reviews: I was stranded at Las Vegas on April th I came in on another airline It arrived late I proceeded to the gate number on my itinerary Got there they had changed the gate number Had to literally run across the airport to the new gate number The flight already took off I had to get the Phoenix plus my heart meds were in my suitcase that was already on its way on the missed flight I went over to the Southwest counter where I was greeted by a very nice gentleman He took care of me got me on the very next flight which was boarding in ten minutes and it was two minutes away from my current location I got on the plane got a great seat Was greeted by a very nice woman and a man I can t thank them all enough All in all I was saved and arrived quickly and without incident
Lemma: strand Las Vegas April th come another airline arrive late proceed gate number itinerary Got change gate number literally run across airport new gate number flight already take get Phoenix plus heart med suitcase already way missed flight go Southwest counter greet nice gentleman take care get next flight board ten minute two minute away current location get plane get great seat greet nice woman man thank enough save arrive quickly without incident

reviews: I have been flying out to Colorado Spring every month for the past months for medical reasons and almost all my Southwest flights are delayed which is costing me more money on wasted hotels rental cars and stress The only thing I can count on is them being late They are rarely on time Their flight times are merely suggestions not actual times you can count on
Lemma: fly Colorado Spring every month past month medical reason almost Southwest flight delay cost money wasted hotel rental car stress thing count late rarely time flight time merely suggestion actual time count

reviews: Reno Vegas As usual flying Southwest out of Reno is a breeze Check in using self service kiosk was effortless as was bag drop We were the only passengers checking in and it was an hour before the flight TSA was empty so went right on through in no time at all Arrived at gate and grabbed a bite to eat and then boarded the plane Full flight usual beverage and snack while in the air Free wifi worked fine but since it s only an hour flight not really time to get too involved with the movies and shows offered Arrived in Vegas and luggage was coming off the belt as we arrived at the carousel Ground staff and cabin crew all did their jobs and made for a pleasant trip No complaints
Lemma: Reno Vegas usual fly Southwest Reno breeze Check use self service kiosk effortless bag drop passenger check hour flight TSA empty go right time Arrived gate grab bite eat board plane Full flight usual beverage snack air Free wifi work fine since hour flight really time get involve movie show offer Arrived Vegas luggage come belt arrive carousel Ground staff cabin crew job make pleasant trip complaint

reviews: I paid for a business select ticket obviously more than an economy ticket only to find out that this does not get you any better class of seat all I got in exchange for more than double the price was the opportunity to board the plane first The seats are the same size as Economy the baggage allowance the same and I was lbs over and they wanted to charge me usd Lucky I has a back pack I could move an item over into Once boarding customers just scramble onto the flight and grab what ever seat they like it reminded me of back in my school days catching the bus home and all us kids racing to grab the best seats The people who ended up sitting next to me just purchased economy seats and had the same exact service as me this is just strange to me that I paid more and got the same seat the same luggage allowance as customers who paid half the price First and last flight with Southwest
Lemma: pay business select ticket obviously economy ticket find get good class seat get exchange double price opportunity board plane first seat size Economy baggage allowance lbs want charge usd Lucky back pack could move item board customer scramble onto flight grab ever seat like remind back school day catch bus home us kid race grab best seat people end sit next purchase economy seat exact service strange pay get seat luggage allowance customer pay half price First last flight Southwest

reviews: Took the Southwest flight from Denver to Ontario and I was lucky that I did The stewardesses were Taylor Melissa and Jennifer and they were fantastic Special shout out to Taylor professional but interactive and attentive They made this flight enjoyable nice work Southwest
Lemma: Took Southwest flight Denver Ontario lucky stewardess Taylor Melissa Jennifer fantastic Special shout Taylor professional interactive attentive make flight enjoyable nice work Southwest

reviews: Had an amazing flight until my husband got sick but then was made great again by super helpful attendants who were very patient and caring and made sure he was alright before letting us leave Thank you so much for having such great staff
Lemma: amazing flight husband get sick make great super helpful attendant patient caring make sure alright let us leave Thank much great staff

reviews: I ve flown SW a lot Usually not a problem March snow in New England geez I got up at am drove miles in storm got there two hours early for am flight No delay notice til am Then a cancellation notice Then a rebook notice on different flight All with in ten minutes ok parked car went to Bradley No one at SWA turned up for work Well guy did Not one SW flight came or went at Bradley Had to book a flight on Delta and pay Ok it snowed Other airlines doing there jobs yeah Thank goodness SW was not able to buy other airlines recently Guess they did not fix issues from XMas debacle
Lemma: flown SW lot Usually problem March snow New England geez get drove mile storm get two hour early flight delay notice til cancellation notice rebook notice different flight ten minute ok park car go Bradley one SWA turn work Well guy one SW flight come go Bradley book flight Delta pay Ok snow airline job yeah Thank goodness SW able buy airline recently Guess fix issue XMas debacle

reviews: Worst airline Flight time was altered via text message a total of times in hours Ended up being delayed just under hours surprise No compensation if under hours of course Requested a pre boarding ticket on check in due to cardiac condition and was not issued the proper designation until we got to the Gate and denied early boarding Staff was rude and unsympathetic

reviews: The very worst I have ever been treated was on Southwest Airlines in Baltimore It was between flights and I needed a wheelchair We had requested a wheelchair in advance but there wasn t one available It took a long time to get to the next flight and the agent for the next flight was rude and treated us like we were the worst passengers ever for being late to the gate While in the loading bridge I made a comment to my husband and said why does she have to be so bxxxxy she heard the comment and forbid me to fly on the flight I am a year old woman who was waiting to have a knee replacement surgery I do not feel that my comment would somehow put anyone in danger The agent did not like my comment and she decided to use her power to punish me I will never forget this as long as I live I will not forget the way this made me feel and what I missed that was caused by her using the power of the FAA giving airline employees the right to treat passengers any way they want I try to avoid flying on Southwest Airlines the employees have become increasingly rude on the ground The flight attendants are not as bad but Southwest was always suppose to be the fun airline This could not be further from the truth It would be so nice to have a seat assignment

reviews: I was scheduled to fly home Wednesday but the flights were cancelled on Tuesday due to predicted snow and rescheduled for Saturday We called because we can t just spend an extra week because of a bit of snow and they insisted that there were no flights until Friday I later found out that they were lying and there were still Wednesday flights that they let other people on They refused to reimburse any expenses that we occurred while being forced to stay half a week then the Saturday flight was delayed and they told us it was impossible to make it home until Sunday They kicked everyone with our destination off the plane then forced us back on so we could no longer sit together in the seats that we had originally sat in and were forced to sit in the middle since everyone moved to the better seats while we were forced off the plane I still haven t made it home and am very upset with how incompetent Southwest has been Yes they are cheap no it is not worth it
Lemma: schedule fly home Wednesday flight cancel Tuesday due predict snow reschedule Saturday call spend extra week bit snow insist flight Friday later find lie still Wednesday flight let people refuse reimburse expense occur force stay half week Saturday flight delay tell us impossible make home Sunday kick everyone destination plane force us back could longer sit together seat originally sit force sit middle since everyone move good seat force plane still make home upset incompetent Southwest Yes cheap worth

reviews: Our flight out of Milwaukee was delayed causing us to miss our connection at Nashville for Panama City Beach I was traveling with my yr old Mother and it was extremely late at night after a long day Every single one of the Southwest employees we interacted with was professional and empathetic and did everything they could to help get us rerouted to a flight the next day hotel and shuttle in Nashville They compensated us very nicely for the inconvenience the next day our luggage was not routed on to PCB the way it would have been The luggage manager Josie at PCB went above and beyond to help get it back for us as soon as possible She was fantastic

reviews: I was at the Clev boarding gates and the gentlemen said my purchased nd seat wasn t printed properly and kept my boarding pass but he would bring it to me once corrected Got on a the plane nothing to hold my nd seat and couldn t get the attention of the flighty stewardess at the front to advise Once the plane was completely full the guy from boarding gates came and loudly announced to the couple next to me that one of them had to move to another flight due to that seat already being purchased After they questioned him since they were there and seating is fcfs he loudly announced in front of entire plane it s because of her size it s a safety issue The entire plane laughed and talked about me the entire flight saying I should have been made to get off I cried the entire flight home of embarrassment since my weight is due to a medical condition SW promised me a LUV voucher for my inconvenience which was routed to the wrong email not one on my complaint and then refused to deal with me any further I am advising please avoid SW if you are of size When I flew American in the past they were much more understanding and private in their interactions about my second seat purchase SW ruined my self esteem and created any future flying with a traumatic experience worrying the same will happen again SW was very blatant and careless about discriminating against someone of size

reviews: I entered Premium Economy as I paid the fee to upgrade my boarding status so I could get a seat in the front of the plane on a preferred aisle seat This was fine in Cancun but when I was to board in Houston passengers who were taken off the plane were allowed to board prior to those of us who had paid for the priority boarding seats and occupied the forward seats despite most not having paid for the seats This also occurred when departing Nashville The only difference being the passengers continuing on who came in on the flight were allowed to remain on the plane and improve their seats prior to our boarding I was forced to more than halfway back in the plane If these people are continuing on they should board in the respective class with those boarding at the gate Southwest is basically stealing the upgrade fee as their terrible policy of disregarding those have paid for early boarding despite those who improve their seats without paying for the privilege In flight wifi entertainment was not working and there are no charging ports or receptacles to charge devices This was my first experience with the airline and I plan on it being the last At least if I pay for Premium Economy or Business class I am able to receive my monies worth The seats were very uncomfortable That is enough I think you get the point I definitely advise you to find another airline

reviews: I m pretty sure that Southwest can not afford to continue to lose passengers I traveled with a week old puppy I paid the fee Which I was ok with until they said I had to check my bag because she counts as my carry on If she counts as my carry on why is there a fee She s not taking up any extra space She weighs less than a normal carry on as well I was told she had to be under the seat for take off and landing but on the plane the flight attendant was extremely rude She told me she had to go back in her pet carrier I explained what I was told and she continued to be extremely rude I proceeded to put her back in her carrier under the seat where she remained The flight attendant came back to ask me my last name and then asked if I she was even a paid pet I proceeded to show her my receipt and the tag on the carrier Stated if she was that concerned she should have checked when I boarded and not half way through the flight I had my jacket on my lap and every time she passed by made me lift my jacket to show she wasn t on my lap Which she never was she remained in the carrier for the remainder of the flight They have lost another customer due to very rude employees If the rule is they have to stay in the carrier for the duration of the flight that should be clearly communicated when checking in Also there is always a polite way to deal with customers but the employees continue to be unnecessarily rude I will make sure to tell everyone that travels with pets my experience from now on Word of mouth travels incredibly fast

reviews: What is going on with SW On a return flight from Puerto Rico to Denver Southwest canceled the second leg of our flight out of Tampa while we re in the air to Tampa citing weather After doing much research and having our local news look into this it appears that only the SW flights were canceled into Denver other airlines were arriving as scheduled The actual statistic for that evening were of SW flights were cancelled into Denver and less than of other airlines were cancelled The FAA did not issue any closures or delays to Denver I can t imagine why weather would be an excuse when no one else was using it After talking to the agents we kept being told that there were no other flights that evening when in reality there were We just weren t offered those flights And yes there was availability according to the website And they weren t canceled We received some of the most unapologetic uncaring and disingenuous treatment from Southwest Airlines across the board From the gate agent to the ticketing agent to the baggage agent to the customer service rep After leaving the airport because our flight was changed to a AM flight the following day I called to inquire again if there were better flights I had to wait ONE to TWO hours just to speak to a live person Our options to return were an early morning flight or an evening flight for a non stop flight There was no way I was going to chance taking a flight with a layover anywhere Southwest is not to be trusted and I didn t want to get into a situation where we were then stranded at yet another airport I don t know what is going on with Southwest and why their business model is falling apart SW used to be my go to airline we even had the credit card but have since retired it due to the airline s inconsistency with flights If SW thinks it s ok to strand passengers in random places just to make their customary playbook profitable then they are not focusing on what is important The local news received a disingenuous reply from a SW rep regarding our situation but also showed some telling facts Many of the flights we proactively canceled at the start of today were in anticipation of operational conditions in Denver Southwest cancelled our flight in the morning and we were not notified until we were in the air on our way to Tampa If we had been notified we would have chosen to stay at our own expense in San Juan to spend more time with our family but we were not given that option Other airlines always lets us know when a flight is going to be delayed or cancelled and they do this in advance and they let us change our flight to a time that works for us SW does not offer this Their system is antiquated and not user friendly We are disgusted with the treatment we received They are losing loyal customers left and right Why do they keep treating your passengers this way Shame on you Southwest

reviews: I had SWA tickets from ONT to ATL with a connection in Dallas Southwest clearly lost control of their operation on and stranded me in Vegas Ok there was ice in Dallas but I would have been happy to keep my hotel room and car another day to avoid being stranded They kept telling me to come to the airport as they had rescheduled my flight Instead they cancelled my flight FIVE times and promised me each time that I could reach my destination on time I asked if there was any chance of missing my connection and SW said no I think they were fabricating stories because they got me to give up my hotel room rental car One time in ONT they pushed off from the gate and rode around on the runway and then parked right back at the gate It was hot in the plane and full of fumes I got sick on the plane Once parked again I got off the plane and tried to talk to some one ANYONE who could help but there was just one ticket person and a long line of angry customers I never was able to schedule another connection in Ontario At one point they said they would take my luggage off the plane and then said they wouldnt So I got back on the plane prefering to be stranded with luggage rather than without These Southwest people are rude and crude and have no idea what they are telling people Why do they feel they have to tell people things that aren t true Is it just some power trip and they enjoy wrecking the plans of their customers Anyhow I eventually landed in Vegas and once again there was no one who knew what was going on No one could tell me how to get home to Atlanta I had a boarding pass for the flight to Atlanta but when I tried to use it they said the boarding pass was no good Some SWA jerk grabbed it out of my hands and said Hmm it says it s for Atlanta Anyhow they told me to go talk to customer service so I lost my seating assignment At customer service they printed out another ticket and said to go get on the plane I tried and again the boarding pass was not working The whole time they were acting as if this was my fault even though it was their obvious flawed way of doing things Any airline this bad should not be allowed to fly They are completely unsympathetic Just rude and nasty if you express simple concerns about your schedule or luggage In one breath they blame it on flight control tell you what flight to get on and then it all turns out to be bogus information Keep in mind that Southwest perpetuated this mess over three days Maybe somewhere someone was working on it but you could have fooled me They looked like idiots and no one had any confidence in what they were saying Southwest made a lot of people desperate for no reason Ok there was ice in Dallas but Southwest made the situation times worse by telling people their flights were still taking off and convincing people to come to the airport This made some people a bit panicky for no reason other than a few airline people wanting to look like they had all the answers In fact their systems were failing their people were confused and untrained and they reacted rudely and aggressively

reviews: My flight was originally a total of hr mins and we were rescheduled one night prior and informed that we would not only be leaving earlier but a hr layover was added in another city with no explanation given This turned out trip into a hour trip This inconvenienced my family greatly Also I traveled with military personnel who is family my entire trip and had no issues anywhere else except for when staff at Gate refused to allow us back with our group We traveled as a group of he scanned of our passes and refused to scan the other and sent us to the end of the line ultimately separating us and causing issues with our seating This staff was not pleasant and did not allow our military personnel guest use her benefits properly even after we already spent hours in the USO after once again being inconvenienced This was my first time flying with Southwest Airlines and I was not pleased at all I am not sure I ll be back

reviews: My wife and I have been traveling on Southwest for nearly three decades and generally appreciate their service or that they do their best to be helpful when travel plans go sideways In fact we just had a trip through Southwest Vacations that was fantastic Our latest experience with them however has been both eye opening and frustrating We had booked flights for February nd from Puerto Vallarta to Reno with a connection in Phoenix We had flight from Puerto Vallarta to Phoenix and then flight from Phoenix to Reno We received an email from Southwest notifying us that our flights were changed from Puerto Vallarta to Denver and then Denver to Reno We had seen this Denver connection when we were initially booking our trip however we did not want to fly from Mexico to Denver in the dead of the winter Too much of a chance of being stuck in Mexico I went on the Southwest website and could see that our original flights through Phoenix and on to Reno were still there and they were still selling tickets for these flights I called Southwest customer service and asked that our flights be changed back to our original flights The customer service representative changed us back to the original flight Puerto Vallarta to Phoenix but informed us here s where things got wonky that we could no longer choose our original Phoenix to Reno flight because the two flights were no longer linked in their system I asked her what she meant by that Apparently Southwest links certain flights together so when you search for a flight from A to B with a connection in between it will only show you these linked flights There may be other connecting flights that are departing earlier or later depending on your needs but you will not see them because they are not linked flights in their system So our original flights were linked when we booked them but were then unlinked and changed by Southwest to Denver And when I tried to change them back I was told that is no longer an option because those two flights are no longer linked The only linked flight through Phoenix was a hour and minute layover in Phoenix and then a flight stopping in Vegas and traveling on to Reno I pointed out to Southwest that there was an earlier flight through Vegas and on to Reno with only a hour and minute layover I was told that was not an option because that was not a linked flight Seriously You changed our flights You un linked our original flights and refuse to do anything to restore our original flights or alleviate the lengthy delay you left us with C mon Southwest you can do better At the end of most flights the flight attendant will say We know you have a choice in flying and we thank you for flying Southwest And so my wife and I will spend our hour and minute layover contemplating our future travel plans and considering if it s time to exercise that choice

reviews: We were part of the mess at the end of December Got the notice while we were on a cruise I immediately booked a car one way realising flights were not an option that time of year and would be super expensive I feel extremely sorry for stories I ve heard I feel really bad for the employees of Southwest Someone needs to get their act together for sure We were refunded all travel and receipts sent in within weeks We are good I hold no grudges
Lemma: part mess end December Got notice cruise immediately book car one way realise flight option time year would super expensive feel extremely sorry story heard feel really bad employee Southwest Someone need get act together sure refund travel receipt sent within week good hold grudge

reviews: I have had more than one issue with Southwest the past times and am absolutely disgusted I was forced to give up my seat to other people after I boarded first as an A class member Then the airline lost my luggage on my flight home because it turns out they decided not to put it on the plane and when I was told it would arrive and I would be contacted I wasn t I was called at am and woken up Then I had booked a flight home Dec to fly home after life saving surgery to spend Christmas with my family until my flight was canceled twice so I ended up having to spend Christmas alone and lost money due to paid appointments thanks to Southwest I rebooted my flight and requested assistance which was not given after I specifically told them I couldn t lift per Dr Orders but didn t get help until second time where I had to go through security again andI had to pay fora carry on bag I was told I would get a flight credit due to SW canceling my trip because they sent my mom one When I called to ask about it again they told me I don t get one after I had been waiting for the email I was promised I am beyond disgusted as a customer and if the situation is not handled I will not be using SW again and will make sure to tell everyone I know not to use them either They are a dishonest company who doesn t care about their customers or taking care of them as promised I understand mistakes happen but what happened to me is not acceptable and won t be tolerated I deserve respect and for SW to keep their word I m tired of being told no one will do anything for me I have flown SW for yrs with no problems until recently when it been nothing but awful and I m considering switching airlines from now on

reviews: We were one of the lucky ones to make it to our destination as we are coming in for a cruise With all the issues Southwest was having creating the perfect storm I cannot say enough about our crew heading to Houston They were so friendly and helpful with us get to our connecting flight which was leaving minutes before we landed Our Captain on the connecting flight to Fort Lauderdale waited for my family and others being the last flight out that night He said he wasn t leaving anyone behind Truly grateful The baggage assistant in Phoenix was great too Our first flight was delayed hours but all the staff sure made everything great by staying positive Bravo SW employees Hopefully the airline will fix all the glitches for their customers and employees Certainly have been through a lot this past week

reviews: Ridiculous disaster that is embarrassing to say the least They didn t update their scheduling software I have had to buy another ticket with another airline two days later than I was due home I ve missed work had to pay for two more nights in a hotel than expected The weather was bad in some parts of the country but other airlines are up and on schedule Not Southwest because of all those canceled flights Southwest was responsible for percent of those cancellations This was my first and last time flying Southwest Shame on you Southwest you have failed a lot of people in this country
Lemma: Ridiculous disaster embarrass say least update scheduling software buy another ticket another airline two day later due home missed work pay two night hotel expect weather bad part country airline schedule Southwest cancel flight Southwest responsible percent cancellation first last time fly Southwest Shame Southwest fail lot people country

reviews: I was scheduled to fly out of Omaha Nebraska on December at p m My flight was delayed twice and then eventually canceled This has been quite a fiasco Southwest offered no help whatsoever to the people who were on these flights I waited in line at the airport for two hours to get a refund on my flight When I finally reached the agent I was offered a voucher that would expire within months however I was told that they could not refund my money at that time I would have to call their customer service line I have tried calling been unsuccessful have been on hold and disconnected six times in total have spent hours on hold Just trying to get a refund for a flight that this airline themselves canceled Reason for cancellation was not leather related It was due to the fact that Southwest agents overbooked flights that they had no crew to fly I will never in my life flying Southwest again three times I have flown Southwest I have had issues every time This is an absolutely horrible horrible airline The true sadness for myself is that I was going to see my two grandsons that I haven t seen in nearly years Also going to see my mother who has had stage four cancer This airline has done nothing for anybody to reconcile the cost the heartache the time that we have wasted and that has been stolen from us For those future travelers do yourself a favor and even if you have to pay a little bit more for a different flight also Do not fly Southwest airlines

reviews: Stellar Employees at Southwest ground crew attendants Pilots etc True dedication to their work and doing their best during these challenging times Our Flight was delayed multiple times during that time I was able to do some research as to what was going on Due to severe storm activity across the country many airlines had to cancel flights Southwest included I understand people being upset but what I appreciate is Southwests ongoing communication to let their passengers know ahead of time that the Airline and Flights were experiencing Irregular Operations they clearly assure their passengers ahead of time If your flight was canceled and you would like a refund please submit a request So I went fully knowing my flight could be cancelled Of course multiple delays the ground crew communicated with us multiple times telling us they were doing what they could that something had happened to their network could have it been hacked or challenges with having to cancel flights due to storm activity Regardless this airline wouldn t have cancelled if they felt the airways were safe or they had the capacity Then to our amazement they were able to organize the crew offline and get us on our flight home These are trying times shutdowns due to mysterious viruses freaky weather Some things can t always be controlled or predicted but the response is what matters Southwest is doing a great job despite the circumstances and I will continue to fly with this airline

reviews: Delayed flight x just to be told it s cancelled literally seconds before boarding We waited hours in line to rebook the next flight tomorrow Tomorrow comes same thing happens They delay our flight x once again After that I knew they were bound to cancel at the last minute once again So I left to go home without even rebooking I checked my email and surprise they cancelled it last minute before boarding I feel bad for the passengers who had hope and stayed waiting all night Thanks Southwest for ruining my family s Christmas and thousands of other s as well I guess if I want to visit my family on holidays I ll remember to never book Southwest Truly unacceptable and unforgivable I m paying more to fly Delta now Learned my lesson I forgot to mention they sent all our luggage without us So my clothes toiletry belongings and necessities are halfway across the country from me

reviews: On Saturday I was at the airport by for my boarding of Flt to Manchester I m always early It was delayed to then cancelled by Got on line no flights to Manchester so I booked one to Boston that stopped in Tennessee first I think that was Flt scheduled for PM landing after midnight I took it I will pay the for car service to get to New Hampshire I went downstairs got my bags from the Manchester flt checked them for the Boston Flight Went through security again At that flight cancelled They told me I could rebook for Monday morning flt several stops but you stay on the plane to Boston get in hours later I booked it I was told my bags would be downstairs again I went downstairs was told over over again by the staff downstairs my bags would be down as soon as they could hours later when the baggage doors closed I was told no more bags coming down I could speak to a manager but there were no managers downstairs I could go upstairs I did guess what no manager there either I went home bagless exhausted I asked at least ten time was told the bags will be here There was no real security watching these bags I had the Christmas gifts for my family in one bag all my winter clothes in the other I would have left if I felt they would be secure I wish I had I stayed home Christmas my rd flt was cancelled I tried calling Southwest on hold the first time hours had to hang up then hours on hold then disconnected I went back to the airport on Got on line AM to try again to get a flt to Manchester I was on that line for hours The reason it was so long is that we were not important to Southwest They had sometimes employees at the counter sometime all of the Southwest employees would take the A list people that just walked into there lane that haven t waited more then minutes So basically the group of over to over people were left with sometimes one person who was at the end of the counter to assist them in finding a new flight How disgusting How belittling to treat your customers with such disrespect I finally rebooked now for the last time I m going to try to get to Manchester on Now I go downstairs to get my luggage you know it not happening Its no where to be found so what are my options a line hours later I get into the luggage counter and ask where is my luggage My last flight was flight cancelled yesterday Well the young man says one bag in is Boston one is still in Tampa I didn t go to Boston but my bag got a spot I told him the other bag is not here I looked for it several times He said well it could be on a cart somewhere we don t have the staff to look for it You had the staff to send one of them to Boston Was it an A list bag I asked how do I get my bags He said once you land in Manchester you can request your bags What Now you want me to get in line in another state I know that Boston doesn t fly to Manchester So what you re telling me is they will fly my bags somewhere else then to Manchester Do I get the mileage points or do my bags get them Also by the time my bags get to Manchester if in fact they do find them I will either be in NY or back in Tampa The only warm clothes I own are in one of those bags He said there was nothing he could do to help

reviews: Don t think I would ever fly this airline again during holiday season They cancelled two flights in my son in Denver telling passenger s the last minute and all the whole saying the flight was delayed Then they refused to even offer any accommodations to stranded flyers who had to spend Xmas eve and Xmas day on the airport floor We waited hours in hold to try to get another flight Horrible experience all the way around They also had no flights into Monday and cancelled my other sons flight on Tuesday We ended up using United much better
Lemma: think would ever fly airline holiday season cancel two flight son Denver tell passenger last minute whole say flight delay refuse even offer accommodation stranded flyer spend Xmas eve Xmas day airport floor wait hour hold try get another flight Horrible experience way around also flight Monday cancel son flight Tuesday end use United much good

reviews: Weather delays and even cancellations as happened on are to be expected However my daughter and her family were on two cancelled flights today They were told that they couldn t give them their luggage and that it could be days and that they wouldn t call them They just wanted their bags so that could drive to their destination I ve never heard of a cancelled flight where they can t give passengers their bags off of the cancelled flight in the middle of the day and they couldn t begin to know how many days it would take to get their bags back Not because they were lost because they wouldn t take the bags of the plane No transparency no competence no compassion and no urgency to serve customers They should be ashamed
Lemma: Weather delay even cancellation happen expect However daughter family two cancelled flight today tell give luggage could day call want bag could drive destination never hear cancelled flight give passenger bag cancelled flight middle day begin know many day would take get bag back lose take bag plane transparency competence compassion urgency serve customer ashamed

reviews: What a terrible experience On arrival we wait an hour on the tarmac for a parking space On departure we wait hours for more passengers not to simply board but because they had seats to fill Never again I suggest anyone considering Southwest to immediately think otherwise if you have a life or a schedule to keep
Lemma: terrible experience arrival wait hour tarmac parking space departure wait hour passenger simply board seat fill Never suggest anyone consider Southwest immediately think otherwise life schedule keep

reviews: Was all set to fly home today after a day trip away from my husband Checked my flight status before I left for the airport and all was well Get to the air port and go to check my bags terminal says my flight has been canceled Lady at the desk had absolutely no sympathy and wouldn t help anyone from the dozens of canceled flights She just told us to rebook online or through the app I couldn t get another flight for days so I am stranded here for days All other airlines wanted for a ticket any sooner than that Absolutely shameful and disgusting to be gouging prices like that This has completely ruined my holiday and caused my depression to sky rocket Thanks a lot Southwest
Lemma: set fly home today day trip away husband Checked flight status leave airport well Get air port go check bag terminal say flight cancel Lady desk absolutely sympathy help anyone dozen canceled flight tell us rebook online app get another flight day strand day airline want ticket sooner Absolutely shameful disgust gouge price like completely ruin holiday cause depression sky rocket Thanks lot Southwest

reviews: We are family of three myself husband and our infant and frequent Southwest travelers since last years We were scheduled to fly out to and fro to Dallas from LGA on Thursday Dec Before we even started to the airport our flight got cancelled It makes total sense given the circumstances of thunderstorm just the previous day We got our flights rebooked for Saturday Dec The rebooked flight had stopover at Chicago MDW before reaching to DAL Right before boarding the flight at LGA the gate agent informed us about the cancelled flight from MDW to DAL Since we did not have a place to stay in MDW we cancelled the whole trip and informed the gate agent about our decision However our bags got checked in and could not be taken out from the flight For the next two days Sunday and Monday I have been going to the airport and standing in line for hrs on each day because no one responds to the phone My wife has been on phone to get hold of an agent for almost hrs everyday but in vain Following are the major issues with Southwest In the name of winter storm there are coming with lame excuses There is impact of storm from Wednesday till Friday Every major airline except Southwest recovered from it and resumed their operations However Southwest has major operational meltdown everywhere This is fact You lift the damn phone and answer the customers You are causing agony and anxiety by ripping apart our once in a year holiday break Our Checked in bags are gone money did not get refunded vacation is gone peace of mind is gone Shame on you Southwest Operations Team I feel bad for their customer representatives who take all the anxiety from customers Where is the operations head at Southwest LGA Face the customers accept the fault and take appropriate measures to get the trust back

reviews: I had my flight scheduled for Christmas Day looked at the app before heading to the airport all was well It wasn t until after dropping off my bags and getting through security did I notice an overwhelming number of people at each gates Doubled checked the monitor to see if there were any changes and there was About a minute delay to my Midway connection before heading to Minneapolis St Paul Maybe minutes later I checked the app and it said the connection was cancelled I did not receive a text notification that it was cancelled Talk about lack of visibility Tried making it easier on the airline by rebooking my own flight through the app didn t work tried the website also didn t work Kept receiving an error code Mind you I have no luggage on me I checked all of it Then I wait hours in the guest services line while trying to reach their phone line to be instructed that I could ve been rebooked on another flight but it just had left so it was a time and place thing which could ve been solved if the app or website was working or even if I had received a notification earlier in the day They then rebooked me for another flight for the th that was then cancelled at am this morning I swear it was a ghost flight to hold people over to be disappointed another day later It s AM and I waited on the phone for hours to be disconnected My luggage is in an unknown location and I am utterly frustrated and sad I am lucky I only have to think about myself traveling but I can t help think about the families with children and elderly those travelling to see their loved ones

reviews: I do the majority of the travel for people I and my family are extremely upset with SW This past year with all the canceled and delayed flights it has been a nightmare Most all of these flights were DAL MCO and RT on non stops But we pushed through hoping it would get better trying to understand Birthday flights to Orlando disastereous with seriously delayed flights For of our party Costing us empty non refundable hotel rooms theme park tickets and the stress of all of us not being togther for my birthday Canceled flight for trying to get to HHN at Universal Studious Tickets bought and and a hotel room unused and non refundable These two stick out but the worst of all is our Christmas flights My husband and I were set to fly to MCO on a non stop and Christmas eve as we try to check in to find I get a seat and he does not SW split us up and put my husband on standby with people in front of him To make matters worse just hours before we have to drive an hour a half to DAL cant get anyone on the Phone We were left on eternal hold hung up on times and upon calling back received several busy signals The bottom line SW ruined our Christmas Again we had non refundable hotels stays And the memories we missed are priceless to us AND this morning they canceled our minor childs flight on a non stop from ATL DAL She was supposed to be home today but now she can t get home until Thursday I don t need excuses about the weather There is no weather in the south If there is a problem where ever to Dal pull out a plane from the hanger DAL it is their hub Stop over booking Your airline has cost me in unused non refundable rooms in unused park tickets and stress for our family ALL year We missed out on happy memories to be replaced with anger and frustration We will be closing all our SW Rapid rewards accounts and our Chase SW Credit cards They are no longer reliable We can not count on Southwest Airlines for our family trips They cost us more then money but memories We have an up coming flight to HNL that we are price shopping to other airlines because of their unreliability I am just heartbroken What happened to SW

reviews: Booked this ticket for myself and my sons Unfortunately the day before the scheduled departure date I had to change the departure date due to a flu The change costed each The following day just before boarding one of my sons didn t feel good and had to go back home I informed the person at the gate that my son was not travelling gave him is name I even noticed he wrote Giovanny instead of Giovanni Once in Vegas I called Southwest and asked for a credit but they said that my son s ticket was cancelled due to a no show they even cancelled the return ticket therefore my son could not join us This was a very disappointing experience and I found a serious lack of professionalism with both gate employees and customer service agents I will not fly again with Southwest

reviews: We were booked direct from Bozeman MT to Houston TX on the same physical plane with the same flight number but with a brief stop in Denver We arrived at Denver No one told us the plane needed maintenance and that we needed to deplane and reboard We deduced this from the complete deplaning of passengers and when we asked about the circumstances were treated by SW employees like complete idiots We managed to barely make our connecting flight and then board I sat directly over the baggage loading bay and saw all the transfer bags which did not include ours My wife mentioned this to the flight and gate crew She was literally verbally assaulted and told to mind her own business and shut up Of course we arrived in Houston without our luggage which somehow ended up in Dallas Our luggage finally made it to Houston airport at pm the next day after which the people contracted to deliver our luggage unloaded it at the wrong hotel It is hours later we still haven t got our luggage comforted only by the knowledge that it is somewhere in Houston with indeterminate wait times on the phone trying to connect with a human being Southwest Airlines is a caricature of a budget airline that specializes in cutting corners and offering horrific service

reviews: I have flown faithfully with Southwest for many years and I ve never had to cancel a flight But my boyfriend was ill and didn t want to expose anyone to whatever he had so we choose to cancel When we bought our tickets it said in bold print no cancellation fee And I looked at the small print papers and they also said no cancellation fee will be incurred When I called to cancel the first person said there is a dollar cancellation fee I asked to speak to a higher person and they told me I have no choice to accept fee or lose all the money At first I accepted it Then I read their policy over and over and again it said no cancellation fees I called back and spoke to someone and said this is not acceptable your policy clearly states no cancellation fees I had to fight with this person and I told them I will see them in court and call news crews They finally gave me back my dollars I still have the policy and no fees incurred on my phone I m disappointed that they know their policy but yet try to lie and and steal money from their clients My boyfriend is a lawyer and I m an educated women and had to fight for my rights How many people have paid the fee that shouldn t have The airline clearly are stealing from people The public needs to be aware of these deceptive practices I m sure they know what they are doing When I called it was the same person answering and using different names Shame on him Shame on Southwest

reviews: Terrible experience with zero communication Passengers understand that weather is out of personal control of the staff however there should always be a responsibility to communicate when plans must change rather than leaving everyone guessing or to their own devices trying to figure out how they can return home with no options provided Even if the news is bad it needs to be delivered We sat on a plane for and hours for what was supposed to be a hour flight then proceeded to land in the wrong city to wait an additional hour on the tarmac all the while being promised that the plane would be moving soon The only reason this review is not a zero is because I was eventually able to see my checked bag again which I assumed was going to be lost along with all the time I spent waiting to get to my destination
Lemma: Terrible experience zero communication Passengers understand weather personal control staff however always responsibility communicate plan must change rather leave everyone guessing device try figure return home option provide Even news bad need deliver sit plane hour suppose hour flight proceed land wrong city wait additional hour tarmac promise plane would move soon reason review zero eventually able see checked bag assume go lose along time spend wait get destination

reviews: I liked Southwest We booked the trip during one of their low fare specials We didn t experience any delays or boarding issues at all In fact we had a total of flights to and from our destination and we landed about minutes early for all of them Flight attendants and gate attendants were friendly Even the staff at the bag drop was friendly I really think you receive the energy you give to people So I greeted them with a smile and they returned with great customer service The only thing I will say is that since there aren t different boarding classes it can be a cramped ride Two of our flights were booked to capacity which means there wasn t any extra space or stretching room for your arms or legs It can be uncomfortable Still the inflight movies snacks helped to ease the cramped space blues I would recommend Early bird check in to try to get A or B section boarding to accommodate your carry on and seat preference Some of the travelers in the C section had to check their carry on luggage at the last minute because the A B sections used all of the overhead bins The airlines have a lot of no hassle policies which I like free checked bags Free movies live TV Decent fares Free cancellation and changes I probably wouldn t use the airlines for flights over hours just because of the seating tightness I m and even I found the seats a bit squished for my liking I felt bad for my husband s knees and back Other than that I ll book again for shorter routes

reviews: I used to be a big fan of SW That was before they ruined our family vacation and treated us poorly We were taking our grandchildren to the balloon festival in Albequerque when Southwest cancelled the second leg of our flight and dumped of us in Houston at midnight without even telling us My grandson saw his bag being pulled off the plane and the flight crew walked out leaving of us sitting on the plane We had to run after them and it was so sorry call back tomorrow Yeah good luck finding a hotel we can t help Five of us were able to get out the next morning but we missed the last balloon flight of the festival and spent the next day Sunday just trying to get home Oh yeah we got a voucher per ticket The hotel we finally found at am cost more than that plus the hotel night we paid for in Albuquerque that we didn t use We ve bought more than airline flights in the last year not one was on Southwest We are absolutely disgusted with Southwest and will never fly them again

reviews: We attempted to book a flight from BWI to Indianapolis for Sunday October and wanted to use miles We were in the process of putting in the information to purchase the ticket and got a notice that we needed to purchase additional miles We purchased in additional miles to have enough for the ticket and then continued to enter the rest of our information for the ticket When we clicked purchase we got an error message and it said to call the airline Upon speaking with a Southwest Airlines representative we were told that the flight was now sold out So frustrating We then asked for our money back for the miles we could no longer use and were told that they were non refundable Apparently Southwest thinks it s ok to spend and not even get a ticket for it When I asked to speak with a supervisor I was told that they would forward my case to Corporate Customer Relations and that we d hear from them in business days We just received a call from a Customer Relations representative and all he did was explain that he wouldn t refund the money and that it was their policy The entire process is a bait and switch and should be banned Southwest Airlines should stop these fraudulent practices and refund customer s money when they can t give them a ticket We plan to avoid Southwest Airlines whenever we can Watch out
Lemma: attempt book flight BWI Indianapolis Sunday October want use mile process put information purchase ticket get notice need purchase additional mile purchase additional mile enough ticket continue enter rest information ticket click purchase get error message say call airline Upon speak Southwest Airlines representative tell flight sell frustrate ask money back mile could longer use tell non refundable Apparently Southwest think ok spend even get ticket ask speak supervisor tell would forward case Corporate Customer Relations hear business day receive call Customer Relations representative explain refund money policy entire process bait switch ban Southwest Airlines stop fraudulent practice refund customer money give ticket plan avoid Southwest Airlines whenever Watch

reviews: Still waiting on our luggage Southwest Airlines is getting on my last nerve We were told at that they located our luggage and once it arrived to Charlotte they would verify that it was our luggage then they would call me and let me know it was there and they would deliver it Yes they called and the person asked how long we were going to be here because they didn t want to deliver it tonight The girls attitude sucked we never raised our voice or freaked out We were polite to every person we spoke to We went along with everything they said I don t know how they misplace every piece of luggage we checked I could possibly understand one or even two pieces But all But to call us and give us attitude because they have to deliver it to us They should have done their job to begin with and deliver it to us at the terminal when they were supposed to then we wouldn t be in this situation We are exhausted and fed up with all of it Southwest Airlines I m flying without you next time around

reviews: Southwest has given affordable flights and continues to so I enjoy traveling with them My complaint isn t the flight itself its about the boarding I pay extra to fly business class so that I can board early and get my pick of seats Over the past year I ve sat back and watched more and more people pre boarding It is obvious that of the pre boarders aren t disabled they have just learned the system and are abusing it All passengers see it and recognize the problem but yet Southwest has done nothing My wife flies with me through my campaign pass but she never boards in the same group as I board We apply for our boarding pass at the same time and she ends up people behind me When will Southwest fix this problem I ve voiced both problems to flight attendants and I m always told that they are aware of the problem and that they get lots of complaints about it I m rating this out of because I m always upset when boarding Ruins a portion of the flight every time
Lemma: Southwest give affordable flight continue enjoy travel complaint flight boarding pay extra fly business class board early get pick seat past year sat back watch people pre board obvious pre boarder disable learn system abuse passenger see recognize problem yet Southwest do nothing wife fly campaign pas never board group board apply boarding pas time end people behind Southwest fix problem voiced problem flight attendant always tell aware problem get lot complaint rating always upset board Ruins portion flight every time

reviews: This is the worst airline service in The United States by long stretch This airline has managed to make what should be simple into a complicated mess with their seating program If you have to be somewhere on time or if you have to be at an event that is time dependent do not fly this airline You will be late and there will be multiple delays or delays then a cancellation following right after This airline doesn t cancel early ever if they cancel a flight it s last minute when they calculate it isn t worth a flight They do not care if you depended on them this airline will bend you over with no remorse or second thoughts This is the airline that will get you to places but that could mean between days after your scheduled flight because of delays and cancellations at the last minute due to not selling enough tickets but this is how this business conducts its service Soon enough they ll be going out of business and I can t wait to see this lousy airline become a part of airline bankruptcy history I will never fly this airline again I would rather drive or walk to my destination I am not impressed by this airlines performance Their service has dropped below its competitors

reviews: I have made multiple purchases for a flight and both times the money has gotten put back into my account The first time I called them and they said it was a banking problem so I called my bank and they said it was nothing on their end called southwest customer service again after I made my second purchase which was more then the first time I bought a ticket and they said everything should be fine and that the confirmation code was verified and nothing should go wrong A couple days after wards it happened again so I just called southwest and was on hold for an entire hour just for them to tell me that I need to go to the airport and do it there I cannot do it online or by any other card and it needs to be purchased at the airport My flight is suppose to be in a week so there is no guarantees that seats will still be open I have a job so I can t go for another days and my airport is almost hours away from me This is ridiculous I m just trying to go visit a friend in college but now I have to deal with this I have used southwest many other times and had no problems I thought it was reliable airline but after this I don t want to fly with them

reviews: LAX RNO I never seem to have any problems with Southwest and it s been that way for years now Mind you flying in and out of Reno is always super easy Check in at LAX was a breeze as was security We were kept informed as to the minute delay Both ground staff and cabin crew were just fine The usual Southwest beverage and snack provided which is fine for a flight under an hour Flight was quick smooth and uneventful Luggage arrived with no hassle and we were on our way home within minutes after landing
Lemma: LAX RNO never seem problem Southwest way year Mind fly Reno always super easy Check LAX breeze security keep inform minute delay ground staff cabin crew fine usual Southwest beverage snack provide fine flight hour Flight quick smooth uneventful Luggage arrive hassle way home within minute land

reviews: San Diego Jam packed terminal absolutely no seating for the entire day I stood for hours Multiple delays and two flight re bookings from AM until PM in San Diego when I finally boarded the last flight out of San Diego to Chicago trying to get to Washington DC I was assured by the gate agent that I would make my connection from Chicago to DC I missed it by minutes Arrived at MDW in the middle of the night No open restaurants in the airport Took shuttle to expensive hotel not in my budget to say the least No room service Closed for the night No meal vouchers no compensation offered Spent for a hour stay Southwest claimed weather related issues but other airlines were taking off from San Diego in the fog Why not Southwest The truth is I overheard personnel flight attendants gate agents discussing missing co workers Saying that the delays were weather related let them off the hook for any compensations to abandoned passengers Flight four of four Jam packed terminal in Houston waiting for flight to San Diego Screaming yr old screaming year old same family in terminal waiting for our flight The family three women held these screaming children on their laps in the terminal for an hour never letting them down to walk or run Then on the airplane they sat in the seats behind me I was in the bulkhead seat along side a handicapped man For the duration of the three hour flight the young inexperienced mother did nothing to quiet her children while she read a book She gave them no toys did not talk to them just let them kick the seats in front of them non stop squirt juice onto the head of the handicapped man all the while letting out non stop ear piercing blood curdling screams I have travelled with toddlers before many times I know it can be difficult but this was a parenting issue The flight attendant was just a few feet away so could not miss what was going on The handicapped man asked the flight attendant to intervene multiple times Only twice she spoke gently to the mother who responded They are children What am I supposed to do She was completely unapologetic The flight attendant never spoke in a firm manner with her as she should have I can t help but think that if the screaming kicking person were an adult the plane would have been landed at the nearest airport and an arrest would have occurred with head spinning speed Why is such torture of other passengers tolerated There was a lot that could have been done to alleviate the situation Do children s rights trump adult s rights One of those screaming children did not even pay for a seat as we adults did My seat mate and I agreed that even though we have both been die hard Southwest customers for decades I am and I have been flying on you since you were a baby airline we said to each other that we would never again willingly fly Southwest It has become a cattle car with none of the humor or comeraderie that used to make it bearable to fly in seats intended to fit middle schoolers Bye Southwest

reviews: Santa Ana to Portland via San Jose Our group of persons paid the add on fee of Early Bird for our round trip Our trip down went as booked However Sept we did our online check in hours ahead and had been assigned A early bird boarding for both legs of our returning flights Yesterday Oct we got to the airport to check in only to find out we had been reassigned to C group on first leg and B group on nd leg At this point we still had NO IDEA our entire itinerary had been changed I paid an additional fee to upgrade to A boarding the other in my group kept their C group We were all confused and angry We got down to the gate only to realize we were not even on flight anymore but we were now on a flight to San Jose and our SJC to PDX was also different So we were no longer on our pm flight out of Santa Ana to San Jose We had been moved to a pm flight because we found out our Portland connection flight had been cancelled So because they had changed our itinerary at am on we no longer had A group early bird boarding assigned We were now stuck in C boarding which was why I had been told I had to pay another upgrade fee so that I would still be in A group The agent checking us in never even realized what had happened to us She was very nice but her explanations to us were NOT accurate She never even told us we were no longer on our pm flight As far as I m concerned ALL of this was horrible SW airlines service We were never consulted on any changes or choices that were made for us When we did our initial online check in we were in A group for our original reservation flights When they changed us they did not give us our PrePaid early bird check ins for those new flights In addition in reality they should never have changed our first flight either because we could have just had an extended layover of hours in San Jose but still had our pre assigned A group for that portion I am unhappy and VERY dissatisfied If they are moving flights they need to be sure they can still honor their own early bird boarding on the flights they are moving their customers to I am giving them a very low rating because they did not honor the early bird options that our group of had chosen when we made our original reservations and also PAID for In addition I m giving the ticket agent a rating because while she was a very nice woman she should have been able to figure out and tell us that all these changes had been made Instead I just paid another for something I had already paid additional for early check in and A group boarding

reviews: My parents husband and I flew from Maui to Phoenix My dad is in wheelchair and needs assistance They said only one of us could accompany him however since seats are first come first serve it would have split the four of us up We wanted to be near my parents to help them with anything they needed They made an exception and let us all go together This was never an issue with any other airlines That was really the only hiccup that we had However Wi Fi connection was not good for other people that paid for it Our flight attendants were fantastic they made the long flight fun

reviews: I wanted to provide a glowing review for Josey Ventura Southwest OPS Agent for my flight from Las Vegas to San Antonio Josey was amazing I can t believe what a positive experience she gave my son yrs and myself We had been in the airport all day long due to a missed flight TSA was back out of the literal door at the airport Josey was so kind to us made my son feel welcome and excited to fly and gave us an incredible experience after a very disappointing and expensive day She made sure to take care of us so that we were all in order for our flight and were comfortable and ready to board I am very grateful for her amazing service and please promote this woman She needs to represent your company in the upper echelons She was fantastic

reviews: Nashville to Philadelphia This is next to the worst airline I have ever flown Bizarre It s a free for all finding a seat on the plane No assigned seats Just get onboard and find a seat really It s low class budget Employees obviously are not compensated well Flight attendants are flippant and think they are comedians They absolutely suck I routinely fly Delta and opt for AA from time to time but was forced to fly SW due to last minute changes Flight was delayed waiting for another SW that was late SW screwed up so now passenger pays the price instead of SW I cannot say enough bad things It s just trashy Plane looks like it was manufactured in the s No WiFi No beverages were served because it was going to be a turbulent flight Not a bump was experienced the entire flight Pay more and fly a real airline that attempts to serve the passenger
Lemma: Nashville Philadelphia next bad airline ever fly Bizarre free find seat plane assign seat get onboard find seat really low class budget Employees obviously compensate well Flight attendant flippant think comedian absolutely suck routinely fly Delta opt AA time time force fly SW due last minute change Flight delay wait another SW late SW screw passenger pay price instead SW say enough bad thing trashy Plane look like manufacture WiFi beverage serve go turbulent flight bump experience entire flight Pay fly real airline attempt serve passenger

reviews: I have flown Southwest since Their on time performance is now the laughing stock of the industry Today my outbound flight is delayed hours They are delayed well over of the time In years I was never stranded by them where the delay prevented me making a connection However I have been stranded times this year I have always been loyal to them I have kept flying them with hope that they will fix the delays However I am now switching to Delta on my next trip While I don t fly near as much as earlier in my career I have spent over this year with them No more revenue from me
Lemma: fly Southwest since time performance laugh stock industry Today outbound flight delay hour delay well time year never strand delay prevent make connection However strand time year always loyal keep fly hope fix delay However switch Delta next trip fly near much earlier career spend year revenue

reviews: They have the absolute worst website and customer service I tried to upgrade my flight well over prior to my flight on the website and it wouldn t let me upgrade and kept saying error and to call customer so I did and they also had error and were unable to get my flight upgraded but they ended up charging my account twice When I called to have them cancel the charges they told me they could do nothing for me and I had to fix their mistakes myself by personally calling bank and have the charges canceled They did absolutely nothing to rectify the situation I will never fly Southwest again the boarding and seating is unorganized and hectic not with the headache

reviews: Southwest is the worst airline In March of they sent my checked bag to a different airport Now months later they sent my checked bag to a different airport again Terrible customer service After speaking with several agents about this reoccurring issue they assured me my bags would arrive hours later After hours multiple customer service calls and multiple false arrival times given to me my bags finally arrived Every customer service agent had a different story and none offered to compensate me for their mistake I will never fly with this horrendous and overpriced airline again
Lemma: Southwest bad airline March send checked bag different airport month later send checked bag different airport Terrible customer service speak several agent reoccurring issue assure bag would arrive hour later hour multiple customer service call multiple false arrival time give bag finally arrive Every customer service agent different story none offer compensate mistake never fly horrendous overpriced airline

reviews: We flew back home from visiting our daughter in Utah and sat in row in the over the wing exit row Heavenly was our flight attendant and she was amazing From what we heard she is new to Southwest and we wanted to give her Kudos for her attitude knowledge and overall deamenor she had even with a full flight late in the evening She was hillarious and should be noted she made dozens of people laugh and enjoy her antics while asking us if we are prepared to help out in the case of an emergency during the flight We know all to well reviews can be extremely negative however wanted to give a shout out and A class service provided by Heavenly and the entire crew of flight at p Gate B in Salt Lake City on Thank you for making flying fun again

reviews: I ve always been an advocate for flying with Southwest but lately I ve been extremely disappointed with their level of service The next Spirit Airlines I m an A List preferred flyer based on how frequent I fly and lately all of my flights have been significantly delayed I can handle an hour or two but hour delays with no alternative solutions is absurd Be prepared to have back up options to get to your destination when flying with Southwest now
Lemma: always advocate fly Southwest lately extremely disappointed level service next Spirit Airlines List prefer flyer base frequent fly lately flight significantly delay handle hour two hour delay alternative solution absurd prepare back option get destination fly Southwest

reviews: My friend and I were seated a few feet away from the boarding gate since the gate was overcrowded We were constantly paying attention to any boarding announcements or boarding status displays on the LCD Other than a min departure delay there was no other display shown nor any announcements made When we were close to the departure time I reached out to the desk to inquire when the boarding would begin Thats when the LCD showed boarding closed status There was no personnel at the desk to answer our questions no boarding announcement made nor any paging calls placed when we reached our adjacent gate the associate told us the plane had boarded and was getting ready for departure and that we had missed our flight All this when we were seated just next to the gate I had to shell out for another airline ticket to reach my final destination I have traveled extensively for the past years and have never missed a flight In this day and age of texts emails paging boarding calls displays and announcements there isn t any opportunity for missing a flight unless the airline doesn t have proper protocol in place to page checked in passengers for boarding Southwest refused to admit it was their fault I even showed them a pic of the gate a few min before departure wondering what s going on with boarding Both my friend and I could not have missed the boarding call had it been made in the first place I am not flying Southwest again

reviews: Today we had the pleasure of flying with Southwest There was a WWII veteran on the plane with us as well that the crew members and the pilot recognized overhead where all other passengers gave a round applause Once we landed in Wichita the crew members once again recognized him and stated the fireman were on the sides making a rainbow salute for their appreciation for this sweet man Yet again all passengers once again clapped and thanked the veteran It was one of the best If not the best experiences I have had on any airline Thank you Southwest for doing this

reviews: If you want to get upset travel with southwest It is my third flight and the last with southwest on the previous trip my bags arrived late but they arrived the same day although late We gave another vote of confidence to this airline and it was fatal Again my bags arrived late but this time the next day the southwest staff in Fort Lauderdale was very rude the staff treated all passengers on flight Fort Lauderdale Havana as if we had not paid for a decent service Many passengers came from connections in different cities and even so the Southwest staff forced almost all passengers to pay dollars for the carry on bag due to this the plane was delayed almost minutes I felt so bad that I decided not to fly with southwest again

reviews: I bought a round trip ticket on Southwest I was told that bringing my golf clubs in a case would not be a problem I arrived in Greenville but my luggage didn t I had to fill out paperwork and instructions then go to my destination without any of my needed possessions including medications My bags finally arrived and the following day I unpacked my golf carrier only to discover that Southwest had broken the shaft on my driver I had to borrow a driver to play the round and cancel other rounds because I couldn t use the same one I reported the broken driver to Southwest only to be told that they didn t cover the clubs or bag for any loss I went back and looked at the baggage section on the website and there was no mention of that in the basic policies Only when digging much deeper was there any information regarding that kind of loss So in addition to being treated like cattle squeezed into tiny seats with no legroom forced to endure plane changes and layovers I m out for my favorite driver I will never use this unprofessional subpar airline again
Lemma: buy round trip ticket Southwest tell bring golf club case would problem arrive Greenville luggage fill paperwork instruction go destination without needed possession include medication bag finally arrive following day unpack golf carrier discover Southwest break shaft driver borrow driver play round cancel round use one report broken driver Southwest tell cover club bag loss go back look baggage section website mention basic policy dig much deep information regard kind loss addition treat like cattle squeeze tiny seat legroom force endure plane change layover favorite driver never use unprofessional subpar airline

reviews: Las Vegas to Long Beach Southwest Airlines employees used to be so friendly and helpful I guess those days are gone I was willing to put up with the cattle call seating delays and stale pretzels because the treatment was pretty great The last flight I took began in Long Beach and ended in Las Vegas I needed additional assistance getting my ticket changed and stood in line for over an hour Some diva manager was leaving and left the passengers in the hands of an elderly woman who was clearly new on the job The diva offered no assistance but flitted in and out of the ticket area while the newbie floundered Yesterday I checked on two flights and saw that the return flights on both were not there In a panic I quickly made the additional flights In reviewing my credit card I saw that I had actually made the round trip flights So I called customer service The CSR who was supposed to be helpful was rude and clearly did not want to take my call She huffed and tapped her pen and kept saying okay okay I got it even when I was talking Then she proceeded to put in the flights but I still was overcharged I saw online that my original flights had been canceled and she told me that when a passenger gets new flights their previous ones are canceled
Lemma: Las Vegas Long Beach Southwest Airlines employee use friendly helpful guess day go willing put cattle call seating delay stale pretzel treatment pretty great last flight take begin Long Beach end Las Vegas need additional assistance get ticket change stand line hour diva manager leave leave passenger hand elderly woman clearly new job diva offer assistance flit ticket area newbie flounder Yesterday check two flight saw return flight panic quickly make additional flight review credit card saw actually make round trip flight call customer service CSR suppose helpful rude clearly want take call huff tap pen keep say okay okay get even talk proceed put flight still overcharge saw online original flight cancel tell passenger get new flight previous one cancel

reviews: I would never fly Southwest again I understand delays happen but I am very confident that flights are being cancelled because they are not full enough I was on the last flight out so it was full After a hour delay we boarded the plane The boarding process is stupid to begin with They may as well put a numbered tag in our ear and then whack us with a cattle prod when it is our turn Once on board the plane was stiflingly hot The seats which should be called something else because they are not real seats not for humans any way Crammed together so tightly that if we were being led to slaughter it would almost be a relief No Wi Fi available you could not hear the pilot when he spoke If it could be done poorly it was The staff was rude and seemed like they would prefer to be any where but there What a mess this airline has become I started flying Southwest back in the s and they were fun and hip and on the ball Now they are a flying disaster Never again
