reviews: Worst flight I have ever been on Southwest Airlines are really making it not pleasant to fly seats are on top of each other packed to the brim No one is happy I will never fly Southwest again It seems completely irresponsible to me that an airline does not have a policy for overweight I have the worst experience in a recent trip to Boston I am not against obese people just seems irresponsible that if you know how uncomfortable I was the response is sorry ma am there is nothing it can be done I was next to the window This person took the middle seat He was taking my personal space because of the size Whenever he needs to move he was pushing my body against the window At some point my right side was completely numb and my back was in pain If I need to move I was unable because I did not have enough space to move my legs nor my body Several times I have had to push him to the side but again he barely fits in the seat I was completely uncomfortable with him pushing and touching of this person It was horrible Southwest Airlines must allow that if someone is overweight then allow this person to have the seat next to him her empty That way we are all happy and comfortable I know he was uncomfortable too but please be considerate with your passengers

reviews: Southwest lost my bag I am not upset they lost my bag as stuff happens I am upset with the follow up and follow thru of Southwest staff to return my bag to me And how the Southwest agent misinformed me on the policy for purchases and reimbursement Your agent told me get whatever you need and we will be able to cut a check for you for pickup after receipts are provided Yep that is not the Southwest protocol I asked manager at the DesMoines terminal to train and educate her staff so other passengers aren t misinformed down the line She did not respond We traveled to Iowa for a wedding my bag had my clothes as well as clothes for my year old daughters who was a flower girl in the wedding Upon arrival with no bag the nice gal at the Southwest counter said it will be here late tonight and to call before coming in case the flight was delayed I called at am the following morning as that s when she said was the next opening of the office and my bag hadn t moved from my original departure location I called more times that day to be told different stories each time about how they would get my back to DesMoines or that is was just sitting and they couldn t tell what was going on until the bag was scanned in again It almost seemed like once the bag is lost there isn t really a person who ensures it gets back on a flight to the final destination The agents could only tell me where it was sitting No bag delivered Saturday night Bag finally delivered Sunday morning Upon arrival the nice gal at the counter gave me my bag and told my to come by after pm and they will have a check ready She even scanned in my receipts Came by after pm and she explained to me that I had to email the Southwest Manager at the DesMoines airport for details on how to submit the claim I just spend the better part of and now you explain to me that I have to submit a claim and wait days I would not be upset if she informed me of the correct process on the front end All I ask for is better training Southwest you can do it

reviews: My grandson and I were supposed to leave Juan Santamaria Airport in San Jose Costa Rica en route to Baltimore at p m on Saturday August The flight had six delays and did not depart until after p m The passengers were told that the scheduled pilot had flown too many hours within some specified time and was over FAA regulations Another pilot needed to be found In addition they said there were some problems in Baltimore without specifying what I will note there are a lot of problems in Baltimore It seems completely irresponsible to me that an airline would not keep track of pilot hours flown in order to avoid putting their customer through the situation we experienced Before we boarded we were informed that our flight would not be non stop which is what we paid for The reason given was that be the time we reached Baltimore the customs agents would have quit work for the day We were rerouted through Houston which added another two hours to our total flying time When we arrived in Houston we had to drag our carry ons out of the plane at p m to have them clear customs over three hours after we were to have landed in Baltimore then lug them back onto the plane Our flight finally touched down in Baltimore around a m over eight hours later than the scheduled p m arrival of the previous day At least my grandson and I could go home Many travelers were transferring in Baltimore to other destinations For them the agony of the day only continued I will add that our check in to go to Costa Rica on Saturday August did not go well either The line at the international check in was over one eighth of a mile long I have photos to prove it Southwest did not have sufficient agents to accommodate the customers on the international flights they had booked They were grossly understaffed It was only through the intercession of an agent that my grandson and I were able to make our departing flight Southwest offered the passengers on our returning flight a coupon good for another Southwest flight within the next year Big deal We paid round trip each way If they really wanted to make amends they would have had a rebate commensurate with the frustration they heaped upon their customers When Southwest arrived on the national scene years ago as a regional airline which was expanding I was very impressed They can blame their current problems encountered by me my grandson and all the other customers on COVID not enough employees supply chain issues or whatever other excuses are in vogue these days It is clear to me that this company has devolved to a significant degree They have lost the customer orientation they once had Not being able to add the hours a pilot flies and not being able to compute how many check in people are needed for the departing flights are issues of poor management Very poor I will be looking for other carriers for my future trips to Costa Rica and suggest to all who read this not to fly Southwest until such time that they give evidence of better management like being able to add and divide

reviews: My brother and I were flying into Denver round trip and were going to take a second flight into Colorado Springs We were supposed to meet up with our two sisters who were also taking flights into Denver but not the Springs When we were getting ready to board our flight to the Springs we realized it was more efficient to meet up with our sisters at the Denver airport so we went up to customer service to explain what we wanted to do The lady at the desk told us that if we didn t take our flight to Colorado Springs we would forfeit our return flight so we said oh never mind we will take our flight to Colorado Springs we don t want to forfeit the return flight but the lady insisted she would help us and cancel the in between flight and assured us that we would be able to return home no problem now we came to the Springs for our return flight and my itinerary did not come up while so my brother was able to check in no problem the lady at the front desk told me that i had forfeited my flight when i came into Denver even though the woman who we talked to in Denver about it said she was taking care of us I had to purchase my ticket again for the return flight while my brother had no problem with his return flight

reviews: Got notified at am by email an hour before the flight leaves stating that flight will be canceled and I was rebooked for pm flight My flight was supposed to land at pm in Dallas now if I take the flight at pm I won t land til am I have a year old and he has school the next morning Southwest has no moral or respect for their customers They want us to arrive early and be prepared but they don t They can over book flights and canceled them with no repercussions but when we do something such as canceling our flights they won t refund us back our money

reviews: I arrived hours early for my flight home for my mother in laws memorial service only to be told that my flight has now been delayed by hours so now I m sitting at the airport from a flight that was supposed to leave at AM now not leaving until PM I m sitting at the airport for hours only to be told that my flight was delayed due to a mechanical issue then I was told that it was due to Weather I don t appreciate being lied to I was offered a raggedy love voucher which did nothing for me With my flight being delayed by hours I missed the service in addition to having to change my rental car pick up time My return flight home with my partner was delayed again again only to be told that that it was weather but we were pushed back for over an hour and a I called Southwest spoke to a representative who told me that corporate would be calling me gave me a confirmation number but I have yet to hear from anyone about about this issue

reviews: I appreciate almost everything about Southwest Airlines their friendly staff members their free check bags and even their customer service agents But what really brings my review in today is a frustration that really ruined the experience altogether After an anticipated flight home they texted to report that they had canceled our flight with very short notice They then rebooked us for another flight with hrs of airtime Traveling with an infant makes that possibility near disaster When I tried to call and rebook the customer service gal was very courteous but there wasn t much she could do every other flight was significantly longer in airtime or wasn t until weeks out since all the more direct flights had been sold out probably months ago I would like Southwest to consider how this effects the people of whom they claim to care for The short notice on cancelation left us no choice but to bite the bullet and pay a more expensive ticket on another airline since its booking a day before or waste time that could have been spent with the family we were hoping to see and take the longer more miserable travel route I m not sure on the reason for the cancelation but a promise commitment to provide a service should mean something especially when you pay for it It would be nice if they would follow through Regardless of the fact that they may lose a little money by flying a plane that doesn t get sold out If the cancelation was for other reasons not related to business or money I may understand If that is the case this review can be disregarded

reviews: This was the worst flying experience I have ever had They were short staffed with pilots so they cancelled the Austin leg of our flight because of the time constraints we were forced to spend hours at the airport and after three failed attempts to put on standby flights and showing no empathy I finally got on a flight to Vegas with my wife and two kids one of them years old He is emotionally scared now from the frustration also when we arrived in Vegas they switched our baggage claim times
Lemma: bad fly experience ever short staffed pilot cancel Austin leg flight time constraint force spend hour airport three fail attempt put standby flight show empathy finally get flight Vegas wife two kid one year old emotionally scar frustration also arrive Vegas switch baggage claim time

reviews: We arrived at am for a flight that was to be boarding at When we arrived the flight was delayed to am due to unknown reason Once we had arrived to Baltimore we had a hour layover which had turned into a hour layover because of our delay at the previous airport Southwest also makes you board in assigned numbers but doesn t give you assigned seats so every man woman for themselves They then delayed that flight back another hours due to weather which had not even arrived in the area yet When we had finally boarded the plane we began again to wait while the flight attendants made jokes and conversed when they should ve been making sure we are ready for take off They then introduced a new flight attendant and rode around the runway for no reason which takes more time away from our travel After that we waited again as they delayed the flight for weather purposes While we were delayed while sitting in the plane they attempted to try and take us back to the airport to let us off the plane and we were told they couldn t because the boarding terminal wasn t set up so we ve been sitting in the plane and the airport for hours Weather has been great all day until pm I m so confused on how we have not arrived to our destination but yet my arrival time says pm and yet it s pm and I still have yet to leave the airport Ridiculous service
Lemma: arrive flight board arrive flight delay due unknown reason arrive Baltimore hour layover turn hour layover delay previous airport Southwest also make board assigned number give assign seat every man woman delay flight back another hour due weather even arrive area yet finally board plane begin wait flight attendant make joke converse make sure ready take introduce new flight attendant rode around runway reason take time away travel wait delay flight weather purpose delay sit plane attempt try take us back airport let us plane tell boarding terminal set sit plane airport hour Weather great day pm confuse arrive destination yet arrival time say pm yet pm still yet leave airport Ridiculous service

reviews: There were several delays My flight was scheduled to leave at pm then pm a few more delays and then cancelled around midnight No vouchers were offered I had to find my own hotel and was rebooked on a flight the next day at pm Now I m sitting at the Phoenix airport and and after a few more delays I just received a text stating the flight is again delayed until am Worst customer service ever One of the customer service reps told me the one hour delay was because they were holding the flight for a few passengers An hour delay for a few passengers Not likely Last night we were told they were waiting on a crew member Today they told me yesterday s flight was cancelled because of weather This airline needs to stop lying to their customers The also don t have an agreement with other airlines so they won t get anyone a flight with another carrier Don t use Southwest if you need to be anywhere important
Lemma: several delay flight schedule leave pm pm delay cancel around midnight voucher offer find hotel rebooked flight next day pm sit Phoenix airport delay receive text state flight delay Worst customer service ever One customer service rep tell one hour delay hold flight passenger hour delay passenger likely Last night tell wait crew member Today tell yesterday flight cancel weather airline need stop lie customer also agreement airline get anyone flight another carrier use Southwest need anywhere important

reviews: Southwest is the worst airline I have seen lately my pm flight is now delayed till pm I took a walk down the concourse every single gate of them are delayed by at least hours The gate agent trying to tell me it s the weather so apparently bad weather compassing the entire US for about hours
Lemma: Southwest bad airline see lately pm flight delay till pm take walk concourse every single gate delay least hour gate agent try tell weather apparently bad weather compass entire US hour

reviews: The second leg of my daughter s return flight to MSP was cancelled SW could only offer a replacement flight the next day She would have to spend a night in Baltimore rather than flying on to Minneapolis as scheduled The SW agent directed her to work it out with another airline but a Delta supervisor explained that Southwest doesn t participate in a reciprocal arrangement with any other airline My daughter was forced to buy a Delta ticket at double the cost of the original Southwest flight in order to get home the same day I meanwhile ran back to the SW counter to get a refund Supposedly SW will refund the cost of the cancelled flight half the replacement cost but I haven t seen that yet Desired outcome optional For all the inconvenience stress and extra cost SW at minimum needs to make reimbursement of the full cost of the replacement flight
Lemma: second leg daughter return flight MSP cancel SW could offer replacement flight next day would spend night Baltimore rather fly Minneapolis schedule SW agent direct work another airline Delta supervisor explain Southwest participate reciprocal arrangement airline daughter force buy Delta ticket double cost original Southwest flight order get home day meanwhile run back SW counter get refund Supposedly SW refund cost cancelled flight half replacement cost see yet Desired outcome optional inconvenience stress extra cost SW minimum need make reimbursement full cost replacement flight

reviews: Atlanta to Dallas My sister and I were returning to Dallas There had been some delays or flight changes We checked in separately When the staff discovered what was going on with our flight YALL he RAN to get my sister s bag from the console so he could place us on the same flight avoiding the delay He was so kind and didn t have to do that I have NEVER had a rep RUN to assist me that s called customer service Later a pleasant young lady educated me on the Clear check in as an option to have for quicker future travel I love Southwest
Lemma: Atlanta Dallas sister return Dallas delay flight change check separately staff discover go flight YALL RAN get sister bag console could place us flight avoid delay kind NEVER rep RUN assist call customer service Later pleasant young lady educate Clear check option quick future travel love Southwest

reviews: Our flight was delayed about hours and we didn t leave Orlando until after am not the end of the world but there were no representatives giving us any updates on the status of our flight but just a gate monitor showing our flight getting more and more delayed which was kind of frustrating It would have been nice to see better communication from Southwest employees so I knew why the plane was delayed and if I should expect it to be cancelled or not At one point during my long wait at the gate they started boarding another flight that wasn t supposed to leave until hours after ours so that was frustrating as well I just felt like my flight was forgotten about until am On the bright side I got into the A boarding group without paying extra for reserved check in despite it being a full flight The crew was very nice the seats were fairly comfortable and I got a variety of free snacks as well as a free drink Entertainment was available on the Southwest app and WiFi was available for purchase If it weren t for the lack of communication and delay I would give Southwest I would recommend them as long as you book a flight that isn t at night because it will most likely get delayed due to summer thunderstorms or staffing shortages and you may not get home until the following day

reviews: Atlanta to La Guardia On Monday July th my daughter and I were returning home from Atlanta to NYC LaGuardia via Southwest Airlines First time ever using them We arrive at the airport at AM for a AM flight After going through TSA and sitting at the gate for a while our flight was cancelled with no announcement or warning My daughter happened to look up and see on the gate TV screen the words CANCELLED The gate personnel were gone and I was left to calm my daughter s nerves because she has never experienced this before calm my own nerves as I suffered from severe anxiety and my meds were in my checked bag and try to figure out what to do next Keep in mind I booked the early morning flight because I had to be home by am to take over the babysitting duties of my two other children so that my wife could go to work So that was my first thing to address finding last minute child care I then get an email confirming that my flight was indeed cancelled no explanation as to why and I was put on the PM plane to LGA later that night So now the next steps were to find out what happened to our checked bags and what to do for hours till my flight with pretty much no money left for my daughter and I to find a hotel I mean we re taking a low budget airline I m a stay at home dad living on my wife s income Go figure hours later with our bags in NY before we are even on a plane we get to the departing gate for our rescheduled pm flight and of course it s DELAYED pm is the new departure time Then it s pushed back to PM Once on the plane only water and a snack was offered to us soda coffee and alcohol were no longer an option Once at LaGuardia we then had to find our checked bags My pre arranged airport pick up no longer available The line for a taxi extremely long My daughter and I jumped on a city bus to take us to Manhattan so that we could take a taxi to the Bronx dollars I couldn t afford to spend charged to my credit card Long story short got to the airport at AM and after an anxiety inducing day afternoon my daughter and I get home at am in the morning Fast forward to today I call Southwest customer service to get an explanation and find out how Southwest can make things right for me so that I can continue using them in the future again this was my first ever experience with them The agent informed me that the first flight was canceled due to weather and that the rescheduled flight was delayed due to air traffic control issues so we were not entitled to compensation I never once said on the call I wanted to be compensated so that was quite an assumption and was then told after reiterating everything I went through would you have preferred that we put you on an unsafe flight I mean WOW What a great condescending customer service response To the Southwest rep that hopefully reads this and yes I will be posting this on MULTIPLE review sites and social media I shall NEVER fly Southwest again and will voice my displeasure to anyone who asks me about my experience with Southwest PS My family and I had an issue with JetBlue a few years ago and their customer service was the TOTAL OPPOSITE of what I experienced with Southwest Very warm helpful and their actions showed that I was a valued customer

reviews: Good prices and nice perk with the free checked bag I ve flown Southwest multiple times solely because of price and you get what you pay for I never had a flight from Southwest on schedule Always a delay or changing gates last minute Seats are uncomfortable and most of the time the staff is rude One time they couldn t find the pilot and delayed us for three hours I recommend spending the extra money and flying with another airline Southwest is very unprofessional

reviews: Bad deceptive customer service Used a travel fund of from a previous flight against a new flight Paid an additional One day later got covid and had to cancel But the entire credit now has an expiration date of just a few days because the old original travel fund would have expired in just a few days That s not right The I just paid should have a new expiration date and not be stuck with the old Called customer service She wouldn t budge It s my problem I suppose Shame on you Southwest

reviews: Tried to get a nonstop cancelled that months ago Cancelled my connecting flight while I was in the air rerouted with another connection Every flight delayed due to weather or crew availability Left home at am arrived destination am for what should have been a hour flight Lost the bags took another hours to get bags from when they went missing We really appreciated the tag on the bag saying sorry for the inconvenience I work hard for a living day vacation Southwest stole days of them if you are understaffed don t continue to book flights I will understand that and drive next time

reviews: Chicago to Orlando I booked a flight for my family of to depart on June at am and when we get to the airport awaiting to be boarded they announced the flight is canceled at am A few minutes later they arranged the passengers to either call or wait in line to the customer counter to have flight rearrange The reason that was given the flight was cancelled is that weather in Orlando is bad enough for they now allowing flights to come in which is a super stupid and big lie And it was just that I searched the internet to see that over of their pilots are picketing and I believe this is the true reason and they just not willing to admit that and unwilling to cut low on their flights to accommodate this Instead my flight is delayed for almost hrs and my family of had to split up with flying to transfer in Ohio We ended up to arrive in Orlando at in the morning instead of in the afternoon And I see that a flight on the same day departing at am did not have a delay or cancellation This is the first time I fly in Southwest and probably the last time I accept delay but I do not accept giving unbelievable excuses due to the company s poor management and their attitude to just want to make money and carelessness for people whatsoever

reviews: Horrible customer service Looked online last night having to go out of town for celebration of life for my father in law Flight is for myself husband and year old Called to see if we could get discount for bereavement Was transfered over to the manager he quoted me that it was going to be over I asked why so much as it s still showing online Said that s what he s able to give I asked to speak to a manager about getting discount Said he was the manager asked to speak to his manager Said he was the only manager Then told to just buy it online and then have a nice day Then he hung up on me Never have I ever spoke to someone so arrogant and rude
Lemma: Horrible customer service Looked online last night go town celebration life father law Flight husband year old Called see could get discount bereavement transfer manager quote go ask much still show online Said able give ask speak manager get discount Said manager ask speak manager Said manager tell buy online nice day hang Never ever speak someone arrogant rude

reviews: Southwest post COVID is a complete disappointment They were known for customer service and were the last to come to the party with positive customer service and drink service after the pandemic It is clear that morale among flight attendants is low not sure if that is due to corporate support or employee entitlement after COVID I have switched to Delta and United for all business travel and now fly SW only for price necessity I was a very loyal customer for years and now feel no loyalty at all Prices are not worth it Late flights SW waits too long for delayed passengers how does it make sense to hold up ish passengers for people I have been on both sides and would have understood if flight had to leave Today we waited minutes for passengers all of whom boarded in the first minutes Why the extra min Previously delightful attendants now act put out and entitled Prices aren t as competitive as they were historically What a shame used to be such a great company
Lemma: Southwest post COVID complete disappointment know customer service last come party positive customer service drink service pandemic clear morale among flight attendant low sure due corporate support employee entitlement COVID switch Delta United business travel fly SW price necessity loyal customer year feel loyalty Prices worth Late flight SW wait long delayed passenger make sense hold ish passenger people side would understand flight leave Today wait minute passenger board first minute extra min Previously delightful attendant act put entitled Prices competitive historically shame use great company

reviews: Unfortunately a friend was not able to make a flight that I had purchased for them Since I was in the middle of a flight myself I could not cancel the flight Southwest enacted their no show policy Therefore no refund could be given for the initial missed fight nor the return trip The overall cost was I can understand penalizing me for the initial flight but to take the funds for the return flight is downright criminal I was given a travel voucher for only I have noticed that in the past few months that the customer service at Southwest has dramatically declined I have tried to contact them several times concerning this issue I only receive a generic reply email stating the no show policy and a half hearted sorry I would say that if you plan flying with them to at least check other options
Lemma: Unfortunately friend able make flight purchase Since middle flight could cancel flight Southwest enact show policy Therefore refund could give initial missed fight return trip overall cost understand penalize initial flight take fund return flight downright criminal give travel voucher notice past month customer service Southwest dramatically decline try contact several time concern issue receive generic reply email state show policy half hearted sorry would say plan fly least check option

reviews: I m currently sitting in the Houston Hobby airport fighting back tears of anger and frustration Southwest should be ashamed of themselves but they are not We landed from Harlingen at pm getting alerts that our flight home to St Louis was delayed the minute airplane mode went off Currently our flight home is a play pretend flight as of this very moment the departure is scheduled for am and originally that departure was pm We have no real scheduled flight home because the departure time is constantly being moved the excuse is MCO weather bc that is the connecting flight however the gate next to ours is on time and flying into MCO Southwest has no responsibility in the matter or to make anything right bc it s the weather s fault I m so disappointed I exclusively fly Southwest Say nice things until now Encourage and book trips that make y all a lot of money Even had one booked for weeks from now that thanks to your lack of accountability I have plenty of time to cancel sitting in your airport waiting for my play pretend flight The icing on the cake Myself and my travel partner were offered a flight out in the morning if we chose to pay for our own accommodations due to the lack of accountability or give a damn by Southwest Get your life together Southwest you just lost a life long traveler on your airline but based on how you do things you obviously don t care in the least
Lemma: currently sit Houston Hobby airport fight back tear anger frustration Southwest ashamed land Harlingen pm get alert flight home St Louis delay minute airplane mode go Currently flight home play pretend flight moment departure schedule originally departure pm real scheduled flight home departure time constantly move excuse MCO weather bc connect flight however gate next time fly MCO Southwest responsibility matter make anything right bc weather fault disappointed exclusively fly Southwest Say nice thing Encourage book trip make lot money Even one book week thanks lack accountability plenty time cancel sit airport wait play pretend flight icing cake travel partner offer flight morning choose pay accommodation due lack accountability give damn Southwest Get life together Southwest lose life long traveler airline base thing obviously care least

reviews: hours before my flight they canceled it and booked it hours later I was forced to use another PTO day of work so now I m down a PTO day because of them I would rather walk from Boston to Denver than fly with them again The last two times I flew with them they put my luggage on the wrong flight and they delay every flight
Lemma: hour flight cancel book hour later force use another PTO day work PTO day would rather walk Boston Denver fly last two time fly put luggage wrong flight delay every flight

reviews: Out of the three different airlines I ve flown with in the past couple of months Southwest is by far the best I m not sure I would have thought that pre pandemic but they seem to have weathered the storm a little better than the others The plane was cleaner the attendants were nice and relaxed and the service was also superior to what I experienced with the others
Lemma: three different airline fly past couple month Southwest far best sure would think pre pandemic seem weather storm little good others plane clean attendant nice relaxed service also superior experience others

reviews: Constantly reschedules your flights doesn t go anywhere direct and every flight is delayed They pack planes way too full with no room and are always running late Switching to a different airline after all the horrible experiences I ve had

reviews: I am tall to the point where I need special accommodation for seats because of this I was a little worried when my family bought seats with Southwest as they don t have a business class Fortunately I thought a nice lady at the gate upgraded me to pre board I had bought early boarding before and I thought this was an upgrade Unfortunately the front row seats had gotten taken by the elderly and children so I went back to exit row seats With pre board you are not allowed to sit in the exit row though While I appreciate the gate lady that upgraded me the flight attendants were rude about it and people that should have boarded after me anyways got the seats with enough leg room while my knees got embossed with the arm rests of the seats in front of me I have canceled my return tickets and am spending hundreds of extra dollars to never fly with Southwest again
Lemma: tall point need special accommodation seat little worried family buy seat Southwest business class Fortunately think nice lady gate upgrade pre board buy early board think upgrade Unfortunately front row seat get take elderly child go back exit row seat pre board allow sit exit row though appreciate gate lady upgrade flight attendant rude people board anyways get seat enough leg room knee get emboss arm rest seat front cancel return ticket spend hundred extra dollar never fly Southwest

reviews: In November of I flew Southwest Airlines to visit my family in Oklahoma City Purchased EarlyBird check in and had an A boarding position We had a layover in Phoenix after flying in from San Diego and our flight to OKC got delayed by about hours with our original PM departure time being delayed to PM Talked to the gate agent and she said the delay was caused by our aircraft being delayed in Baltimore Our aircraft had SWA s older Evolve cabin I got about an hour of sleep before arriving in OKC On the return trip we flew to Denver where our plane had the newer Heart interior The plane to San Diego had the Evolve cabin again There was no delay and we ended up getting back home to San Diego safely Honestly I like Southwest for their low fares and open seating
Lemma: November fly Southwest Airlines visit family Oklahoma City Purchased EarlyBird check boarding position layover Phoenix fly San Diego flight OKC get delay hour original PM departure time delay PM Talked gate agent say delay cause aircraft delay Baltimore aircraft SWA old Evolve cabin get hour sleep arrive OKC return trip fly Denver plane new Heart interior plane San Diego Evolve cabin delay end get back home San Diego safely Honestly like Southwest low fare open seating

reviews: What a scam airline Everyone should know this scam they are pulling while bragging about no bag fees This is there only selling point They know they would lose of their customers overnight if they started bag fees There check in procedure is set up to make you want to use your points to upgrade I was waiting to check in with my laptop and phone through there own app Conveniently enough when hour check time came up the website and app took minutes to come up with the check in button By the time it did and I was able to hit check in I was given end of B group I immediately called southwest to find out what was wrong with there system The lady said nothing was wrong BUT we can upgrade you for points to put you in A I jumped on it because I want to use my points up and will never fly southwest again Will cancel my credit card that I have had since and spend extra money for peace of mind travel not games Very unprofessional business practices

reviews: My children were set to fly today with their grandparents for a nice trip to Florida as school and daycare are not covered this week it seemed like a win win until Southwest got involved I took them to the airport and Southwest cancelled last minute with no flights leaving to the destination for days Somehow though the checked bags are all flying to the original destination but with no passengers so what is going on We asked and they cant answer Southwest claims weather and therefore wont refund the ticket price but yet the bags are flying there right now So what is going But they claim weather and wont discuss refunds or credits You ruined their vacation screwed us on daycare this week and there is important medication on those bags not to mention my kids clothes but we wont get them back for three day plus according to Southwest Unbelievable I used to fly west Southwest for all of my work travel but I will never fly Southwest again for business or pleasure Get your act together Southwest this is completely unacceptable

reviews: Sarasota to Denver Flew on with two children from Denver to Sarasota with a layover in Indianapolis Flew back on the th with a layover in Dallas On the way there I got a text message from Southwest that my flight had been delayed by hours Luckily I was in the airport when I got the message and could determine the flight had been delayed but by less than an hour Gate attendants were unable to explain the reason for the incorrect message Flying back I got another text before leaving for the airport that the flight was delayed by hours I checked the website and found this was another incorrect message from Southwest and the delay was again less than an hour I found other customer reviews indicating many others had received similar text messages from Southwest and the inconvenience and expense for some had been significant There were enough reviews that Southwest had to be aware of the problem for some time and had not fixed it I ll be doing everything I can to avoid flying Southwest in the future

reviews: Currently ongoing Typically have recommended this airline but this has been a horrible experience Our flight from STL to Portland ME had our connecting flight in Baltimore canceled Customer service was horrid and had to eat money on hotel rooms for that night the impromptu one and the originally scheduled one Lost a full hours waiting on the flight we got rebooked for On the rebooked flight we paid extra for A boarding but due to their system issue or something their personnel forgot to do in the computer with pur luggage we got kicked out of line and had to go to customer service nothing about us getting refunded that money Now flying back from Portland via Chicago to STL showed up to airport and flight immediately delayed hours As plane touched down and getting ready to board announced another minute delay due to weather Checked weather in Chicago beautiful Weather here beautiful Weather in between nothing It s all staff but they re walking all over their customers using Weather as an excuse to keep from compensating anyone

reviews: As my departure time neared I received several messages over the course of hours Each indicating an additional delay This now meant I had no hope of making my connecting flight I called to reschedule for the next possible flights to my destination After waiting a half hour on hold I explained my situation to a human and was asked to be put on hold while he found me another flight As I had already looked up possible flight schedules I thought this would be a quick hold as there were very few possibilities After minutes on hold I was hung up on Now I have to call back This time it only took minutes to get a human so I should consider myself lucky right I explained everything over again and apologized if I sounded irate which I was This time I just told the woman which flight I wanted I then inquired about what she could do to make me feel better about flying Southwest ever again in the future I suggested a simple upgrade to A on my boarding pass to get me on the plane earlier so I might get a window seat This would have cost the airline nothing and would have made me feel like they were actually sorry about my being quite inconvenienced She said she couldn t do that but could give me a discount on my next flight which would cost them I told her I didn t want a coupon for a flight I might never take and she asked if I d like to speak to someone about it I said that I would like to speak with a supervisor and was about to insist on not being put on hold when I was put on hold I m not one to give up easily so I waited on hold for an hour and a half before I was forced to hang up because I had to leave home for my new flight at am and it was almost pm Now I m going to be late for an appointment at my destination and get only hours of sleep I have great respect for Southwest flight personnel but their customer service absolutely awful And I m unlikely to fly with them again because of that

reviews: Southwest Airlines is a nightmare I have never encountered airline staff so horrific in my lifetime When we arrived at our gate to board minutes early they yelled at us to haul our butts on board and that we were late Except they failed to tell us that our actual flight was at another gate instead all staff members yelled that we were on a different flight and how dare we try to board this one except this was the gate and time our tickets stated They refused to even look at our tickets to find out which gate they moved our flight to After minutes of sitting feeling confused I went back up to them and asked where we were supposed to board our flight that our tickets said was boarding at that time and that exact gate we were waiting at The guy sheepishly realized that they just about caused us to miss our flight which had been moved gates down instead of letting us know right away they shamed us for following the information on our tickets and demanded we get out of their faces Unbelievable

reviews: Southwest Airlines took on May and refused to refund my money for a flight that they had cancel due to inclement weather on that date That same very date of May Southwest had rescheduled my flight to board a am flight to Denver Colorado to get to Houston Texas for my family of vacation and charge me a additional for another flight Southwest had dispense my older children luggage to different states which was Houston Texas and my twins stroller Denver Colorado and my medications went to Houston Texas as well Southwest took a total of in less than hours and my family never flew in the airplane Southwest took ship our luggage to different states cancelling our flight without proper notice and called the Sherriff department to follow my family around the terminal to give us a ticket that we currently have to see a judge about now to clear our name On top of paying Southwest ask me to pay more money for my twins when I had originally paid for them to board the plane Southwest never gave my family an apology for all of the strife chaos shaming belittlement that s that my have put on my family I will never have my family to board Southwest ever again I have lost all respect for this airline company I have encountered some rude and unprofessional workers on the customer service lines who talks fast pace to get you off the line Southwest promise my family a flight on blast am they let my family board the plane as a touring experience sit down on plane then ask all of us to exit the plane My personal preference will be to never paid or even board this airline again If you want to get rip off taking advantage of swindle out of your hard earn money than choose this airplane as your st choice After they refund my I will never give them my business again It s way to many competitors of airlines in the world to be settling for less and making a joke out of people family members just to enjoy a family vacation that you have save for

reviews: So after years I decided to fly on SW airlines again I ve always had an amazing experience with this airline They delayed my flight minutes before boarding for hrs It said on time even when the plane landed and was at the gate They said it was the air traffic control in MCO I checked the flight delays on all airlines There were only that were non SWA SWA had tons Even frontier and spirit had none AA was flying nonstop with no cancelations I then was cancelled and put on standby I stood at the airport all night until all planes were exhausted along with other families that had been there way longer than I had I never got on a plane In the mean time I booked a ticket on AA I asked for a hotel motel voucher they laughed So I took a ride to DFW from Dallas love with a trip booked in the morning I had to pay for the motel room I never cancelled my flight My thought was maybe I m wrong The data is lying to me Yet I was right I got on that flight with AA with no problem I monitored my standby alternate ticket situation with SW the entire time in air and off It kept getting pushed back over and over again To the point that it was landing days from the point I booked I canceled I d love to give my credit to someone needing a flight but I cannot I m the only one it works for Never again will I book this airline They are worse than Spirit or Frontier BTW My AA ticket coming back was not delayed or canceled either I m sure some have had problems with AA and many other airlines But I haven t
Lemma: year decide fly SW airline always amazing experience airline delay flight minute board hr say time even plane land gate say air traffic control MCO check flight delay airline non SWA SWA ton Even frontier spirit none AA fly nonstop cancelations cancel put standby stand airport night plane exhaust along family way long never get plane mean time book ticket AA ask hotel motel voucher laugh take ride DFW Dallas love trip book morning pay motel room never cancel flight thought maybe wrong data lie Yet right get flight AA problem monitor standby alternate ticket situation SW entire time air keep get push back point land day point book cancel love give credit someone need flight one work Never book airline bad Spirit Frontier BTW AA ticket come back delay cancel either sure problem AA many airline

reviews: I ve historically loved Southwest The two free bags open seating reliable flights and communication were excellent But now this airline is nothing short of a vile greedy company In the past year more than half of my flights have been significantly delayed or outright cancelled Any getaway comes with an asterisk best not to make any plans at the destination and save yourself the disappointment Short notice and some excuse that always dodges responsibility has saddles the customer alone with huge last minute re booking or hotel fees To be fair they always compensate you with a LUV Voucher which you can put toward the cost of your next Southwest flight when you ll inevitably get to repeat this whole process again you masochist At least there are stale bags of pretzel crumbs to keep you satisfied as you sit and wait a few hours for that last second cancellation
Lemma: historically love Southwest two free bag open seat reliable flight communication excellent airline nothing short vile greedy company past year half flight significantly delay outright cancel getaway come asterisk best make plan destination save disappointment Short notice excuse always dodge responsibility saddle customer alone huge last minute book hotel fee fair always compensate LUV Voucher put toward cost next Southwest flight inevitably get repeat whole process masochist least stale bag pretzel crumb keep satisfy sit wait hour last second cancellation

reviews: I am beyond mad I booked a flight for an employee and when she went to check in online it said they couldn t find her reservation I called the airline and they said they canceled the reservation due to fraud There was already a charge on our card No one had reported this as a fraudulent charge Southwest offered no real explanation except they bank declined the charge What bank It was an Amex and the charge already showed up Southwest offered no solution just a sorry My company flies employees all over the US I will never use Southwest Airlines again
Lemma: beyond mad book flight employee go check online say find reservation call airline say cancel reservation due fraud already charge card one report fraudulent charge Southwest offer real explanation except bank decline charge bank Amex charge already show Southwest offer solution sorry company fly employee US never use Southwest Airlines

reviews: Worst flying experience of my life Trying to get home from Salt Lake City to Fort Myers Florida sheer hell Flight from SLC to DEN was delayed then cancelled Which caused us to have to stay overnight and SW did not pay for any accommodation s Had to pay for hotel food and then more cash for airport food Southwest rescheduled a flight to get us home which caused us to have to get up at am to catch a flight by am only to find when we got at the gate that the flight was not going straight to Midway Michigan as was on the ticket no We were going to Houston take off land deboard all those passengers onboard all those passengers Then fly to Panama City deboard onboard passengers then to Midway hours sitting on a plane with only bags of snacks since am in the morning Then arrive at Midway to find that flight was delayed Then delayed again Finally boarded that flight and made it home after days of sheer hell with Southwest who could not have cared less None of the employees cared less Plane was so cold the man sitting next to me called it a meat locker I had to stay wrapped in fleece and blankets and scarves No one cared Their employees are immune to everything because this happens all the time and I m sure they get screamed at all day But customers can t even speak up for fear you will be considered unruly Ruined what was a wonderful vacation to Moab We will never use Southwest again If you want them to screw up you life for days then this is your airline
Lemma: Worst fly experience life Trying get home Salt Lake City Fort Myers Florida sheer hell Flight SLC DEN delay cancel cause us stay overnight SW pay accommodation pay hotel food cash airport food Southwest reschedule flight get us home cause us get catch flight find get gate flight go straight Midway Michigan ticket go Houston take land deboard passenger onboard passenger fly Panama City deboard onboard passenger Midway hour sit plane bag snack since morning arrive Midway find flight delay delay Finally board flight make home day sheer hell Southwest could care less None employee care less Plane cold man sit next call meat locker stay wrap fleece blanket scarves one care employee immune everything happen time sure get scream day customer even speak fear consider unruly Ruined wonderful vacation Moab never use Southwest want screw life day airline

reviews: You really take a chance getting to Nashville Airport especially with the crazy traffic I was flying out of Nashville on Southwest Airline I live hours away You could at any time be in a traffic jam for hours I was lucky arrived hours early So I stood in line for hour to check in Oh no you can t check in You are too early Apparently you can t check in with Southwest Airlines more than hours early Who knew So I went and sat for another hour and watched people Very interesting It s better than being late Boarding the plane my seating pass was in the B section I usually go toward the rear but every seat I wanted was being saved by the passenger next to it So I had to actually turn around along with other passengers behind me so I could find a seat Did not know that you are allowed to save seats on Southwest The stewardess just shrugged her shoulders and asked people to back up What a mess What is the point of paying an extra to get to board early

reviews: My review is about the customer service I have been receiving My last two times of flying have been pretty much very dissatisfying When I flew to Florida in June my flight got canceled I had a book at a hotel I lost a days vacation couldn t get my money back from the hotel Then this flight that we just came back from they change the flight so many times that when you add up the loss we took in our time vacationing we lost a whole day Then I try to use my vouchers and my guest certificate that I got from some friends to book my Southwest vacation And they wouldn t take it But I asked them to extend the six months that I had to use them and they won t So they took my money they stole my money I ve been flying with Southwest for years I m so disappointed with what they have turned into

reviews: As the pilot is doing his safety briefing over the intercom which they have to mandatorily do before takeoff the Flight Attendant is going through the motions very sarcastically and making funny faces as the pilot is explaining the expectations roles and responsibilities of the personnel on the plane if it was to crash I then hear the FA getting upset about someone s luggage poking out in the way He wasn t very calm about the situation and was on edge The messages from the Pilot and the head Flight Attendant kept coming and I kept listening I had my Earpods in but paused my music every time a message would come over the intercom Even with my music paused I could not understand what was being said over the intercom I asked the FA about what beverages they had He looked at me like I was speaking another language and made drastic body motions pointing at his ears I knew what he meant but was still shocked that this flight attendant was having such a horrible attitude towards everyone on the plane

reviews: Louisville to Buffalo via Tampa I had to abruptly leave a business trip when I found out my dog was very ill with little chance of survival The gate attendant was extremely helpful making sure I had all the proper connecting information as well as organizing all of my previous cancelled flight information and credits Once on my first flight the flight attendant was so incredible when I told her about my concern for our delay and the if I did not make my connecting flight I would not make it home in time to say goodbye to my dog She kindly asked all the people on the plane if they could sit and allow me to get off first and asked everyone to keep my puppy in their hearts I do not know the name of this wonderful flight attendant but I will never forget her

reviews: Deplorable customer service They deserve a negative star I flew from Syracuse to Charlotte when I get my stroller bag I noticed it was partially unzipped when I go to get the stroller out I see both wheels are broken off and placed under the stroller The top bassinet carrier part was also disconnected which was connected when I checked it in and zipped it up I know my stroller was intentionally dismantled to make it fit smoother under the plane I went to the ticket counter where Diane and a manager both told me they do not cover damages only losses They filled out a report and said I can try to talk to customer service to see if they will replace it I was sent home with no replacement and no check to replace my infant s stroller Quickly forward to I flew from St Louis back to Charlotte again only to have my car seat that I checked in not put on the plane Once again Diane was at the ticket counter and gave me a loaner car seat However my car seat was also in a travel bag that needed to be replaced Diane brought out the replacement car seat in a travel bag but refused to loan it to me I asked to speak to the manager and advised her when Southwest delivers my car seat and travel bag I will give them both car seat and car seat bag of theirs back We stood there for about minutes going back and forth minutes in she ask me to verify my name as if I had just walked up like Diane didn t already do it Diane had already got my ticket and verified who I was which is how I got the loaner car set from the beginning of the ordeal Security was called the manager said she couldn t believe I was acting like this and refused to give me the name of her regional manager When I asked for her to write down her supervisor s name she refused and said you can take it down yourself She started talking through her teeth at me like I was a child and threatened to walk away if I recorded her If your acting professionally you wouldn t care if someone recorded you Everyone after the gate and above the ground were great Southwest train your ticket counter employees and ramp agents to treat people and their property with respect
Lemma: Deplorable customer service deserve negative star fly Syracuse Charlotte get stroller bag notice partially unzipped go get stroller see wheel break place stroller top bassinet carrier part also disconnect connect check zip know stroller intentionally dismantle make fit smoother plane go ticket counter Diane manager tell cover damage loss fill report say try talk customer service see replace send home replacement check replace infant stroller Quickly forward fly St Louis back Charlotte car seat check put plane Diane ticket counter give loaner car seat However car seat also travel bag need replace Diane bring replacement car seat travel bag refuse loan ask speak manager advise Southwest delivers car seat travel bag give car seat car seat bag back stand minute go back forth minute ask verify name walk like Diane already Diane already get ticket verify get loaner car set beginning ordeal Security call manager say believe act like refuse give name regional manager ask write supervisor name refuse say take start talk teeth like child threaten walk away record act professionally care someone record Everyone gate ground great Southwest train ticket counter employee ramp agent treat people property respect

reviews: This is about customer service We created a credit card with Southwest last year They had two sets of nonstop flights to Virginia which made it easy to travel to see my parents which was important because we have two small children A hour flight with a layover has turned into a hour flight due to delays which isn t easy with small children Imagine an unplanned hours in the Dulles Airport Well these flights were in place throughout COVID and were full always As soon as COVID started to lift these flights disappeared Gone Now we have at least one stop and more frequently stops to get to our destination The same is true for my husband s family in New York Southwest used to fly direct and they dropped the direct flights Today I was on the phone trying to apply travel vouchers I was under the impression that I needed to book travel within the expiration timeframe not complete travel within the expiration timeframe I have work travel that happens less than a week after the expiration date and together with this misunderstanding I thought maybe Southwest would help me out No such luck told me it s my problem Obviously it is my problem but I hoped that an airline whose hold message which I listened to for minutes while my customer service agent took other calls instead of helping me repeatedly talks about how much they care about customers might have some flexibility in such a short timeframe Other businesses help people out to maintain positive customer relations too bad Southwest has turned a corner and is no longer actually serving the customer That s why I was loyal to them in the first place No longer

reviews: They don t assign seats If there s an issue how do you know whose in what seat My main issue was I wasn t feeling good after we landed and I asked for ginger ale and the flight attendant said we don t give drinks out after we land It wasn t like I was asking for a beer The flight was delayed but yet the monitors said on time When they finally told us the flight was delayed they said it s possible we will board on time so don t leave the area If we are delayed how can we board early b You don t have to worry about me flying your airline again For it s a waste of money Couldn t get Wi Fi nor any entertainment It wouldn t work

reviews: Normally love SW My pm flight on had the absolute worst flight attendant crew I have ever had on any airline and we have been flying regularly monthly for more than years They were rude to many passengers including my husband and I over trivial things that normally aren t a big deal An under seat item being slightly close to the passengers feet not under and I mean slightly as in barely even noticeable face mask covering nostrils but not up to bridge of nose giving a family with a screaming child a hard time during landing husband lowered mask to tell me something bc I couldn t hear him and she went off on him etc The entire three hour flight with this crew was ridiculously awful They were not pleasant when coming around for drinks or trash They acted like they had a chip on their shoulder about something Normally SW attendants have great personalities and offer decent humor on the flight but you got none of that with this gang The only time they were nice was when announcing their we know you have a lot of choices and we thank you for choosing SW spiel at the end of the flight If I hadn t had so many great experiences with SW I wouldn t book again I hope this was an isolated incident bc this crew was lousy and rude I m refusing to offer anything but a single star in all categories as I was so upset with this crew but I had no issues with the ground service The seats are not any more or less comfortable than any other larger airline and the food and beverages are comparable as well The inflight wifi was not working on any of my SW domestic flights this week so that was annoying as well
Lemma: Normally love SW pm flight absolute bad flight attendant crew ever airline fly regularly monthly year rude many passenger include husband trivial thing normally big deal seat item slightly close passenger foot mean slightly barely even noticeable face mask cover nostril bridge nose give family scream child hard time land husband lower mask tell something bc hear go etc entire three hour flight crew ridiculously awful pleasant come around drink trash act like chip shoulder something Normally SW attendant great personality offer decent humor flight get none gang time nice announce know lot choice thank choose SW spiel end flight many great experience SW book hope isolated incident bc crew lousy rude refuse offer anything single star category upset crew issue ground service seat less comfortable large airline food beverage comparable well inflight wifi work SW domestic flight week annoy well

reviews: I am beyond frustrated with this airline as a concerned mother whose child is flying alone for the first time I called the airline over times and received a different story each time to make matters even worse you can t speak to a manager or a supervisor because apparently they have none Eventually I found out you can talk to a service coordinator No wonder no one s on the same page and they all give you different answers Who trained them or taught them what the airline procedures are They don t care that you can t afford for the flight to keep going up like they said they have no control over it but neither do they have control of the procedures I couldn t even book my child a minor under my account because they are so worried about whatever point system they have going on They obviously need a family plan where you can have your spouse and children under Especially for someone who gets frustrated on the internet quickly They have made the beginning of my trip with my daughter hell and my finances tight because they had to refund me and were so happy to book another flight because apparently I m so rich I can t wait days till the refund comes in to get another flight because I would have lost the price I could pay So I had to come up with money for another flight which of course went up the next day but hey at least she said I m Sorry

reviews: Will never trust Southwest Airlines again What a fiasco trying to get out of Tampa on April nd Eventually canceled our flight and offered absolutely no guidance on what to do at that point Waited in line for information for hours Waited at baggage line for hours to retrieve soaking wet suitcases Finally decided to rent a car in line for hours and drive to Buffalo instead of waiting till Wednesday or Thursday for a new flight I especially felt sorry for all of the families with children having to go thru the same ordeal as myself and my husband Southwest you are not the airline you used to be
Lemma: never trust Southwest Airlines fiasco try get Tampa April nd Eventually cancel flight offer absolutely guidance point Waited line information hour Waited baggage line hour retrieve soak wet suitcase Finally decide rent car line hour drive Buffalo instead wait till Wednesday Thursday new flight especially felt sorry family child go thru ordeal husband Southwest airline use

reviews: I have been a loyal Southwest customer but I am now looking for other options Two days and two canceled flights is too much I understand that may not be their fault but their customer service is no longer like it used to be They are not helpful at all and you are just on your own which is very unfortunate Right now I would be very gracious in giving them a star rating Very disappointed
Lemma: loyal Southwest customer look option Two day two canceled flight much understand may fault customer service longer like use helpful unfortunate Right would gracious give star rating disappointed

reviews: New Orleans to Richmond via Atlanta Not very pleased at all A representative for Southwest during baggage drop directed us to an A list priority line After we waited mins when we were next in line she redirected us yet again to ANOTHER line that was WAY longer and we barely made our flight from MSY to ATL with minutes to spare We had to literally RUN so we wouldn t miss it EVERYBODY had boarded ahead of us and the door to the gate was even closed I m still flabbergasted by this situation and will definitely keep this horrible experience in my head for future possible flights with Southwest
Lemma: New Orleans Richmond via Atlanta pleased representative Southwest baggage drop direct us list priority line wait min next line redirect us yet ANOTHER line WAY long barely make flight MSY ATL minute spare literally RUN miss EVERYBODY board ahead us door gate even close still flabbergast situation definitely keep horrible experience head future possible flight Southwest

reviews: Flight direct was pushed back and fourth for hours yesterday then cancelled and rebooked for today w one stop meaning a long drive back home and getting up in the middle of the night The extra early bird charge was not refunded and not given back on the new flight due back Once in Chicago things were delayed for a couple hours again Unfortunately my wife and my daughter whom had a soccer game today to play in front of specific college coaches was operating on hours sleep now They arrived in Phoenix with no time to go to hotel and check in because HERTZ rental car Zero stars had a super long line and not enough customer service agents to handle them Hertz cancelled our original reservation charged triple the price for the rental which was a downgrade charged for overage hours and charged for insurance and prepaid gas full tank they wont use which was all declined I ll talk with both of these incompetent companies the next couple days If your traveling do your due diligence and fly the best airline at the best time of the week Last but not least we cancelled one day at the hotel which ended up cancelling the whole stay leaving us to frantically find another hotel away from her team hotel Looking at the internet and talking with many people today I believe that people should be cautious and think twice about booking flights with Southwest and Rental Cars with Hertz as many people have had similar experiences just not all at the same time trip Frustrated but safe Customer service has taken a real dive since our last election in this country
Lemma: Flight direct push back fourth hour yesterday cancel rebooked today w one stop mean long drive back home get middle night extra early bird charge refund give back new flight due back Chicago thing delay couple hour Unfortunately wife daughter soccer game today play front specific college coach operate hour sleep arrive Phoenix time go hotel check HERTZ rental car Zero star super long line enough customer service agent handle Hertz cancel original reservation charge triple price rental downgrade charge overage hour charge insurance prepaid gas full tank wont use decline talk incompetent company next couple day travel due diligence fly best airline best time week Last least cancel one day hotel end cancel whole stay leave us frantically find another hotel away team hotel Looking internet talk many people today believe people cautious think twice book flight Southwest Rental Cars Hertz many people similar experience time trip Frustrated safe Customer service take real dive since last election country

reviews: Denver to Chicago Southwest has completely ruined my trip i have missed my cousins wedding due to all the delays cancelations and layovers today I have had my flight canceled three times today My original flight was scheduled to go non stop Denver to Chicago O Hare at am that was canceled I was rebooked for a flight leaving Denver at am with a layover in Austin that flight was canceled I was then rebooked for a flight out over Denver to Dallas that was delayed an hour My then connecting flight from Dallas to Chicago O Hare was delayed times before being canceled I am now booked on a flight to Houston and then to Chicago midway just to get me close to home Canceled on three times have been in an airport for hours now still have two flights to go which are not guaranteed not to be canceled and im not even flying to my home airport where my car is i will have to pay for a ride from midway to O hare and hours after i was supposed to originally land When i asked for some kind of compensation for my troubles and extra expenses i was lied to by the supervisor at the gate saying i should ve been offered vouchers this morning which i wasn t because i was not at the airport when my first two flights got canceled and then she changed her story to say southwest could not provide compensation because my flights were canceled due to atc when in reality as reported on the news southwest as had a company wide system shutdown today which in fact is southwest s fault and should compensation me for what will be almost hours in an airport and or plane a hour delay in my arrival to my destination my arrival to the incorrect airport and my costs of a taxi from midway to O hare

reviews: I booked my hotel like I always do through Southwest to get points I was to earn points for my stay via the Southwest concierge Usually my points hot within days after travel is complete My flight hit and my car rental hit I was waiting to book a trip for my wife and I to Austin to celebrate a friends redo of their th birthday Points still have not hit after weeks and now I believe they are taking their time out of spite Now they are telling me they have to wait for hotel to notify on how many points they need to apply to my account This is complete rubbish because it tells you how many points when you book and when you get confirmation email from Southwest At the time the points would have given me a total of points and I could have booked a trip for us both for points Now it will cost points I travel about twice a month and it looks like this will increase to probably times per month Going to American Airlines now Thanks for nothing Southwest Hope it was worth it

reviews: I flew to MegaCon last August and went with my dependable standby The arrival flight took off on time but was minutes behind weather related whereas departing flight back to RDU was delayed an hour due to custom issues with the Orlando aircraft arriving from Montego Bay Even with the Delta surge MCO was packed with people Coming out of the pandemic SWA is feeling the pinch in terms of staffing and aircraft availability

reviews: Shame on Southwest Airlines My husband and I and our family have used Southwest for over years This past March we were supposed to leave Portland Maine at in the morning and we received a cancellation for no reason on March at PM in the evening We could not get through to the site via Internet or phone on how to reschedule a new flight Since we had reservations for two weeks in Orlando all paid for we needed to get on a flight as soon as possible So my husband tried and tried and waited on hold for almost an hour before he finally just gave up and decided to book a different flight and the only one we could fly find was from Boston which is a Hour Drive instead of a min drive to Portland The only flight we could find was for leaving Boston that morning which meant we had to leave Portland Maine by AM We did not sleep at all that night On top of that the flight that was connecting was delayed as well The real kicker is that because we did not follow Southwest Airlines rules for rescheduling a canceled flight we had to pay more to drive two hours longer to get to the airport to actually get on a flight And the person who answered our phone call later on was like oh well too bad you didn t do it the way you were supposed to I just don t understand how a an airline can cancel the flight out of the blue for no reason and not assist their travelers and then along the way the attendants were rude and obnoxious and in no way helpful or kind We are still trying to figure out how we can get refunded our money over something that we did not do we did not cancel the flight Southwest airlines canceled the flight They should honor the fact that we had booked our flights months ahead of time And they should do a better job when canceling a flight to assist customers and getting to where they need to be

reviews: Went to attend s Con in Hartford CT for the weekend beginning Outgoing departure was on time good customer service and unproblematic plane change But due to the winter weather SWA cancelled my return flight on Sunday and they didn t notify me until an hour before my flight was due to leave via email They rebooked my flight for Tuesday and I couldn t do it I ended up booking a last minute flight on Delta that got delayed as well so I ended up staying an extra day I wish these big airlines had contingency plans for getting customers home Had SWA rebooked me for Monday I would ve been happier Anyway it worked out for me both airlines sent me flight vouchers SWA sent me a one and I got home fine I just won t fly SWA to New England during the winter
Lemma: Went attend Con Hartford CT weekend begin Outgoing departure time good customer service unproblematic plane change due winter weather SWA cancel return flight Sunday notify hour flight due leave via email rebooked flight Tuesday end book last minute flight Delta get delay well end stay extra day wish big airline contingency plan get customer home SWA rebooked Monday would happy Anyway work airline send flight voucher SWA send one get home fine fly SWA New England winter

reviews: Been sitting on this plane since Flight supposed to take off at It s now and no sign of movement Someone actually just got on the plane minutes after take off time And still on the app it says this flight departure is on time What a joke I d rather pay double to fly with a real airline
Lemma: sit plane since Flight suppose take sign movement Someone actually get plane minute take time still app say flight departure time joke rather pay double fly real airline

reviews: We had our flight home canceled and were notified by text hours before hand No help re booking or anything just left to us to call and figure it out After hours on the phone we got re booked on the next available flight which was days later Cost us over in car rental extension and hotels and meals Found out cancelation was not due to bad weather but told it was due to air traffic control issues whatever that means So we sent a request for Southwest to pay our extra expenses and they said yeah I know I left you your wife and children stranded for days for ambiguous reasons but hey here is a voucher to fly on our airline again Really I guess that is fitting because with the voucher and another cash I might be able to get a one way ticket maybe leaving me stranded again Southwest stopped caring long ago

reviews: My husband had been an A List member of Southwest Airlines for over years He traveled extensively for his work and we always appreciated the special perk he received of priority boarding due to his status When Covid hit and all airlines came to a halt his company put a moratorium on all travel even after the airlines were back up and running Last fall he received a promotion from Southwest that if he traveled one round trip flight anywhere he could retain his A List status Unfortunately he had been diagnosed with cancer back in the spring of and began undergoing cyberknife treatments in September His doctors specifically told him he should not travel through the remainder of the year as he was immunocompromised We contacted Southwest and let them know the situation The agent with whom I spoke advised that if we could provide a certification from his oncologist they would consider our request to extend his status despite the fact he was unable to travel even the bare minimum in Yesterday after going through a second appeal process following an initial denial of our request from Southwest we were told they would not be able to honor our request I am absolutely appalled that this airline which our entire family has supported religiously for the past years in addition to all of my husband s business travel would not consider these extenuating circumstances and grant him an exception Shame on you Southwest for not having more heart Perhaps if someone in a leadership role is faced with the same daunting cancer diagnosis and finds themselves undergoing this brutal treatment they ll reconsider this ridiculous policy We couldn t be more disappointed at this time in the airline and its leadership

reviews: We were flying on March from Maui to Honolulu at pm It was a very hot day and my year old daughter was very thirsty The water fountain at gate was broken so I told her we get water in the plane It was a minute flight so I knew there wouldn t be service during flight We were at the back of the plane it was completely empty and I saw a male and female flight attendants at the back seats away from us They were boarding the front of the plane My year old went to asked the lady for water very politely and she turns to my kid and says No sit down in a very rude way My kid came back so I went and asked the gentleman if he could please give me some water for my kid He literally reached in front of them on a cart and gave me a blue can of water I said to the lady my kid just wanted water and it was right in front of you that was mean she followed me to my seat and said something I said the water was right in front of you She raised her voice and said Do we have a problem here At that moment I figured she wanted to get a reaction out of me maybe to kick me off the plane so I said no no problem I m sorry Never flying this airline again Inhumane to a child that all she needed was a cup a worker
