reviews: Me and my family got rebooked to Southwest because Spirit got cancelled out of nowhere and we are never flying Spirit again but anyway the treatment was good and the wifi was good but the only bad thing was really the seating system where it s first come first serve meaning everyone just chooses their seats upon boarding the plane Everyone in my family was spread out and sitting next to random people and it was good besides that
Lemma: family get rebooked Southwest Spirit get cancel nowhere never fly Spirit anyway treatment good wifi good bad thing really seating system first come first serve mean everyone choose seat upon board plane Everyone family spread sit next random people good besides

reviews: My nonstop flight at pm Sunday March th from Dallas to Tulsa was cancelled hours before flight time I received an email which I later found meant no text notification They auto booked me for pm flight then was delayed two hours which puts me getting home at am No apologies no explanation was given weather is one thing but cancelling a fight because you didn t sell enough seats is terrible customer service Especially when I ve been a loyal client for decades I was really disappointed with this company Way too many delays and cancellations in the past year Covid is over and no longer an excuse My time is way more valuable than buying an inexpensive plane ticket I will be finding a new carrier when my points and funds are gone So sad what s happening to them Will not recommend anymore
Lemma: nonstop flight pm Sunday March th Dallas Tulsa cancel hour flight time receive email later find meant text notification auto book pm flight delay two hour put get home apologies explanation give weather one thing cancel fight sell enough seat terrible customer service Especially loyal client decade really disappointed company Way many delay cancellation past year Covid long excuse time way valuable buy inexpensive plane ticket find new carrier point fund go sad happen recommend anymore

reviews: I ve flown a minimum of once a month with Southwest for the last year At this point the savings are not worth the absolute madness the yo yo delays and last minute cancellations cause This airline has far too much uncertainty for anyone depending on reliability Unless you are super flexible with departure and arrival time by hours or days don t waste your time and sanity on Southwest
Lemma: flown minimum month Southwest last year point saving worth absolute madness yo yo delay last minute cancellation cause airline far much uncertainty anyone depend reliability Unless super flexible departure arrival time hour day waste time sanity Southwest

reviews: Completely cancelled my flight less than hours before departure Not even a single delay Have asked for a refund multiple times and they have just sent two vouchers which I do not want to consider since I will not be flying with this airline again Have tried contacting through email Twitter and Facebook no response unless it s a robot Have waited on the line multiple times Once they hung up after I said hello and the second time I had to hang up after hours to go on with my life Terrible airline and terrible customer service
Lemma: Completely cancel flight less hour departure even single delay ask refund multiple time send two voucher want consider since fly airline try contact email Twitter Facebook response unless robot wait line multiple time hang say hello second time hang hour go life Terrible airline terrible customer service

reviews: I never book flights on low cost airlines with very high hopes It started when I got to the gate the staff was nice and they are enforcing very strict COVID rules something very important in these times Before long we were boarding which was surprisingly easier than with other airlines You got to choose your seat which was nice as long as your preferred seat wasn t already taken and the taxi and takeoff was smooth and uneventful Once we had leveled off the cabin crew came around with drinks and snacks and while their selection was a little limited I understand why they can t have a vast array of refreshments The cabin crew was very nice and while there was no in flight entertainment I don t see that as a factor that lowers the experience value because it s just so easy to bring your own entertainment on board these days Our descent landing and taxi were smooth and once we got to our gate I exited the plane feeling refreshed at the experience I had just had
Lemma: never book flight low cost airline high hope start get gate staff nice enforce strict COVID rule something important time long board surprisingly easy airline get choose seat nice long preferred seat already take taxi takeoff smooth uneventful level cabin crew come around drink snack selection little limited understand vast array refreshment cabin crew nice flight entertainment see factor lower experience value easy bring entertainment board day descent landing taxi smooth get gate exit plane feeling refresh experience

reviews: First customer service rep I called couldn t help me and told me my flight was delayed when on the app and text message I received said it was cancelled She told me she doesn t understand why that s happening and gave me another number to call I have been on hold on the phone for hours and still currently waiting for my call to be answered My flight was cancelled hours before we were supposed to leave Not only is this incredibly inconvenient but there are no flights going out until Wednesday night A handful of other airlines are leaving Indianapolis and going to fort Meyers Maybe if southwest stopped overbooking their flights they wouldn t constantly get cancelled and be blamed for bad weather
Lemma: First customer service rep call help tell flight delay app text message receive say cancel tell understand happen give another number call hold phone hour still currently wait call answer flight cancel hour suppose leave incredibly inconvenient flight go Wednesday night handful airline leave Indianapolis go fort Meyers Maybe southwest stop overbooking flight constantly get cancel blame bad weather

reviews: I have been flying Southwest Airlines from the early s until now on and off The reason I don t get to fly often is due to my work situations However when circumstances allows me my first choice is SWA For the first time my experiences with SWA my flight was cancelled by Air Traffic Control few days ago I called SWA support to ask any flight out of MCO in the next hrs and got the next day flight out from MCO The person who helped me bent backward to find me a flight even though it took me out of the way and longer time This is the service you get even you are not a frequent flyer Southwest Airlines go to great length to please anyone
Lemma: fly Southwest Airlines early reason get fly often due work situation However circumstance allow first choice SWA first time experience SWA flight cancel Air Traffic Control day ago call SWA support ask flight MCO next hr get next day flight MCO person help bend backward find flight even though take way long time service get even frequent flyer Southwest Airlines go great length please anyone

reviews: Worst experience I ve ever had on a plane Flight was hour late taking off when captain and stewards shut down flight to accommodate a panicky customer We wait another hour prepare to de ice and take off when another customer needs something out of the cargo hold Flight shuts down again Customer reps come aboard to relay that all connecting flights are cancelled because there s no way to get there in time Chaos ensues as half the plane de boards A single customer service rep who has no idea what she s doing attempts to coral all fifty passengers and fails What a waste of three hours of my time Poor communication time and customer management Will not use this airline again don t recommend them

reviews: My review is for the Southwest staff at the Phoenix Sky Harbor airport It wasn t crowded There were no long lines And yet every desk employee was rude grumpy non smiling and abrupt My questions were met with sour looks wrong information it turned out and I have MS and although I don t appear disabled I walk with great difficulty My husband was with me We needed a wheelchair There were no pushers at all and we were treated like it was too much to ask or expect We weren t blaming Southwest about the wheelchairs but that is who we had to ask for it But that wasn t a main issue The desk agents in arranging our new flights treated us like scum under his feet he made mistakes instead of answering our questions he said You re done so move away My husband was trying to push my wheelchair I was rolling my carry on beside me my tote on my lap my husbands back pack We had been stuck in Phoenix nights due to weather We were smiling respectful polite and understanding on purpose It didn t help He again told us to get out of the way quickly In days back at the airport after our new flight didn t show on the APP waiting on hold hours never receiving the previously requested call back Finally we got an email with the flight confirmation The desk agent had no one else in line and couldn t find us in the computer My husband looked up the email with the confirmation to show her and she rudely said I don t want to see any phones Don t show me papers we hadn t You aren t booked We were but somehow she couldn t find us until she tried for over minutes Not sure if it was system or human problem Ok so no wheelchair pushers on duty so that was a wreck I m pushing carryons beside my wheelchair husband is carrying items plus pushing We get to security No help at all An agent said we needed a pusher and to go to the information desk and ask them to call for a pusher through security The info man said I don t know who told you that but I don t do that So security was a mess I can t walk or stand long enough I needed to stay in my chair I was greeted with sour looks and impatience when they asked if I could try to walk through the scanner I can t And I can t help my disease I waited a long time before a woman security person came to get me through I didn t mind waiting I did mind being spoken to in such a rude manner Because we had to check out of the hotel hours before our flight we had several hours to wait at the airport and gate And the list of rude Southwest staff went on I ll stop here

reviews: RNO LAX r t As always at least for us Southwest is the best carrier out of Reno Flight out was delayed by minutes but we were kept well informed In fact it turned in to only a minute delay and an on time arrival in LA Check in boarding and flight all went smooth Served a drink and snack Protocols for Covid were in place for the one hour flight which is no problem Shocking airport traffic in the terminal at LAX for a Thursday evening but that has nothing to do with the airline Flight out of LAX was remarkably smooth Departure at am and literally lifted off in air at Arrived minutes early in Reno Used my points so flight was free except for in taxes Can t beat it Good job Southwest
Lemma: RNO LAX r always least us Southwest best carrier Reno Flight delay minute keep well inform fact turn minute delay time arrival LA Check board flight go smooth Served drink snack Protocols Covid place one hour flight problem Shocking airport traffic terminal LAX Thursday evening nothing airline Flight LAX remarkably smooth Departure literally lift air Arrived minute early Reno Used point flight free except tax beat Good job Southwest

reviews: Great price for airfares but you pay for it with their customer service They are lazy do not take time to help their customers and are selfish with their time I was recently in Dallas airport and called the desk because their agent had made a mistake with my ticket I accidentally left my AirPods at the desk I boarded my plane and noticed they were missing I quickly checked the location and called the desk I explained I was already on the plane so that I couldn t get off We had about people still boarding and the door was still open The agent at the desk said if I have time I will walk them to your gate This was at gate and I m at gate not far at all of course she did not have time and now I m being told I have to pay for FedEx to have them shipped back and that s if they are found It s so sad that they encourage laziness and the lack of customer service
Lemma: Great price airfare pay customer service lazy take time help customer selfish time recently Dallas airport call desk agent make mistake ticket accidentally leave AirPods desk board plane notice miss quickly check location call desk explain already plane get people still board door still open agent desk say time walk gate gate gate far course time tell pay FedEx ship back find sad encourage laziness lack customer service

reviews: Within my four flights to and from NM there has been a total of hours worth of delays waiting Our first flight we were going to NM from Maine and due to a technical error my name was misspelled and it took staff a very long time both times to fix the name on the boarding pass but I don t blame the staff I blame the system that Southwest uses We were already there two hours early so we had time to do the things we needed to do before boarding but Southwest Airlines will be giving you so much time that you won t know what to do with yourself We were told that the very first delay was due to the plane being too heavy because of passengers baggage and fuel After they sorted that out we were finally on our way After we landed for our connecting flight in Baltimore we waited an hour on the pavement to get to a terminal because all of them were full Once we finally got to a terminal in Baltimore we had to haul butt to the other side of the Airport because our connecting flight was going to be missed no thanks to Southwest This being my first time flying I decided not to let it bother me too much However now that we are flying back and dealing with the same extensive delays and terrible customer reimbursement of funds and services I decided it might be time to give a cent I d like to note that all the staff have been so helpful and wonderful this whole time the flight attendants and pilots have been extremely kind and apologetic for this airlines absurd behavior and policies Right now it s pm in Baltimore and our flight was supposed to leave at pm We were already delayed minutes and as soon as passengers started lining up to get on the delayed plane someone on the intercom stated that suddenly the plane is unsafe to travel in and therefore have cancelled that flight They ended up keeping us in the dark for a while until we were told to move to Terminal B instead of B We re awaiting the plane to leave that s currently there so that a new plane can pull up However I m expecting at least an hour more of waiting because they will need to fuel pack and board the plane Overall I ll give a star rating to your very helpful kind and patient staff I ll give a star rating to everything else We were in the dark the whole time and it was made very clear to us that if the airline messed up it was on us Southwest even over boards the planes for profit with no guarantee of a seat So if it s overpacked and there isn t a seat for you someone is expected to voluntarily give up their seat And if they don t I think they ll try to find another plane for you but I m not sure either way what we re they thinking You don t board a plane without plans They don t care as long as they get that

reviews: Consistently late at every portion First leg shifted my departure hours earlier and almost missed my flight out On the way back because of overfilling fuel and change of planes they Added a day to my trip put me up in a motel with literally ceiling falling down Then next flight first in the morning is hour late Over the last two years this has become the standard for southwest What used to be one of the best airlines has been downgraded to frontier and spirit level I do not recommend flying southwest if you are sensitive to time or events Terrible for business planning If you want free bags sure they re included

reviews: I flew to Denver on December with a return flight scheduled for January I got caught in the biggest most devastating fire ever in Colorado s history My family and I were evacuated This was a very traumatic experience and I was exposed to Covid I tried to schedule a Covid test before the day of my flight but the earliest I could get an appointment was January I bore the expense to drive home out of respect for other passengers and my inability to test due to the chaos and tragic circumstances surrounding the Marshall Fire I received the following response today Dear Brenda We are sorry to learn that you were unable to travel as planned due to not feeling well and we hope you are doing well The reservation in question was booked at our Wanna Get Away fare which carry restrictions such as being nonrefundable And while we wish we could honor every request to refund a nonrefundable fare the reason we are able to offer these fares at such a substantial discount in the first place is because they are a firm commitment to travel In this situation the originally ticketed Passenger still has the flexibility to apply these travel funds to a new reservation provided the reservation is canceled at least minutes prior to travel and travel is completed by the expiration date We are hopeful you will be able to travel with us soon We know you have a choice when you fly and we hope you will continue to choose Southwest We would truly appreciate the chance to welcome you onboard soon I canceled out of respect for other passengers Incidentally I did have Covid making for a miserable drive home I could have easily boarded that plane and saved myself a hour drive on treacherous icy roads not to mention the expense SWA is more concerned about money than safety I gave hours notice and I guarantee my seat did not remain empty with all of the cancellations that were taking place at that time I think SWA is despicable for putting the concern of other passengers behind the almighty dollar

reviews: We had unused travel funds that we were using to travel this month My husband fell sick so to ensure everyone s safety I had him take a covid test which came back positive I called the airline to let them know that we couldn t complete our trip due to Covid and asked for a one time curtesy extension for one month They said to call back after the funds expired and they would offer a one time month extension The funds expired today and I was told they would send me a voucher of and some change because they have to deduct as a penalty for not using the funds by the date There was no way around it Very disappointed and will never be using Southwest again

reviews: Today my husband and I headed back home to Texas from our honeymoon in Cancun It was the absolute best flight we have ever been on even with the flight being delayed All because of the incredible flight attendant Tammy on our flight on January th at PM She was so sweet to announce our celebration and even gifted us with an unforgettable memory of her generosity Wish we could ve thanked her more she went truly above and beyond Hope to see our fellow Texan in the future

reviews: We were supposed to fly back home to Oklahoma City on October th On the day we were supposed to fly home we received a text stating that our flight had been cancelled but had been rebooked for a am flight the next day At approximately am we got a text cancelling that flight as well Then they offered my wife a flight to Atlanta with no flight from Atlanta to OKC which then was cancelled as well We had to get back home no later than Sunday so we drove down to the airport to find out what was going on There was a mob of angry people waiting on employees to try to handle to issues The employees stated that they had no information as to why all of the cancellations Later this issues became a national news story and SW said the cancellations were weather related but strangely there were no other flights cancelled that day on any other airlines for weather related issues
Lemma: suppose fly back home Oklahoma City October th day suppose fly home receive text state flight cancel rebooked flight next day approximately get text cancelling flight well offer wife flight Atlanta flight Atlanta OKC cancel well get back home later Sunday drive airport find go mob angry people wait employee try handle issue employee state information cancellation Later issue become national news story SW say cancellation weather relate strangely flight cancel day airline weather relate issue

reviews: Our flight going to Chicago number on am The attendant was very rude my sister is handicapped she is yrs old She asked the staff member if someone could put a carry on up above for her The attendant sarcastically said if its too heavy you should check it in so another passenger helped us Our flight coming home was flight Our attendants were sarcastic they rolled their eyes when we asked for drinks If your employees are not happy they need to get other jobs When we were at Tampa Airport Southwest counter it was early but the ladies at the counter were not happy answering my questions Yes it was am but its their job to answer our questions Just rude sarcastic and didn t want to be bothered I am a customer paying for my flights if they don t want to work early then don t I am not happy with how my sister and I were treated

reviews: Due to weather my original flight was canceled and rebooked without my knowledge Then there were multiple delays due to weather Both I understood and accepted However with the chaos my concern now was with my luggage And that concern was valid now days into a trip to visit my daughter I still have no clothes other than what I borrow from her During this time they repeatedly gave me misinformation on where my luggage was and when it would arrive At one point my luggage never left Texas but they assured me it was on a flight to Baltimore and and they d call me when it arrived Well at I called and they said they were offloading it Called back at and they tell me it never left Texas Not one time did they call me to tell me any of this or offer any type of apology for apparently lying I called tonight to ask for the location of my luggage as it was due in today Now days in and my bag was delayed another day The service representative tonight again lacked empathy to my situation and offered us a voucher In what world does a voucher makeup for not having my luggage delivered to me for days in the middle of winter Of course I took it because it s something and I m not that prideful but I am very upset They only say they care if they cared I wouldn t have to writing this review of how poorly their team treated me throughout this entire process

reviews: First we stood in line for hour and minutes before we were able to even get to the counter flying Business Select then another plus minutes to get checked in as the customer service rep looked all around instead of paying attention to what he was doing It took scans of each of our passports of us were traveling together People were moving others to the front of the business line for tips counter working A List passengers that pay more for expedition to begin with and we were solicited to tip more to get us to the front of the line No way Then we were given a free drink coupon for our flight Beer wine or liquor was valid for the day of travel only and only for Southwest Airline this was rejected by attendant with We haven t had alcoholic beverages for over two years now then he chuckled A non alcoholic beverage offering at that time would have been nice but no offer We had already had coffee and soda so maybe one drink allowed This is the worst experience ever flying Why should I pay for business class if it does not benefit me We boarded behind wheelchair passengers and their extended families who miraculously were able to travel walking when landed due to no wheelchairs available yet at the gate Three of remained seated waiting for assistance I have no problem waiting for those three at all This makes me question if I will ever fly Southwest again but I will never pay for Business Class again with them regular boarding took well over hours to check in for the flight There were at least counters to serve other class boarding The security process took way less time as they screened everyone s bags and persons This is an economy type airline thankfully it was the non stop destination option Beware if you fly with them keep your money in your pocket and don t bother with A list business or first class you just threw away your money

reviews: Southwest s customer service is terrible I paid for early bird check in when I got to the airport my boarding number was C I upgraded so I wouldn t be the last one on the plane with the worst seat So now this has cost and Southwest refuses to give a reimbursement for their error In Houston it took minutes at baggage claim for the luggage Overall I will not fly with them if this is how they do business I am grateful my flight was canceled
Lemma: Southwest customer service terrible pay early bird check get airport boarding number C upgrade last one plane bad seat cost Southwest refuse give reimbursement error Houston take minute baggage claim luggage Overall fly business grateful flight cancel

reviews: My comment is on the lack of enforcement of masks Yes we say it s mandatory but they are not enforcing it properly As soon as stewardesses walk away people pull mask down all the way or under nose If your not going to wear a mask properly the entire time don t fly Stewardesses should be more firm and walking around enforcing mask more I flew from Texas to Ohio girl took her mask down during snacks and didn t put it up the rest of the trip My return flight the man beside me didn t even wear a mask into the airport and didn t wear it the entire trip even after being told multiple times by one step thank God to put it up and leave it up This man after the second time should have been fined and or arrested upon departure But no nobody says anything and how many people end up sick

reviews: Kansas City to Denver Horrible experience Had a direct flight that was held an extra minutes for people to board from connecting flights after everyone was already boarded Once we reached Denver there were no gates available so we waited in a long line of planes for over an hour I don t understand how this could happen at Denver It is huge Never flying Southwest again

reviews: This was the absolute worst experience of my entire life I will never fly with southwest again First of all the flight attendant showed up super late causing the flight to be delayed Once we were all boarded and sitting in the seats the power went out on the plane We waited and waited and finally it got fixed Then we pulled onto the runway and for some reason they pulled us all the way back up to the gate again Nobody told us what was going on So we sat at the gate for MORE than minutes and we still don t know why and then finally we went back to the runway and we took off Then we landed here at CVG at am many hours later than planned and I m still sitting here in this plane at am and they haven t let us off yet why am I still sitting here in this plane minutes after landing Why did we not land until after midnight when I have work early in the morning Because of stupidity I am floored and very angry They ve lost a customer
Lemma: absolute bad experience entire life never fly southwest First flight attendant show super late cause flight delay board sit seat power go plane wait wait finally get fix pull onto runway reason pull us way back gate Nobody tell us go sit gate minute still know finally go back runway take land CVG many hour later plan still sit plane let us yet still sit plane minute land land midnight work early morning stupidity floored angry lose customer

reviews: Flight was delayed hours when there were planes on the ground not being used Finally boarded and still delayed because waiting for people that were running late Landed very late then sat on the ground for another hour waiting for a plane to move from the gate There were open gates but they wouldn t let us park there Instead we sat on the ground inhaling fumes No notification from the crew on board as to why This was mismanagement and someone high up made a small mistake which cascaded to a larger one
Lemma: Flight delay hour plane ground use Finally board still delay wait people run late Landed late sit ground another hour wait plane move gate open gate let us park Instead sit ground inhale fume notification crew board mismanagement someone high make small mistake cascade large one

reviews: This isn t the first time Southwest has screwed up my luggage Last time I flew southwest they lost my luggage and then gave me the wrong luggage This time they completely damaged my Delsey large luggage it wasn t a cheap purchase for me by any means I understand normal wear and tear on luggage but this went so far past wear and tear Customer service does not help and will tell you to simply accept that they damage your property The only thing that s nice about Southwest is that their rates are budget but you make up the difference in having to buy new luggage Fly American Airlines
Lemma: first time Southwest screw luggage Last time fly southwest lose luggage give wrong luggage time completely damage Delsey large luggage cheap purchase mean understand normal wear tear luggage go far past wear tear Customer service help tell simply accept damage property thing nice Southwest rate budget make difference buy new luggage Fly American Airlines

reviews: I left a package on my flight from Boston to Midway It was an early Christmas gift with instructions not to open until Christmas I accidentally left it in the above luggage compartment when I deplaned I only remembered that I left it there when I boarded my flight from Midway to Houston Hobby I completed a missing items report and spoke with a few flight attendants They all directed me to fill out the mission items report Before leaving the airport I stopped at the luggage office and the woman gave me the number to the lost and found offices in Midway and Pittsburgh where the plane that I left the package on was going to next I called both offices a few times and the next day a woman in Midway answered and said they had the package I was so relieved She offered to mail it to me and needed my FedEx number I was having trouble with my FedEx account so I needed to hang up with her and then call her back She was so wonderful and helpful I can t remember if her name was Courtney or Michelle or something else Any way I was extremely grateful for your kindness and her help Thank you SW and thank you in particular to them women in Hobby and Midway who were so helpful
Lemma: leave package flight Boston Midway early Christmas gift instruction open Christmas accidentally leave luggage compartment deplane remember leave board flight Midway Houston Hobby complete missing item report speak flight attendant direct fill mission item report leave airport stop luggage office woman give number lose find office Midway Pittsburgh plane leave package go next call office time next day woman Midway answer say package relieved offer mail need FedEx number trouble FedEx account need hang call back wonderful helpful remember name Courtney Michelle something else way extremely grateful kindness help Thank SW thank particular woman Hobby Midway helpful

reviews: I had two flights with this airline and both of them were direct I purchased those flights because I have a tight timetable One of them was at in the morning after getting in late at night on another airline The first flight was cancelled weeks before with NO reasonable rebook options so I had to fly from MCI to Chicago before heading out west This one was cancelled immediately beforehand and then the woman at the counter told us to run not telling us the gate was at the other end of the airport and not calling them to tell them to wait After running losing some of our stuff I was treated to missing the plane anyway and then being changed to an even later flight on no sleep Vouchers do not make this right I won t be flying Southwest again

reviews: I had a travel voucher from a purchase in Feb I used them throughout this past year but had some travel voucher leftover I then used that to roll into a new flight that was scheduled to take place in Dec I had to cancel that trip because I got covid the day before When I went to use the travel voucher for a trip this Feb I saw that the two different travel voucher credits expiration dates were rolled up into the original Feb purchase instead of being separated out from dates or purchases Very dissatisfied with this treatment I called southwest to get it straightened out and waited on the phone for over minutes only to hang up because I had to get to my appointment Had I known I would have to go through all of this with the travel voucher expiration date problem from Southwest and waiting on the phone for help I would have gone with a different airline and airline credit card
Lemma: travel voucher purchase Feb use throughout past year travel voucher leftover use roll new flight schedule take place Dec cancel trip get covid day go use travel voucher trip Feb saw two different travel voucher credit expiration date roll original Feb purchase instead separate date purchase dissatisfied treatment call southwest get straighten wait phone minute hang get appointment know would go travel voucher expiration date problem Southwest wait phone help would go different airline airline credit card

reviews: They were very courteous helpful and inviting I had no issues Everyone and everything from booking and boarding to baggage claim went smooth and I will Definitely continue to use them out of stars
Lemma: courteous helpful inviting issue Everyone everything book board baggage claim go smooth Definitely continue use star

reviews: My half brother who is intellectually challenged asked for help in obtaining his boarding pass this morning at the Orlando MCO terminal for Southwest Airlines He was there at am for a am flight He forgot his mask A Customer Assistant lady told him that he had to get out of line and possibly was going to be thrown out of the airport because he did not have a mask This is after he politely told them that he forgot his mask and if they could get him a mask He had to go and purchase a mask Luckily there was a kind soul in line that provided him with a mask to wear Needless to say he was petrified that he would miss his flight Like I instructed him to ask for help with the kiosk to obtain his boarding pass I have never had any problems in the many years I ve flown Southwest Airlines or other airlines in my Air Force career spanning decades The staff member told him that he had to get his own boarding pass he had to do manage the kiosk by himself Anyone that ever meets my half brother automatically is aware that he is intellectually challenged First of all it is heartless to have this attitude toward intellectually challenged human beings Secondly what happened at the basic premise of customer service for Southwest Airlines Did I say heartless What kind of training is this airline providing to their so called customer service representatives that are in the forefront of this airline I called Southwest to file a formal complaint It tells me where Southwest Airlines customer service initiatives are
Lemma: half brother intellectually challenge ask help obtain board pas morning Orlando MCO terminal Southwest Airlines flight forget mask Customer Assistant lady tell get line possibly go throw airport mask politely tell forget mask could get mask go purchase mask Luckily kind soul line provide mask wear Needless say petrify would miss flight Like instruct ask help kiosk obtain board pas never problem many year flown Southwest Airlines airline Air Force career span decade staff member tell get boarding pas manage kiosk Anyone ever meet half brother automatically aware intellectually challenge First heartless attitude toward intellectually challenge human being Secondly happen basic premise customer service Southwest Airlines say heartless kind training airline provide call customer service representative forefront airline call Southwest file formal complaint tell Southwest Airlines customer service initiative

reviews: I left Cancun Mexico with a minute lay over at Houston before heading to my final destination Phoenix I got to Houston at am My flight to Phoenix kept getting cancelled from am till pm Then Southwest Airlines load us on a flight to San Jose with promises that phoenix will be our last destination that day The minutes we touched San Jose we were told our flight to Phoenix was canceled To top things off My checked in bag got lost Had no change of clothes Southwest decided to put us in a hotel for a night But did not pay for our meals They issued new tickets showing from San Jose we would head to Phoenix the next day Well without any notice At boarding time the next day We were told the flight was going to another destination first And we did A trip that should have taken hours took hours My bag with all my supplies got lost Other customers bags were wet to the touch in San Jose Southwest airlines did not see any need to explain why our flight was cancelled so many times I m done with this airline Good luck to those who want to trust Southwest I will pay and try my luck with better airlines
Lemma: leave Cancun Mexico minute lay Houston head final destination Phoenix get Houston flight Phoenix keep get cancel till pm Southwest Airlines load us flight San Jose promise phoenix last destination day minute touch San Jose tell flight Phoenix cancel top thing check bag get lose change clothes Southwest decide put us hotel night pay meal issue new ticket show San Jose would head Phoenix next day Well without notice board time next day tell flight go another destination first trip take hour take hour bag supply get lose customer bag wet touch San Jose Southwest airline see need explain flight cancel many time do airline Good luck want trust Southwest pay try luck good airline

reviews: We want to recognize a Southwest Airline Supervisor who helped us in the Orlando Airport on Dec st My husband had a low blood sugar episode while standing in line to board the plane I notified the ticket agent who immediately called for a wheelchair Ildi gave him some orange juice and sat with him while I spoke with another agent who called the paramedics Ildi was very calm and supportive throughout the episode She stayed with us the entire time even after the paramedics checked his vitals She was extremely professional I just wanted to let the company know how much we appreciated her kindness and encouragement She is an excellent representative for your company
Lemma: want recognize Southwest Airline Supervisor help us Orlando Airport Dec st husband low blood sugar episode stand line board plane notify ticket agent immediately call wheelchair Ildi give orange juice sit speak another agent call paramedic Ildi calm supportive throughout episode stay us entire time even paramedic check vitals extremely professional want let company know much appreciate kindness encouragement excellent representative company

reviews: Southwest is known as a cheap airline and it deserves this reputation After waiting in line minutes to add a Frequent Flyer number to my ticket I was disconnected It does not even allow you to leave a call back number I do not ever plan to use them again
Lemma: Southwest know cheap airline deserve reputation wait line minute add Frequent Flyer number ticket disconnect even allow leave call back number ever plan use

reviews: Not the Southwest they were when they started They used to talk the talk and walk the walk when it came to customer service that no longer exists Customer service is mediocre and incompetent Processes that could be quick and streamlined easily take a lot of time Not once were we verified for covid tests mask wearing inside the aircraft is optional despite it being implemented by law When you arrive at the Baltimore Airport you need to walk to the other end of the airport with your bags to do the bag transfer and wait in line for people coming into the airport I can t imagine what that must be like for someone with some form of impediment like the lady I saw dragging her bag walking with a cane Staff aren t as polite as they used to be either We are definitely not flying with them again and changing our Chase card from SW to another airline

reviews: Literally the worst airline with the worst customer service Booked a flight for April but it was the peak of COVID pandemic and all travel had to be canceled I was not given an option of refund instead the money was put into my Southwest account for use within year I work in healthcare and it became nearly impossible to travel anywhere for the year I tried to make a travel plan by December just to use the existing funds in my Southwest account but had to cancel last moment again due to increasing COVID cases around December Again the amount was put back into my Southwest account until it expired and now they re are offering me a small voucher after all my flight money has been taken I am so disgusted by the way they handled the refunds during the pandemic I vow to never board Southwest ever again
Lemma: Literally bad airline bad customer service Booked flight April peak COVID pandemic travel cancel give option refund instead money put Southwest account use within year work healthcare become nearly impossible travel anywhere year try make travel plan December use exist fund Southwest account cancel last moment due increase COVID case around December amount put back Southwest account expire offer small voucher flight money take disgust way handle refund pandemic vow never board Southwest ever

reviews: We arrived at for an flight and got rejected at the gate Apparently Southwest has a very strict policy of cutting off boarding minutes before takeoff We were minutes past their cutoff but they had no mercy during the holiday season I other airline I have flown will cut you off if you make it before take off you are good On top of that the gate attendant was unkind and cold I will never fly southwest again and I don t recommend them to anyone Silly policies and poor customer service
Lemma: arrive flight get reject gate Apparently Southwest strict policy cut board minute takeoff minute past cutoff mercy holiday season airline fly cut make take good top gate attendant unkind cold never fly southwest recommend anyone Silly policy poor customer service

reviews: The stewards were so rude We selected to sit by the door for leg room They asked to respond verbally and my husband responded Si She yelled at him saying in English Really Glared at us whole time Seats were separated and when we asked is there a way we can sit together we were told to appreciate what we had On the way back everyone seems grouchy or in a bad mood Maybe they are over worked because so many lost jobs over vaccine mandates But for whatever the reason I will never fly with Southwest again Did not appreciate the treatment on a six hour flight going both ways
Lemma: steward rude select sit door leg room ask respond verbally husband respond Si yell say English Really Glared us whole time Seats separate ask way sit together tell appreciate way back everyone seem grouchy bad mood Maybe worked many lose job vaccine mandate whatever reason never fly Southwest appreciate treatment six hour flight go way

reviews: Spoke with a reservation agent regarding booking a military flight for four round trip tickets on Dec for Dec Jan Was told that paris would not need a seat so we proceeded to talk about purchasing three seats and were asked for our card details so it can be placed on file After giving our details the gentleman made the purchase without any consent of the purchase being made at that moment or anything My husband had to look at our account to see that money had been taken after asking the gentleman why would he not notify us he then proceeds to say that he never really took our son into account put him in the system and now he need to make a separate purchase because he infants does need a seat and that any and up has to pay for a seat although in a previous conversation he had said and under Not once did he apologize for charging our card without approval nor for neglecting to tell us our child did need a seat at the time of purchase when being told originally that he didn t We are in the holiday season when tickets can be pricey and I feel that we should ve been given a option as to which airline would accommodate us better instead our money was taken and now we have to week business days to get the money back and by then all the airline seats will be sold out or higher due to this inconvenience I asked to speak with a supervisor and was switched to a department without briefing them of my case and without any notations being place on my account And the Supervisor didn t help either it was either get a refund or pay full price for my sons ticket a seat that he will not sit in no discount no taxes dropped for making me have to do two purchases when being asked if tickets needed to be purchased and or no comped seat for the child Completely unprofessional experience and I never intend to fly with this company again There s no respect for the customers and they don t believe in satisfying the customers even when the customers are looking for a resolve

reviews: I was flying from Houston to Florida and had a lay over in New Orleans Lay over originally was mins but then flight got delayed I land in Tampa and apparently me and several people who had similar lay overs all had luggage left back in New Orleans The airline couldn t have bothered to transfer our bags on time There was ample time and they ruined a weekend trip i planned Southwest you need to get your act together and have better policies Now we are all waiting to get our stuff back I will never travel Southwest again This is just pure laziness and could have been avoided Thanks for the travel voucher
Lemma: fly Houston Florida lay New Orleans Lay originally min flight get delay land Tampa apparently several people similar lay over luggage leave back New Orleans airline bother transfer bag time ample time ruin weekend trip plan Southwest need get act together good policy wait get stuff back never travel Southwest pure laziness could avoid Thanks travel voucher

reviews: I have been delayed times on this flight I was suppose to be in las Vegas at pm Not I m barely about to board and it s pm This is terrible time management
Lemma: delay time flight suppose las Vegas pm barely board pm terrible time management

reviews: My husband and I recently flew Southwest Airlines coming home from a vacation trip The Southwest Airlines steward Lloyd was so attentive and respectful He offered walking and seat change assistance to an elderly woman on the plane He also checked on all the passengers several times throughout the flight to make sure everyone was doing okay Lloyd made the flight enjoyable and comfortable I will definitely continue to fly with Southwest because of him
Lemma: husband recently fly Southwest Airlines come home vacation trip Southwest Airlines steward Lloyd attentive respectful offer walk seat change assistance elderly woman plane also check passenger several time throughout flight make sure everyone okay Lloyd make flight enjoyable comfortable definitely continue fly Southwest

reviews: Can t believe the lack of EQ from Staff Had to buy a last minute ticket for my year old daughter and year old son Somehow the boarding passes were split up So my son was A and me and my daughter were B So we tried to board in the A group seeing as we would be called up in another or so people And the man taking tickets refused to let us do so Very disgusted with his attitude as he was treating us like shop lifters
Lemma: believe lack EQ Staff buy last minute ticket year old daughter year old son Somehow boarding pass split son daughter B try board group see would call another people man take ticket refuse let us disgusted attitude treat us like shop lifter

reviews: I flew with Southwest Airlines from San Francisco to LA The flight had a delay of about or hours The flight attendant gave all the passengers vouchers for about The voucher expired by the end of The pandemic time Everywhere was closed and some of the people didn t feel safe to travel during that time Now since everything is getting better I called the airline I asked about extending my voucher I explained everything it was a pandemic for all the world not only California They don t do it Why Because they keep saying we have months policy after the expiration date It was a pandemic Such a bad experience hours delay however this is not irregular for Southwest no care about customers
Lemma: fly Southwest Airlines San Francisco LA flight delay hour flight attendant give passenger voucher voucher expire end pandemic time Everywhere close people feel safe travel time since everything get well call airline ask extend voucher explain everything pandemic world California keep say month policy expiration date pandemic bad experience hour delay however irregular Southwest care customer

reviews: Booked fares to Stl from Hou At midnight Oct received a text saying flight was canceled and to log on to SW to rebook no flights available Called CS and there was a recording stating there was a minute wait Got rental car to drive back to Hou SW gives me a voucher Doesn t cover even one fare not to mention the car and fuel Never again
Lemma: Booked fare Stl Hou midnight Oct receive text say flight cancel log SW rebook flight available Called CS recording state minute wait Got rental car drive back Hou SW give voucher cover even one fare mention car fuel Never

reviews: My friend and I were trying to fly out of Los Angeles Burbank to NYC and of course the fog was crazy this particular morning Burbank ended up canceling every flight at least in the morning The lady at one of the kiosks was super helpful In a very stressful situation for everyone was cool calm and collected She was kind and quick when helping us out I was pleasantly surprised that I felt okay even though it was chaotic
Lemma: friend try fly Los Angeles Burbank NYC course fog crazy particular morning Burbank end cancel every flight least morning lady one kiosk super helpful stressful situation everyone cool calm collect kind quick help us pleasantly surprised felt okay even though chaotic

reviews: We flew Southwest for family vacation to Cancun We went from GR to Chicago and when boarding started they said first come first serve on seats and we were letter C so we re last to board Some of us got to sit together to Chicago once we boarded in Chicago to Cancun again first come first serve we were letter C again My family was strong put through out the whole airplane My son has a brain injury and didn t have a clue how to fill out the declaration papers So you people need to start assigning seats We all ended up in middle seats and were like sardines for the money we paid should of got better service No one wants to move or offer a seat because they want an empty seat between them With my experience I doubt I will fly Southwest again
Lemma: fly Southwest family vacation Cancun go GR Chicago board start say first come first serve seat letter C last board us get sit together Chicago board Chicago Cancun first come first serve letter C family strong put whole airplane son brain injury clue fill declaration paper people need start assign seat end middle seat like sardine money pay get well service one want move offer seat want empty seat experience doubt fly Southwest

reviews: This was our first time ever flying Southwest and it will be our last Totally disorganized and for the price of our ticket it was a rip off We paid each plus upgraded once not realizing that people can sit in the same area without paying This was from Nashville to Puerto Vallarta I have traveled all over the world including on many foreign carriers and have never had an experience even close to this one Beware
Lemma: first time ever fly Southwest last Totally disorganize price ticket rip pay plus upgrade realize people sit area without pay Nashville Puerto Vallarta travel world include many foreign carrier never experience even close one Beware

reviews: Southwest has been getting progressively worse If I had a problem with one flight once in a while it would be fine but every time I fly Southwest something happens They damaged my brand new suitcase hr delay minute delay because their attendant was late A very unprofessional airline Many of the employees are pretty grumpy Wouldn t recommend
Lemma: Southwest get progressively worse problem one flight would fine every time fly Southwest something happen damage brand new suitcase hr delay minute delay attendant late unprofessional airline Many employee pretty grumpy recommend

reviews: I had the most terrible experience flying with Southwest for the first time First I had to deal with security at Baltimore airport who shook me down over a bottle of hair cream and because of the sparkles on my sweater and missed my first flight then I was placed on a later flight with Southwest waiting to get back home to Florida but waited an entire hour at the airport due to the flight being delayed and the Southwest staff failing to update us on why we were an hour late leaving the airport When an explanation was finally provided we were told that our plane had to be towed which made no sense then we were told that we were unable to board due to a technical issue with the computers So we were dealing with a huge tired and confused group of people waiting around in the airport just waiting to go home Oh and the saga doesn t end there once we were FINALLY able to board the plane we had to wait an additional minutes for no reason I don t think I will ever fly with Southwest again I didn t get back to Florida until pm and still had to drive minutes to where I actually live from West Palm Beach
Lemma: terrible experience fly Southwest first time First deal security Baltimore airport shake bottle hair cream sparkle sweater miss first flight place late flight Southwest wait get back home Florida wait entire hour airport due flight delay Southwest staff fail update us hour late leave airport explanation finally provide tell plane tow make sense tell unable board due technical issue computer deal huge tired confused group people wait around airport wait go home Oh saga end FINALLY able board plane wait additional minute reason think ever fly Southwest get back Florida pm still drive minute actually live West Palm Beach

reviews: Overall my flight was great We arrived just in time for boarding and it was quick and fast Taxing was surprisingly quick Entertainment was easy you could bring your own handheld device The website offered a ok selection of movies and tv shows along with free messaging iMessage and WhatsApp Internet costs but free for A List Preferred members I believe Lastly they had a good selection of Live TV stations and free Iheartradio The seat width was good for a hour flight however one concern I would have is food They only offer a snack mix on the airline however they do offer a selection of beverages If you are going on a longer flight please bring your own food The landing provided scenic views of the Hoover Dam the touchdown was a little bumpy I would recommend Southwest if you want a great experience and cheap fares And I forgot to mention be sure to take advantage of their free baggage system first bags free
Lemma: Overall flight great arrive time board quick fast Taxing surprisingly quick Entertainment easy could bring handheld device website offer ok selection movie tv show along free message iMessage WhatsApp Internet cost free List Preferred member believe Lastly good selection Live TV station free Iheartradio seat width good hour flight however one concern would food offer snack mix airline however offer selection beverage go long flight please bring food landing provide scenic view Hoover Dam touchdown little bumpy would recommend Southwest want great experience cheap fare forget mention sure take advantage free baggage system first bag free

reviews: Worst experience flying with Southwest First they cancel your flight then the process to rebook is a headache also don t forget after they rebook us from our original itinerary to San Diego I have to land at Ontario and have someone drive hours there and back to pick me up Also my luggage is on a completely different flight Not only that but my other friend is given false tickets since she was left in Long Beach instead of lay over in Oakland and land in San Diego She lands in Long Beach without luggage as well
Lemma: Worst experience fly Southwest First cancel flight process rebook headache also forget rebook us original itinerary San Diego land Ontario someone drive hour back pick Also luggage completely different flight friend give false ticket since leave Long Beach instead lay Oakland land San Diego land Long Beach without luggage well

reviews: SWA Canceled our flight to Vegas hrs before take off am via text We were advised to jump online to re book by the time we did there were no flights available We were meeting friends pre paid hotel had Lionel Ritchie tickets and this was a vacation we had planned months in advance We never got to go because other airlines same day booking were astronomically high We missed our concert vacation and friends because of SWA employee no shows this was the reason for cancellation We complained to SWA and their response was a voucher after losing out over in hotel fees and concert tickets Beware of this airline trying to make amends at faults of their own Their customer relations dept are horrible and would not recommend flying with them ever
Lemma: SWA Canceled flight Vegas hr take via text advise jump online book time flight available meet friend pre pay hotel Lionel Ritchie ticket vacation plan month advance never get go airline day book astronomically high miss concert vacation friend SWA employee show reason cancellation complain SWA response voucher lose hotel fee concert ticket Beware airline try make amends fault customer relation dept horrible would recommend fly ever

reviews: Absolutely the worst experience I ve ever had at an airport with an airline We got to the airport at pm for a pm departure We were moved to different lines and eventually at pm we reached the ticket counter When we reached the front of the line they then took people behind us that were on a flight that departed minutes before ours No one knew what was going on and the extra time we wanted to use to get food and other items was now gone and we had to rush to our gate
Lemma: Absolutely bad experience ever airport airline get airport pm pm departure move different line eventually pm reach ticket counter reach front line take people behind us flight depart minute one know go extra time want use get food item go rush gate

reviews: Our flight from Albany to San Antonio on Southwest had us worried after the problems of cancelled flights a few weeks earlier Also this was our first try at bringing a folding electric wheelchair for use at our destination as well as during the layovers We could not be happier with the care and help with getting the chair aboard the plane and retrieving it at each destination The personnel at the check in and the gates at Albany Baltimore and San Antonio were superb I would recommend Southwest to any traveler and especially passengers that need assistance Southwest people are the best
Lemma: flight Albany San Antonio Southwest us worry problem cancelled flight week earlier Also first try bring fold electric wheelchair use destination well layover could happy care help get chair aboard plane retrieve destination personnel check gate Albany Baltimore San Antonio superb would recommend Southwest traveler especially passenger need assistance Southwest people best

reviews: I ve flown this airline three times and each time there has been a delay of two to three hours each Often for no reason of why I ve no problem with the crew but have grievous trepidations about the airline organization itself They claim low cost which is true but they fail to live up to any form of arriving or departing on time This will be an airline of last resort Fly at your own risk especially if there is a connecting flight

reviews: I called customer service before my flight because I was nervous about traveling with my wedding dress She assured me I could just ask for help from the flight attendants with my dress to make sure it doesn t get squished in the overhead bin When I boarded I asked the flight attendant at the front for help and he laughed at me and told me there s nothing they can do to help me and then when I got by the seat I chose I asked another flight attendant for help and she said the same thing Horrible experience They didn t even act like they cared about getting my expensive wedding dress to my wedding safely I m very annoyed and won t be flying with them again
Lemma: call customer service flight nervous travel wedding dress assure could ask help flight attendant dress make sure get squish overhead bin board ask flight attendant front help laugh tell nothing help get seat choose ask another flight attendant help say thing Horrible experience even act like care get expensive wedding dress wed safely annoyed fly

reviews: Never have I ever been so poorly treated by Southwest Airlines My husband and myself were supposed to leave Las Vegas headed back to Indianapolis on Monday Nov st at am Instead we got a late email at pm October informing us that are flight is cancelled and we won t be able to fly out until the next day at with a layover Southwest refused to accommodate us with a hotel food nor a different flight to a city close to Indianapolis We had just found out we lost our grandmother and couldn t get home Instead they offered a love flight voucher as if that would cover another night at the Aria or food and drinks for another full day stay We had to miss an extra day of work and had to pay an extra day of child care because we had no other way of getting to our children No way of getting to our family when they needed us the most Southwest left us with no options and they didn t care The service coordinators were unhelpful I ve never been so poorly treated in my life I d never recommend anyone to fly them ever again You all should be a ashamed of yourselves

reviews: Southwest has been horrible For work I flew from Las Vegas to Dallas for a connecting flight and was suppose to fly to Tampa The connecting flight got canceled due to weather which Southwest lied I was stuck in Dallas airport for two days without any luggage Southwest could not get me back to Tampa so I had to fly to Atlanta and rent a car for to drive back to Tampa In the process my Macbook screen was shattered by Southwest and it was in my luggage Southwest denied the claim because it was past the four hours and they do not do claims on electronic equipment I couldn t report the damage within four hours because my luggage made it to Tampa without me since Southwest could not get me home On top of everything my zipper was broken lock cut off my suite case and laptop screen broken Southwest maintained it was weather related even though no other airline canceled their flights This trip with Southwest has caused many issues and I will make sure my organization will not use them again

reviews: Reno Los Angeles via San Jose Los Angeles Reno As always Southwest is great flying out of Reno On time and friendly service Two of the three flights were on a but one leg had the max I really liked the max For the most part almost new very clean and good leg space The flights were pretty uneventful which is fine with me Standard beverage service and bag of pretzels The return flight out of Los Angeles was a half hour delayed due to weather so really can t complain about that No beverage service on that flight as turbulence was predicted because of flying through a storm but it never really materialized Had my own drink and snacks that I brought so no problem All in all Southwest always delivers when flying in and out of Reno

reviews: When Southwest Airlines first came out with the early bird special to purchase for early check in I thought it was a great idea However it sucks or is a scam Seven times out of seven I got in the worse boarding positions only the very first time was I in A boarding category My boarding positions were as follows when I used the early bird check in A B B C B C B I will no longer purchase the early bird special as it clearly does not check you in early for good boarding positions Oh as a side note the last check ins I did without the early bird special when I did it myself my boarding positions were A A A In case nobody knows seat are not assigned just boarding positions So when they announce that they are boarding A passengers to board the plane then A A passengers enter the plane first and get the pick of the seat then B B and then C So you can imagine how bad the seats left over were if you re in the B and especially the C categories Don t buy the early bird special it s not worth the extra money especially when they cannot even guarantee that you ll be in the A category at all I would recommend the airline because it s usually inexpensive but I would not recommend purchasing the early bird check in service because it sucks or is a scam for additional for nothing
Lemma: Southwest Airlines first come early bird special purchase early check think great idea However suck scam Seven time seven get bad boarding position first time boarding category boarding position follow use early bird check B B C B C B longer purchase early bird special clearly check early good boarding position Oh side note last check in without early bird special board position case nobody know seat assign board position announce board passenger board plane passenger enter plane first get pick seat B B C imagine bad seat leave B especially C category buy early bird special worth extra money especially even guarantee category would recommend airline usually inexpensive would recommend purchase early bird check service suck scam additional nothing

reviews: Worst experience on an airplane ever I had been flying Southwest loyally for over years Today we had a flight from Hartford to Baltimore get delayed In Baltimore I had a connecting flight to Sarasota I asked the gate attendant if we would be in jeopardy of missing our connection to Sarasota She said no that flight was also delayed We arrived in the A wing ran frantically to the B wing to make our connection Myself and over other passengers found the door to board closed plane still there and we were denied access to the plane Without our knowledge Southwest changed our flights to a later flight without ever notified us all They refused to let all of us on the plane that was still sitting there I paid extra to be in the A group for priority boarding but my reissued ticket has us in the C group last people to board When asked the attendant said it would cost an additional I already paid the on my original ticket and I know from past experience that whenever I changed my reservation I never lost my A status Because Southwest made the changes that did not happen I will never fly them again Thank you Southwest for sticking a loyal customer in the back of the plane You denied us all access to our original flight delayed our original flight changed our reservation without our notice and stuck us in the back of the plane Keep your travel voucher Southwest You mistreated many customers today I will try your new competitor Avelo which is actually cheaper or Jet Blue from now on I am also going to cancel my Southwest credit card as you do not value my time and me as a customer

reviews: Terrible business model if you reserve a flight six months in advance then cancel within a week you cannot get a refund you are instead offered a credit which can be used to purchase another flight through Southwest Airlines but only within the next months You are required to pay a higher price for a ticket to get a refund just in case you need to cancel the flight to actually get your money back

reviews: I have flown Southwest for several years but currently looking at other options The service dependability and customer service of the past has dramatically changed and not for the better I just returned yesterday on a flight from Texas It is not possible as evidenced by passengers exiting the flight and the time at which passengers are then boarded for cleaning and sanitizing to be completed per their stated protocol That and the discarded wrappers in the seat pockets as well as a sticky substance splashed on the back of the seat in front of me further validates this In addition I have definitely had it with checking in at the very moment possible only to board and find passengers who ve already boarded saving seats for others further back in the boarding process while flight attendants who are very obviously aware do not enforce their own boarding practice I am extremely weary of being treated like cattle Most airlines have already eliminated the change fees the only other perk that Southwest offers that others do not is free checked bags but even that is barely worth it anymore I expect that other airlines will soon follow suit and when that happens it will be the end of Southwest if they do not improve their current practices I applied for and have received the chase sapphire card which will allow me to accrue points that can be used for any of the airlines In the meantime I am looking at baggage shipping services as a way to deal with the baggage fees

reviews: Still sitting in the airplane hours after boarding First hold up was supposedly because extra maintenance checks had to be done for over an clean flights Second hold up was for weight and balance issues They were literally moving people around the plane and there were only empty seats total Then as we are pushing back from the gate the pilot comes on and says he is out of hours We were ft from the gate and he pulled back up and got off minutes later a new captain comes on and basically has to start all over Just got word that they were topping off the gas How is it you have to top off the gas if we were pushing from the gate minutes ago Southwest really needs to look at their management and processes This is definitely a star flight

reviews: I ll never fly Southwest again Booked a flight from Austin to Ontario and had a connection flight in Phoenix The flight from Austin to Phoenix was delayed an hour and a half Southwest then rebooked my flight from Phoenix to Ontario on another flight since the delay of the first flight was set to have me miss my original plane out of Phoenix My original plane I was in group A Southwest rebooked me and put me in group C as the last person on the plane I mentioned that I was forced to this plane due to the airline s own delay and was originally in group A asking if I could get the same group for the new flight The airline rep told me I could if I pay for it What terrible customer service Thanks for the delayed flight and then having me be the last person on the plane with the worst choice in seating on a full flight You guys screwed up yet I m the one that gets the short end of the stick Didn t offer any kind of compensation voucher was rude and Not trying to make right on their mistake I will never use Southwest again Worst airline ever

reviews: I have been a long time customer of Southwest Airlines beyond satisfied however this latest experience was not pleasing at all I made a reservation to visit my daughter in Los Angeles CA for the st of September Wednesday She called me and said not come as she had tested positive for COVID I immediately cancelled my reservations Tuesday August st and received a notification that they had been cancelled and the funds would remain for any future flights That was I got another email a few days later stating that my reservation had not been done in a timely manner and that my funds were taken and I would not get a refund and or credit I called SWA Customer Service to dispute this and was not given any consideration I m years old on a fixed income and was not pleased with the outcome I would hate to stop flying SWA however I ve worked in customer service for over years and would appreciate being given some satisfaction in this matter

reviews: This was the second leg of the trip ORD DAL HOU Flt Full flight with open seating The flight attendant who was standing at the forward galley as boarding was almost completed started singing while her voice was is good it is not great After serenading us she then began to what amounted to a lecture on how we are all blessed and asked to the passengers to respond in the affirmative In addition we were told we were all loved etc It had the feel and sound of an evangelical Christian bible meeting Several passengers passengers around me were shaking their heads in disgust while others were yelling Praise Jesus Unprofessional insulting and narcissistic for her to think that we would want to hear her sing or preach In addition there is no service of any kind on the DAL HOU DAL leg I do not understand why Southwest is popular this is nothing more than a bus with wings I will never purchase a ticket on WN or recommend them I will stick to the legacy carriers such as American etc

reviews: We had been waiting in line to board the plane for about minutes the flight attendants were just standing there telling us nothing about what was going on I kid you not while in line to board the plane they cancelled the flight While we were in line to get on that flight Even worse they had already boarded our luggage on the plane and they wouldn t un board it My family was stuck there for HOURS trying to figure out what to do We ended up having to go on a train for hours and picking up our luggage the next day from the flight they wouldn t let us on They flew the luggage but not the people Apparently the day before our flight a bunch of air control people quit because of the vaccine requirements There was no reason they couldn t have cancelled the flight the day before it was supposed to take off Worse they won t give us a refund They re offering us credits but we will never be flying with them again
Lemma: wait line board plane minute flight attendant stand tell us nothing go kid line board plane cancel flight line get flight Even worse already board luggage plane un board family stick HOURS try figure end go train hour pick luggage next day flight let us fly luggage people Apparently day flight bunch air control people quit vaccine requirement reason cancel flight day suppose take Worse give us refund offer us credit never fly

reviews: Southwest has quickly become the worst airline My last two flights I have booked a non stop flight to Phoenix and both times they have switched my flights to having one or two stops This particular time I received an email at am stating my flight has been canceled for no reason My wife has been on the phone for more then hrs trying to talk to a representative and still no one has answered At this time news outlets has stated that due to weather and air traffic control was the issue so I drive to the airport and asked myself They stated is was due to staffing issues Why wouldn t they know that at pm when I last checked the flight status When I talked to the ticket agent I was greeted with condescending answers and a attitude Thanks again Southwest So they rescheduled my flight I now leave Tuesday I have lost days of my vacation my rental car and my time from work As someone who works with the public my time is limited and for Southwest to show no remorse in their actions to help me I will never fly Southwest again
Lemma: Southwest quickly become bad airline last two flight book non stop flight Phoenix time switch flight one two stop particular time receive email state flight cancel reason wife phone hrs try talk representative still one answer time news outlet state due weather air traffic control issue drive airport ask state due staff issue know pm last check flight status talk ticket agent greet condescend answer attitude Thanks Southwest reschedule flight leave Tuesday lose day vacation rental car time work someone work public time limited Southwest show remorse action help never fly Southwest

reviews: Return flight scheduled for App notification flight delay approximately hr Flight was cancelled Notified to go to ticket counter Waiting in line at ticket counter notified had to pickup luggage first prior to obtaining new flight must retrieve my luggage first So lost my place in line in order to get my luggage My luggage came off last thus placing me at the end of line Look on their website and there are no reservations available for the next day So made reservations for the next day out of another airport While holding on the phone Was on hold over hrs Thought my reservations for the next day were confirmed They totally changed my reservations to days after confirmation was received So again I m on hold and I should be up in a few hours for what I thought was my new reservation This is horrible customer service I am so dissatisfied What a waste of time and money
