reviews: We booked a round trip flight between Miami and Denver for our Denver vacation The only reason we booked Southwest was for the nonstop flights Both flights were cancelled within minutes of the scheduled takeoff The Miami to Denver flight was rescheduled with a layover and the Denver to Miami was simply cancelled Will never fly Southwest again will never recommend Southwest Thankfully they provided us with flight vouchers which we will happily never use Southwest simply isn t reliable Do not book if you actually want to get where you are going
Lemma: book round trip flight Miami Denver Denver vacation reason book Southwest nonstop flight flight cancel within minute schedule takeoff Miami Denver flight reschedule layover Denver Miami simply cancel never fly Southwest never recommend Southwest Thankfully provide us flight voucher happily never use Southwest simply reliable book actually want get go

reviews: Flight from Charleston South Carolina to St Louis was cancelled at the last minute Was never told why The lack of information afterwards was completely unacceptable Could not get anyone to tell us where to get our luggage as it had already been checked Finally found our luggage at the carousel with no announcement Will not fly Southwest again
Lemma: Flight Charleston South Carolina St Louis cancel last minute never tell lack information afterwards completely unacceptable Could get anyone tell us get luggage already check Finally find luggage carousel announcement fly Southwest

reviews: No issues from Jacksonville to Houston Hobby but upon landing I received a text notification my flight to Oklahoma City has been canceled Agent explained weather has affected flight coming out of Florida Strange since I also flew out of Florida She couldn t get me into OKC until around pm via Denver My flight was scheduled to be in OKC about pm She could however get me to Tulsa earlier What I would be on my own from Tulsa I had no option but to accepted the OKC via Denver route At pm I received a text notification the Denver flight had been canceled Good grief Now I m on a pm flight to OKC Never an offer for any type of financial consideration or compensation even though I asked if SW would cover the rental car cost in Tulsa to get me to OKC Pitiful customer service Today I would not recommend SW due to their lack of excellent customer service and uncaring attitude of ticket counter rep

reviews: Southwest counter staff were rude arrogant and appeared genuinely uninterested in our situation We arrived at the airport hours prior to departure to find no available airport parking the shuttle from the Park n Fly dropped us at the wrong terminal and security was severely backed up We arrived at the gate mins before departure and they had just closed the door With both of us out of breath from running my wife pleaded with them to let us board The Customer Service Supervisor Gate appeared to relish her authority in refusing to open the door and let us board She then spent a solid minutes booking us on a flight for the following day I explained that I could see same day flights available via the SW app and only then did she rebook me on a better itinerary This is the nd bad experience on SW in the past months and pre Covid I was an A List flyer on SW I m deeply disappointed in what was once America s best domestic carrier

reviews: Late for no reason Kept changing the departure time and never told us what was going on or why After boarding we just sat there for min No announcement nothing Baggage staff took their sweet time putting the bags under the plane had zero sense of urgency I had an appointment that I had over an hour and a half of leeway to get to Thanks I missed it I will never fly this airline again

reviews: I have liked flying Southwest until this trip Our first suitcase came out open yes unzipped along with many others where you could see the clothing inside and ours was also cut in an L shape I left my husband and daughter while I went to file a claim No one was in the baggage service area and when I went to enter to call out another SW employee told me not to enter Showed this SW employee my issue and she told me to wait the lady would know I was there I asked how she would know as this person had not notified anyone there was no doorbell or cameras She replied the lady would just know A psychic I guess While waiting my daughter called hysterical as her lacrosse sticks had not come out with her teammates and the conveyor belt had stopped When we found it that person was rude as well and stated all sticks come out at over sized baggage and we should have known that Guess they forgot to tell our team as all the rest of the lacrosse sticks in lacrosse stick bags like hers did and have never before or again come out in over sized baggage Hers was the only stick bag to come out at over sized luggage and only that one time When the baggage service lady finally showed up the two SW employees had to converse first about how I was waiting and not happy making me wait even longer When she did finally come over she refused not once but several times to fill out a ticket on my issue She said open and cut luggage was not a valid claim She outright refused to do anything It gets better folks I called SW and was being on hold a very long time Finally someone gets on the phone listens to my issues and than proceeded to tell me the people were not SW employees but employees of BWI and I had to make a claim with BWI When I pointed out all the employees I was calling about all wore SW uniforms she proceeded to enter my complaint about their rude customer service but told me I had to do my own for the luggage I did per her instructions SW responded to the rude complainant with a letter stating they were sorry I was inconvenienced with a delay in my flight and offered me a SW credit The luggage complaint they noted as complete without any letter conversation funds for new luggage or anything I filed another complaint to comment on this incorrect form letter and the luggage issue to hear nothing from SW as it is now September with no reply

reviews: I trusted Southwest until a flight from Love Field to BWI September arriving PM Within five minutes of deplaning I realized I had left my phone on the plane Unfortunately I had left the secure area so I could not return to Gate A where the plane was located I was directed by Southwest personnel to go to the baggage claim office to receive assistance The three workers at baggage claim were admittedly dealing with a disgruntled employee and stated they could not help me at the time because they were too busy In fact the supervisor reprimanded me for leaving the phone on the plane and claimed it was my own fault for being so stupid Despite resistance I insisted that a missing item claim be filed at the office before I departed the airport I waited at baggage claim until AM when an employee reportedly searched the plane only to find no cell phone When I obtained access to my computer at AM that morning I searched FIND MY PHONE to discover my phone located at the Southwest baggage claim I returned to the Southwest baggage claim the next morning and I showed them on my computer where my phone was located according to FIND MY PHONE They told me they did not have my phone and that they could not help me I then went to the police They accompanied me to the SOUTHWEST baggage claim He told me to stay outside the office and push my phone to ring on the FIND MY PHONE app which I did The police came out of the office and told me that my phone was in the office When I went into the office to get my phone one employee verbally attacked me with comments such as you were the irresponsible one who lost your phone Furthermore they justified themselves that their job was baggage claim not lost and found They would not verify to me where or when the phone had been found

reviews: Southwest cancelled of my flights in the last month just hours prior to the flight leaving They blame it on weather United had no trouble taking us as we had to pay through the nose to fly last minute I used to sing their praises not any more Cost me a small fortune Cancelling their credit card and never flying them again Use them if you don t need to get where you are on time or when you want Hopefully the competition will put them out of business

reviews: I flew with my year old who is on the spectrum takes ADHD medicine and has anxiety When a gate attendant allowed us to pre board another one right at the time of entry said we shouldn t be pre boarding and kind of implied that we are abusing the pre boarding option Second time from Seattle to Nashville I bought premium tickets and was among the first to board then I was told that I am carrying more luggage on myself and should consolidate between my son my mother who has shoulder pain What s the point of paying premium money when you have to take their hassle
Lemma: fly year old spectrum take ADHD medicine anxiety gate attendant allow us pre board another one right time entry say pre boarding kind implied abuse pre board option Second time Seattle Nashville buy premium ticket among first board tell carry luggage consolidate son mother shoulder pain point pay premium money take hassle

reviews: Terrible Flew my daughter home for a very short visit Allowed over an hour between connecting flights Flight out of Portland was delayed over an hour and instead of holding the connecting flight for minutes they made everyone take another flight Now my daughter has to take two more flights to get here and will be arriving five hours maybe late That s if the other flights are on time This has happened too many times with Southwest I have always loved them but they have clearly gone way downhill You can no longer count on leaving or arriving when scheduled I am canceling my credit card with SW and going to a different airline
Lemma: Terrible Flew daughter home short visit Allowed hour connect flight Flight Portland delay hour instead hold connecting flight minute make everyone take another flight daughter take two flight get arrive five hour maybe late flight time happen many time Southwest always love clearly go way downhill longer count leave arrive schedule cancel credit card SW go different airline

reviews: My flight was supposed to leave out of Gate at PM flying tonight from San Diego to Reno At exactly my flight had not boarded and I went to see what the matter was Apparently they change the gate to a separate terminal without notifying me I ran to gate eight and made it there by PM on the dot plane was already boarded and they would not let me on the plane Southwest reps did not display any compassion nor help me find a solution I feel Southwest could ve done a better job at resolving the matter Especially since I arrived at The gate a full minutes before it was even supposed to leave not fair
Lemma: flight suppose leave Gate PM fly tonight San Diego Reno exactly flight board go see matter Apparently change gate separate terminal without notify run gate eight make PM dot plane already board would let plane Southwest rep display compassion help find solution feel Southwest could do good job resolve matter Especially since arrive gate full minute even suppose leave fair

reviews: I have flown SW for over years faithfully This trip from Aruba on was the worst flight attendants ever None of them looked like they wanted to be at work yesterday The plane wasn t even full and they only offered drinks once on a four hour flight I m also amazed how many people get early boarding since most of the huge adults walked down the jet way without assistance As someone who always pays extra to get a A seating assignment it s not fair to us loyal customers Do you even have documents from their MD with the reason they need to board before those who pay extra They should have a MD excuse to get on early these people were all in one group knew everyone and traveled together So can I use my BMI of over normal as a reason to get on first in the front rows Or maybe my A C level is slightly elevated or that I have to take Lipitor because my cholesterol is high A passenger had to notify a flight attendant that someone sitting in an aisle seat wasn t wearing his mask after she walked past him Seriously Something needs to done to those passengers who are lying about their need to board before those who pay extra for early bird seating Medical need to board early should have to be presented at the gate before they board prior those loyal customers earned a companion pass prior to covid

reviews: Forget every positive experience about the Old Southwest and erase those high reviews Those days are over and it s the end of an era They should change their name to Scrubwest airline because there is a high percentage your flight this Fall is going to get scrubbed It will either get canceled or they will move it to a new time that is often impossible to meet If you complain by email they will offer you on another flight Southwest apparently thinks buying out customers will work completely ignores the reality that many of us have only specific times to fly Plus that future flight will probably just be canceled too so what s the point The brand name has been destroyed A web search with a timeline of August or September will confirm I m not alone in this experience and that it s now common to many Southwest fliers
Lemma: Forget every positive experience Old Southwest erase high review day end era change name Scrubwest airline high percentage flight Fall go get scrub either get cancel move new time often impossible meet complain email offer another flight Southwest apparently think buy customer work completely ignore reality many us specific time fly Plus future flight probably cancel point brand name destroy web search timeline August September confirm alone experience common many Southwest flier

reviews: I will never be flying on Southwest again They forgot to fuel the aircraft my first flight so that delayed me hours which then made me miss my other flight so instead of giving me the next closest flight They give me the last flight out Then when I got into that flight which they already messed all of my plans for the day because I was supposed to land now I m still at the airport all day the flight I m about to board has something wrong with the plane so I m now delayed again I have a hotel room booked which is pointless know because I won t be there till am Overall worse experience flying in my life I ve been flying for years Seats are terrible as well Do not book this airline front desk workers are terrible at their job as well
Lemma: never fly Southwest forget fuel aircraft first flight delay hour make miss flight instead give next closest flight give last flight get flight already mess plan day suppose land still airport day flight board something wrong plane delay hotel room book pointless know till Overall bad experience fly life fly year Seats terrible well book airline front desk worker terrible job well

reviews: My family and I had a flight booked for The flight was scheduled to leave early Monday morning We discovered it was cancelled around am Monday morning We tried to schedule a different flight from Albany to Orlando but the next flight wasn t until Wednesday meaning we would miss rd of our prepaid Disney vacation We called southwests customer service but there was a hour wait We ultimately booked a flight out of Hartford CT to Orlando This flight cost nearly more than the initial flight We had to have a family member drive us to Hartford to get the flight While driving to Hartford we called the southwest customer service number back I explained the situation and expected them to say they would quickly refund the To my surprise the person told me I had two options she could only refund the the cost of the initial flight and I would have to pay the meaning the vacation would cost me nearly more than I budgeted or she could book the next flight from Albany to Orlando two days later causing my family to miss two days of our prepaid vacation I asked if I could speak with a supervisor but she said she is a supervisor and she could not refund the I told her I planned a vacation with my young family a long time ago and the plane having technical difficulties wasn t my fault and I had to have a family member take the day off work to drive me to Hartford She said my only other option was to send a message to the customer service department which would be responded to within days I told her it was unacceptable I have to spend time on my family vacation putting in the complaint and not knowing if I m being charged an additional After about two weeks I got an email after asking for a call and was told I m not getting refunded the additional charge Vacation cost more than expected

reviews: We booked a roundtrip flight From Colorado Springs to the Las Vegas For the return flight my wife and I were kicked off the flight and stranded in Vegas with no way to get home The flight attendant I wish I got her badge number grabbed me by the arm and told me I was harassing the patrons which is untrue We got pulled aside as we were boarding because I was not wearing a mask and the manger was called After I spoke with a manger I put the mask on and was one of the last ones to be able to board the flight My wife asked the lady next to her if she would trade seats with me so we could sit next to each other She told my wife no problem even though I was in a middle seat and as we were passing each other in the isle I asked her again if she was sure she was ok with switching me seats and that is when the flight attended grabbed me by the arm and said to get off the flight and that I was being deboarded for harassments When I got out of the tunnel I went to the manger and expressed my concern about my luggage that was under the plane and at that point he said if I do not get away from him he would call the police and have me arrested So there we were with no flight home

reviews: Worst experience ever My wife and I were supposed to fly to Denver then LA We were rerouted to a Dallas then El Paso No big deal During flight our mask came down to the end of our nose mine once hers once and we were told to keep our mask up When we landed in El Paso apparently the stewardesses that asked us to keep our mask up went and got one of their superiors This was the craziest experience of our life The lady came on the plane and went crazy on us Threatening us with throwing us off the plane making a huge scene trying to get us to argue with her which neither of us would do This went on for about minutes Then she gets us another mask because I explained that my mask may have come down to the end of my nose because it was cloth She went crazy again Said put this mask on I replied ok Is this good She said don t argue with me I ll throw you off this plane Never seen anyone over years old act like this We were embarrassed for her Never again Southwest

reviews: We had a flight that was delayed times It started with a boarding time of pm by the time we boarded it was after pm While our flight was being delayed other airplanes were also delayed One was canceled completely While we sat and waited the hours we sat by Southwest gate The whole hours there was one lady Paulette All I can say is Paulette was by far the best customer service agent I have ever seen in action for that length of the hours I heard every kind of excuse lie complaining and down right ugliness by a lot of the travelers She never once lost her cool She was friendly to the worst kind She was so helpful to anyone she could help she tried hard for everyone regardless how rude they were to her I am not going to say it was a great day it wasn t It was a long bad day Saying all that Paulette made me believe that no matter the situation we can be great under the worst situation Thank YOU Paulette

reviews: I ve never missed a flight in my entire life until today because when I reported to the gate at for a flight the associate told me the plane wouldn t be boarding until pm because it was running late so I go get a bite to eat and return at the flight had already left I ve been flying since I was in diapers and never missed a flight I can t count how many times I wouldn t leave the gate if I was there two hours before the flight I am a very cautious prompt person I arrived at this airport almost three hours before scheduled departure and that employee should not gave me that long of a time frame and now I won t arrive in Dallas until instead of This just shows the competency and assumption of workers I get to spend eight hours here in Nashville and it caused my evening business plans to be able to happen

reviews: Booked one way flights with SWA Our first flight from TPA DEN was smooth Flight on time service in flight was great Next flight from DEN to Phoenix was delayed times then canceled No other flights to PHX were available that and next day so we were put on flight to SLC We boarded that flight sat in he plane for one hour then flight was canceled Anyway we got to SLC next day Lost almost days of our travel couldn t get refund for our hotel I contacted SWA and we got ton of vouchers for future flights even voucher for lost hotel funds Yes this experience was unpleasant but SWA did great with contacting us and make it right I will fly with them without hesitation This situation happens and I do not harbor any bad feelings towards the airline

reviews: Over the past year and half my husband and I have flown many times on Southwest and prior to the Covid pandemic Southwest was always our airline of choice for domestic flights The pandemic changed things quite understandably and we have had patience in what we know has been a difficult situation However the past several flights we have completed with Southwest have definitely taken turns for the worst in terms of customer service with flights being rescheduled without notification to us re routing us to flights that are not non stop when our originally booked flights were nonstop returning us to our home town in the middle of the night when our originally purchased itinerary arrived late afternoon losing our luggage etc But this is finally the last straw We will not be flying Southwest again In June my mother passed away The memorial service is scheduled to take place on August th In July as soon as the memorial service dates were confirmed we booked our flights back to Portland from Colorado for the memorial service Twenty four hours before our flight time we checked in as is the usual routine with Southwest We were assigned seats Some hours later we received the usual emails with reminders for timeliness of arrival to the airport for our flight mask requirements etc Now less than hours prior to our flight departure time we checked our flight status to give my family final updates for our arrival time only to find that Southwest has canceled our flight All other flights from Denver to Portland within the next hours are listed by Southwest as Unavailable We called the Contact Us number for Southwest Airlines to try to figure out what we could do to rectify the situation After sitting on hold for literally hours with what became an increasingly annoying message about how sorry Southwest was for the delay and that they would be right with us as soon as possible we finally gave up and hung up While sitting on hold we found and booked a flight on a different airline at last minute prices with luggage fees etc This behavior by Southwest Airlines is profoundly unprofessional and completely unacceptable It breaches the contract Southwest Airlines entered into with us as its passengers of a service they were to provide transportation from Colorado to Oregon paid for in advance with the express understanding that the service would in fact be provided At the very least timely notice of the inability to provide the service should have been provided along with an explanation as to why the service was canceled at the last minute with literally no notice to us of the cancellation No offer of restitution or alternative transportation has been made and Southwest has refused to provide any sort of customer service although I m sure that no one could be paid enough to have to deal with customers treated in such a fashion by their employer After going on line and reading recent Washington Post among others articles we now see that Southwest has been doing this to its customers for the past several months They certainly won t be doing it for very much longer because they will be out of business soon You cannot treat your customers like this and expect to continue to have any In a customer service oriented business such as the passenger airlines are the death knell for Southwest Airlines is surely tolling

reviews: I flew times in and I ve been a consistent flier with advantaged airline miles at airlines Southwest is easy to book easy to change easy to add companions and the two bags thrown in for free really simplify my travel when I bring my e bike to new cities It is simple to use with one glaring exception I get why they do it and once you have A list status with them you can take advantage of it but the boarding system is embarrassing complicated and really cutthroat Do a bit of research before you do your first flight Domestically I will likely only fly other airlines if I absolutely have to

reviews: Pre pandemic I was always flying Southwest with my family I loved the free bags and no extra fees I always had great customer service too I used to recommend Southwest to everyone Well let me tell you no more Their service quality and customer care has gone down the drain I finally got to visit my family this summer after a year and a half of not seeing most of them due to the pandemic Myself and my three boys traveled to our destination via American Airlines Had no issues there great service and a nice plane On the way back however I traveled via Southwest Unbeknownst to me they had changed my nonstop flight to a flight with one stop in Orlando I found this out when checking on my flight a few days before Now in their defense I searched my email and they had notified me of this change back in the beginning of May via an email that I am fairly certain ended up in my promotions folder instead of my inbox or else I would have seen it The thing that urked me is that they made this change the day after I bought my nonstop tickets The day after their sale ended they decided to get rid of a bunch of nonstop flights How convenient for them Not so much all of us who booked with them because we wanted a nonstop flight I was hoping they had one this week that I could change it to but nope Checked their website none Now mind you I was traveling alone with three boys My oldest is and the other two are both under the age of a month old and a month old If you are a parent you understand how difficult this could be I waited on hold for almost hours just for them to tell me they could refund my tickets but if I used flight credit it would stay as flight credit not helpful as they have no nonstop flights on this route anymore They said they temporarily got rid of nonstop flights from their schedule I looked at my options for the week and either the layovers were way too short to make it to the other plane for us or they were long and required even more flight time Needless to say I had to keep my flight By then other airlines were too expensive and Southwest said they could not book us on another airline I was told this before I even asked so you know a bunch of people must have asked this I haven t gotten to the worst part yet We had a fine first flight to Orlando A little over two hours They kept changing the time but ended up boarding on time after all We made it to Orlando and our stroller was already waiting for us when we got off the plane Kudos to Orlando people Flying to Dallas was a different story We were sitting in the plane an hour before we took off This was due to the weather so that I understand This was another and a half hour flight as well My poor kids were doing fairly well despite traveling all day Remember two of them are a young toddler and a baby Near the end of the flight while we had been traveling for over hours already one of the flight attendants remarks about the mess we had made my toddler spilled some chip crumbs on the floor and said that we would have to clean it up but she said it in a passive aggressive way and asked if we needed

reviews: I ve always been pretty happy with Southwest Airlines I use them a lot and they are typically my airline of choice Overall the staff is friendly and the flights are on time We recently got delayed in Denver due to severe weather They comped us vouchers even though they didn t have to which is very nice My only criticism is the ticket booth at Las Vegas The past two times it s a bit of a nightmare There seems to be no sense of urgency to get people through the line and in both cases it was very busy and they had two ticketing booths open and one of the desk clerks kept walking away Super stressful when you have a flight to make
Lemma: always pretty happy Southwest Airlines use lot typically airline choice Overall staff friendly flight time recently get delay Denver due severe weather comped us voucher even though nice criticism ticket booth Las Vegas past two time bit nightmare seem sense urgency get people line case busy two ticket booth open one desk clerk keep walk away Super stressful flight make

reviews: I flew southwest months pregnant with my husband year old son and year old daughter returning home to Orlando from Portland Oregon after coming from my mother passing away on Our flight was scheduled to leave Portland at pm which was only delayed minutes no big deal The lay over was in Denver we get off the plane with minutes to spare before our connecting flight was suppose to take off to find out our flight had been canceled and was not leaving until am the next morning We are then told to go wait in the customer service line for minutes to get told we can t have a partial refund hotels would not be accommodated and the flight in the morning would be taking us to Indianapolis then Orlando instead of our original flight which was straight from Denver to Orlando The customer service representative cut me off and stated that they only had spots on this plane so I needed to tell her if I wanted to be on the plane or not They told us the flights were canceled due to weather but there was no bad weather in Denver or Orlando My family and I went to the rd floor sat in seats and walked my year old around in the stroller until she fell asleep for exactly hour no one else slept at all We were able to leave at am with a flight going straight to Orlando I got sick from lack of sleep literally the morning of before we got on the plane my daughter husband and son are all sick now but thankfully we made it home the next day by pm I think it s highly unprofessional to drastically change someone s flight to the next day when they land and then try and make them pay for a hotel I think had I not been pregnant and had my year old with me and returning home from a family death it wouldn t have been as bad but I have no idea what happened to customer service I will never fly through Denver again I know better and I will never fly southwest again rd strike for me

reviews: I had a flight for AM and received a text at that the flight was changed to PM I changed my shuttle service to leave my home at AM I am over an hour away from airport I then get a text at AM stating that my flight departure time changed back to AM making it impossible for me to make this flight Now I can t fly out until PM When you make a change you shouldn t change it back This is ridiculous I am so dissatisfied in your service

reviews: I won t get in to the fact that their flight attendants no longer seem to take care of passengers like they appreciate the fact that we have a choice and we choose to fly with them Or that for a family of four it s quite expensive to fly and would be nice to be treated with friendliness What I am writing about is the fact that they can t seem to figure out flight schedules before publishing them resulting in my family losing an entire day during a vacation that folks save up for years for Not their problem because hey they can get you on the same flight a day earlier But what they won t do is pay for a condo reservation that was booked under the pretense that we would be staying that extra day which is past the point of being refundable Call customer service you ask What a joke After waiting on hold for over an hour they direct you to the customer care line where you get to wait on hold for over four hours just to be told the same thing And they aren t even willing to waive the additional cost to switch to a different SW flight What a fun treat it was when my year old mom who is travelling with us spoke to a Customer Care supervisor because she is so excited about her first trip to Hawaii with her grandkids only to be met with someone that couldn t have cared less and was not empathetic or willing to help in the least Just remember you have a choice when spending your hard earned dollars on an airline that won t sell you something that won t exist a month before your trip

reviews: I am a loyal customer to Southwest Airlines but in the past few years I have noticed a decrease in service Two weeks ago I flew to Birmingham and on the way back to Orlando my flight was delayed over three hours Mechanical problems so I understood Two weeks later and here I am stuck in Vegas my flight is being delayed over four hours I got off a four hour flight just to find out that I have to sit here four hours before getting on my way to SFO where I have family waiting to drive me up north for my granddaughters wedding I find it difficult to believe that both my trips with in two weeks just happen to have planes with mechanical or operational failure Also ever time I reserve a flight it gets changed and they try to route me all over the place I than have to go in and chose another flight I realize this is an attempt to fill planes and run more efficiently but it getting old I have over k of miles but I m asking myself if sticking with SW is worth it My SW credit card anniversary is in the spring and I may cancel the card and stop using this airline as I am old travel is difficult enough without all this drama Once was my favorite airline and the only one I would use

reviews: My family and I bought Southwest tickets to fly to Mexico in December for my th birthday Prior to flying my father contracted COVID and was also diagnosed with dementia The hotels also put COVID restrictions into place We called Southwest and cancelled our flights to which we were given Travel Funds Fast forward we are taking the family and going on a vacation in December this year We tried to book the flights using our travel funds and were told we can not due to them expiring in October We called customer service and explained the situation and were rudely told we have to wait until they expire and then pay a per ticket fee to reinstate them We understand paying the fee and requested to pay it now to extend the date We explained we can not wait until October to book the flights as flights are limited and are already nearly sold out The customer service rep had zero compassion and stated there was nothing she could do that that was the policy We asked to speak to a supervisor and were told only contact with them was through email The email response we received only had a first name and stated there was absolutely nothing that could be done to try and resolve the problem We called customer service again and once again explained the situation We again said we would gladly pay the fee now and book the flights The rep sternly responded that they are not able or willing to do anything to assist That we would have to take our chances and wait until after October IF they decide to take the fee and extend the funds or just lose all the money They stated they gave year extensions for travel plans changed due to covid she then sarcastically stated that we did not fall in that time frame COVID is out of our control along with the medical problems of my father We are not asking for a refund of the money or even asking to have a fee waived to extend the funds I simply want to book a flight flying the same month I was going to previously No compassion and no attempt at finding a solution I will not fly Southwest again

reviews: Southwest wasted mine and my kids day hours sitting in Dallas Love Airport The original flight through Las Vegas was delayed delayed and then delayed again which resulted in missing my connection The flight was then rerouted through Denver delayed delayed cancelled The option given to me was get booked to another city and pay for a hotel in that city my hotel rooms paid for in Spokane was not able to be utilized my myself and my family and would not be reimbursed or I can go back home and return the next morning which I did When I left Spokane and flew back I was singled out by a Southwest Airlines gate attendant that my bag will not fit in the overhead I was sitting with my extended family and was not flying out of that gate In addition I used this same bag that did fit in the overhead compartment on different legs She would not listen I sat back down after measuring it confirming it was larger than was allowed I did not check it at that point She came back to me at my seat while I am sitting with family to continue her harassment even though I informed her I am not flying out of that gate She ended up being that gate attendant so I checked the bag at that point We boarded the plane all the passengers and were informed the plane had a fuel leak last night and was fixed However it was not completely repaired we had to deplane We are going to miss our connection again Plane was supposed to leave at am I sat here at am and Southwest still does not have a resolution Southwest airlines scheduling of their resources whether it is personnel shortage or whatever is inexcusable They have stolen of my vacation days and I have to eat all of the costs and time affiliated with their incompetence I will not fly Southwest Airlines again

reviews: I will never fly Southwest again I had the worst experience I was stuck on the hot plane for over hours with a year old We weren t updated Then after an hour of just sitting on the plane they explained they were having IT issues and we were going to be leaving soon Fast forward another hour sitting on the freaking hot plane we finally left While we were sitting on the plane the flight attendants told us to buy the WiFi for or watch the free inflight movies which weren t even working Then upon arrival to our destination we find our stroller was completely broken because they broke our axel It was explained that it s considered a fragile item so they don t cover damages but then I was told they throw other luggage on top of it but it s a fragile item so why would them do that Another Southwest crew member told me next time to bring a cheap stroller so when it gets broken I won t have to worry about it I am so disappointed in southwest and there terrible customer service I will never fly Southwest again
Lemma: never fly Southwest bad experience stick hot plane hour year old update hour sit plane explain issue go leave soon Fast forward another hour sit freaking hot plane finally leave sit plane flight attendant tell us buy WiFi watch free inflight movie even work upon arrival destination find stroller completely break break axel explain consider fragile item cover damage tell throw luggage top fragile item would Another Southwest crew member tell next time bring cheap stroller get break worry disappointed southwest terrible customer service never fly Southwest

reviews: The planes are cramped much smaller than Alaska for example Flight attendants are rude do not give you all of the information and do the bare minimum They act like they re herding cattle rather than doing customer service Delayed flights on the first leg of the trip When we arrived to the tarmac we sat on the plane for mins still sitting and waiting so who knows how much longer we will be here waiting for a gate when there were easily without a plane at them within my view from the window The flight attendants then told the cabin we are cleared to move to the gate please be seated with seatbelts on The plane moved all of feet then we stopped and waited another minutes with no communication from staff The flight attendants were not helpful in this case We finally into the gate we were originally planning to go into so the original plan to find one was bogus I ran to the next gate and barely made it When I boarded the next plane I asked the flight attendant if the flight was full she said yes I am now seated on the second flight and the plane is definitely not full photo below of middle seats empty We also just heard an announcement that the pilot is still on another flight not yet landed and doesn t know he s going to Seattle the current plane I m sitting on So I ran here parched and didn t get a beverage to sit and wait for the pilot to land and come to this plane The flight attendants are not truthful or forthcoming with customers This airline treats its guests disrespectfully things are not well organized and I won t fly with them again Southwest has let flight attendant standards go far too low Not a respectable airline like Alaska or United

reviews: Back in the day Southwest was the best airline to fly domestically in the states I do not know what happened This last trip has been the worst flight experience I have ever encountered To start my trip I booked my flights with a longer hour layover to ensure a slight delay would not hinder my travel This still was not the case Southwest changed the gate and plane in Norfolk resulting in a delay Next we boarded and waited for over an hour to just get gas in the plane Meanwhile planes scheduled after mine were boarding and taking off in the original gate my flight was supposed to be Almost hours later we took off I knew I was cutting my layover short at that point but we were scheduled to arrive with just enough time to spare I sprinted to my gate to see my next flight s plane sitting there The ramp to get on was still connected to the airplane but no one was there to check me in I frantically looked around for someone to help me but no one was in the area I had to watch my plane leave without me I then got a text stating they had rescheduled me to the next day in the evening I went and talked to a Southwest representative who helped change my flight to earlier in the day but would not offer any other flights to the surrounding airports in LA for the evening I requested they compensate and put me in a hotel as I now had to stay overnight I was informed that they would not put me in a hotel because they were not responsible for me missing my flight They blamed the flight control in Norfolk instead of taking responsibility for being very unorganized resulting in people missing their flight to Ontario there were many more traveling to other places I talked to another representative to see if I could get a better boarding position as I had the boarding position B prior to them sending my plane off They had given me C which is considerably worse They would still not compensate me at all I have been unable to talk to a customer service representative but if this is how Southwest treats their customers now I will not be back I did my research during the extra time I had of sitting in the airport overnight and apparently Southwest has the highest delayed flights percentage Two years ago this was unheard of Their motto of flying the friendly skies does not uphold Its a real shame how far this flight company has fallen

reviews: Our worst mistake when flying our yr old grand daughter home was choosing to fly from BWI airport If the security TSA staff wasn t rude enough when arriving at the gate to ask a question took the cake I approached the ticket boarding person at the gate to ask about help for my yr old grand daughter as she is flying unattended for help putting carry on bag above the seat I was told when booking this flight she would have assistance however the person at the gate said she is and doesn t qualify although was told she did when booking My anger stems from his opinion suggesting we should pack a lighter bag not the problem she s short or that maybe I should have booked a flight with her Rude and unwanted advise from a Southwest employee is beyond disrespectful and unprofessional

reviews: Worst experience with Southwest flown many times arrived at the gate in Denver at boarding time no plane minutes pass still waiting on plane to arrive check with the gate agent flight was diverted to Texas the flight departed DAL on time agent said weather but she also said plane was low on fuel so they had to refuel going back to TX Flight was suppose to take off at pm MST finally departed at pm No communication except text s stating flight was delayed Then all hell broke loose as Southwest started cancelling of their flights by pm thousands in the airport lines so long to rebook for other passengers I was lucky the flight did take off hours later then scheduled Southwest you have to short of a turnaround on your aircraft takes flight to mess up your schedule Word of warning I knew flying after pm at any airport and this happens I always take a early morning flight as the aircraft will depart as its at the gate overnight What a disaster will think twice about flying them again I have never been so frustrated in my life
Lemma: Worst experience Southwest flown many time arrive gate Denver board time plane minute pass still wait plane arrive check gate agent flight divert Texas flight depart DAL time agent say weather also say plane low fuel refuel go back TX Flight suppose take pm MST finally depart pm communication except text state flight delay hell break loose Southwest start cancel flight pm thousand airport line long rebook passenger lucky flight take hour later schedule Southwest short turnaround aircraft take flight mess schedule Word warn know fly pm airport happen always take early morning flight aircraft depart gate overnight disaster think twice fly never frustrated life

reviews: First time I have ever written a review on an airline Normally I don t enjoy flying but it s generally tolerable whatever airline I have flown This was by far the worst experience I have had on any airline My pregnant wife and I were the last two to board and there were two seats left open on the plane on opposite ends Frustrating but it was fine As far as customer service one of the flight attendants should find a different career The only part of her job she seemed to enjoy was waking up people who had their mask slip below their nose Long story short it appears they could care less about making the customers feel comfortable between packing flights to capacity and unhappy flight attendants I have heard nothing but great things in the past about southwest but maybe this airline changed the priorities after COVID
Lemma: First time ever write review airline Normally enjoy fly generally tolerable whatever airline fly far bad experience airline pregnant wife last two board two seat leave open plane opposite end Frustrating fine far customer service one flight attendant find different career part job seem enjoy wake people mask slip nose Long story short appear could care less make customer feel comfortable pack flight capacity unhappy flight attendant hear nothing great thing past southwest maybe airline change priority COVID

reviews: I booked flights for a group of How is it that you would not allow our transfer flight to Houston to wait more minutes for us to get off the flight from Las Vegas to return home If there would have been communication with the flight from Las Vegas they could have allowed us to get off to head to the gate for our connecting flight instead all of us are here in Dallas until am Your staff informed us it was weather related and we could not be comp To have customers diabetics heart patients expecting mother etc with no meds here is sad with no food or drinks because everything is closed is unsatisfactory We were the only ones on this flight that was going to IAH Take better care of your customers Not once was I advised via text message that the other delays were weather related Yes we did experience weather issues minutes from arriving in Dallas That would account for our flight arriving after pm this information was provided by our pilot So again where is the communication break down

reviews: Please save your money and time flying with this Airline We paid for nonstop flight for ways then hrs before departure flight we received a text message stated that our flight was delay we live and a half hour away from the Airport So they changed our flight from nonstop to transfer for the next day and when we checked the return flight they also changed it from nonstop to transfer flight Therefore we called back to customer relation and customer reservation department on July th to talk to one person name Ro and one person name Martin no one could help us out or gave us any compensation or rebook the straight flight for us They gave me a really shit show on the phone also they don t have the manager or higher position they could transfer me to find the solution lol I hope the management level can read this review

reviews: What happened to Southwest I ve been flying with them for years They use to be a good airline then we just flew with them I know COVID was tough on airlines but they were subsidized to stay open by us taxpayers now that restrictions are lifted they sandbag flights till they can pack them out and if there are a few empty seats there are always stand by The flight attendants and pilots all seemed unhappy Every aspect of the experience was like they cut as many corners and saved as much money as they could yet charge extreme prices for tickets But somehow they just invested a ton of money on all of these new Supermax planes that have safety concerns Looking for a new airline to fly from now on even though I have a ton of points I would rather throw them away than fly with them again

reviews: I was supposed to go to my friend s wedding in South Carolina My flight was cancelled before I even got to the gate and I get a text telling me that I have a new flight and had to change planes in Nashville TN Got to Tennessee and was told that they had no flights going to SC but they could put me on a flight that was going to Chicago then back to Dallas then to South Carolina After sitting on a plane for hours yes I could have been in England by then I was told that the plane would not be continuing on to South Carolina They told me they had a flight the next day that would go out at pm I informed them that the wedding would be over before I got there I then got a ticket to go back home The flight was supposed to leave at pm After being told one story after another we were finally on our way to Austin hours later To this day I still don t know what happened to my suitcase I spend most of yesterday talking to these people who tried to make it sound like it way my fault that all of this happened Only one person had the decency to even say they were sorry

reviews: No Customer Service Flight was cancelled via text message hours prior to departure Could not get a Rep on the phone after holding hours Im on hold again now hold time hours and counting I had to spend extra money that I did not have on hotel food and transportation with no verbal assistance at ALL I was told I could email them with hopes of a response time of weeks Not Days but weeks This is just not acceptable NO one that works for this airlines care about its passengers After they get your money that s it Hope you get to your destination Take your money elsewhere
Lemma: Customer Service Flight cancel via text message hour prior departure Could get Rep phone hold hour Im hold hold time hour count spend extra money hotel food transportation verbal assistance tell could email hope response time week Days week acceptable one work airline care passenger get money Hope get destination Take money elsewhere

reviews: This airline absolutely sucks I ve flown them z times recently and every time the flight was late no explanation or they cancelled the next leg no explanation I m sitting on a SWA plane now in Denver minutes after scheduled departure time and we are getting shot from the crew on why the delay and when we will leave l Very single SWA flight I ve taken recently has been this messed up Southwest sucks
Lemma: airline absolutely suck fly z time recently every time flight late explanation cancel next leg explanation sit SWA plane Denver minute scheduled departure time get shot crew delay leave l single SWA flight take recently mess Southwest suck

reviews: First flight out my suitcase was robbed Coming home was a nightmare First flight delayed because they had no one to fly the plane That meant we missed our connection for the next flight They paid for a room that night that is a whole other story where they attempted to put us after we had to complain over and over again The next day flight canceled after being delayed Airline refused to pay for our hotel because they said the flight was canceled due to weather Liar would not still be there if they had someone to fly the plane the day before Managers are rude and are in need of customer service training They actually tried to lie to my face I called them out on it Booked again for the following day delayed again No surprise Staff was out of control threatening passengers about wearing a face mask One mother asked for an extra snack for her child flight attendant rudely said no Same person came to us I asked for one for my child as she was in the restroom Flight attendant was extremely rude about it She did eventually as I reminded her that she made my child walk to the back of the plane to use the restroom because she would not let her by Finally landed then the luggage got stuck They couldn t even give us the correct place where to get luggage This is the short version of what all went on My advice is don t fly southwest until they get things in order I personally would now give them a minus as a score This saddens me as we always fly southwest Won t anymore unless they make things correct Buyers beware

reviews: I am extremely disappointed with this company I booked a flight last year but due to COVID the trip was cancelled I booked a flight for myself using my rapid rewards points which were reimbursed back to my account I also booked a flight for a friend that was flying with me Because the flight I booked for them was not in my name because it was for someone else flying not me they would not reimburse the several hundred dollar flight back to my credit card Instead they reimbursed the credit to the other person directly Therefore I was out money and I couldn t even use the credit I contacted the business and they refused to work with me even during COVID times I had a lot of points from when I used to have their credit card and was going to use them to purchase my ticket I had just shy of what I needed for a round trip ticket so I figured I would use all the points and pay the difference Nope can t do that either I had to book the flight there with points and book the flight back with a credit card So now I have about half of plain ticket worth of points in my account that I can t use because you have to have enough for the entire flight You can buy points but it s an astronomical amount for several hundred dollars No thanks I fly and travel a lot and I will not be recommending them to anyone nor will I fly with them again
Lemma: extremely disappointed company book flight last year due COVID trip cancel book flight use rapid reward point reimburse back account also book flight friend fly flight book name someone else fly would reimburse several hundred dollar flight back credit card Instead reimburse credit person directly Therefore money even use credit contact business refuse work even COVID time lot point use credit card go use purchase ticket shy need round trip ticket figure would use point pay difference Nope either book flight point book flight back credit card half plain ticket worth point account use enough entire flight buy point astronomical amount several hundred dollar thanks fly travel lot recommend anyone fly

reviews: Our flight leaving Chicago was canceled without reason We were rebooked automatically for the following day That would not work for us so we had to switch from O Hare to Midway only to be met with a six hour flight delay Return flight kept getting texts saying the flight was delayed Then it suddenly wasn t We landed and had to sit there for over an hour to get off the plane Horrible experience both directions Never again
Lemma: flight leave Chicago cancel without reason rebooked automatically following day would work us switch Hare Midway meet six hour flight delay Return flight keep get text say flight delay suddenly land sit hour get plane Horrible experience direction Never

reviews: I was supposed to go to Chicago yesterday but my flight was canceled My son is playing baseball outside so the excuse of the weather is dumb I was on hold for two hours only to be told there is nothing I can do I spent four hundred extra dollars for a hotel and one hundred on taxi and when I got to the airport I was told there is a cancellation I received no notice so I have to sit at the airport and pray I get on booked a flight with cancellations This is my last Southwest flight
Lemma: suppose go Chicago yesterday flight cancel son play baseball outside excuse weather dumb hold two hour tell nothing spend four hundred extra dollar hotel one hundred taxi get airport tell cancellation receive notice sit airport pray get booked flight cancellation last Southwest flight

reviews: Like so many other recent reviewers I was stranded in Denver due to weather What was supposed to be a hour travel day layover included turned out to be a hour nightmare The flight from ECP got routed to New Mexico after being told Denver was closed due to a thunderstorm Fine We then were stuck waiting on the plane on the ground for over an hour before it was decided we could get off while we waited for the weather to clear This delay ended up being hours By the time we got to Denver it was damn near midnight and ofcourse all connecting flights were long gone At that point we had to wait in line for nearly hours to speak with a southwest rep regarding what our options were Meanwhile I was also on hold with southwest to see if I could speak with anyone on the phone No one ever answered and I hung up after hours Upon speaking to an agent in the airport I was told that the next flight was at theend of the next day There would be no credit refund hotel accomodations or even a darn blanket for the night I was left with so many others sleeping on the floor shivering there were no hotels rental cars or Ubers available Absolutely unacceptable I ended up purchasing a flight with Delta so I could get home the next morning I know of many other people that did the same thing I understand that the weather is not necessarily the airline s fault but their inability to accommodate people that are stranded and offer zero assistance is just not ok

reviews: Southwest use to be my favorite airline and today was my official last flight with them Constant delays and now paying for early bird is a joke Saving seats is common practice and when you say anything you are the problem The tickets are not cheap and until they change their joke of a seating policy and their constant delays since they have such short windows between planes I will no longer be flying with them I recently flew with United and it was such a better and more comfortable experience Southwest terminals are packed and unpleasant So goodbye Southwest
Lemma: Southwest use favorite airline today official last flight Constant delay pay early bird joke Saving seat common practice say anything problem ticket cheap change joke seating policy constant delay since short window plane longer fly recently fly United good comfortable experience Southwest terminal pack unpleasant goodbye Southwest

reviews: I m over Southwest Flight cancelled and now my husband and I can t get on the same flight I have medical issues and am not comfortable flying alone but there is nothing they can do We can t go the next day as the reason we are going is for a family reunion that we will miss if we wait until the next day to fly So now we are on two different flights went from non stop to flights with plane changes had to rebook the rental care and pay more I m certain this is because of the computer problems they are having but they won t say why the flights were cancelled My daughter and her family also got cancelled and now have to be on a flight with stops and be on the plane hours longer with two little kids

reviews: Booked flight times according to my schedule and needs SW changed both my departure times cutting approx hours off my trip cutting into my plans When I called different times long wait times before finally getting thru explained this to rep was told that I wouldn t be compensated any for this She wouldn t even ask someone higher about my inconvenience Tickets were not cheap for this flight

reviews: First time out of Long Beach Airport for me I m and am traveling with my mom for our usual Summer vacation to to see family Probably the best crew ever on the LGB to St Louis flight Very friendly and absolutely hilarious This wasn t your typical Southwest flight with or jokes The jokes were nonstop throughout the flight Boarding was back to pre COVID procedures While some find that annoying I actually preferred that Any return to some sense of normalcy is a welcome change for me Flight attendants were actually smiling throughout the flight Shocker right Glad to see this is typical of Southwest And even after the pandemic we got bags free per traveler on top of an already cheap ticket The only downside is that a couple of their aircrafts seem pretty old
Lemma: First time Long Beach Airport travel mom usual Summer vacation see family Probably best crew ever LGB St Louis flight friendly absolutely hilarious typical Southwest flight joke joke nonstop throughout flight Boarding back pre COVID procedure find annoy actually prefer return sense normalcy welcome change Flight attendant actually smile throughout flight Shocker right Glad see typical Southwest even pandemic get bag free per traveler top already cheap ticket downside couple aircraft seem pretty old

reviews: Never used to be like this I always get to the airport early I arrived for my A flight hours prior knowing I was going to get some work done As the time crept up text notification of delay Then I watch my app like a hawk No additional notifications as additional three changes are made They overfilled planes with gas which delayed two gates Then a gate change then no gate no gate for you then finally another gate change More delays without notice Finally an additional text update I check with customer service we should be fine plenty of time to get on your connection hours later the flight attendant says vaguely we don t know if we will make it if you live in Seattle and want to get off now mind you we are all buckled in at this point No clarity on the subject just a vague statement We take off we land in Denver Congestion on the tarmac we sit another ten minutes Now Miami flight delayed my hope that they ve waited for us in the minute window we ve arrived My boarding pass no longer shows boarding No longer shows gate number or boarding number The plane is still at the gate I go to customer service the doors are already closed sorry We can rebook you for tomorrow I m in tears Another flight attendant walks up and says we were told we would be rebooked I tell her not true She repeats the same vague statement I tell her they can do better She persists to argue with me that she was on the flight and heard it I ignore her Not good enough The plane is still at the gate I get rebooked for the next day I have to call out tomorrow now missing a day of work that Southwest won t compensate me for Oh but I get in flight vouchers for their crappy airline They book me at a quality inn I get the shuttle major crack in the windshield No AC it never used to be like this They didn t prepare for return volume and it clearly shows We will book with another airline from now on

reviews: Southwest is the welfare of airlines I will never forget the ridiculous night that I had sitting in Baltimore Airport after being delayed for at least different reasons and even boarded on the plane and driven around the tarmac and then after several hours and different excuses told to get off the plane because the pilot had timed out and the flight is canceled I sat alone all night in the airport and it should never have happened Then they offer to fly me home days later No money and sleep at the airport The best part is I have been trying to call them for a week and automated says hour wait on hold so I waited and they picked up and hung up not one time but times I will pay more for one of the more reliable airlines Check Southwest reviews all similar accounts
Lemma: Southwest welfare airline never forget ridiculous night sit Baltimore Airport delay least different reason even board plane drive around tarmac several hour different excuse tell get plane pilot time flight cancel sit alone night airport never happen offer fly home day later money sleep airport best part try call week automate say hour wait hold wait pick hang one time time pay one reliable airline Check Southwest review similar account

reviews: My son and his family were supposed to fly from Midway to LaGuardia on June At AM he received a text that the flight was cancelled There were no other flights that day The planned family reunion was ruined He tried to rebook a flight for later in the summer only to discover that the number of points needed had doubled It would be fair for Southwest to allow him to rebook for the same number of points but they have not made that option available
Lemma: son family suppose fly Midway LaGuardia June receive text flight cancel flight day plan family reunion ruin try rebook flight later summer discover number point need double would fair Southwest allow rebook number point make option available

reviews: This trip has been awful I am a college student and have summer classes I am traveling to I booked my flight so that I would have enough time to get to my lodging location and finish a little homework before going to bed When I arrived for my connecting I found out that my flight was canceled and I was not able to change the rebooked flight they had given me The only reason they gave me for canceling the flight is the weather There is no weather at my connection point or my destination There is no weather between They would not give me a voucher for food or a hotel stating they don t do that for weather delays I am now stuck at my connecting point for hours waiting for the next flight to the destination The airport I am stuck at does not have wifi and I have to use my hotspot that costs me money Southwest would not let me change my destination cancel with a refund or change flight providers When talking with the ticketing agent she also told me there is a high possibility that the rebooked flight will be canceled too That means I will be at the airport until tomorrow with no voucher for a hotel food or wifi to do my homework Southwest has used the WEATHER as an excuse so they don t have to give vouchers There is no weather so don t say the cancelation is due to weather They need to own up to the real issue I am extremely fed up and will not be flying with them again if I have a choice
Lemma: trip awful college student summer class travel book flight would enough time get lodge location finish little homework go bed arrive connecting find flight cancel able change rebooked flight give reason give cancel flight weather weather connection point destination weather would give voucher food hotel state weather delay stick connect point hour wait next flight destination airport stick wifi use hotspot cost money Southwest would let change destination cancel refund change flight provider talk ticket agent also tell high possibility rebooked flight cancel mean airport tomorrow voucher hotel food wifi homework Southwest use WEATHER excuse give voucher weather say cancelation due weather need real issue extremely feed fly choice

reviews: If I could title this review it would be hrs in hell Not just one flight but every flight we had on our quick turnaround from Nashville to Bozeman was delayed rescheduled gates changed lengthy waits in planes for gates stranding in Denver overnight just to mention a few But my main focus here is how horribly we were treated by Southwest staff mainly on the ground officious in the air They delayed us at every turn every time we needed information or to interact with gate agents information desk agents even baggage agents it was the same thing huffs rolled eyes indifference even intentional misdirection They all were rude beyond belief lacked any empathy for my wife who was hobbling on a broken foot no one took any responsibility for anything or offered any help What was crazy about this was while I hadn t flown in a few years as I m partially retired I flew hundreds of times on Southwest going back into the s and the had always been the happiest and most helpful crews and staff of any airline Now the wait time to get them on the phone is always minutes everyone was unnecessarily rude as if there was any degree of necessary rudeness and to a person exuded the feeling that you were an inconvenience and not customer I hope never to fly again and have no problem with this now horrible airline going out of business

reviews: First we boarded the plane late due to a maintenance issue Then we sat on the tarmac for an hour before the crew announced they couldn t fix the issue so we d have to exit the plane luggage and all We were told to just wait for an update The plane didn t leave until hours after the original departure date Due to the delay we missed our connecting flight Southwest booked us for an evening flight forcing us to stay another hours in another airport terminal They wouldn t put us on an earlier flight We are arriving so late that we are missing our last train home and will have to book a hotel In sum we were supposed to arrive at our destination at am and will now be arriving at pm Next time I will pay extra money for a more reliable airline because the hours wasted and hotel add up to more than what a pricier ticket would have been

reviews: To say my last experience with Southwest was a disaster would be an understatement It all started from day one to the very end Beyond disappointed To start my flight to Long Island was supposed to be Friday at am out of San Antonio TX I made sure to check in exactly hours prior as I always have and got my confirmation and boarding pass Then that very same night the day before I m supposed to leave I get an email from Southwest saying my flight has been changed to the following day more than hours later than my flight due to a disruption in my itinerary So while I m panicking because I needed to be in Long Island by Friday not Saturday I decided I was going to just show up and play dumb So I did Once I arrived there I had to talk with the customer service team due to receiving an error at the ticketing kiosk because they changed my flight of course I was asked Umm did you change your flight Yes yes I did and just decided to show up a day prior Not So I very politely said No I had not They accommodated thank goodness but I had to fly out an hour later than expected Okay whatever fine Then comes the following Tuesday I had this feeling in the pit of my stomach just knowing something bad was going to happen First off my flight from Long Island to Orlando got delayed two hours due to computers going down and there being nothing they can do Once I got on the plane they then had us sit on the plane for minutes because the plane is too heavy and they were trying to figure out numbers Okay great Now I m starting to panic Not to mention while all of these delays are happening I m terrified I m going to miss my other flights I was originally supposed to be home at approximately pm but due to all of the changes and issues I got home close to am the next day Another flight told us that they didn t have any flight attendants for the flight and it too got delayed another few hours Just beyond livid with the way everything was handled And not to mention since I got back to the San Antonio airport the next day at am I got charged more for parking my car there an extra day I just do not recommend using them going forward They do not have anything in order and everything was in complete disarray I will be using United or Delta going forward because even as one of the flight attendants said to a plane full of upset people and I quote at least they United Airlines and Delta won t be late for your flights So not only was an entire day wasted for me with frustration and disappointment I also am out more money than I anticipated because of how much later my flight was Run Do not use Southwest Airlines

reviews: My husband was to fly out Wed June th around pm He got a notification his flight had been moved to pm He drove hours to Nashville Tn got there and the flight was bumped to after pm He s traveling to help his year old Dad during his surgery tomorrow June th in the morning and is also responsible for he year old Mom with Dementia There is no family left in Austin Tx that can help After arriving he discovered that none of the flights on SouthWest today to Austin may fly Reason given No crew Seriously This is why I never fly anymore I ll drive across country before flying Now they have our money my husband is stuck hours from home and his parents are in a terrible position Southwest you should be truly ashamed

reviews: Worst flight and customer service Lost hours Plus had to pay for food They gave me a voucher Last night I went to purchase more airfare In October I have a flight I went to use the voucher but it expires in September Its currently June I paid for the airfare so I had the flight during their off It was I was on the phone for over hours to use the voucher Two agents said they cannot attach the voucher whatsoever But I can have it extended for another flight later on I then canceled and found different airline same flight details for cheaper This is an absolute nightmare go elsewhere if you value your time They have no customer service and will put you through loopholes They do not value their customers and will not make it right They just prolonged the inevitable I have never been treated like this It was easier to cancel the flight I had just booked than to resolve voucher on a fake off sale
Lemma: Worst flight customer service Lost hour Plus pay food give voucher Last night go purchase airfare October flight go use voucher expire September currently June pay airfare flight phone hour use voucher Two agent say attach voucher whatsoever extend another flight later cancel find different airline flight detail cheap absolute nightmare go elsewhere value time customer service put loophole value customer make right prolong inevitable never treat like easy cancel flight book resolve voucher fake sale

reviews: Flight was delayed hours due to systems failure Understandable We asked before boarding the first leg of our flight if the plane was going to continue on to Denver and we were assured it would We booked the flight because we didn t need to change planes Got to Long Beach where we waited for the passengers to board when an announcement was made that the plane is being terminated which meant they were using it to take passengers somewhere else due to all the canceled flights from the technological issues of the day Flight crew told us to get off the plane While waiting in line to find out what was going on I noticed the flight crew lining up to get on another plane right next to our plane and I asked them if they were going to Denver and they all confirmed they were Southwest decided to board a plane right next to our plane that was supposed to continue to Denver with a full group of people and did not allow us to board In other words they backhandedly gave our seats away boarded the crew but not us as we waited on line and took off without us Of course when we finally got to an agent she was showing us on the flight that we should have been on and had a challenge rerouting us for a flight and another hour wait Attached is my ticket which appears we left at like we were supposed to I also included the new ticket which of course was delayed Our seats were given away right before our eyes without so much as an explanation or request from Southwest This was my favorite airline but with this and the condescending way they threaten you to wear a face mask or face civil consequences has taken this airline from the fun comical way they used to conduct business which is needed at this time in the world to an airline of demands and consequences This is worthy of compensation We did not give up our seats they were taken from us
