reviews: While boarding the plane at pm on flight I was sent back to customer service as the boarding pass I was given by customer service had security restrictions in error Customer Service Manager Sally was very rude it is not my fault you did not receive the correct boarding pass She initially refused to give her name and ID number and she also did not apologize or accommodate me for the confusion and also the embarrassment the airline caused me Due to this error I almost missed my flight While boarding plane at pm due to an employee error one of the flight attendants made an inappropriate comment of a sexual harassment nature that was offensive and he did not apologize as that would admit his guilt He also blocked the rear of the plane with his arms and legs to prevent me from sitting in the rear of the plane It appears Southwest is hiring Managers with terrible customer service skills and employees with lack of training on ethic and no respect
Lemma: board plane pm flight send back customer service board pas give customer service security restriction error Customer Service Manager Sally rude fault receive correct boarding pas initially refuse give name ID number also apologize accommodate confusion also embarrassment airline cause Due error almost miss flight board plane pm due employee error one flight attendant make inappropriate comment sexual harassment nature offensive apologize would admit guilt also block rear plane arm leg prevent sit rear plane appear Southwest hire Managers terrible customer service skill employee lack training ethic respect

reviews: Southwest has the worst customer service I have ever come across I was calling to try and figure out why my travel credits were set to expire in July I was on hold for hours and minutes Then the agent picks up and in seconds she tells me that there is nothing she can do because the flight was canceled a week after the completely arbitrary deadline of September th I canceled the ticket as soon as I could but it was for a wedding that ended up being canceled due to covid There are still covid restrictions in place in many places in the US yet these tickets are still expiring Southwest just stole from me and as I am looking through other reviews it seems that this is all too common a practice for this airline
Lemma: Southwest bad customer service ever come across call try figure travel credit set expire July hold hour minute agent pick second tell nothing flight cancel week completely arbitrary deadline September th cancel ticket soon could wedding end cancel due covid still covid restriction place many place US yet ticket still expire Southwest stole look review seem common practice airline

reviews: Southwest Airlines had a computer glitch that caused many delays and upset people We happened to be some of those people affected While flying home from Nashville our flight was delayed hours we switched to a different flight that had a stop over but was still due to get us to Midway airport hrs sooner After switching the flight ended up also being delayed and we would have been stuck in St Louis because the connecting flight would be missed In the meantime the flight we switched from booked up so we couldn t switch back So we were going to be stuck over nite in St Louis or Nashville I was told to call customer relations to see if we could be reimbursed for our room there was a min on hold wait We went back to the counter and one if the very nice service reps got a supervisor to help us her name is Melissa on pm She was amazing polite and professional as was the service rep who also assisted I wish I had his name in making a horribly frustrating situation into a pleasant experience It was very stressful with having two kids along My stress level was high and my tone was a bit sharp instead of them taking offense they were very understanding and apologetic They helped us resolve the issue by getting us on a flight that would avoid an overnite delay After this experience I will always fly with Southwest Big big thank you to Melissa and her staff for making the final day of our trip a great one

reviews: This airline cost me a lot of money by causing me to miss my international flight Their system was down for many hours so we missed our flight to Iceland and had to stay overnight in Seattle Not only they did not address our issues but many of their personnel were also rude What kind of airline is not able to fix their computer system on time in Silicon Valley The answer is Southwest They caused many passengers who were traveling from Southern Ca sit in the airplane for hours or more to get to the destination in Seattle You get what you pay for Cheap airline and incompetent personnel If I could give negative stars they would get We could not even use the internet on the flight and had no hot beverage could only offer soda or room temperature water
Lemma: airline cost lot money cause miss international flight system many hour miss flight Iceland stay overnight Seattle address issue many personnel also rude kind airline able fix computer system time Silicon Valley answer Southwest cause many passenger travel Southern Ca sit airplane hour get destination Seattle get pay Cheap airline incompetent personnel could give negative star would get could even use internet flight hot beverage could offer soda room temperature water

reviews: We were traveling Philly to Reno Nevada last night and there was a computer glitch in Southwest s equipment which resulted in our landing in Denver at ish but not able to deplane for approximately minutes We were updated by the crew as frequently as they knew something and when we were able to enter the airport our connecting flight was just a few gates from where we entered The next leg was uneventful and we landed in Reno later than we had hoped but without any further incident Things happen especially these days but the crew and our plane full of passengers deserve a shout out for their patience and good humor in the face of our little delay
Lemma: travel Philly Reno Nevada last night computer glitch Southwest equipment result landing Denver ish able deplane approximately minute update crew frequently know something able enter airport connect flight gate enter next leg uneventful land Reno later hop without incident Things happen especially day crew plane full passenger deserve shout patience good humor face little delay

reviews: Delayed by a towed plane already here in Denver Scheduled to leave at and still waiting to board at No excuse for not having the towed plane here before our boarding time Shame on you Southwest I thought Frontier was bad
Lemma: Delayed towed plane already Denver Scheduled leave still wait board excuse towed plane boarding time Shame Southwest think Frontier bad

reviews: Rapid reward flier and I usually love southwest but on this occasion flight was already hours late due to weather Plane lands we board quickly and the pilot is all set to go we sit Nothing to do with weather or plane but rather an administrative screw up Apparently we are waiting for a document from dispatch in Dallas we re in Detroit mind you No one can find the document so Southwest and only Southwest dispatch has already added minutes of sitting to scheduled flight time It s seriously unbelievable inability to manage their own internal paperwork process
Lemma: Rapid reward flier usually love southwest occasion flight already hour late due weather Plane land board quickly pilot set go sit Nothing weather plane rather administrative screw Apparently wait document dispatch Dallas Detroit mind one find document Southwest Southwest dispatch already add minute sit schedule flight time seriously unbelievable inability manage internal paperwork process

reviews: I will never fly Southwest ever again First off it s a first come first serve airline so if you don t get there in time you re out of luck on your seat and get funneled to the back or the worst choices because everyone grabbed seats already Good luck if you re traveling with family I saw a mother flying on her own with children waiting for the moment they called for her section only to get up there and be rudely told by the attendant she has to go to CSA to check in her stroller She basically got pushed to the back of the plane and was split up from her kids who at most had the oldest being Secondly the staff are rude pushy and it seems every flight attendant is standing ready to nun chuck anyone into oblivion that so much as lets a tiny bit of their mask slip down I did not appreciate the threats from flight attendants about mask mandates nor did I appreciate the poor quality and service during the flight Trust me pay the extra to get on something else
Lemma: never fly Southwest ever First first come first serve airline get time luck seat get funnel back bad choice everyone grab seat already Good luck travel family saw mother fly child wait moment call section get rudely tell attendant go CSA check stroller basically get push back plane split kid old Secondly staff rude pushy seem every flight attendant stand ready nun chuck anyone oblivion much let tiny bit mask slip appreciate threat flight attendant mask mandate appreciate poor quality service flight Trust pay extra get something else

reviews: I m never flying with Southwest again Southwest canceled of my flights and didn t ask or notify me about it This morning I went to my email to check in for my flight just to see an email that had been sent at am in the morning that it was canceled I bought this ticket over a week ago I was confused so I called and was on hold for an hour no call back option was super annoying Soon a lady talked with me and I told her my situation and how I needed to fly out that date and how important it was to me She then proceeded to tell me it was my fault for putting a wrong name on my ticket which I didn t and then said they wouldn t compensate me at all or give me my original flight back But she would charge me a significant amount more for a flight on a different day This ruins my entire week and puts such a burden on me Southwest has the worst customer service and they don t care about you as a customer at all from my experience I will not be flying with them again and I recommend you shouldn t either I m sticking with Alaska because they actually care to help solve your problems and are friendly
Lemma: never fly Southwest Southwest cancel flight ask notify morning go email check flight see email send morning cancel buy ticket week ago confuse call hold hour call back option super annoy Soon lady talk tell situation need fly date important proceed tell fault put wrong name ticket say compensate give original flight back would charge significant amount flight different day ruin entire week put burden Southwest bad customer service care customer experience fly recommend either stick Alaska actually care help solve problem friendly

reviews: I need to continue to lower my expectations for Southwest Airlines Always providing the minimum amount needed and don t seem to care about customer service Airport check in was easy flight was late taxiing in was late because the flight was late Baggage was extremely late Generally the staff all seemed annoyed at you except for the captain from check in to the flight attendants to baggage I m trying to avoid flying them in the future Alaska please think about expanding to Denver Flyers would like better options
Lemma: need continue lower expectation Southwest Airlines Always provide minimum amount need seem care customer service Airport check easy flight late taxiing late flight late Baggage extremely late Generally staff seem annoy except captain check flight attendant baggage try avoid fly future Alaska please think expand Denver Flyers would like good option

reviews: I raced to my connecting flight at Atlanta airport My seat was sold to another because I arrived on time I was told it was my fault that my seat was sold to another leaving me embarrassed spending more money to re schedule my hotel and car rental and then criticized in front of strangers for being late on time to my flight My name nor flight was never released on the overhead speakers My experience that I will share with my family friends and most importantly the colleagues from my office advising me not to fly Southwest money is the only thing Southwest acknowledges or cares about Southwest s name makes me sick to my core Only more money from customers who missed their flights or will pay additional funds to take someones seat is more important than a paying customer A supervisor came out to speak to my husband and I about the Southwest attendant speaking rude to us to another couple The supervisor blamed me for being on time to my flight giving Southwest permission to give my seat away making it okay for the attendant to speak about me to this other couple The reasoning for allowing the rudeness is because I was on time to my flight therefore making any rude comments from a staff member acceptable I am in my mid s and will ensure I never fly Southwest or speak kindly of the company The company only cares about money and not the future Keep my well earned money because it s too little to amount to the future wealth you could have had My word of mouth will forever be negative towards this airline and staff for being rude and inconsiderate to a person paying for their service I regret not cancelling my flight with Southwest after several colleagues suggested I change airlines It was my waste of money to give Southwest a chance

reviews: This is hands down the worst company I have ever interacted with I flew a connecting flight which they changed on me The flight was minutes late arriving to our layover A flight that was on time My wife ran ahead of me to get to our flight When she got there she was informed our seats had already been given away She was in the gate area but waiting for me to catch up Our seats were given away minutes after they started boarding as were several other people The attendant then ignored everyone trying to figure out how their tickets were given away before the plane was finished boarding To the point where she then stated it was past their minutes before departure rule which states you need to be in the gate area not right at your gate there was no final boarding call because they had already overcrowded the plane The plane was so overbooked the people you sold other peoples tickets too had to come back off because there was nowhere to sit Whoever manages your Southwest Airline employee s at Atlanta international airport is joke and has no mental comprehension of what their job is let alone to be in charge I feel this company can not operate with any form of intelligence as clearly it shows in your reviews I suppose I am some what to blame for waiting until after experiencing your uselessness as a company to read the reviews written about your company

reviews: Extremely disappointed in the promptness of this airline We were initially excited that there was now a direct flight to Destin Fort Walton from Milwaukee In fact this was the inaugural flight What started with optimism quickly faded to the same old same old disappointment Our flight was delayed for one hour after the gate attendant said don t worry you ll still arrive at the same time That of course turned out to be false I am actually writing this review from the plane as we speak still sitting on the tarmac minutes after landing with three small children If you have somewhere you need to be or are traveling with small children I would highly recommend choosing a different airline
Lemma: Extremely disappoint promptness airline initially excite direct flight Destin Fort Walton Milwaukee fact inaugural flight start optimism quickly fade old old disappointment flight delay one hour gate attendant say worry still arrive time course turn false actually write review plane speak still sit tarmac minute land three small child somewhere need travel small child would highly recommend choose different airline

reviews: Will never fly with this airline again Didn t know they had open seating which means that people walk on and sit wherever they please Which is great for the people with money who can afford to upgrade to the first seating class Not great for single parents or other families who can t because of you are in group C to board you are almost guaranteed to be separated from your kids rest of your family As a single parent I was furious that my kids and I were scattered throughout the plane and forced to sit next to strangers instead of as a family The reason I was given was they haven t assigned seating in years So that makes it right No It doesn t We didn t even get cabin service on the flights and everyone is crammed together like sardines Lowered the tray tables so I could use it for other things and it was filthy had crumbs and all clearly wasn t cleaned Absolutely awful experience Will fly any other airline but theirs
Lemma: never fly airline know open seating mean people walk sit wherever please great people money afford upgrade first seating class great single parent family group C board almost guarantee separate kid rest family single parent furious kid scatter throughout plane force sit next stranger instead family reason give assign seat year make right even get cabin service flight everyone cram together like sardine Lowered tray table could use thing filthy crumb clearly clean Absolutely awful experience fly airline

reviews: Absolutely terrible customer service they indicate families with little ones can board early but we were still behind passengers While on the flight we were told our car seat was not acceptable so lap seating was ok Then another rude male flight attendant scolded us and threatened to stop the flight if we didn t get our year old in a seat faster I tried to explain we were told otherwise as I was placing him in a seat and not trying to cause issues He was extremely condescending asking me multiple times his age when I had already told him he was If we were refusing to comply I d understand his demeanor however that was not the case No WiFi on the flight Our return flight situation was an utter nightmare The website kicked me out several times while trying to change our flights as we had a family situation We paid the additional fee to change the flight but it was the wrong date when it kicked us to the homepage My fault I get it However the customer service agent was uncaring and charged us another k to rebook They kept reiterating their policy over and over They refused to assist us and gave us absolutely no break told us the flight was not booked so our chances of an early boarding pass was probable Not the case did I mention I was on hold for nearly hours to speak to someone We ll never fly Southwest ever again and stick to Delta which has always been spectacular I ve worked in the travel industry for years and have never experienced this level of unfriendly service or lack of service

reviews: This review is of the gate agent at Chicago Midway A b on the evening of This gentleman was the rudest most uncaring person I ve ever encountered on any airline Was very abrupt unhelping uncaring individual He was short with handicapped people rude to other customers including us twice He should be reminded that even though Southwest signs his paycheck the traveling public actually pays him I am not looking for anything from Southwest just frustrated that this guys attitude left us with a bad taste in our mouth from a trip that was otherwise fantastic

reviews: Flying Charleston to Baltimore was fine In Baltimore was notified pm departure delayed until pm for no apparent reason Then delayed to pm It s now pm and still not boarded Excuse no pilot How do you not have a pilot for a flight leaving at pm that was supposed to leave at pm Lost my car rental because of the delay So no way to get around while I m supposed to be working Asked clerk at boarding counter a simple question and she snapped my head off and wouldn t give me her name
Lemma: Flying Charleston Baltimore fine Baltimore notify pm departure delay pm apparent reason delay pm pm still board Excuse pilot pilot flight leave pm suppose leave pm Lost car rental delay way get around suppose work Asked clerk board counter simple question snap head give name

reviews: I used to love Southwest Man have they gone downhill Let me preface my review that the pilots were amazing Most of the stewards stewardesses were obnoxious They make every excuse to not provide food and beverage services Checking in was an absolute nightmare There was one staff member trying to direct hundreds of people and he had no idea what he was doing We arrived two hours early on our return flight and almost missed it because checking baggage was so disorganized Will find another airline and hope they are better One steward made the comment It s time for us to get back to making money The flight is full so don t protect seats Seriously There s a better way to convey that info All of our flights were late the second one by nearly two hours My brand new luggage received a big ding to boot Inexcusable

reviews: Southwest Airlines has taken a nose dive and crashed and burned over the past months Their customer service is a joke with min wait times I ve flown times with them this year and half of the flights have had major issues I have had delays over hours cancelled flights No way to get anyone on the phone with min wait times I ve flown SWA religiously for years and will never fly them again I cannot handle the delays and lack of customer service any longer Avoid this airline at all costs

reviews: Very disappointed in the customer service and lack of communication Southwest verified and ensured that a pet could fly under their policy with the owner during his move to another state Seems it was a very different story when they showed up in person Owner was faced with abandoning the pup or not seeing his family
Lemma: disappointed customer service lack communication Southwest verify ensure pet could fly policy owner move another state Seems different story show person Owner face abandon pup see family

reviews: I used to have no issues with this airline until the last few flights I had with them I upgraded my ticket to sit in row A the very front row During the whole flight I can over hear the flight attendants conversations all they talked about was the passengers in a very rude way Just gossiping about them all not knowing that the first row can hear every word they said I looked at one of them in the eye when I heard them talking trash on the passengers and he quickly smiled at me and changed their conversation like if nothing was said he knew I heard what they were talking about Very unprofessional The next flight that day I would have to say that the flight attendants were a ton worse I got yelled at for lowering my mask to eat a snack in his words You have to raise your mask above your nose in between bites and while you chew I have never heard of that rule until this flight Later that flight I fell asleep and was rudely woken up by the guy because my mask was at the tip of my nose not under and they threatened to get the captain involved I said go ahead Keep in mind I m not against masks I m against harassing people for your own beliefs that we can t even eat without getting yelled at I m and a half months pregnant and of course they never got the captain involved because that would have gone nowhere for them but make them look stupid I could over hear the passengers talking about how rude he was because it wasn t to just me everyone After reading other Southwest reviews I know this isn t happening to just me Your employees need a customer service class because the behavior from all your flight attendants is just absurd I will never fly with them again Back to Delta and American Airlines

reviews: We understand that airlines have to cancel flights from time to time That s not the reason we feel SW deserves such a low rating The reason for the rating is the way they handled the communication and willing to help us out once they canceled the first flight in our trip and their response for assistance It is too long of a story to share in this review but the short of it is that the flight they canceled and did not tell us about until we were checking in cost us an additional and a full day of our honeymoon We reached out to them several times and the only response we received is the COVID excuse with no willingness to assist in any manner We do not plan on using their future travel plans Poor customer service
Lemma: understand airline cancel flight time time reason feel SW deserves low rating reason rating way handle communication willing help us cancel first flight trip response assistance long story share review short flight cancel tell us check cost us additional full day honeymoon reach several time response receive COVID excuse willingness assist manner plan use future travel plan Poor customer service

reviews: I have heard about all the disrespect from customers on some Southwest flights especially since covid but I must say that as someone who use to love Southwest Airlines and I still do in many ways I am finally back in a hub city and want very much to fly Southwest I think that some of the staff members could use a refreshers course on customer service We are all coming through a very difficult time that has left a lasting Imprint on our mental health in one way or another If you want respect you could give respect too I was accused of not putting my seat up twice on my flight coming back into Las Vegas on when finally the last flight attendant had the sense to realize that the seat was up as much as it would go I became sad as I felt that I was being accused of disobeying commands I am one who truly believe and want total peace in the sky it used to be why I chose flying over other forms of transportation everyone deserves respect and a polite reminder of more than a half second may be needed in some cases where disputes are of concern We are afraid of what happens to us on flights just as you guys are anxious about us lets all be kind to each other and spare a little empathy as we continue to get well together Thanks for your service

reviews: I have only flown twice in my whole life My first experience was with Delta Air Lines and it was amazing My second experience flying with Southwest Airlines was absolutely horrible Seating is at a first come first serve basis Therefore if you check in super early you are guaranteed better seating Well I checked into my returning flight about hours before my flight and was still put in the C category meaning that your one of the last groups of people to board Not wanting to be the last group to board me and my fianc paid per person a total of to get a boarding pass in the A group A and A Pittsburgh was to board at gate C While sitting there waiting to board our plane an announcement was made that all of the sudden Pittsburgh was to board at gate C So everyone on that flight ran over to gate C When we got there to board about passengers were already on the flight and the guy boarding the plane said oh you probably won t get to sit together since there s so many passengers on already We said ok well we paid for us to be in group A so we could sit together In return he said I made the announcement a few times in hours Ok well if that were in fact true then everyone else would have heard him as well I m completely dissatisfied and disappointed with this airline I will never use them to fly again Your better off going somewhere elsewhere where they have assigned seating and can help you out not ruin your whole trip We should get reimbursed for the extra money spent since we paid and did not get what we had paid for After landing in Pittsburgh at our destination we approached the attendant asking what we could do to get our money back for our upgraded seats and her response was The tickets are non refundable sorry So we then asked if there s someone we can call about the issue and she said You can call but you still won t get your money back Seriously after paying over a thousand dollars for the flights already then another on top of that for upgraded seats is just ridiculous It s highly disappointing and I wouldn t recommend this airline to anyone

reviews: This is a long overdue review I have been flying with Southwest since I was a little kid and they had ashtrays in the seats and the planes were brown I have been an advocate for Southwest my whole life and in college I majored in business we would study how Southwest excelled at customer service and hiring right when compared to other airlines I lamented flying with other airlines because I know the way I would be treated And finally I signed up for the Chase credit card to fly with them more often No more My past flights during the tail end of the COVID pandemic have been beyond horrible Nonsensical mask policies when compared to other airlines I witnessed them kick a baby a non walking baby off the flight due to not being able to keep a mask over its nose Repeatedly yelled at over the coms for not abiding by the mask policy People most of us have had it or are vaxxed You are sacrificing the one thing that made you better than other airlines Something tells a small room in the corporate office in Dallas are making these poor long term brand ruining decision for some short term I am not liable gain I have a sneaky suspicion my kid brother will be studying the rise and fall of the Southwest Brand when he gets to college I fly next month If it isn t even marginally better by the time we are exporting vaccines it s time to cancel the credit card and go with another airline And if my office of Employees is any indicator one used to even be a stewardess for Southwest I know I am not alone

reviews: Arrived at airport with boarding passes in hand checked luggage employee at luggage check in counter made a change to my wife s boarding pass but didn t give us a new one Got to TSA check in and her boarding pass would not scan because of the change they made She was in a wheelchair so they changed her boarding pass so there would be help at our destination Had to go back other end of terminal to get a new boarding pass Back across terminal through TSA and the door to the plane was closed Next available flight had one empty seat Southwest s response was sorry these things happen you should have been here sooner We were prepared for our flight when we got to airport we were at TSA but could not go any farther because of a change they made And they said it was our fault Lost Got reimbursed The only mistake I made was not buying the insurance One would think a company like Southwest would correct their mistakes

reviews: This was one of the worst trips I ve ever taken on Southwest The gate attendant kept calling for help for a customer service agent to help people with boarding passes other issues and a tag for an elderly person s wheelchair and they never came That delayed the boarding process for minutes then we all boarded ready to go and the captain comes on to say that we will be delayed minutes waiting for ten bags to come from another plane That being said we left minutes late On top of that they only served beverages and snacks one time when we were on the plane sitting and hour to take off and another hours in flight Plane was full and cramped Their new planes have thinner cushions on their seats and backs and for someone with back issues it was so uncomfortable
Lemma: one bad trip ever take Southwest gate attendant keep call help customer service agent help people boarding pass issue tag elderly person wheelchair never come delay boarding process minute board ready go captain come say delay minute wait ten bag come another plane say leave minute late top serve beverage snack one time plane sit hour take another hour flight Plane full cramp new plane thinner cushion seat back someone back issue uncomfortable

reviews: I only fly Southwest and my experience this trip is one of the reasons why Great customer service I purchased my ticket for I was scheduled to return to Dallas on Monday but I needed to change my flight to Tuesday I read online that there was no fee to change a flight unless the flight was a different price When I searched the flights for Tuesday there were no flights for I called customer service and they changed my flight at no additional cost without a problem There is no other airline that does that I received a confirmation email before I even ended the call That is excellent customer service I love Southwest because I can fly to Phoenix every year for bucks round trip with the wanna get away specials and they are the only airline that doesn t charge for luggage I am a loyal Southwest customer
Lemma: fly Southwest experience trip one reason Great customer service purchase ticket schedule return Dallas Monday need change flight Tuesday read online fee change flight unless flight different price search flight Tuesday flight call customer service change flight additional cost without problem airline receive confirmation email even end call excellent customer service love Southwest fly Phoenix every year buck round trip wan na get away special airline charge luggage loyal Southwest customer

reviews: Very poor customer service I m a cancer survivor and due to Covid I had to cancel my flight last spring Now that I have been vaccinated I tried to rebook my flight and I was told that my credit had expired They had my cell and my email and no one could let me know that my credit was expired They advertise no cancellation fee but they won t credit your ticket for a cancelled flight or let you reuse the credit a year later Worst airline ever My entire family will never fly them again
Lemma: poor customer service cancer survivor due Covid cancel flight last spring vaccinate try rebook flight tell credit expire cell email one could let know credit expire advertise cancellation fee credit ticket cancelled flight let reuse credit year later Worst airline ever entire family never fly

reviews: I tried to book this flight with SWA points but I was short of points A screen popped up offering me the option to buy an additional points I agreed to the option purchased the points and clicked next When I got to the end another screen popped up saying that I was still points shorts and I needed to buy more points Except the minimum number of points I could buy was I tried to cancel the transaction so I could redo it and buy only the points I needed I emailed SWA and spoke with their phone rep only to be told emphatically that all point sales are final This is a total hoodwink by SWA I will try to avoid flying SWA in the future SWA s buy points option is a scam for which the company should be ashamed
Lemma: try book flight SWA point short point screen pop offer option buy additional point agree option purchase point click next get end another screen pop say still point short need buy point Except minimum number point could buy try cancel transaction could redo buy point need email SWA speak phone rep tell emphatically point sale final total hoodwink SWA try avoid fly SWA future SWA buy point option scam company ashamed

reviews: Horrible Unorganized We paid extra for specific seats and were stuck in the last row last number Every time we ve been in the last seats all the way in the back that are so firmly upright and bend forward The guy next to me should have been in two seats he was a large guy and I was on top of my bf the entire ride Then the lady when we were boarding called certain numbers and when we got up she gave us attitude and changed it so we were last
Lemma: Horrible Unorganized pay extra specific seat stick last row last number Every time last seat way back firmly upright bend forward guy next two seat large guy top bf entire ride lady board call certain number get give us attitude change last

reviews: I have to share because I am so upset Our family has flown Southwest for years and will never fly them again We called the airlines twice to verify the mask exemption policy for my grandson who just turned After lengthy hours of hold times we were told by separate employees that we were to bring our doctors excuse and the exemption form from their website to the airport that day After hearing the most recent horror stories on the news regarding them we called again this Sunday night We were disconnected after a hour wait Then we waited on hold another two hours to be given totally different information This lady was telling us the excuse and exemption form needed emailed in at least days in advance We were already at day I asked if a supervisor could call me since this is totally different information than we were given and was told that I could get back in line and wait for one Monday morning my daughter waited on hold two hours got a supervisor and was disconnected just as she started to speak She waited another minutes and was given the information of where to send in the info She sent it in and received a receipt by email stating that they would let her know in days She called to address this and was given a number to call today and she was told to press option five When she called the number today there was no option five She left a message somewhere they eventually called her back to tell her that he would ve been approved for not wearing a mask but because it wasn t seven days ahead of time it wouldn t be considered We confirmed by actually speaking to separate representatives their policy and procedure prior to purchasing tickets which was inaccurate we followed every direction they gave us This was their mistake They couldn t of cared less what we we were told Southwest Airlines is the most disorganized mess Such poor customer service doesn t belong in business And it s ridiculous that anyone under wear a mask anyway In researching many other countries airlines do not require anyone under to mask You mean to tell me the whole plane can takeoff their mask to eat and drink during the flight but a three year old has to be masked for hours We had re purchase tickets with Delta They were very helpful in communicating the process with our airline They will be flying out this Saturday on Delta

reviews: I was planning a trip to see my daughter in Houston last year I purchased my ticket for a Nov flight The flight was rebooked by Southwest customer service without my knowledge I never received any type of notice saying that my flight had been rebooked I called Southwest to confirm my flight date last year and at that time I was told I had been booked on a different flight I tried to cancel and the customer service person told me that I couldn t cancel I could only receive travel funds and I had until June rd to use them I didn t argue because I thought that was policy I then tried to use the travel funds on for a fight in July and was told that I had to use the funds by June rd FYI this customer service person I spoke with on was terrible and did not try to assist me at all I disconnected and called again to talk to a much more pleasant person on She advised that my flight was rebooked last year by Southwest and according to the notes I was not contacted and not given the opportunity to decline the rebooking She then expressed that I should call Corporate to see if there is anything that could be done to allow me to use the travel funds I called Corp on and low and behold I get another terrible customer service person She listened to respond and didn t listen to hear I was told I couldn t use my travel funds because the dates were out of range ignoring the fact that I was not given the opportunity to refuse the rebooking last year After being put on hold twice she finally told me that I will be given a refund that will take up to days to refund I never fly any other airline but Southwest and I do have opportunity to fly another airline with my job I choose Southwest because I was a loyal customer But if your customer service people will not respect the consumer why should the consumer frequent Southwest
Lemma: plan trip see daughter Houston last year purchase ticket Nov flight flight rebooked Southwest customer service without knowledge never receive type notice say flight rebooked call Southwest confirm flight date last year time tell book different flight try cancel customer service person tell cancel could receive travel fund June rd use argue think policy try use travel fund fight July tell use fund June rd FYI customer service person speak terrible try assist disconnect call talk much pleasant person advise flight rebooked last year Southwest accord note contact give opportunity decline rebooking express call Corporate see anything could do allow use travel fund call Corp low behold get another terrible customer service person listen respond listen hear tell use travel fund date range ignore fact give opportunity refuse rebooking last year put hold twice finally tell give refund take day refund never fly airline Southwest opportunity fly another airline job choose Southwest loyal customer customer service people respect consumer consumer frequent Southwest

reviews: Overall not a bad experience comfortable seats drink service nice mask enforcement great service no major issues Flight attendants were helpful and attentive even taking time to reserve a seat for a friend Slight delay on ground nothing major I was impressed and pleased
Lemma: Overall bad experience comfortable seat drink service nice mask enforcement great service major issue Flight attendant helpful attentive even take time reserve seat friend Slight delay ground nothing major impressed pleased

reviews: Left Kansas City and got Chicago when I went to board plane from Chicago to Miami boarding wouldn t work Sent to customer service I had A boarding pass Went to customer service and I was shown as on flight from Kansas City so reservation cancelled Had to make new reservation and given c boarding pass on full flight Back of plane middle seat When arrived in Miami couldn t check in for flight tomorrow go to counter and they had to manually do it and give me boarding pass B back of the plane I ask to talk To manager or someone to make complaint they told me call number Really Called number and was on hold twice for minutes tried again and last time was on hold for over hours customer service is terrible really gone down hill I am a frequent traveler for business at least two trips a month Just be aware no customer care currently on Southwest

reviews: Haven t flown Southwest in a while and unfortunately it s going to be a long time until I do so again Several issues Paid for early bird boarding but I wasn t checked in as indicated and didn t received priority boarding Boarding system is just outdated With all the technology available Lining up according to a number with open seating is just a joke Once we boarded plane we were delayed for almost an hour because the ground crew forgot to load the bags No kidding Everyone was on board and minutes after departure time the pilot came on and said the forgot and we re rounding up a ground crew to load the bags Sorry Southwest but you ve lost your edge
Lemma: flown Southwest unfortunately go long time Several issue Paid early bird boarding check indicated receive priority board Boarding system outdated technology available Lining accord number open seating joke board plane delay almost hour ground crew forgot load bag kid Everyone board minute departure time pilot come say forgot round ground crew load bag Sorry Southwest lose edge

reviews: Our non stop flight from Phoenix to Tampa was great with fun staff as usual The return non stop flight was cancelled due to weather My husband and I were booked on different returning flights with multiple stops After paying for a hotel at the airport and directly speaking to a Southwest employee we were able to get a flight out the next morning together with only one stop The flight was a nightmare Staff was rude and mean about demanding their covid restrictions which was not the case on our original flight to Tampa Our masks which we wore on the original flight were NOT accepted by this staff and we were forced to wear their blue chemical laden masks on top of our own masks We were then hassled throughout the flight to be sure our noses were covered even though I observed several other passengers with their masks below their noses At the end of the flight the most militant of the staff announced that we should stay in our seats until our row s turn in order to maintain social distancing Hilarious since we had all just spent hours eating our snacks with no masks and being stuffed into seats at full occupancy I had to laugh out loud We have always flown Southwest and in the past found their staff to be courteous and fun Sadly another death of covid is the staffing at Southwest We will never ever fly Southwest again
Lemma: non stop flight Phoenix Tampa great fun staff usual return non stop flight cancel due weather husband book different return flight multiple stop pay hotel airport directly speak Southwest employee able get flight next morning together one stop flight nightmare Staff rude mean demand covid restriction case original flight Tampa mask wear original flight accept staff force wear blue chemical laden mask top mask hassle throughout flight sure nose cover even though observe several passenger mask nose end flight militant staff announce stay seat row turn order maintain social distance Hilarious since spend hour eat snack mask stuff seat full occupancy laugh loud always fly Southwest past find staff courteous fun Sadly another death covid staff Southwest never ever fly Southwest

reviews: I flew Southwest or times a month during Covid last year and to date this year I was understanding when they made changes and they were accommodating as well to get me on a plane This time they changed my direct flight out of Memphis where I fly in early and fly back out the same day to adding lay overs that will not make it work for my meetings I have set up I can fly direct out of Nashville and they have made the changes in past multiple times last year and even last week when I flew with no additional fees Now since the flights are filling back up they want to charge to make the changes You would think they would take care of their loyal A List Preferred customers I guess I ll be looking at other carriers in the future to do my business with
Lemma: fly Southwest time month Covid last year date year understand make change accommodate well get plane time change direct flight Memphis fly early fly back day add lay over make work meeting set fly direct Nashville make change past multiple time last year even last week fly additional fee since flight fill back want charge make change would think would take care loyal List Preferred customer guess look carrier future business

reviews: I am a flyer on Southwest Perhaps not as much as most people but a number of flights per year I have a Southwest Rapid Rewards number I was flying to Portland from Ontario CA with a stop in Sacramento I was going to see my Mother in Salem her health had deteriorated rapidly after falling and breaking her hip She was sent home under hospice care with as little as a week to live I was determined to see her We landed in Sacramento which showed a hour layover I didn t want to delay and needed to get to Salem I checked Alaska and they had a flight that would arrive hours earlier I booked the flight and flew Portland After arriving in Portland drove to Salem to see my Mother That afternoon I received an email from Southwest informing me that the rest of my itinerary had been canceled and all payments forfeited I called and the support person said because I didn t cancel the flight and didn t inform them that my return trip was canceled and money forfeited I guess I forgot to read the fine print Because of this policy even though I felt it more important to get to my Mother s side I now didn t have a return flight I used to fly Southwest But with that uncaring insensitive response to stand by their rules I am no longer a Southwest flyer I will tell everyone I can my story and encourage them NOT to fly Southwest
Lemma: flyer Southwest Perhaps much people number flight per year Southwest Rapid Rewards number fly Portland Ontario CA stop Sacramento go see Mother Salem health deteriorate rapidly fall break hip send home hospice care little week live determine see land Sacramento show hour layover want delay need get Salem check Alaska flight would arrive hour earlier book flight fly Portland arrive Portland drive Salem see Mother afternoon receive email Southwest inform rest itinerary cancel payment forfeit call support person say cancel flight inform return trip cancel money forfeit guess forget read fine print policy even though felt important get Mother side return flight use fly Southwest uncaring insensitive response stand rule longer Southwest flyer tell everyone story encourage fly Southwest

reviews: We understand that we are living in unusual times but we don t need reminded with an overbearing personality about the mask mandate times during the flight briefing This was the foundation for our flight with a non personable stewardess that continually bumped their way up and down the aisles with no recourse to the paying customers We can understand of the crew having a rough day but not the entire crew If they are not happy and would like to act like robots then maybe they need a update on personal service Thank you for the many years of wonderful flights but unfortunately this was not one of them
Lemma: understand live unusual time need remind overbearing personality mask mandate time flight brief foundation flight non personable stewardess continually bump way aisle recourse pay customer understand crew rough day entire crew happy would like act like robot maybe need update personal service Thank many year wonderful flight unfortunately one

reviews: The ticket agent thought he needed to be funny by rallying a war cry from the audience as we started boarding Really Just take the tickets and shut up Then he was yelling into the microphone but his voice was high pitched and we could neither hear nor understand him If you want to be a comedian go downtown I expect professionalism at the airport The same onboard Just make the announcements and lets move on Sarcastic comments that aren t funny tend to make me wonder if the mechanics maintain the plane with a sense of humor as well If you announce that you will serving snacks serve the snacks We had a smooth flight so no reason to not serve what you said you were serving Maybe this is good during a daytime flight but we were flying from pm Just do your dang job
Lemma: ticket agent think need funny rally war cry audience start board Really take ticket shut yell microphone voice high pitch could neither hear understand want comedian go downtown expect professionalism airport onboard make announcement let move Sarcastic comment funny tend make wonder mechanic maintain plane sense humor well announce serve snack serve snack smooth flight reason serve say serve Maybe good daytime flight fly pm dang job

reviews: Flight attendant made the decision to not let my year old daughter use the bathroom all the while she was trying to hook up a car seat for the passengers in front of us which took almost minutes Another passenger was kind enough to give us a pull up that my daughter ended using because she couldn t hold the pee anymore She then had the nerve to tell me if I let you go everyone will want to go as well How appalling she lacked compassion in the decision she made and was trying to justify it
Lemma: Flight attendant make decision let year old daughter use bathroom try hook car seat passenger front us take almost minute Another passenger kind enough give us pull daughter end use hold pee anymore nerve tell let go everyone want go well appalling lack compassion decision make try justify

reviews: I ve previously written about four negative experiences that I had in a row flying on SWA I still had a small travel voucher that I didn t want to go to waste so I decided to use it My experience was average I suppose While I ve also written generally glowing reviews about SLC airport the SWA check in staff at SWA were blas Not rude not mean but also not remotely interested acting or helpful Just robotic I even get more helpful service on United relatively speaking and that says something Same for the SWA gate staff As for flight staff the flight attendants were a mix of very cheery and upbeat almost scarily so or yeah blas and even kind of bossy to and barking orders at passengers Not very helpful At least the FA I had to interact with for the most part was the cheery and upbeat one Once at Houston Hobby it took almost minutes to retrieve checked baggage from the carousel while this may be more of a Hobby airport personnel problem this is a problem that Southwest needs to address with airport management as the airport is an airline hub On the bright side the plane was almost spanking new and very clean The snack and Coke served were delicious The plane was only about half occupied though I don t know whether that has to do with bookings and demand or with the fact that we re still in a pandemic Social distancing was possible and enforced as a result Overall summary at least this flight experience on SWA was average rather than hostile so I guess that s an improvement for this airline I still wouldn t recommend as it will take many more average or above average flights with them to convince me that they re not actually the worst airline in the USA and I m far more willing to fly on Delta or Alaska normally anyway for domestic flights

reviews: Absolutely horrible experience I ve flown times since covid and you are the absolute worst Flight was delayed hours and not once did we see anyone cleaning There was no order to calling seats section A was called but some B and C were allowed through at any time for no special reason other than getting in line before their turn and I use the word line loosely more like a cluster stampede Masks were not enforced people coughing unmasked Tray on the back of the seat had sticky juicy all over it and the seat next to me trash in pouch obviously no cleaning We were served open plastic cups that were carried on a tray down the isle that anyone not wearing their mask wearing it below their nose were breathing all over Unboarding customers from the back were rude unbuckled before we even stopped and then jumping to the front of the plane instead of waiting your turn like it s always been Stewards should be enforcing order from chaos Plane was jam packed no space in between seats strangers sitting right next to you taking off their masks to eat and drink Keep in mind this also is a plane leaving Miami Florida rd highest covid state in the whole US

reviews: As a service member in the Army I ve never come last or after a group when it came to boarding At least people boarded before me and it was open seating I had to rush off the plane to catch my ride to the base before it took Every other airline prioritizes service members but not Southwest I just figured all airlines recognized military personnel a lot better especially if we are in uniform Nothing against the civilians but I feel like all we ve done for this country especially on an open seating flight we should be able to be the first ones of and the first ones on
Lemma: service member Army never come last group come board least people board open seating rush plane catch ride base take Every airline prioritizes service member Southwest figure airline recognize military personnel lot well especially uniform Nothing civilian feel like do country especially open seating flight able first one first one

reviews: For an airline that claims to put passenger service and safety first I experienced the exact opposite During my most recent travel first time since the pandemic I flew Delta Airlines from DSM to TPA with a few days in ATL in between On the way home I flew Southwest from TPA to DSM through DIA My two experiences could not have been more polarizing To begin my Southwest flight was changed three times before departure in both departure day and time as well as the connecting city Each flight I was on they were fully booked and I was sandwiched next to strangers on each leg of my journey I was treated rudely by gate agents and flight attendants as many of the passengers were confused and rather frustrated at both the boarding process as well as the capacity issues For an airline that claims to put their passengers first I will speak for everyone on each of our flights by saying we all felt like an afterthought I will not be flying Southwest Airlines again
Lemma: airline claim put passenger service safety first experience exact opposite recent travel first time since pandemic fly Delta Airlines DSM TPA day ATL way home fly Southwest TPA DSM DIA two experience could polarizing begin Southwest flight change three time departure departure day time well connect city flight fully book sandwich next stranger leg journey treat rudely gate agent flight attendant many passenger confuse rather frustrate boarding process well capacity issue airline claim put passenger first speak everyone flight say felt like afterthought fly Southwest Airlines

reviews: After reading recent negative reviews about Southwest it seems that our experience is one of many You wouldn t believe the way this flight crew was behaving Totally unprofessional They don t talk to you they talk at you If you have a question get ready for a snarky clipped answer They don t want to help you They just seek out reasons to scold you I realize that good help is hard to find but Southwest should look harder I try to give people the benefit of the doubt Maybe they re overworked Maybe they had a bad flight experience earlier that day But taking out your frustration on the passengers is no way to behave It s really not difficult to be nice
Lemma: read recent negative review Southwest seem experience one many believe way flight crew behave Totally unprofessional talk talk question get ready snarky clip answer want help seek reason scold realize good help hard find Southwest look hard try give people benefit doubt Maybe overwork Maybe bad flight experience earlier day take frustration passenger way behave really difficult nice

reviews: The flight with them went very well going to Florida but the staff we had going back to Las Vegas were horrible When we boarded our flight I asked flight attendants if I had time to go and change my month old daughters diaper before take off one flight attendant said that I would have time to as we had about minutes before take off and the other was not so happy about the idea and had an attitude My son is autistic and wearing a mask for him is uncomfortable and he cries hysterically if it s on the flight attendant that was not happy about me going to change my daughters diaper proceeded to tell me that my son needed to wear a mask I explained to her his situation and she gave me a dirty look and went to the front of the plane to tell her co worker I walked to the front of the plane as well to go and change my daughters diaper but that flight attendant and the other worker she was talking to were in the way she turned around and saw me and said she s right there the guy looked at me and told me I had to go back to my seat and change my daughters diaper when we were in the air I went back to my seat and my son was crying hysterically and screaming at the top of his lungs because of the mask I had put on him We take off and we re in the air and I see about people get up to use the bathroom As soon as I get up with my daughter thinking it was a good time to change her the flight attendant talks on the intercom and tells everyone to stay sitting until the seat belt lights are off I was so angry at this point because they never said anything up until I stood up to finally go and change her diaper These workers were rude and were not pleasant to my kids and I They were very disrespectful in the looks they were giving my kids and I and we re very passive aggressive towards my family and I Worst experience I have ever had Luckily the passengers around us had no complaints about my family and I and weren t giving us dirty looks They were understanding and trying to make us not feel so bad

reviews: The worst experience Please tell me how it makes any sense to have flights completely full during the covid pandemic Packing in people separate from their families with no regard to Covid rules Never again Southwest

reviews: Horrible packed in like sardines No regard to social distancing Very disappointing Separated from family and no regard to COVID I will think twice before flying Southwest again
Lemma: Horrible pack like sardine regard social distancing disappointing Separated family regard COVID think twice fly Southwest

reviews: This airline fails to meet domestic standards when it comes to safely handling passengers suitcases during transportation They will offer an unlimited number of suitcases for you to check in charge you exorbitant amounts of money for it but then damage your suitcases and belongings and loose part of it They would apologize at your arrival and offer you very bad quality emergency bags to contain the rest of your belongings so you can take it home and some cents voucher and keep your damaged property promising you that the airline will cover its cost if you go on some specific online platform that is difficult tp access with codes and other information and send them your ticket information pictures and tags but once you follow all of their nonsense various requests and even provide them with photos and receipts they will call you a liar deny responsibility and basically just tell you go ahead sue me Complete unprofessionalism and abuse of power and totally unethical ways of treating passengers They damaged and lost part of my belongings and it has been a month that they have been playing games and sending nonsense conflicting letters where they are basically insulting the passenger and demanding completely unrelated things They are offering free first suitcases for a reason
Lemma: airline fail meet domestic standard come safely handle passenger suitcase transportation offer unlimited number suitcase check charge exorbitant amount money damage suitcase belonging loose part would apologize arrival offer bad quality emergency bag contain rest belonging take home cent voucher keep damaged property promising airline cover cost go specific online platform difficult tp access code information send ticket information picture tag follow nonsense various request even provide photo receipt call liar deny responsibility basically tell go ahead sue Complete unprofessionalism abuse power totally unethical way treat passenger damage lose part belonging month play game send nonsense conflict letter basically insult passenger demand completely unrelated thing offer free first suitcase reason

reviews: Was planning on flying from Denver to Austin Texas Flight to Austin was canceled so I ended up going to Salt Lake City instead Southwest Airlines sent my luggage to Las Vegas Phoenix and Dallas Am now stuck in Salt Lake City without luggage Have spoken with different customer services reps in Vegas Phoenix and Salt Lake This is the biggest waste of my time do yourself a favor and fly with someone who gives a damn and takes pride in their work
Lemma: plan fly Denver Austin Texas Flight Austin cancel end go Salt Lake City instead Southwest Airlines send luggage Las Vegas Phoenix Dallas stick Salt Lake City without luggage speak different customer service reps Vegas Phoenix Salt Lake big waste time favor fly someone give damn take pride work

reviews: I was turned away at the gate due to my oversized bag A bag I ve flown with on many other airlines They refused to consider how much they were inconveniencing me I had to rebook through another airline the next day at top dollar and I was given a travel voucher instead of a refund A travel voucher that will do me no good because I don t fly without that bag
Lemma: turn away gate due oversized bag bag fly many airline refuse consider much inconvenience rebook another airline next day top dollar give travel voucher instead refund travel voucher good fly without bag

reviews: Worst trip ever I paid extra for business it s first come first serve They won t give me credit for false advertisement I paid extra for accommodations that didn t exist They gave me a voucher for a free alcoholic beverage that they don t serve no alcoholic on board and they did not enforce the mask policy The woman to my left and right were unmasked the entire flight Have pictures to prove it It s the greyhound of airlines Horrible
Lemma: Worst trip ever pay extra business first come first serve give credit false advertisement pay extra accommodation exist give voucher free alcoholic beverage serve alcoholic board enforce mask policy woman left right unmask entire flight picture prove greyhound airline Horrible

reviews: This review is to sing the praises of your customer service representative Shundalynn I called Wednesday morning around to schedule a trip and inquire about the flight I had to cancel due to Covid complications From the beginning of our call Shundalynn was very pleasant I was concerned about using the money from my cancelled flight to book the new one Shundalynn went through the process with me I was delighted because things are sometimes confusing for me at my age she was so kind and helpful Southwest is lucky to have Shundalynn as a representative I have flown Southwest many times I have never been disappointed with a flight or the great customer service Keep up the good work
Lemma: review sing praise customer service representative Shundalynn call Wednesday morning around schedule trip inquire flight cancel due Covid complication beginning call Shundalynn pleasant concern use money cancelled flight book new one Shundalynn go process delight thing sometimes confuse age kind helpful Southwest lucky Shundalynn representative fly Southwest many time never disappoint flight great customer service Keep good work

reviews: Our flight was to board at a m and the counter to check in bags did not open until a m There was a line of people to check in We had to rush through security and barely had time to go to the restroom and grab a water for the plane Horrible way to start our day We will not fly with Southwest again The service has really gone downhill
Lemma: flight board counter check bag open line people check rush security barely time go restroom grab water plane Horrible way start day fly Southwest service really go downhill

reviews: Southwest Airlines took my money for a flight to Costa Rica then Southwest stopped flying there and they won t refund my money They told me I could reschedule but had to fly within a year They still haven t started flying there and they told me I will just lose my They blamed it on Costa Rica but that is a lie since other US Airlines are flying there Southwest Airlines just flat out stole over a thousand dollars from me Whatever you do do not book with Southwest Airlines They are literally high class thieves
Lemma: Southwest Airlines take money flight Costa Rica Southwest stop fly refund money tell could reschedule fly within year still start fly tell lose blame Costa Rica lie since US Airlines fly Southwest Airlines flat stole thousand dollar Whatever book Southwest Airlines literally high class thief

reviews: Wifi didn t work at all Movies stopped and started and were impossible to use Flight was full No warning No option to change flights No safety at all No spacing at all People with masks down Awful Very unsafe
Lemma: Wifi work Movies stop start impossible use Flight full warning option change flight safety space People mask Awful unsafe

reviews: My flight was supposed to be from to and they rescheduled it times The last time they canceled my flight at pm at night the day before travel We literally moved our entire schedule around to fly at and now at the last minute we have to scram to get to the airport hours early Not to mention they scheduled a hour layover that we would have never booked In addition due to their idiotic no assigned seating policy I checked in exactly hours before my checkin time and was lucky enough to get in boarding group A However on the rescheduled ticket they put my husband and I in group C What s the point of me waking up to check in on time I will never fly this airline again
Lemma: flight suppose reschedule time last time cancel flight pm night day travel literally move entire schedule around fly last minute scram get airport hour early mention schedule hour layover would never book addition due idiotic assigned seating policy check exactly hour checkin time lucky enough get board group However reschedule ticket put husband group C point wake check time never fly airline

reviews: Had to land at airports along the way All was fine in regards to arrival and departure times Served snacks on of the flights Snacks consisted of dry hard chocolate chip brittle and a bag of dry hard pretzels and another mystery ingredient All was well until the plane from Las Vegas to Atlanta filled up Then it became people per row At that point there was no room to move much and in no time at all my back was killing me from being so uncomfortable The seats would not recline and felt extremely cramped The cabin was much too narrow and should never have had per row seating This was my first and last time flying with Southwest
Lemma: land airport along way fine regard arrival departure time Served snack flight Snacks consist dry hard chocolate chip brittle bag dry hard pretzel another mystery ingredient well plane Las Vegas Atlanta fill become people per row point room move much time back kill uncomfortable seat would recline felt extremely cramp cabin much narrow never per row seating first last time fly Southwest

reviews: I guess my flight was ok I got on six different flights of them the staff was awesome and the other one the staff was annoying and unnecessarily controlling I was really disappointed that I was informed late that my returning flight was canceled after I already checked out of my hotel and was on my way to return my car They did not offer any help to people that they stranded such as a room voucher or a ride to the airport totally unfair My luggage that I purchased days before my flight I have the receipt looked as if it had been dragged on it s side instead of rolled which was very easy to do After getting home I felt uneasy about my trip If I feel like going cheap and taking chances with my situation I ll use them again
Lemma: guess flight ok get six different flight staff awesome one staff annoy unnecessarily control really disappointed inform late return flight cancel already check hotel way return car offer help people strand room voucher ride airport totally unfair luggage purchase day flight receipt look drag side instead rolled easy get home felt uneasy trip feel like go cheap take chance situation use

reviews: Flight Southwest Airlines January scheduled to depart Denver airport at PM The flight did take off and land safely at the destination BWI airport My checked bag arrived as it should There is nothing else I have to write that is a positive comment about the way this flight was handled First of all many of the passengers were not wearing their masks as required in the waiting area before boarding the flight Some of the same passengers at least by my count boarded the plane without their masks covering their mouths and noses They walked in this manner by the Southwest flight attendants and were not stopped or directed to comply with the rules A lady and an Asian man seated themselves in seats b and c They began taking about liberty and their freedoms and would not wear their masks Seats d e and f had passengers that would not wear their masks properly and they began discussing liberty and freedom loudly The spoke to a passenger nearby that indicated they should comply with the rules since we have a global pandemic Those passengers commented that their is no pandemic and the new media has promoted a hoax All of the sickness is a hoax including the media the drug companies and the liberal media It is difficult for a crew to control morons The crew did have several opportunities to not allow these individuals on the plane to begin with If they will not comply in the boarding area then they must not be allowed to board Other passengers and I purchased our tickets to fly based upon the contract and trust that Southwest would not allow passengers on the plane if they would not comply For the first minutes the Captain and the First Officer did not turn on condition air to save Southwest money Once security removed the lady that was ranting denigrating the flight attendants and other passengers the Captain and First Officer did get the air conditioning going The flight remained at gate C for another hour as the crew sorted the mess Several passengers never wore their masks properly I do not want to get COVID and you do not either Southwest executives must believe times are normal and have forgotten the raging pandemic The boarding process jammed people next to each other in the name of loading quickly The lineup of passengers in the aisle was jammed with many passengers in contact with each other The paln had few empty seats Wake up airline executives you have lost me as a customer until the pandemic is over I do not recommend flying any commercial fight until the airline executives from ever airline realize they must take a loss for the time and hold planes to a capacity until the pandemic is over Passenger safety should be the most important goal of any airline Getting sick with the possibility of death from the illness is a definite threat If you can charter a plane or have your own plane these issues will not affect you Commoners like me will drive of find another way to get safely to any destination I must go to for work Otherwise I am following the Governor s orders and minimizing any travel and recommend that to everyone There is no reason not to wear a mask I tried Southwest and you failed me I would like to think I can fly safely but after this flight I will not be flying on any airline for a long time I felt as if I was in jail Adapt Southwest you must keep us safe

reviews: On January rd I arrived to ORF with checked bags a book bag personal item and early bird seating We were off to Nashville around with dense fog noted Soon minutes after takeoff it seemed like we were not ascending as usual The cabin became unusually hot and there was an awful plastic metal smell with some vibrations that I thought was just turbulence The captain came overhead to inform us we had struck a flock of birds and we were returning to Norfolk to service the engine The next minutes were terrifying as we glided back down to safety and I applaud the flight crew for returning us safely however the next few events following this incident is where I have some issues with southwest I have always enjoyed flying with southwest airlines and I am an easy customer to please I frequently travel and understand that there are some circumstances that flight crews and airport personnel can not control However I found the way that Southwest dealt with the situation was despicable and disrespectful A simple phone call to follow up after a terrifying incident would have sufficed However I want to acknowledge how great the employees were at the gate dealing with the rescheduling issue and the flight crew unless they failed to report it We all exited the plane and were asked to wait in the terminal Everyone was confused and no one was sharing information and there was only person to help direct all of us on what to do next she was awesome thus the star ground rating The flight was canceled and I was pleased that SW attempted to reschedule me to get to my final destination to MKE Nashville was my connection I ended up asking to change the one they rescheduled Orf to orlando to MKE and flew directly to Chicago and drove up to Mke from there So never heard word from southwest about the incident do I get money back I know that direct to Chicago was cheaper And I didn t get my early bird status I checked the FAA bird strike database not even reported I hope they actually inspected serviced that airbus The next day I was happy because I called and asked where my checked bags were and the very helpful lady informed me that she would make sure they made it to MKE from Nashville I m glad those people who waited for that rescheduled flight got to go and SW called me when my bags were ready to be picked up But all in all I am super salty that our plane hit birds and had to turn around and was not once addressed by the airline No We are sorry you experienced that no flight coupon for my early bird I mean if I wanted to be treated that way they should at least make us sign a safety waiver

reviews: Tickets were cheap and quality followed My initial pm flight time was delayed until pm gate was changed or times and no real explanation given My Connection would have been missed so they directed me which I originally appreciated until I realized it would be another hours of waiting As I sit I am now waiting another hours due to an other delay on their end I would originally have been home at pm but now it appears I wont be home until am Very unpleasant experience and I will not be flying Southwest again
Lemma: Tickets cheap quality follow initial pm flight time delay pm gate change time real explanation give Connection would miss direct originally appreciate realize would another hour wait sit wait another hour due delay end would originally home pm appear wont home unpleasant experience fly Southwest

reviews: Long wait times to board was supposed to leave at didn t get out until from the gate then sat on the runway for m at midway with no information from the pilot or crew Very lame customer experience and no communication SW was at one time great they are at their worst now Very regretful for choosing this airline from Midway a complete disaster here in Chi Been on the plane for hr and no one is telling us what is going on
