reviews: My son and I had the greatest pleasure of flying with Southwest Airlines on flight departing Philadelphia to go back to Atlanta My travel date was The flight attendants were great however my greatest shout out must go to the pilots I traveled with my son has autism and this was his second time flying since he was a baby He did great going to Philadelphia Both flights going returning were great smooth rides As we were leaving the plane my son stood looking into the cockpit and the pilots were so nice to him allowing him to look and even answer questions He even took a picture They did not know he was autistic all they saw was a curious little boy that wanted to see the section of the plane that has all the controls Thank you to the pilots and the gentleman that was with them You truly made our flight the above and beyond experience You showed such great hospitality and kindness to him giving hope that we still have wonderful people that live in America even if their skin color is different from yours Kudos to you Southwest for providing exceptional service The Southwest staff was a pleasure from welcoming the passengers onboard to the delightful and amusing at they announced the safety protocols One passenger ask the staff member while boarding was his seat first class and the gentleman replied all our seats are first class and the passenger smiled Thank you Southwest for your Services
Lemma: son great pleasure fly Southwest Airlines flight depart Philadelphia go back Atlanta travel date flight attendant great however great shout must go pilot travel son autism second time fly since baby great go Philadelphia flight go return great smooth ride leave plane son stand look cockpit pilot nice allow look even answer question even take picture know autistic saw curious little boy want see section plane control Thank pilot gentleman truly make flight beyond experience show great hospitality kindness give hope still wonderful people live America even skin color different Kudos Southwest provide exceptional service Southwest staff pleasure welcome passenger onboard delightful amuse announce safety protocols One passenger ask staff member board seat first class gentleman reply seat first class passenger smile Thank Southwest Services

reviews: On my first and connection flight they were asking people to wear masks over their nose I fall asleep on my connecting flight from Baltimore to Maryland Wake up from a sleep to a flight attendant asking me for my ID I had no idea what was going on days later they send me an email banning me from their flights and canceling my return flight I had not one warning the whole time I had to book a whole other flight with delta just to make it back home for work I will never ever fly with Southwest again They have lost a long time customer
Lemma: first connection flight ask people wear mask nose fall asleep connect flight Baltimore Maryland Wake sleep flight attendant ask ID idea go day later send email ban flight cancel return flight one warn whole time book whole flight delta make back home work never ever fly Southwest lose long time customer

reviews: My husband and I just few SouthWest airlines over Thanksgiving We were both so impressed with the staff in all areas They were fun professional and made traveling during a challenging season a great experience They told jokes on all of our flights and also kindly reinforced the use of masks and social distancing I cannot say enough positive things about our flights Thank you Southwest for a great travel experience in a season where it is very hard to travel
Lemma: husband SouthWest airline Thanksgiving impressed staff area fun professional make travel challenging season great experience tell joke flight also kindly reinforce use mask social distancing say enough positive thing flight Thank Southwest great travel experience season hard travel

reviews: full when the COVID virus is worse than ever My wife and I are in our late s and we did not know the center seats would not be empty like it was flying to Phoenix going home tonight is extremely uncomfortable and we are very worried that we will get sick I can t believe SW would endanger passengers this way bound to lead to massive lawsuits If we get sick we will add to the lawsuits for sure Long flight home
Lemma: full COVID virus bad ever wife late know center seat would empty like fly Phoenix go home tonight extremely uncomfortable worried get sick believe SW would endanger passenger way bound lead massive lawsuit get sick add lawsuit sure Long flight home

reviews: I must share my recent experience I love flying Southwest the employees are fun and accommodating but this year which has been a tough year for the whole world and to top it off as an active military family we were recently put on orders to move out of state making this year even more emotional and scary having to travel Well while flying out of Ontario CA On my husband son and I were waiting to board and as usual Southwest has always treated military greatly so we wait for A listers and group A to board usually small children and active duty is called next to board but we understand that doesn t happen every time everywhere well my husband approached the operations employee and kindly in a soft low tone asked do you allow military to board early here Well a simple sorry sir no would of sufficed but he just gave the most annoyed attitude tone and said No we don t and you can go read online if you want he didn t even allow my husband to finish his sentence and he was extremely rude Wait You think that s all oh no we waited for our group and number to walk up and he looked at my husband and said wait let me check that it really is your turn he didn t want to let us on the plane until he made sure he verified all three of our tickets as if we were too incompetent to read the big letter and number on the boarding pass I could feel and sense his anger and annoyed mood towards us with just his stare I m not one to give reviews much but this really bothered my heart and mind A smile and a positive attitude can make a huge difference in a person but not bigger than a negative attitude and a frown Flight out of Ontario I will forever remember your rudeness and lack of care toward the military member my husband that has volunteered to serve so that your family doesn t have to be drafted so that all that freedom you have is possible and so that your personal family can feel safe We do not expect special privileges but we do expect common respect and good customer service as anyone should for choosing Southwest Airlines

reviews: At the point of boarding the plane I was verbally accosted by the gate agent who rudely embarrassed me by loudly stating I had too many carry on items to board the plane and that I needed to go over there and check something I politely tried to tell the woman that I had a bag with food for the flight and a fleece jacket in it Didn t matter I was accused of having a fanny pack when I was wearing a waist belt in lieu of carrying a purse I had a mini backpack with chargers that per Southwest are not supposed to be checked in baggage and a small suitcase I was not given an opportunity to combine anything I do not consider a waist belt which I was wearing and is similar to a money belt or passport belt to be a carry on item It takes up no more space on my body than a belt on my pants I never remove the waist belt and it does not impede sitting in a single seat or fastening my seatbelt I do not consider food that I was going to eat in flight especially as I was taking an antibiotic at that time for a GI condition to be a carry on item There were many many other passengers who were carrying food on the plane in addition to other carry on items I have never heard of a coat jacket being considered as a carry on item When I left Phoenix it was almost degrees When I arrived in Detroit hours later the temperature was about To say a jacket coat was necessary is an understatement The gate agent was incredibly and unnecessarily rude I was embarrassed unnecessarily in front of other passengers waiting to board I have GI issues and cannot eat anything that might have been served in flight Taking my own food on a hour flight did not seem unreasonable The mini backpack I had is about the size of an ordinary shoe box Had I been given the chance I would have combined items except the waist belt but I was denied that opportunity I submitted a complaint to Southwest post flight and received an email that in essence blamed me for having so many carry on items quoted a number of Southwest policies on baggage as if I do not know how to read and more importantly failed to provide what I consider to be a sincere apology or any language about the gate agent receiving any kind of coaching reprimand or training to correct her inappropriate behavior In other words it was all my fault I am not ok with that I have flown Southwest many times in the past and never had this kind of experience I hope to never fly Southwest again Public humiliation is uncalled for period Not being given a chance to fix my mistake and being ordered around rudely and loudly like a bad child is uncalled for And to make matters worse after we boarded the plane we then sat in line with planes ahead of us and took off minutes late Wow

reviews: Second time flying since the pandemic The first time was with Delta which was so impressive and their concern for customer safety was evident Not so much with Southwest Proper mask wearing was not enforced no disinfecting wipes were provided all attendants did not wear gloves and distancing was not observed at all when leaving the plane
Lemma: Second time fly since pandemic first time Delta impressive concern customer safety evident much Southwest Proper mask wearing enforce disinfect wipe provide attendant wear glove distancing observe leave plane

reviews: I have always flown SW and had pretty good luck with them until recently I had a credit that was about to expire I went to book a flight online and my credit would not go through and I was told to call After calling they had to look into something I didn t get a call back for over weeks and I was calling them everyday By then my credit was expired and they said they only thing they could do was give me the credit back minus I talked to about different people all with awful customer service This is not ok especially during such hard times I will never be flying with this awful company again
Lemma: always fly SW pretty good luck recently credit expire go book flight online credit would go tell call call look something get call back week call everyday credit expire say thing could give credit back minus talk different people awful customer service ok especially hard time never fly awful company

reviews: Had to cancel my flight in October and was given credit in my travel funds This credit was good for months and had to be used for flights made by October Because of the COVID pandemic and because I and my spouse belong to the higher risk group older than and are having some other health related issues at this time we cannot take a chance to fly until it s save for us Unfortunately Southwest has not modified its month expiration policy due to COVID as I would reasonably expect I called their Rapid Rewards and Customer Relationship asking to give us extension but Sorry it s our policy was the only answer I got so we have lost our credit
Lemma: cancel flight October give credit travel fund credit good month use flight make October COVID pandemic spouse belong high risk group old health relate issue time take chance fly save us Unfortunately Southwest modify month expiration policy due COVID would reasonably expect call Rapid Rewards Customer Relationship ask give us extension Sorry policy answer get lose credit

reviews: My Dad bought my ticket for October th My Mom had to go into the hospital on October th I called to move up my departure date A reservations representative was able to get my ticket for Thursday October th He then called me back saying that he could send me even a day earlier Wednesday October th He made sure emails were received and confirmed He was very professional showed human empathy and interest in my Moms emergency situation My elderly parents are so grateful and appreciative of his kindness
Lemma: Dad buy ticket October th Mom go hospital October th call move departure date reservation representative able get ticket Thursday October th call back say could send even day earlier Wednesday October th make sure email receive confirm professional show human empathy interest Moms emergency situation elderly parent grateful appreciative kindness

reviews: I wanted to acknowledge an experience from a excellent customer service representative at Southwest Airlines On October I spoke with customer service representatives at approximately pm until pm and at that time spoke to three representatives who were asked to assist me in rebooking using our Southwest credit from the beginning of the pandemic All three representatives told me that I had different amounts of credit remaining I had The first rep assisted us in booking our flight but them told us we would have to pay more We eventually got hung up on before we could resolve the issue The next rep told us we had Again we somehow were disconnected from that call as well We spoke to the last rep of the evening and he again said that we had I asked if there was a part of our trip that was already booked that we did not received email confirmation He said no After going round and round with him we again got disconnected Now Oct I spoke with another rep She researched our situation which no other agent could do and realized that was in fact correct and had credit She was patient apologized for the other agents and my experience and took care of the situation with minutes We also found out that the first agent sent my confirmation to the wrong email even though it has been on our records She had set it up as two transactions and told me that since it was already booked there would be two confirmation emails coming I wanted to let Southwest Airlines know that this rep talked me down She listened to me ramble about the three other reps

reviews: I have been sitting next to my gate for the past hour and have had the experience of witnessing a flight attendant with a black Supreme mask on be extremely helpful to absolutely everyone that has come up to her It has been so fun to see everyone that is helped walk away her with a smile under their mask of course on their face due to her friendliness and willingness to support the Southwest customers here She has excellent customer service and my experience of her work ethic alone is enough to make me want to fly Southwest again
Lemma: sit next gate past hour experience witness flight attendant black Supreme mask extremely helpful absolutely everyone come fun see everyone help walk away smile mask course face due friendliness willingness support Southwest customer excellent customer service experience work ethic alone enough make want fly Southwest

reviews: I booked my flight in October of to go and visit my year old mother in Las Vegas At the time they stated nobody would be sitting in the middle seats and now they send me an email stating that they are going to sell the middle seats The alternative they are giving is to get your money back really I guess I don t want to see my mom over the holidays I have never done anything but boasted on how good an airline Southwest is but this is ridiculous They do not care about the safety of their passengers or their employees Horrible service

reviews: Southwest says they are are customer focused But I told them I needed to change my ticket to an earlier flight because of an emergency and they politely told me I need to purchase a new tickets that cost twice as much They don t have the review feature turned on so I can t leave a review We are in a pandemic These airlines want to be bailed out by the federal government our money but they don t have a heart for the people
Lemma: Southwest say customer focus tell need change ticket early flight emergency politely tell need purchase new ticket cost twice much review feature turn leave review pandemic airline want bail federal government money heart people

reviews: We made reservation to fly with Southwest to Tennessee last year for a wedding We were not able to go I called to get a refund but they said they could not give us a refund but instead gave us credit that would expire within a year I called them to extended the credit We are first responders and could not take vacation during this pandemic As a first responder it is not that easy to take a vacation then quarantine for days This was explained to the person I spoke with The credit was extended but they deducted dollars just because its policy Their was no accommodation given to us Shame on Southwest for benefitting off of their customers during these rough times

reviews: Last week my husband and I flew Southwest to Orlando Flight was good until the end The flight attendant had the supervisors call the cops on us There was cops supervisors waiting for us in the gate when you walk off the plane Obviously face masks are required during the flight unless you were eating or drinking During the flight my husband fell asleep and I put my earbuds in and started drawing He slept with a neck pillow and his face mask would catch on the pillow and slightly fall lower than his nose The flight attendant woke him up a couple times and asked him to pull it back up He apologized and went back to sleep As far me I went into my purse to grab mints and a protein bar I pulled my face mask down to put the mint in my mouth The flight attendant snapped and told me to put my mask back on I said I was eating She said it s only a mint and if this is going to be an issue I ll call the supervisor And stormed off We land and get off the plane only to be greeted by the cops The cops questioned us on what happened on the flight The cop told us that face to face conflict confrontation was reported from the flight attendant and that s why they were called The supervisor looked up our return flight and revoked them All over sleeping and eating a mint The flight attendant might have had a bad day but it s not enough justification to go out of your way to wreck our trip Her behavior is unacceptable I understand you want to keep everyone safe But you re taking it too far Not once did we raise our voice or stand up and cause issues Revoking our tickets over something this small is unbelievable If it s that big of deal to eat on the flight then stop serving water and snacks Southwest I want to truly thank you from the bottom of my heart for blowing things out of context and wrecking our trip We cannot thank you enough for your unbelievable customer service

Lemma: Southwest amazing company represent compassion customer issue complete refund sick make flight company would choose greed right thing Southwest choose different never bad experience Southwest never fly anyone else choose represent company Thank Southwest

reviews: I understand that face coverings are required while in flight unless you re continuing to eat and drink however I think that Southwest needs to reconsider the type of face coverings they have now banned all masks that have ventilation and they also banned bandanas as a face covering as well They said that you are able to wear a face shield but you still have to wear the mask under that as well I think that is wrong and they need to reconsider all the options as for face coverings because if all of the stores have no issue with the face shields neither should they Overall great staff and great flight

reviews: First and last time flying Southwest Likely the worst airline I have flown to date From check in to leaving the terminal it was a terrible experience The kiosks were not working and the customer service woman was incredibly rude and not willing to help This first come first serve seating is absurd The flight attendants looked like they couldn t be bothered and were busy chatting I got chastised for taking my year old to the bathroom when the seatbelt sign was on for those who have children a child they age can t hold it when they have to go I know all airlines have to impose a mask rule during COVID but only allowing certain kinds of masks is outrageous What is even more infuriating is the way they treat children and the parents when they can t won t wear a mask One woman was not let on the flight because her year old wouldn t wear a mask How can any year old be expected to wear a mask In my opinion this is overboard I fly several times a month and this is the only airline that treats people this poorly I never thought I would say it but I would fly Spirit any day over Southwest

reviews: Southwest has now stated that they do not have to notify you of a change in flight status Booked a flight July for Sept SW changed the flight Aug without notifying anyone Found out hours before leaving that flight was changed and now I will miss the wedding due to the change They could put me on Delta and I would make it in time but they are not willing to do so Why should I have to pay times as much because they did not notify anyone anyone this was verified by their agent They refer me to contract of carriage page para stating that they have the right to change flights and will notify as soon as possible Well they had from Aug to Sept to notify me yet the only way I found out was Sept when I went to pre board Their response was oh too bad that we did not notify anyone of the change They should have put me on the Delta flight at their expense They had days in which they could have notified people of the change Will never fly Southwest again
Lemma: Southwest state notify change flight status Booked flight July Sept SW change flight Aug without notify anyone Found hour leave flight change miss wedding due change could put Delta would make time willing pay time much notify anyone anyone verify agent refer contract carriage page para state right change flight notify soon possible Well Aug Sept notify yet way find Sept go pre board response oh bad notify anyone change put Delta flight expense day could notify people change never fly Southwest

reviews: I got a notification e mail the day before my return flight that my flight was cancelled I called the airline and it was hard to understand the agen during the full phone call When I repeatedly asked why my flight was cancelled the only reason he could drum up was that my flight was not ticketed What in the hell is that supposed to mean I payed for a higher class ticket so that wouldn t happen Then he tells me that I m getting a refund for my return flight Let s say it s But then he sets me up with a new flight on the same planned day with a different airline that costs let s say How does this make sense This not only is the last time I fly with Southwest but it s the last time I fly PERIOD I ll take a train or rent a car

reviews: The absolute worst experience I have flown with SW about times since the COVID disrupted our world This day was humiliating to say the least Once onboard I had my face mask on as requested I had lowered the mask below my nose while my mouth was still covered to take a couple of deep breaths before take off The female flight attendant was walking past and immediately reprimanded me I quietly tried to explain what I was doing Her response was that of a nazi ruler saying this wasn t acceptable During the flight it was time to take my prescription so I ate a snack so I wouldn t take the medicine on an empty stomach and then took a drink of water The entire time the attendant was just staring me down Once we arrived HOU and I stepped off the plane the neo nazi was standing there and pointed me out to her manager They then said obviously my health needs wouldn t be acceptable to fly with them and denied me to make my connecting flight leaving me stranded miles from home
Lemma: absolute bad experience fly SW time since COVID disrupt world day humiliate say least onboard face mask request lower mask nose mouth still cover take couple deep breath take female flight attendant walk past immediately reprimand quietly try explain response nazi ruler say acceptable flight time take prescription eat snack take medicine empty stomach take drink water entire time attendant star arrive HOU step plane neo nazi stand point manager say obviously health need acceptable fly deny make connect flight leave stranded mile home

reviews: I was traveling from Las Vegas to Louisville on flight on Aug While in the waiting room waiting to hear my number I noticed the two Pilots of this flight come out and talk with the wheelchair customers after which they then pushed their wheelchair onto the plane I was never so touched by what these Two Pilots did I have never seen this before and will never forget it Thanks to Southwest for another reason I only fly this airline
Lemma: travel Las Vegas Louisville flight Aug wait room wait hear number notice two Pilots flight come talk wheelchair customer push wheelchair onto plane never touch Two Pilots never see never forget Thanks Southwest another reason fly airline

reviews: What happens when your luggage doesn t make your connecting flight on southwest airlines I was aware my luggage may come in on a later flight and that as confirmed by Louis from baggage claim I spoke in person to Louis and he called to confirm my bag was in flight to Tampa and would arrive on the pm flight from Memphis and that I would get a call when it arrived According to him my bag would be held in the baggage claim office for me to pick up I received a call around pm that they didn t have my bag yet and would call me when it came in The following mid afternoon I received a call that my bag was thought to have been stolen off the baggage belt Knowing my luggage would be there at pm is it to much to ask that it be secured in the baggage claim area The associates failed to do so I received an email that Southwest took no responsibility for my loss and I might file a claim with a secondary insurance if I have one Thanks for the advice The value of my Pro travel bag and contents is more than Of which it looks like I am plain out of luck Through no fault of my own my free checked bag is ending up costing me over three grand Southwest sent me an email stating they take no responsibility for my loss Well failure to secure and protect my belongings makes them totally responsible If my bag was in the office it couldn t have been stolen Sorry for trusting a company that obviously doesn t really care about its customers

reviews: Apparently Southwest s new slogan is If you don t comply you do not fly Forget Welcome Aboard or the Somebody Up There Who Loves You Southwest staff have always been considerate pleasant and hospitable No more Now they are mask enforcers thoughtfulness is over Yes we need to wear masks We get it but there is a way to manage it Yelling at your paying passengers and repeating If you don t comply you do not fly fifty times is not it There is a kinder way to enforce the mask rule Customers are not the enemy We are the people showing up helping Southwest stay in business Flying is difficult enough now Southwest used to be the friendly airlines with people who liked their jobs and their passengers No more
Lemma: Apparently Southwest new slogan comply fly Forget Welcome Aboard Somebody Loves Southwest staff always considerate pleasant hospitable mask enforcer thoughtfulness Yes need wear mask get way manage Yelling pay passenger repeat comply fly fifty time kind way enforce mask rule Customers enemy people show help Southwest stay business Flying difficult enough Southwest use friendly airline people like job passenger

reviews: This is a review of Southwest customer service I had to have a representative book my husband s return flight after a three week battle over Rapid Rewards points I d purchased That battle was more than enough multiple calls points never showing up had to purchase the points again I wasn t able to book the flight myself because of the points situation so I called in I told the representative I needed to book my husband on my flight The itineraries were related and my flight was in the system She said she put him on my flight She did not When I opened the email about an hour later I realized it was the wrong flight I tried to call they close at pm AZ time I called the next morning thinking it was very annoying to have to call again but that they would change it To my surprise I was told they were not going to change it and I could pay the difference to switch him to my flight A difference on a flight They are insistent that they will do nothing even though it is abundantly clear that the representative blatantly booked the wrong flight They do admit she booked the wrong flight and never told me which flight she booked but it was my fault for not checking Stupid on my part but I didn t realize I needed to check the work of a representative in the highest customer service department of the airline It is shameful and disgusting and I m going to have to cancel my trip It has been horrible service on top of horrible service that has gone on for almost a month Not sure I ll ever fly Southwest again which is a shame because it used to be my favorite airline
Lemma: review Southwest customer service representative book husband return flight three week battle Rapid Rewards point purchase battle enough multiple call point never show purchase point able book flight point situation call tell representative need book husband flight itinerary relate flight system say put flight open email hour later realize wrong flight try call close pm AZ time call next morning think annoy call would change surprise tell go change could pay difference switch flight difference flight insistent nothing even though abundantly clear representative blatantly book wrong flight admit book wrong flight never tell flight book fault check Stupid part realize need check work representative high customer service department airline shameful disgust go cancel trip horrible service top horrible service go almost month sure ever fly Southwest shame use favorite airline

reviews: Everyone has to wear a mask So a woman sat in my row with an empty seat in between She took her mask off the whole flight Not one stewardess said one word They looked straight at her I feel they jeopardized everyone on the flight especially me I was going to see my elderly mother I would hate to pass anything to her while I am visiting I am very disappointed in Southwest
Lemma: Everyone wear mask woman sat row empty seat take mask whole flight one stewardess say one word look straight feel jeopardize everyone flight especially go see elderly mother would hate pass anything visit disappointed Southwest

reviews: Today on Flight at am a Southwest pilot never revealed his name went above and beyond for a year old who was extremely terrified flying the first time by herself yes she thought she was brave enough to do it The crew tried to calm her and she continuously screamed that she wanted to go home One flight attendant held her hand everyone tried to calm her and the pilot apparently let her into the cockpit prior to taxi away to hopefully ease her fears She eventually calmed down The same pilot then proceeded to escort her off the plane bought her breakfast from Chick fil A and took her to her next gate I can t even begin to express the gratitude I would write a letter of appreciation to the CEO if I knew who he was I spoke with him while I was on facetime with her Although I m sure that the crew was probably at the brink of putting her off the plane they comforted her and completed their flight I love Southwest always have
Lemma: Today Flight Southwest pilot never reveal name go beyond year old extremely terrified fly first time yes think brave enough crew try calm continuously scream want go home One flight attendant hold hand everyone try calm pilot apparently let cockpit prior taxi away hopefully ease fear eventually calm pilot proceed escort plane buy breakfast Chick fil take next gate even begin express gratitude would write letter appreciation CEO know speak facetime Although sure crew probably brink put plane comfort complete flight love Southwest always

reviews: We went to the airport to pick up a minor from a flight from Atlanta and we were talking about the fact that we wanted to make a sign to welcome my grandson home and the agent informed me that she had some construction paper and a marker and let us pick and make our signs since she wasn t busy and there were no lines We thought it was a really nice gesture on her behalf that she was able and willing to help us out

reviews: Received a Luv voucher that resulted from a six plus hour flight delay Have tried multiple times to use this voucher only to have events cancelled because of the current pandemic In anything resembling normal times I would have redeemed this voucher long ago However there is nothing normal about covid and no end in sight at this point Southwest absolutely refuses to extend the expiration date on this voucher We lost an entire day of vacation because of the original lengthy flight delay was the least Southwest could do in response would have brought them tremendous good will and a positive review Instead a dismissive and obnoxious customer service rep has created a disgruntled customer and negative reviews on multiple social media platforms Guess they believe saving bucks is worth getting called out for bad service

reviews: Worst experience ever My mom s flight was cancelled in May because of COVID We were told that we could not get a refund even though we were all in limbo We accepted a rescheduled flight different times because the travel restrictions for this inadequate airline was not lifted My mom had to book through another airline to get home before her visa expired I called in June and spoke with a rep who saw our plight and offered a refund within days Its been months and i call back only to find out that the request has been cancelled because my mom s flight has been cancelled and rebooked too many times She didnt do that you guys did after denying her a refund Worst ever

reviews: So disappointed We always have been loyal to Southwest Even when people would make fun of us for flying them We loved flying with them until they completely dismantled my stroller and did not take one ounce of responsibility Did not offer to fix it Their policy is obviously in place because they cannot do the right thing I get it things happen But offer to fix it when you broke it Or hire employees who can handle things with care Every airline has done something to our things I get it happens But never in my life have I received something back that is now unable to use that has not been offered the moment they see it to replace it Instead we were greeted with a Maybe you shouldn t travel with such an expensive stroller Will not be flying anymore Anyone with a stroller fly someone else It s worth it

reviews: Like many others I had to make changes in my plans due to Covid Southwest only offered a voucher for future flights No where on there website do they post refund policies involving the Early bird check in option The problem is the voucher they offer for my early bird check in expires prior to the flight voucher Somehow this makes sense to them I hate this airline and will avoid using it in the future They must need the money more then me

reviews: Purchased return tickets for my mother son grandkids to return home from a staycation with us in Atlanta my mother has COPD and want allowed to take oxygen on either flight but I was assured that a wheelchair with an attendant would be there for her The evening before the return flight I got a call telling me that they had overbooked the return flight not my fault or problem so we changed to a flight hour earlier Got the family to the airport hour and minutes early no wheelchair was there for my mother they told my son to go find one in the terminal which took about minutes No one from Southwest offered to pushed my mother and my son got into the line and passed agents that didn t say a word that wheelchairs were not allowed in that line Long story short they missed their flight and now they want to split them up to get them home can t and will not happen I called and no one offered me any help or resolutions My family is still sitting in the airport Never again Southwest

reviews: Southwest is always a good trip and this one was no exception The open seating concept is good in that it gets you to check in on time and allows you to sit in the front for free The cabin is also comfortable but there are no USB ports or power outlets Snacks and drinks were free and there was a good stream to your device entertainment system Flight attendants were also great MSP Terminal is nice but lacking in concessions and BWI is always a good airport to use So good experience
Lemma: Southwest always good trip one exception open seating concept good get check time allow sit front free cabin also comfortable USB port power outlet Snacks drink free good stream device entertainment system Flight attendant also great MSP Terminal nice lack concession BWI always good airport use good experience

reviews: Took a flight from Atlanta Ga to San Antonio Tx to visit a friend I did this same flight last year with another carrier had nothing but trouble missed first flight because of run around by the agents at check in at the time I was years my father went to help me We were there hours ahead of time we did the same this morning and he ask for a gate pass since this was my first flight alone They are no words to describe the difference the Southwest made in us getting through the line in what I see as record time I do mean all the Southwest people went above and beyond not only for me but everyone else Keep up the good work and welcome to Atlanta Ga

reviews: I scheduled a spring break trip for my teenage son and I prior to COVID Because of such I was forced to cancel the trip Southwest credited the funds to my Southwest account but only under the original ticket names my son s name and my name I am no longer able to travel with my son and have twice requested the funds under his name be transferred to my husband On both occasions I received only a form letter which outlined their policy and never addressed my actual question I don t understand this being that they have nothing to lose by transferring the funds to another family members name I suppose they are hoping as is the case here that the funds can t be used Shame on you Southwest
Lemma: schedule spring break trip teenage son prior COVID force cancel trip Southwest credit fund Southwest account original ticket name son name name longer able travel son twice request fund name transfer husband occasion receive form letter outline policy never address actual question understand nothing lose transfer fund another family member name suppose hop case fund use Shame Southwest

reviews: I have a Southwest travel fund for that expires Sept I had planned to use it this Spring until national restrictions due to Covid prevented my travel In May a Southwest travel rep reassured me the travel fund expiration date was extended to Dec I was SO relieved because is a good amount of money I didn t want to lose and I couldn t travel again any earlier than October But when I tried to book my flight in June I got an error message that said my travel fund expiration date was Sept I immediately called Southwest customer service to explain that I was told the wrong expiration date by one of their reps and due to Covid health concerns and regional restrictions I can t use my travel credit until October FUN FACT Did you know Southwest is extending the expiration date for travel funds that expire between March and Sept to now expire Sept That now gives travelers YEARS to use their travel credit I have to assume they ve done this to protect the health of those Southwest fliers who don t feel safe flying any time soon and in the midst of Covid What a nice and very practical gesture Let me remind you my travel fund expiration date is Sept And because it falls days later my own health and safety is NOT prioritized by Southwest travel policy makers Instead I m forced to use my travel fund by Sept and risk not only my own health but that of my friends family and fellow fliers or it disappears forever I spoke with several reps including a customer relations manager and none of them gave a damn that I couldn t use my travel fund when I was initially told by one of their reps that it expired on Dec That doesn t sound like transparency to me
Lemma: Southwest travel fund expire Sept plan use Spring national restriction due Covid prevent travel May Southwest travel rep reassure travel fund expiration date extend Dec relieved good amount money want lose travel early October try book flight June get error message say travel fund expiration date Sept immediately call Southwest customer service explain tell wrong expiration date one rep due Covid health concern regional restriction use travel credit October FUN FACT know Southwest extend expiration date travel fund expire March Sept expire Sept give traveler YEARS use travel credit assume do protect health Southwest flier feel safe fly time soon midst Covid nice practical gesture Let remind travel fund expiration date Sept fall day later health safety prioritize Southwest travel policy maker Instead force use travel fund Sept risk health friend family fellow flier disappear forever speak several rep include customer relation manager none give damn use travel fund initially tell one rep expire Dec sound like transparency

reviews: New Orleans to Detroit via Chicago Let s start with my flight sent an update saying the flight was delayed minutes which was fine with me Then a page goes over saying those flying to Detroit please come to the counter I get to the desk and I was told it was only seat left but not on the delayed plane I would have to wait hours or until the next day Needless to say I was VERY UPSET Once I finally make it to Detroit I find out items were missing out of my bag I immediately called the Metro Airport baggage office I filed a claim the same night hours later I get an email from Southwest saying they don t cover theft and I just have to suffer the loss I will never fly Southwest they are on the list of the worst Amazes me how these corporations do the very people who pay them One lost customer won t harm them but I definitely can make sure my company doesn t use them again and I surely won t use them Ever
Lemma: New Orleans Detroit via Chicago Let start flight send update say flight delay minute fine page go say fly Detroit please come counter get desk tell seat left delayed plane would wait hour next day Needless say UPSET finally make Detroit find item miss bag immediately call Metro Airport baggage office file claim night hour later get email Southwest say cover theft suffer loss never fly Southwest list bad Amazes corporation people pay One lose customer harm definitely make sure company use surely use Ever

reviews: My wife and I usually always fly Southwest because we love the staff and the overall experience Today s flight was no different from all of our other great travels with Southwest Airlines However it s a real bummer when you get an employee who is rude and doesn t even make eye contact with you I myself am in Customer Service and would never treat a customer in the way I was treated It honestly felt as if I was an inconvenience to this employee I simply asked about where by babies stroller would be She first told me Sir you can t go in there Fair enough so I asked her if she could help retrieve the stroller for me When she brought it back out she didn t even acknowledge me and was incredibly rude I Her tone was bitter and she cared more about chatting with her peers about her days off she has coming up I didn t get her name cause I had no desire of any additional interaction with her I flew from Burbank to Denver into gate C We arrived around pm I have no intention of getting anyone in trouble but that lady might need a little refresher on customer service She must really need those days off Thank for your consideration

reviews: We fly Southwest for their easy fast ticketing and reasonable pricing Yesterday was the first time since that an attendant failed to use common sense a trait Southwest is known for Staff in Denver announced loud and clear that we are allowed bags only to board That s always been the rule however countless times common sense is applied first written rules second I have boarded many many times with my small over the shoulder purse small backpack and my carry on suitcase this was my return trip from Denver i had traveled days ago in identical fashion I watched closely as others boarded large bags a woman with items one fellow had large items neither fit under the seat and so on and so on He never stopped anyone so i knew his announcement was just routine in the case he truly had to limit someone I was the last to board with B flight not even close to full He stopped me and asked me to please put my purse into my backpack My purse and backback are small i am a small person nothing was even hanging outside of my person Both items were so empty they easily fit together Both items tucked under the seat did not even fill percent of the space Why did he even bother Why did he have to make one person s experience less than pleasant In B I was the last person Flight was not even half full There s no good reason for him to do what he did The lady with bags was so loaded down in size and bulk that she held up the entire plane for deplaning She couldnt carry her items front ways or sideways But me small items that were tucked onto my person me he HAD to target He does not represent Southwest well at all and should receive the same training countless others before him have been given Southwest is by far the best airline my family ever travels and the poor actions of this fellow are an embarrassment to the company

reviews: I m writing this with a heavy heart and a serious headache I booked a flight on Mar for May on April th southwest changed the flight I got an email and was told to rebook online at no additional cost By that time Jamaica had closed the boarder and the situation was so uncertain so I asked to be refunded instead of changing or being credited They told me no my only options were the two previously stated I told them that it was unfair for me to be stuck on their timeline since it was ever changing Anyway with no other option I revoked for May That was canceled and I got an email notification I changed again to June Now june was being held based on the multiple conversations I had with CSR I applied for my leave days and everything based on the information provided by their app stating that my flight was still on A few days before my flight I called southwest because of an Instagram post I saw about international flights entering orf having issues only to find out that my flight was canceled days before without notification I lost wage revenue since my leave days were already booked with my company and now I have to request additional days to actually going to VA Then they called and offered me a voucher like that was somehow going to help my situation I cant pay bills or eat using a southwest travel voucher I m extremely disappointed and upset
Lemma: write heavy heart serious headache book flight Mar May April th southwest change flight get email tell rebook online additional cost time Jamaica close boarder situation uncertain ask refund instead change credit tell option two previously state tell unfair stick timeline since ever change Anyway option revoke May cancel get email notification change June june hold base multiple conversation CSR apply leave day everything base information provide app state flight still day flight call southwest Instagram post saw international flight enter orf issue find flight cancel day without notification lose wage revenue since leave day already book company request additional day actually go VA call offer voucher like somehow go help situation cant pay bill eat use southwest travel voucher extremely disappointed upset

Lemma: Southwest middle global pandemic steal customer money airline beg tax payer bail out refuse work customer elderly family member serious medical condition make unsafe fly covid fully know people compromised immune system high risk sorry rant frustrate allow airline company steal Tax Payers turn around beg bail

reviews: Incredibly disappointed in a company I ve trusted for so many years A company known for outstanding customer service Southwest Airlines not only cancelled my late July flight with no notice when I log into my account to book another flight is when I see I have no upcoming trips so I call customer service only to be told sorry it s out of our control we can issue you a refund within days It certainly didn t take them days to collect my money when I trusted them to book a flight with them Unfortunately they have permanently lost a customer not acceptable Southwest Airlines

reviews: Tampa to Havana I been traveling continuously with Southwest airline since once a month at least The most remarkable thing i like about this airline its that every single time i traveled have been a on time flight Other than a rude employee at TSA checking process never had a complaint Last February i did have a really stressful situation on board when my Son who have ASD autism spectrum disorder did not board the plane even when he pass true TSA checking and was lined up at the boarding gate All the sudden he disappear at that time i was on board already That situation make me feel a lot of emotions from panic shame frustration etc After minutes of desperation the manager on charge have talk to me in a kindly manner and she offer to travel the next morning with out any charge Even when there where some unconsidered and rude passengers on board they clarify that my son its a high sensitive passenger and they cant just depart with out take any action at least look for him in the gates area in my experience they behave in a really human manner more than just worried about business For a LOT of reasons but this one specifically i have to THANKS all and every single one Southwest employees
Lemma: Tampa Havana travel continuously Southwest airline since month least remarkable thing like airline every single time travel time flight rude employee TSA check process never complaint Last February really stressful situation board Son ASD autism spectrum disorder board plane even pass true TSA checking line board gate sudden disappear time board already situation make feel lot emotion panic shame frustration etc minute desperation manager charge talk kindly manner offer travel next morning charge Even unconsidered rude passenger board clarify son high sensitive passenger cant depart take action least look gate area experience behave really human manner worry business LOT reason one specifically THANKS every single one Southwest employee

reviews: The problem is really with the website and customer service I was charged more than expected when I booked online I had called to get it fixed and it was only partially addressed as I discovered when my credit card statement arrived I called again and after spending an hour on the phone I was told by the agent that he could not help me with anything involving charges to my credit card I was stunned that we had spent so much time on the phone if he couldn t help with my issue I asked why he didn t tell me this within the first few minutes of our call and he claimed that he wasn t allowed to tell me this I asked him how he was allowed to tell me when he did if he wasn t allowed to tell me earlier and he said he didn t know but that was how he was told to do his job The other scary part of this is even though I was using travel funds to pay for a ticket and the funds completely covered the cost of this ticket and yet somehow the system was able to charge my credit card without me entering the security code and approving the charge Bad service and bad website function They also charged me for early bird checking when they knew I wouldn t need it I am disabled so I get to pre board
Lemma: problem really website customer service charge expect book online call get fixed partially address discover credit card statement arrive call spend hour phone tell agent could help anything involve charge credit card stun spend much time phone help issue ask tell within first minute call claim allow tell ask allow tell allow tell early say know tell job scary part even though use travel fund pay ticket fund completely cover cost ticket yet somehow system able charge credit card without enter security code approve charge Bad service bad website function also charge early bird check know need disabled get pre board

reviews: My review has nothing to do with my last flight from Kansas to Seattle it has everything to do with my up coming trip from Kansas to New Orleans My husband and I were set to go on a cruise leaving June th the cruise line canceled our trip due to COVID I called to cancel our flight and they want charge me a fee to refund my points back to my account I trip to talk to the SW representative and she hung up on me I am a long time SW card holder and with the way I was treated I will be paying my card off and closing my account Very rood and unacceptable behavior from SW customer service

reviews: St Louis to Phoenix Southwest really shows luv for its customers In my opinion they are truly the best of the best sure there may be no meals but for the lowest price possible you still get free drinks a pleasant experience and free entertainment Southwest also has no change fees no baggage fees and amazing customer support I m from St Louis and we don t have a very big airport but Southwest still is able to fly me anywhere in the country from my home airport directly to where I m going On top of everything Southwest has the best flight attendants they are so nice caring and attentive I can see why people only fly Southwest Some people love all the features of other airlines but I think you should get out of your comfort zone and see the Southwest difference
Lemma: St Louis Phoenix Southwest really show luv customer opinion truly best best sure may meal low price possible still get free drink pleasant experience free entertainment Southwest also change fee baggage fee amaze customer support St Louis big airport Southwest still able fly anywhere country home airport directly go top everything Southwest best flight attendant nice caring attentive see people fly Southwest people love feature airline think get comfort zone see Southwest difference

reviews: Much to my chagrin Southwest has pulled the rug from under my feet My well planned vacation to the wonderful world of Disney is falling apart All because of Southwest Airlines villainous change to my pre booked and confirmed airline flight that occurs two months from now This shows a complete disregard for their loyal customers Do we mean nothing to them They changed a o clock flight to am without my consent Obviously for nothing but their own convenience How am I supposed to drop my pooches off at their home away from home This will not be possible now Do they even care From their email notification that I received after they changed the time it does not appear so Whatever executive made this horrendous decision should be shamed I wish I could talk to their mother parental figure and give them a piece of my mind I have been on Southwest previously in my life and their service was perfectly fine but this experience has changed my opinion of them Such a shame
Lemma: Much chagrin Southwest pull rug foot well plan vacation wonderful world Disney fall apart Southwest Airlines villainous change pre book confirm airline flight occur two month show complete disregard loyal customer mean nothing change clock flight without consent Obviously nothing convenience suppose drop pooch home away home possible even care email notification receive change time appear Whatever executive make horrendous decision sham wish could talk mother parental figure give piece mind Southwest previously life service perfectly fine experience change opinion shame

reviews: Worst experience ever I was exposed to Covid and on doctors orders to stay in until further notice Not only that but the destination of my trip had implemented a day quarantine upon arrival What am I supposed to do for days in Texas Missed flight for return and unprecedented expenses How inconvenient not to consider refunds for lost causes The customer service was down right rude and no one I spoke with showed an ounce of concern I m going to tell my story to anyone who will listen This is ludicrous A pandemic breaks out and a company that is receiving bailout from the government chooses to be greedy and not refund when families need their funds more now than ever I m off work my husband off work and your organization won t even display the decency to have a manager talk with an escalated call Sorry Southwest Y all are officially trash

reviews: Tampa to Birmingham My wife and daughter were scheduled to attend a gymnastic competition in Birmingham Ala The event was cancelled due to the COVID outbreak I thought that a refund would be given especially since it was cancelled because of a pandemic but they are telling no refund we will give a credit that has an expiration date This is unfair and shows a serious lack of concern for customers and I want to make sure that the word gets that Southwest doesn t really care about you and your situation only their bottom line

reviews: Pittsburgh to Orlando This review is not about my last flight it is about the flight I had to cancel because of COVID and my stepson having down syndrome I have spoken with a few different representatives and only one has given me the feeling that she cares about me and my family but she doesn t have the power to help It seems all they care about is their money With COVID being such a problem to people with a breathing issue It is most likely that my stepson will never be able to fly These tickets could be refunded or transferred To another name and Southwest will not even let me speak to a Sr Manager They have just closed the account without speaking with me This is a worldwide problem people had to shut their lives down and taking care of a child with special needs has shut our family down for who knows how long Southwest Has shown me what is important to them and it s surely not family and taking care of family I highly recommend looking at all of your flight options before taking your flight with such a company that doesn t care about their customers
Lemma: Pittsburgh Orlando review last flight flight cancel COVID stepson syndrome speak different representative one give feeling care family power help seem care money COVID problem people breathe issue likely stepson never able fly ticket could refund transfer another name Southwest even let speak Sr Manager close account without speak worldwide problem people shut life take care child special need shut family know long Southwest show important surely family take care family highly recommend look flight option take flight company care customer

reviews: Ontario to Sacramento Purchased tickets on for May needed to be cancelled due to news that my graduation ceremony would no longer be taking part from COVID concerns I called customer service who referred me to executive office They informed me that because I purchased non refundable tickets I could not receive a full refund back on my card They only offered travel funds for future use until June This is unacceptable as I did not have any idea that this outbreak would occur and it is not the customers fault I have no history of complaining before and am shocked that Southwest could not make any exceptions during this difficult time Southwest Airlines should be ashamed and embarrassed for the lack of sympathy and corporate greed they have portrayed

reviews: After flying from Indianapolis to Atlanta we had a hour layover until our flight to Oakland My girlfriend has a service animal and we had to the bathroom We were in Terminal C and there were no pet relief areas open in the entire terminal We had to walk minutes to terminal B to find an open pet relief area When we came back they had closed the doors minutes before the flight We explained to the lady at the gate that there were no pet relief areas open yet she would not let us on the plane We then watched the plane for minutes sitting and then it backed out and left There was plenty of time to correct the situation The representative laughed and said Oh I figured you were walking your dog because I saw a service animal on your reservation I fly twice a week and I used to prefer Southwest but no longer

reviews: Nashville to Dallas I had flights scheduled for Dallas and Napa When I cancelled the flight because of the coronavirus I was told that the early bird fees of per flight would not be transferred to the rescheduling of my flights Feels like an old fashion holdup Will not fly Southwest intentionally ever again if I do not at least get my early bird fees transferred to future flights Bad publicity and customer relations for an airline that in the past had put customer first They missed a tremendous opportunity to do the right thing

reviews: Although many are upset because of these trying times I have to say while we flew Southwest Airlines from MDW to Punta Cana flight and had a great flight We had our grandchild with us which was his first flight and the crew could not have done enough While in the Dominican we started hearing so many rumors that the borders were being shut down and we were basically being abandoned Well Southwest answered their phones confirmed our flight back to the USA and yes we called numerous times as United abandoned everyone at our resort and many people were left scrambling for any airline to please take them back our flight was the second to last flight back to the USA and we had a first row seat and I cannot tell you how many people arriving on the plane Flight kept on thanking Southwest for taking them home Our family witnessed this personally and Southwest had flown many planes empty to the Dominican to bring our people home The best part was the crew of this flight showed all of us so much attention and treated everyone great One passenger had her birthday party sung to her by the whole flight and the crew gave her a bit of a funny gift and one of the crew also sang to the passengers By far the best flight I have ever been on I thank the pilots for their hard work and the crew who put so many people at ease for the great time and flight I have and will anytime always fly with Southwest due to their great service If I could I would give them more than stars

reviews: Washington to Columbus I ve consistently had an excellent experience with Southwest Airlines having flown them dozens of times over two decades I live in the DC area and appreciate the number of nonstop routes from the area While their fares are no longer the least expensive their customer service is light years ahead of competing US based airlines If you have an extenuating circumstance outside of their policy they provide more sympathy and do their best to offer solutions They allow maximum flexibility by allowing you to keep what you paid for a flight even if your plans change up to the time of your flight An added bonus is the free checked bags drink coupons they provide to frequent flyers on a periodic basis and the free on board entertainment through Southwest Wifi

reviews: Please be cautious when you are purchasing Wanna Get Away airline tickets right now I had purchased two tickets for some friends to come visit me in Philadelphia on my Southwest Credit Card We were planning on going to New York however due to the coronavirus they are afraid to come now and rightfully so I purchased the tickets under my name and I was told by Southwest Airlines that I am not able to transfer those tickets to my name with no exception so I am losing because this was their only opportunity to come visit me and they cannot come at a later date These tickets are non refundable and non transferrable so be aware With everything that is going on right now it is probably best not to purchase these tickets right now You will lose your money if you have to cancel
Lemma: Please cautious purchase Wan na Get Away airline ticket right purchase two ticket friend come visit Philadelphia Southwest Credit Card plan go New York however due coronavirus afraid come rightfully purchase ticket name tell Southwest Airlines able transfer ticket name exception lose opportunity come visit come late date ticket non refundable non transferrable aware everything go right probably best purchase ticket right lose money cancel

reviews: Nashville to Ft Lauderdale I had to buy a seat for my service dog the other day at the counter While checking in Even though they knew he was traveling with me I even called two days prior to make sure everything was still ok and they mentioned nothing so later he got on the plane and laid at my feet Then another couple asked if they could sit with us and I said yes Southwest said that the seat could not be refunded even though he didn t take up a seat nor have I ever had to pay before with another airline even though the federal law states the airlines May not charge pst fees or other relevant charges So if you are traveling with your Service animal you might want to ask Southwest about any hidden fees

reviews: Kudos to Southwest My flight got rerouted due to Heavy Fog in Atlanta So went to Birmingham AL to refuel and one of the Pilots opened a window and then couldn t get it closed Long story short I should have been in Phoenix by noon missed my connection had to go back to Orlando to get flight home to Phoenix They gave us all a voucher and food voucher everyone was so extremely nice My day should have been hours ended up hours My bag made it to Phx by the time I arrived Outstanding work by all Called into southwest this morning and talked to Vasa one of the consultants she s Amazing too I will be flying Southwest again soon
Lemma: Kudos Southwest flight get rerouted due Heavy Fog Atlanta go Birmingham AL refuel one Pilots open window get close Long story short Phoenix noon miss connection go back Orlando get flight home Phoenix give us voucher food voucher everyone extremely nice day hour end hour bag make Phx time arrive Outstanding work Called southwest morning talk Vasa one consultant Amazing fly Southwest soon

reviews: Dallas to St Louis St Louis baggage handling office thinks it funny and laugh about my luggage being soak and wet Staff was of no help and certainly not the normal southwest employee Bad attitude and does care about concern There is no way my luggage should have gotten this wet Other than dropping my luggage on the ground there is no excuse for this I watch you baggage handler mishandle bags all the time and this time it was mine

reviews: St Louis to Austin The young lady that checked us in was very rude and nasty because when she first called row A and active duty military we approached her presented ticket and military ID she said Oh we no longer take active duty military without uniform We stated that s not how you called it that s why where standing here she said the policy just changed so I went ahead and looked this up and it states Southwest gives special consideration to active duty military personnel Any active duty military passenger will be able to board after the A group regardless of their assigned boarding position
Lemma: St Louis Austin young lady check us rude nasty first call row active duty military approach present ticket military ID say Oh longer take active duty military without uniform state call standing say policy change go ahead look state Southwest give special consideration active duty military personnel active duty military passenger able board group regardless assign boarding position

reviews: Detroit to Puerto Vallarta via Denver On our flight to Puerto Vallarta our group of six was divided into different groups and we were told it was because we checked I m later than others Checked in exactly hours in advance on our return flight there were six travelers all were shown to be in group A But when we got to the airport we were separated in group b I was in group C Our connecting flight were in group A I was in group C when asked why the women said it was because of when we checked in We even set an alarm while on vacation so we could all check in together to avoid being split up like on our previous flights We asked if I could board with my husband and the attendant told us to it was not allowed and to file a complaint with the company This is the first and last time I fly with Southwest Airlines We were treated very rudely and were dismissed by the staff I will tell all of my friends an post our experience on social media I would rather pay a little more to be assured I am sitting with my husband

reviews: Our International flight arrived late into Baltimore I ran from customs in E concourse to re check my bag at A concourse to head home to Jacksonville By the time I got there to check my bag the flight was already boarding There was confusion as to whether or not I had to re check my bag with the International or Domestic counter They could tell I was getting upset and jut wanted to get home The woman late checked my bag and told me there was no guarantee it would make it on my flight that night When I landed in Jacksonville my bags were there The Southwest team had unknowingly made the end of my trip a good one They hustled you ensure my bags would be on my flight home Thank you Southwest
Lemma: International flight arrive late Baltimore run custom E concourse check bag concourse head home Jacksonville time get check bag flight already board confusion whether check bag International Domestic counter could tell get upset jut want get home woman late check bag tell guarantee would make flight night land Jacksonville bag Southwest team unknowingly make end trip good one hustle ensure bag would flight home Thank Southwest

reviews: Ontario to Seattle As always a great experience This is truly the People s airline in that they treat you like a human being and don t purely operate to extract every last bit of profit at the expense of the passenger I love that there s no first class as an average seat is as good as business class on other airlines minus food but who relies on airline food these days anyway Also fantastic is their no hassle change policy For my most recent flight I had to change it twice No fees no problems Also two free bags checked what s not to like
Lemma: Ontario Seattle always great experience truly People airline treat like human purely operate extract every last bit profit expense passenger love first class average seat good business class airline minus food rely airline food day anyway Also fantastic hassle change policy recent flight change twice fee problem Also two free bag check like

reviews: Dallas to Little Rock I looked forward to flying with Southwest as I have never been on any of their flights before They do not fly up to the Greatland so no chance to do so I waited about hours for my flight after arriving from Portland I wandered around the airport grabbed a doughnut and coffee at Dunkins and chilled with a new book An hour prior to departing I got my ticket dropped of by bag and was quite impressed with the employees attitudes What I was not impressed with was the very overcrowded gate area I had never seen how Southwest loaded their aircraft before It seemed to be kind of crazy at first but it worked out fine The pilot came out and thanked us for choosing to go with him to Detroit He was then reminded to get us to LIT and he said with a laugh that he would try I was fortunate enough to sit by one of their pilots who was deadheading home We chatted most of the way The flight attendants did a great job getting drinks and chips out to those who wanted them short flight up and down in minutes Bottom line great service fast flight and good humor all in all very nicely done
Lemma: Dallas Little Rock look forward fly Southwest never flight fly Greatland chance wait hour flight arrive Portland wander around airport grab doughnut coffee Dunkins chill new book hour prior depart get ticket drop bag quite impressed employee attitudes impressed overcrowded gate area never see Southwest load aircraft seem kind crazy first work fine pilot come thank us choose go Detroit remind get us LIT say laugh would try fortunate enough sit one pilot deadheading home chat way flight attendant great job get drink chip want short flight minute Bottom line great service fast flight good humor nicely do

reviews: I had the worst experience ever with South West airlines Houston I waited at baggage claim for over minutes for my bag which never came while over the speaker the announcer called for the owner of a crown royal bag As you may know Crown Royal is a liquor that comes in a purple and gold bag but this couldn t be my bag even though it was purple and gold it clearly said Betsy Johnson all over it I guess that was a funny joke for the employees to yell on the loud speaker that owner of a crown royal bag needed to come to the service desk After realizing my bag was not coming I was directed to a room in the back where I inquired about the location of the bag The airport staff then said oh you re the owner of the Crown Royal bag and began to giggle They informed that my bag fell and was ran over and some of my stuff have been destroyed with not even the smallest hint of remorse My bag was literally destroyed to the point all the clothes and shoes In it were ripped to shreds destroyed When I became angry the south west employee asked me what are you so mad about it s not like we are not going to cut you a check I explained to the worker that I am in a city I have never been to with absolutely nothing to wear and all my belongings destroyed The employee began to tell me how southwest is a million dollar company they have no problem cutting a check as if this was suppose to make me feel better The employee then told me it happens all the time due to southwest handling so much luggage on a daily basis and they just cut a check The employees asked me to go through my bag and damages and asked me to price the cost of each item The south west employee sat on the computer googled my items one by one while making comments like woah you really paid for that and arguing with me over the amount I paid for each item saying things like well they have it for cheaper at this store The worker also went as far to turn to his employee and say I don t even argue with these people After the employee calculated what he felt I deserved for my belongings he wrote a check for and told me I should just go to the mall buy new items The employee told me I can go to chase bank and cash the check the same day which was a lie I went to chase bank and they told me they could not cash check because southwest had to verify it and no one answered the phone I was not able to cash check until I returned home from my vacation The customer service was absolutely terrible and this was a major I m convenience and embarrassing experience I do not recommend Southwest Airlines to any one

reviews: Berrien Springs to San Jose Great airline Southwest was the best flying experience for me The flight attendants were very nice and when I asked for a drink they kept offering more until I was good to go Since I was on a morning flight they offered coffee without anyone having to ask But I do have a complaint On my flight back home I kept getting disconnected from their wifi for some reason And others around me had a solid connection If Southwest can look into this problem I will give entertainment a better review But other than that totally worth the price I paid
Lemma: Berrien Springs San Jose Great airline Southwest best flying experience flight attendant nice ask drink keep offer good go Since morning flight offer coffee without anyone ask complaint flight back home keep get disconnect wifi reason others around solid connection Southwest look problem give entertainment good review totally worth price pay

reviews: San Jose to Denver Customer service was terrible I always get to stand in family boarding line with my two kids since I m flying alone with my kids My kids are ages and The lady at the door made me get out of line with my kids and did not allow me to get on the plane with family boarding I ve never encountered this problem before and I did not appreciate her separating us We had to sit away from one another and my daughter cried in the plane the whole flight I hope that makes the damn door lady happy She must not have kids Very unsatisfying customer service today
