reviews: It would have been nice to know that I actually can t pick up my minor from the gate as promised by Southwest Airlines After everything closes at Will Roger s you cant go any further then the ticketing area I specifically called Southwest and asked if I pick her up from the gate and they said yes They said nothing about if TSA is closing you have to wait outside This is the first time my little girl has flown alone and I gave her specific Instructions to wait for me at the gate not the front of the airport A little disappointed that this was not mentioned I was not the only mom waiting for their minor that was upset by this I know we all looked through the instructions on how to fly a minor but when I call to ask a specific question to the airline to make sure I didnt miss anything nothing was mentioned about TSA closing and possibly not being able to pick up minors from the gate
Lemma: would nice know actually pick minor gate promise Southwest Airlines everything close Roger cant go ticket area specifically call Southwest ask pick gate say yes say nothing TSA close wait outside first time little girl fly alone give specific Instructions wait gate front airport little disappointed mention mom wait minor upset know look instruction fly minor call ask specific question airline make sure didnt miss anything nothing mention TSA closing possibly able pick minor gate

reviews: Houston to Denver via Dallas I ve even had better luck flying on United and that s saying a lot considering United s abysmal reputation To begin with my stories Most recent flight October Denver back to Houston Unremarkable flight Southwest check in agent in Denver who collected my checked baggage was mechanically professional but lacked much in the way of personality Upon arrival at Houston baggage was oh so slow to come out Second most recent flight October Houston via Dallas to Denver Southwest check in agent in Houston who collected my checked baggage was mechanically professional again Gate agents in both Houston and Dallas acted quite bored honestly I didn t notice the splotches of dried drink food chunks and blood yes that is correct blood surrounding my seat until I sat down and I had to sit down because I was one of the last people to board the plane I sent Southwest a scathing review of that flight and got a credit for a future flight for what it s worth Third most recent flight May Austin to Albuquerque then back to Austin Any Southwest staff I interacted with at either airport couldn t be paid enough it seems to even bother to pleasantly interact with staff That said I remember the pilot on the first leg from Austin to Albuquerque trying to engage the passengers so good for him Fourth most recent flight October Dallas to Louisville The man who checked in my baggage at the curb barely said a word or even grunted and even fairly forcefully threw said baggage onto the carousel even after I had told him that I have fragile items within No thank you no this is your ticket and go this way to your gate nothing Southwest s overall concept of customer service has plummeted over the last decade and after October I ll absolutely no longer fly them unless they are significantly cheaper than any competitor

reviews: St Louis to Seattle Our flight was delayed by two hours but as I sat in the waiting gate I witnessed some of the most genuine employees of Southwest I was sitting in gate E near the help desk and couldn t help but overhear the employees talking Anytime an employee walked by or came up to the help desk they were greeted with a big smile and a hug They asked everyone how their holiday was how their family was and just how that person was doing It was so nice and sincere and you could tell they really cared and everyone got along well Not only were they kind to each other they were also so kind to every single customer they had even people who were frustrated and not so nice Usually employees gather around and talk bad about the really annoying customers but none of them ever did Everyone seemed to be in a really good mood and it was really nice to see such good happy employees
Lemma: St Louis Seattle flight delay two hour sit wait gate witness genuine employee Southwest sit gate E near help desk help overhear employee talk Anytime employee walk come help desk greet big smile hug ask everyone holiday family person nice sincere could tell really care everyone get along well kind also kind every single customer even people frustrate nice Usually employee gather around talk bad really annoying customer none ever Everyone seem really good mood really nice see good happy employee

reviews: I want to point out how amazing their staff did with all of the st communication nd and how much i had faith in them On December th I was supposed to fly out of Denver into Dallas then onto Amarillo and at that time Denver had just gotten some snow and cold weather and the first thing they addressed was that I might not be able to get on my second flight to Amarillo because the time frame was to small being that they would like more than an hour between I had about minutes in between and the time just kept getting shorter and shorter So we rebooked my flight for January st on January st I was about minutes away from missing my flight maybe less but I was aware that they said my luggage may or may not be there when I get to my final destination in Amarillo because of how short of time there was But now that my flight is over I do indeed have all of my luggage I would just like to applaud Denver International airport with the highest standards forbeing so communicative Thank you for everything that y all have done on my little journey

reviews: Detroit to Phoenix Had the most wonderful experience on my flight home today with today being a holiday and an early Flight I was not looking forward to traveling especially with a sleepy and grumpy toddler but the flight attendant James made a dreaded experience into a relaxing stress free and comical adventure He was upbeat kind and friendly and engaging with my little one and his humor aboard the flight made me laugh and feel at ease It s the little things that makes the difference and he nailed it The icing on the cake he said goodbye to my daughter and still chatted with her and he got Lucky and she blew him a kiss Anyone who crosses paths with him is indeed lucky you will not be disappointed
Lemma: Detroit Phoenix wonderful experience flight home today today holiday early Flight look forward travel especially sleepy grumpy toddler flight attendant James make dreaded experience relaxing stress free comical adventure upbeat kind friendly engage little one humor aboard flight make laugh feel ease little thing make difference nail ice cake say goodbye daughter still chat get Lucky blow kiss Anyone cross path indeed lucky disappoint

reviews: Phoenix to Los Angeles I had the worse experience with Southwest on Dec Flight was delayed for mechanical issues and I have a disability that requires medication to be taken timely I checked my meds under the plane since this was the simplest route LAX to PHX I let the customer service know my meds went to be put under plane they were rude and extremely rude Told me my meds were at baggage to retrieve and got down there on my scooter and it wasn t there nor did they even know anything about me getting my meds Had to go back through security Sent in a complaint on someone was supposed to call me within hrs never did Called them several times and all they say is a special team is working on it Here it is and no one not anyone from Southwest has called me Just sad disappointed and upset at this

reviews: Oakland to Denver Southwest s Oakland desk agents are fantastic and provided the best experience I ve had with an airline I brought my cat in a carry on that was too big The agent checking me in tried her best to let me by but it clearly wouldn t fit So she quickly snuck in the back and gave me a free Southwest pet carrier She could have easily followed strict protocol and ruined my and others holiday but did her best to make sure we d make our flight That level of service has made Southwest my number airline
Lemma: Oakland Denver Southwest Oakland desk agent fantastic provide best experience airline bring cat carry big agent check try best let clearly fit quickly sneak back give free Southwest pet carrier could easily follow strict protocol ruin others holiday best make sure make flight level service make Southwest number airline

reviews: Southwest really flew the extra mile today in terms of demonstrating just how terrible they are at customer service After a hr delay in leaving the West Coast they informed passengers that they had informed the connecting flights to wait a bit so that passengers could make their connections We land in the Midwest and I rush to my connection only to find out that No one had bothered to inform this flight crew that there were delayed passengers rushing to catch this flight my plane was literally sitting right there on the other side of the glass and they refused to let me on because they had already counted the passengers the next connection was hours later but oh wait that was delayed another hrs too So even though the two flights that I needed to catch were more than hours delayed they couldn t hold this one for a few minutes And then when they gave me a ticket for the last flight of the day they put me on one of the last groups for seating and because Southwest doesn t assign seats then it just means you will have a horrible seat I pressed and they gave me seating after the first group Fast forward four hours later on a late Sunday evening after traveling all day and it looks like a small group of passengers DID get to board before everyone because they were from a connecting flight So apparently Southwest does not care at all if it s one or a few persons being royally screwed by every one of their actions All the while the staff who answered my questions responded curtly seemed annoyed and one manager simply stared at me and asked what I wanted in deadpan voice after the person at the desk explained the situation A friendly service reminder to never ever fly this airline that doesn t care the least bit for individual customer experiences

reviews: I will never fly with Southwest Airlines again Our trip was flat out cancelled in March when all of the debacle happened Not their fault They kindly gave us an flight credit to use in the next year We saved it so that we could go and see family over the holidays I booked it weeks ago so I could get the times I wanted Got text messages this morning delaying the flight to Dallas so that we missed our connection to Amarillo Had to re book and now we lost a day of time with my family We had to get a hotel room in Amarillo because we are getting in so late and had to delay our car rental The customer service lady was extremely rude and really couldn t care less Oh and to add to it I refreshed the flight information on the Southwest website The flight time was changed back to a good time where we could have made the connection but by the time I called they had already sold all of the seats I guess we should have risked it and just gone to the airport hoping that something would work out Southwest offered nothing not even an apology for the missed time and extra money we had to spend

reviews: Las Vegas to Rochester via Baltimore On these two flights I noticed that the flight attendants were less comedic than on previous Southwest flights However they were also kind and accommodating During the Las Vegas flight many of us fell asleep shortly after takeoff and the flight attendants were very much willing to serve us beverages and snacks later on when we requested them When I ordered a lemon lime sparkling water with no ice the flight attendant who served it to me added in a lime wedge and a famous Southwest heart stirrer Nice touch Otherwise things were the same as during previous flights the underwhelming shortbread cookies and Fritos for the long flight and the pretzels for the short flight and inflight entertainment only accessible via personal electronic devices The flight also arrived approximately on time All in all a good experience
Lemma: Las Vegas Rochester via Baltimore two flight notice flight attendant less comedic previous Southwest flight However also kind accommodate Las Vegas flight many us fell asleep shortly takeoff flight attendant much willing serve us beverage snack later request order lemon lime sparkle water ice flight attendant serve add lime wedge famous Southwest heart stirrer Nice touch Otherwise thing previous flight underwhelming shortbread cooky Fritos long flight pretzel short flight inflight entertainment accessible via personal electronic device flight also arrive approximately time good experience

reviews: Rochester to Providence via Baltimore These two flights took place amidst the winter storm which struck the Northeast in early December of As usual for these short flights we were offered beverages and pretzels The gate agents for both flights were excellent and got us boarded quickly but the issue was that we were delayed for both flights due to de icing and such The flight attendants did a good job of balancing the occasional need for speed with the need for passenger respect Not a whole lot of joking around during these flights too but given the circumstances I suppose that should not be surprising We arrived at each location about to minutes late All things considered I think that was quite impressive After flying with Southwest for nine flights over the span of about a week and a half I can say that one area in which they are excellent is in getting you where you need to go on time This is one area where they really do outperform JetBlue and to me it matters a lot

reviews: Rochester to Las Vegas via Baltimore and Salt Lake City The flight from Rochester to Baltimore was operated on a Boeing while the flight from Baltimore to Salt Lake City and onward to Las Vegas was operated on a Boeing We had some comedians as flight attendants on these flights The first two kind of struggled to get us to laugh The third however was absolutely hilarious I noticed several indirect advertisements for Southwest s new flights to Hawaii through joking we had just landed in Hawaii The flight from Rochester to Baltimore featured the usual beverage service and packet of pretzels as did the flight from Salt Lake City to Las Vegas For the flight from Baltimore to Salt Lake City which was much longer there were two beverage services and we were offered shortbread cookies or Fritos or both As usual inflight entertainment was available but only if you had a streaming device with you I don t know why but for some reason I felt like the flight attendants on the first two of these flights were a little less friendly than I ve experienced in the past on Southwest Not hostile but just kind of passive yet also a little impatient with passengers as they boarded like during previous flights I guess my biggest gripe is the food I know it s a low cost carrier and I know it s a domestic flight in the U S But somehow for a flight that lasts for something like five hours I feel like people really ought to be offered more than just a couple of packets of snacks Yes I am absolutely spoiled by Asian carriers which offer full hot meals on such flights

reviews: Providence to Rochester via Baltimore Two quick flights and pretty much without incident I was accompanying my parents and one of them my Dad needed special assistance For some reason the gate agent in Providence said only one person was allowed to accompany my Dad during preboarding My Mom opted to do so The gate agent in Baltimore however said both my Mom and I could accompany my Dad during preboarding During the flights complimentary beverages were offered as were packets of pretzels Apparently wi fi is available as well as a few movies if you brought your tablet or smartphone or whatever to watch them on The flight attendants were generally pleasant but seemed a little bit impatient at times I recognize that these were short flights and that they had schedules to keep which they did indeed keep to their credit but it seemed like people generally were not going particularly slowly as it was despite Southwest s unique boarding technique of having people choose their own seats Overall though pretty good and it certainly beats flying American or United

reviews: Ontario to Denver Take their no show policy seriously Ten hours travel my elderly mother appeared to have a stroke and was transported to a local emergency room Numerous tests were being done because of the concern for her wellbeing and the doctor was less than sure about what the cause was Being an only child I stayed with my mom during this process getting her to agree to treatment explaining what the doctors were telling her and trying to keep her calm The furthest thing from my mind was our planned travel to go to her college friends funeral in Colorado While they were doing a procedure I got the email that we missed the flight that is how fast time flied I immediately called and they said it was too late but that I should contact the corporate consumer line Much later that day when I left the hospital I immediately went to the airport and they also recommended that I contact the corporate consumer line The staff member at the airport was understanding and encouraged me to reach out because the company is known to make exceptions So I did In response was an automatic non empathetic you didn t meet our rules email It was clear the author never read anything I wrote that the author never came close to the sympathy advanced by phone representative or airport representative That the author utilized the cut and paste function to get through its tasks The moral of the review keep the southwest number on your favorites if you are traveling That you have a sick family member in the emergency room is not a reason to miss the deadline or not call them to cancel That their mission statement claiming dedication to the highest quality of Customer Service delivered with a sense of warmth friendliness are words on a website not words that consider any tragedy that may befall you or your family unless they can advertise it for their advantage My mom and I are nobodies to a big institution like this so be careful you will be too
Lemma: Ontario Denver Take show policy seriously Ten hour travel elderly mother appear stroke transport local emergency room Numerous test do concern wellbeing doctor less sure cause child stay mom process get agree treatment explain doctor tell try keep calm furthest thing mind planned travel go college friends funeral Colorado procedure get email miss flight fast time flied immediately call say late contact corporate consumer line Much later day leave hospital immediately go airport also recommend contact corporate consumer line staff member airport understanding encourage reach company know make exception response automatic non empathetic meet rule email clear author never read anything write author never come close sympathy advance phone representative airport representative author utilize cut paste function get task moral review keep southwest number favorite travel sick family member emergency room reason miss deadline call cancel mission statement claim dedication high quality Customer Service deliver sense warmth friendliness word website word consider tragedy may befall family unless advertise advantage mom nobody big institution like careful

reviews: I have been fairly disappointed with Southwest in the last several months I routinely fly multiple times a month between Sacramento and Los Angeles Burbank for work My last flights in a row starting mid November have been delayed by an hour or more And today it has already been delayed minutes It has begun to really interrupt my ability to make dependable plans I have been a rewards member for a year and I am looking to stop using southwest for all flights For many months there was not a problem at all But the last months have been delay after delay Very unfortunate they can not maintain the schedules flight times I will begin to look to other companies for better reliability

reviews: San Jose to Boise I am really disappointed about how Southwest handles transfer of miles to friends and family I just gifted my adult son miles and it cost me to do so I wanted him to have the freedom to use them as he wished I decided to go ahead and pay but next time it would seem better for me to purchase his ticket and use my miles I have never gifted miles before so maybe it s standard practice Regardless I know I won t be doing that again Not worth it In general I use Southwest and enjoy the benefits of free luggage and refundable tickets

reviews: St Louis to Fort Lauderdale I do believe southwest just set a company record A three owner flight has now turned into a hour nightmare Since we left St Louis we have had eight delays We are going to miss our family cruise Sitting in a plane waiting for their next delay To make matters worse we tried to get off and drive to port Now Southwest Airlines employees are telling us they don t know what plane our luggage is on Still stuck in a nightmare

reviews: Today our pm flight was cancelled for no apparent reason Luckily we were able to book a pm flight We arrived at the airport with an hour to spare to find the southwest computers had been down for hours We had to wait in a line for hours that wrapped three times around the inside of the airport as every single passenger had to be checked in manually Then were put on standby for a different connecting flight which we were able to obtain seats Unfortunately that plane was minutes delayed causing us to miss our connecting flight by minutes The connecting flight departed minutes early as we watched it take flight There are no flights home for us tonight after we just missed the last one Meanwhile we are offered a travel voucher which won t even cover a hotel tonight Now we have been waiting over an hour to speak to a supervisor

reviews: I took a beautiful trip to Jamaica with no help from Southwest Airlines They cancelled then delayed then cancelled then delayed our original flight from Buffalo to Baltimore They did schedule us for another flight to get to Jamaica but leaving the next day I work and don t just have vacation time to throw around because you delay my flight at am and then can t do anything until the next day really I went and asked to be rebooked and we made it to Florida not Jamaica that day causing me to miss a day of vacation We got for that so ok I guess that s fine But then we had to return home On the way home both flights were hours delayed and then they completely busted my checked luggage We were also not allowed to get up during basically the whole hour flight to use the restroom I feel like telling them to take their flight vouchers and shove it They can give me cash because I don t plan on flying Southwest again If you have planes fly them we re not paying for a service where the business doesn t hold up their end of the bargain and that s what happened if we book to fly certain days and times the o ky thing affecting that should be weather not mechanical issues and late planes I m beyond frustrated as having flights messed up can really destroy your trip Nice try Southwest looking very forward to a call to your customer service tomorrow if I m home by then
Lemma: take beautiful trip Jamaica help Southwest Airlines cancel delay cancel delay original flight Buffalo Baltimore schedule us another flight get Jamaica leave next day work vacation time throw around delay flight anything next day really go ask rebooked make Florida Jamaica day cause miss day vacation get ok guess fine return home way home flight hour delay completely bust checked luggage also allow get basically whole hour flight use restroom feel like tell take flight voucher shove give cash plan fly Southwest plane fly pay service business hold end bargain happen book fly certain day time ky thing affect weather mechanical issue late plane beyond frustrate flight mess really destroy trip Nice try Southwest look forward call customer service tomorrow home

reviews: I am very aggravated with Southwest Airlines We were on the plane headed to our cruise in Mexico about a month ago something went wrong with the plane which we were understanding because things like this happen that are out of anybody s control Southwest customer service was not helpful in trying to figure out how to get to our next destination They kept ignoring us and promising us multiple vouchers while we were at the airport that we have yet to receive We took matters into our own hands and at this point we had to figure out another way to get to Mexico through a different airline Southwest promised us a refund vouchers probably hoping to keep our mouth shut but it s been a month now we haven t received a single thing from them Altogether my friends and I spent or more that weekend because of Southwest and they can t even give us a refund for our flight Never flying through Southwest Airlines again

reviews: I had probably the worst experience with Southwest Here is what happened On December I was flying from Baltimore to Las Vegas By the time I got onto the plane all the compartments are full Then the flight attendant took my luggage and seated me in one of the front seats After all the passengers moved out I started looking for my bag but couldn t find it anywhere Then I asked for the flight attended where she put my luggage she wasn t able to find it either Long story short after calling Southwest customer service representatives I was finally offered a voucher for my lost luggage which they call it for apologies I can t imagine dollars for my lost carry on bag I don t recommend anyone to fly Southwest if you have to fly prepare for the worst

reviews: In mid September my husband and I took a short flight from Oakland to Portland as we were moving up to our new place in Portland I packed my wedding flatware which I use for special occasions in my check in luggage thinking that if I added it to my carry on they could consider it to be dangerous Up to this point the other issue I had with Southwest over luggage was a few years ago when they smashed up my Samsonite luggage from OAK to Long Beach They did correct the situation by reimbursing me for the damage However when I arrived at PDX and our new place I did not unpack all of my luggage immediately since we had bags between the two of us A few days after we landed I looked for my flatware and found it was missing except for the butter knives Someone took out the dinner forks salad forks Soup spoons and teaspoons I called Southwest right away and was told that they would process the claim When I called customer service I begged and pleaded for them to find it and return it to me I don t even want the money for the flatware I just wanted the flatware because it was sentimental to me SouthWest said someone could have taken it out of my luggage and not returned it to its place and that many times it ends up at a lost and found in Atlanta Well I put in a claim sent a letter and asked them to check in Atlanta ALL I wanted was my flatware it wasn t extremely expensive but it was Mikasa and it had been discontinued They denied my claim and when I appealed the denial they sent me a letter stating that they cannot reimburse everyone for what they claim they lost and hoped that I would not give them bad online reviews because of it

reviews: Baltimore to Fort Lauderdale was my st flight in years due to PTS from a white knuckle Washington RDU ValuJet flight the month after the disaster that suffered engine trouble right over Raleigh that badly scared me The attendants especially Steve and Christie who me my big brother in the rear saw most lived up to their title doling out instructions the meager excuse for food and drinks in a professionally caring and friendly manner The atmosphere was convivial untroubled by complaints or aircraft crew problems This airborne adventure bookending a Carnival cruise after such a long time many industry changes therein was one which the crews involved truly highlighted with their skills friendly engaging service rrow finishes which can be described as a landing only charitably not leave passengers marinating in their buckled seats I didn t for long minutes waiting for the gate

reviews: I took this quick trip to FL to visit my sister and help out with her friendsgiving dinner I sat in an aisle seat and a woman sat at the window seat It was a full flight however our middle seat was vacant somehow I started a new medication the day before and I had taken it as well as my regular pain medicine Being it was an early flight I had not eaten breakfast I did have water and snacks with me on the plane if I got hungry I started to feel hot and a little faint and it intensified to almost passing out The woman next to me who turned out to be a spectacular nice friendly woman immediately came to my assistance She made me eat something and she was fanning me hoping that I would not pass out I was within minutes of doing so The stewardesses on board were also spectacular They asked for a nurse or doctor on board and luckily for me there was a physicians assistant directly behind me She came over to me took care of me checked my blood pressure listened to my heart and made sure that I was going to be OK After drinking some orange juice and having some snacks my blood pressure did go down and I started to feel somewhat normal again I never did pass out thankfully and was able to enjoy the rest of my flight and the great conversation I can t say enough about all four of those people who immediately came to my aid no questions asked They were all happy to take care of me
Lemma: take quick trip FL visit sister help friendsgiving dinner sit aisle seat woman sit window seat full flight however middle seat vacant somehow start new medication day take well regular pain medicine early flight eat breakfast water snack plane get hungry start feel hot little faint intensify almost pass woman next turn spectacular nice friendly woman immediately come assistance make eat something fan hop would pass within minute stewardess board also spectacular ask nurse doctor board luckily physician assistant directly behind come take care check blood pressure listen heart make sure go OK drink orange juice snack blood pressure go start feel somewhat normal never pass thankfully able enjoy rest flight great conversation say enough four people immediately come aid question ask happy take care

reviews: Orange County to Denver I like Southwest overall because of the transparent prices and the fact that they don t charge extra to switch or cancel a flight I choose them almost exclusively However I recently tried purchasing the inflight WiFi with free movies technically an movie since you have to pay for the WiFi first I was very disappointed in the inflight entertainment quality The movie buffered partway through for at least minutes and the audio didn t match up with the video because of the internet lag I will be downloading my own entertainment ahead of time from now on Wish I could have gotten a refund on the WiFi

reviews: When traveling with Southwest I accidentally placed my tablet on the edge of a garbage can forgot and walked into security a minute later I realized it and ran back but it was gone I had just started my vacation and was devastated as this was a very special birthday present I immediately placed a missing report but was frantically trying to cancel all my information loaded in my tablet A few days into my trip I received an email from Southwest saying they may have found something that belonged to me For a very small fee I have been reunited with my tablet in perfect condition I would like to thank the person who turned this in and Southwest airlines for their expert and immediate attention to an item in their possession that was lost My faith in the kindness of others and honesty of business has been restored I am very grateful I highly recommend Southwest Airlines from flying in their planes to the customer service on the ground
Lemma: travel Southwest accidentally place tablet edge garbage forget walk security minute later realize run back go start vacation devastate special birthday present immediately place missing report frantically try cancel information load tablet day trip receive email Southwest say may find something belong small fee reunite tablet perfect condition would like thank person turn Southwest airline expert immediate attention item possession lose faith kindness others honesty business restore grateful highly recommend Southwest Airlines fly plane customer service ground

reviews: Baltimore to Pittsburgh As I boarded this SW flight and was attempting to get a seat utilizing Southwest s open seating policy the attendant blocked me from getting to a seat stating he was holding the seats for others Because I asked him repeatedly about the Southwest policy that he was not adhering to he got loud stating that I need to find another seat I did and apparently I needed to have a cheery disposition because before I knew it another attendant was in my face telling me I need to listen to the attendants I was already in a seat and was lost as to what she was talking about sure enough another employee who was not even with the crew comes on board and is now demanding that I verbally answer him when he tells me I need to listen to the attendants and no I was not in the emergency exit nor was I doing any duties for the airline So yes we are back in kindergarten and I answered him but that too was not good enough because he provides his rendition to the captain and I was told to leave the plane I was not loud nor drunk nor physically abusive I did not raise my voice nor did I cause a commotion And now I am told to leave the plane because person decided to take his frustration out on me I did nothing wrong to anyone on that plane nothing wrong to anyone in the airport and Southwest can justify people making decisions like this If you are frustrated with your job before am then why does Southwest have morning flights Clearly the employees do not want to deal with customers during certain hours And what is even more disheartening is the fact that they are allowed to document lies and nonsense to cover their end and nowhere is it documented what I went through as a paying customer I guarantee I would not recommend Southwest to anyone ever

reviews: Baltimore to Boston I pride myself on packing a carry on bag whenever possible as opposed to checking a bag I find it infuriating the lack of communication between the flight crew and the gate attendant checking tickets Overhead bin storage for carry on luggage was cut off towards the end of the B group For those who do not understand who SW operates you are not assigned a seat Based on when you check in you are either in Group A B or C My fianc and I were B and B and around B an announcement was made that no more carry on bags allowed because overhead bin space was full No big deal right Well when you walk down the aisle and see five bins completely open I was inspired to write this review That doesn t include the bins that were partially full See below for just a few photos

reviews: Indianapolis to New Orleans I have been a big supporter of Southwest in the past I would drive the hours instead of using the local airport because of cost savings and a good flight I flew in March with no issues but this September was a different story My flight to MSY was okay but the return trip was another story My flight was cancelled I did get another flight to a city that was two hours from my destination I had to drive to the other airport to pick up my car Southwest lost my luggage and i had to wait several days for it to be delivered to my home I incurred extra cost to get back to the other airport at such a late hour and lost money by not getting back home at designated time I called Southwest to ask about reimbursement for at least my hotel and rental car that was extra but was told we do not cover those expenses I have another flight next month and I decided to just fly from the smaller local airport My expenses are a bit more but my time has value as well and with what happened last time the flight was not cheaper in the end Southwest did not provide value and I see no longer to fly with them
Lemma: Indianapolis New Orleans big supporter Southwest past would drive hour instead use local airport cost saving good flight fly March issue September different story flight MSY okay return trip another story flight cancel get another flight city two hour destination drive airport pick car Southwest lose luggage wait several day deliver home incur extra cost get back airport late hour lose money get back home designated time call Southwest ask reimbursement least hotel rental car extra tell cover expense another flight next month decide fly small local airport expense bit time value well happen last time flight cheap end Southwest provide value see long fly

reviews: Earlier this year we took a trip to New York and flew Southwest On our return flight you cancelled the flight telling everyone there was lightning at LaGuardia and Southwest was not flying You charged us per ticket for a round trip We should receive a refund each for you not honoring your end of the contract We received each curious as to what kind of math you used No assistance of any kind was offered by your companies personal and we were told another flight wouldn t be available until the next day The worst part is that it cost us an additional to fly home to the wrong airport on Delta that day We sat in the airport for nearly five hours waiting for our flight watching Southwest planes take off and land Since this is the way you treat customers we will never again use your airline and urge others to do the same

reviews: Chicago to St Louis I flew Southwest and it was absolutely terrible The crew was rude and grumpy One kept yelling at me to push my bookbag under the seat and it was as far as it could go because they ran out of overhead carry on storage room so they had to check everyone s rolling carry ons as checked bags It was a mess I will never fly Southwest again
Lemma: Chicago St Louis fly Southwest absolutely terrible crew rude grumpy One keep yelling push bookbag seat far could go run overhead carry storage room check everyone roll carry ons checked bags mess never fly Southwest

reviews: Salt Lake City to Cleveland I just booked my flight through Southwest then booked a rental car through their same portal after that I booked by hotel Saved me I thought I had done well for myself They booked by rental car for an hour and minutes after my landing but my hotel they booked for the next day Since I continued and confirmed my reservation it is nonrefundable This is all automated and does not indicate that my check in would be restricted till the next day I went in again thinking I had just not paid attention and done something wrong It again tried to do the same thing After minutes with customer service did nothing but regurgitate the lines they had been taught to admit to nothing and tell me I should have checked closer When I told her I was their website trying the same thing again she wanted to hear none of it I will fly with them in the future but will not use their automated system to book anything else
Lemma: Salt Lake City Cleveland book flight Southwest book rental car portal book hotel Saved think do well book rental car hour minute landing hotel book next day Since continue confirm reservation nonrefundable automate indicate check would restrict till next day go think pay attention do something wrong try thing minute customer service nothing regurgitate line teach admit nothing tell check closer tell website try thing want hear none fly future use automated system book anything else

reviews: Flew Raleigh to Orlando return this past week on Boeing aircraft The inbound flight arrived minutes early and had empty seats while the outbound flight was full and on time Had no problems with the ground or plane crew in terms of service the in flight phone app entertainment worked fine and it was an uneventful pair of flights Although it took minutes for them to start unloading luggage at the claims area when I got back Getting TSA PreCheck helps immensely
Lemma: Flew Raleigh Orlando return past week Boeing aircraft inbound flight arrive minute early empty seat outbound flight full time problem ground plane crew term service flight phone app entertainment work fine uneventful pair flight Although take minute start unloading luggage claim area get back Getting TSA PreCheck help immensely

reviews: Orlando to Philadelphia I was trying to get my elderly mother on a Southwest flight to Philadelphia so she would be safe from Hurricane Dorian which was headed towards Central Florida Regulations did not allow me to help my mother get onto the airplane and into her seat The Gate attendant was extremely helpful to me as my mother was traveling with her little dog and I was very concerned that she would become confused as she has some dementia and would not be able to find a seat or get into her seat while dealing with her dog and her purse The Gate attendant made sure that someone assisted my mother onto the airplane and helped her get her dog safely under the seat in front of her Once all the passengers were on board he made a point of coming over to me and assuring me that my mother was doing fine on the airplane and that the flight attendants would watch over her on her hour flight into Philadelphia I cannot begin to express my gratitude for his helpfulness that day He was an angel in disguise and I really appreciate everything he did for my mother and her dog Many thanks

reviews: We had to fly from Phoenix to LAX where we had a connecting flight from LAX to London from there Our Southwest plane was min late and we were running short on being able to make our connection flight in LA Southwest announced that they were offering early boarding and early exiting for the late flight for per person We talked to Southwest employee about waiving that fee for us since the plane was late and jeopardized our connection flight The employee said she couldn t do that for us because we should have allowed more time for the connection flight We had hours It seems that when Southwest is late it uses that to sell their customers early boarding and early exits because they know people with connecting flights are now running late and are forced to purchase these extra tickets What a scam I showed up on time and waited for your plane that s late due to you not being organized enough to get your customers in wheelchairs off the plane in a timely manner Now you want me to pay extra for you being late Horrible customer service
Lemma: fly Phoenix LAX connect flight LAX London Southwest plane min late run short able make connection flight LA Southwest announce offer early boarding early exiting late flight per person talk Southwest employee waive fee us since plane late jeopardized connection flight employee say us allow time connection flight hour seem Southwest late use sell customer early board early exit know people connect flight run late force purchase extra ticket scam show time wait plane late due organize enough get customer wheelchair plane timely manner want pay extra late Horrible customer service

reviews: Las Vegas to Orlando via Nashville On August flight was over minutes late arriving in Las Vegas This caused the flight to leave Las Vegas over minutes late this jeopardizing our connection flight in Nashville The flight attendants then said they will hold the plane in Nashville until we arrive there However we paid for the early bird check in because Southwest doesn t assign seats for their passengers In order for you and your family members to sit together you have to purchase the early bird check in which assures you a place in line within the first people This does not work if your flight is delayed coming in and your connecting flight already boards everyone even the people who didn t pay for the early bird check in So you get screwed and lose your place in line which you paid for So when they boarded us onto flight and we tell the flight attendant that we paid for the early bird check in The flight attendant says well we waited minutes for your flight to get in How is that the passenger s fault that the flight go in late So they tell us to sit in the only available seats which are center seats not even in the same row Also to make matters worse the seats are sandwiched in between larger than normal sized people So I had to squeeze between large people and my husband got to sit next to a lbs man who was partially in his seat so much so that he had to lay his tray table down to lean on it for the entire flight Did the flight attendants care Of course not because they herd people like cattle on these aeroplanes they don t care if your flight is uncomfortable The flight lasted hour and minutes to Orlando When we got home I called Southwest Customer Service and the only thing they said they can do from their end is to refund us the each that we paid for the early bird check in They said to call their Customer Relations Department On I call Customer Relations and explain to the representative the situation and the terrible experience and she said she can only refund us each in travel vouchers towards another Southwest flight So this airline company takes your money gives you a terrible flight experience and only gives you each for your unsatisfactory experience due to their flights not keeping on schedule I told the representative if Southwest assigned seats in the first place it would not have been a problem because no one would have sat in someone else s seat We pay for the early bird boarding to get within the first people on a plane so parties can sit together Looking back in hindsight my husband and I should have walked off the plane and asked to be put on another plane where we would be able to board within the early bird boarding and not lose our place in line I doubt if I will ever book another trip with Southwest

reviews: On both flights from New York to Los Angeles and the return Southwest cancelled one leg of the flight leaving me to spend the night in the airport on my own twice now in one month Today I had to wait a full hours to board the next flight Never book with Southwest if you are not flying non stop to your destination Cancellations and delays are the rule and not the exception The airline does not provide meal taxi nor hotel vouchers Delays and cancellations are always magically due to weather even in perfect summer conditions according to the airline The truth is that the airline does not have enough planes staff and pilots to cover slight delays
Lemma: flight New York Los Angeles return Southwest cancel one leg flight leave spend night airport twice one month Today wait full hour board next flight Never book Southwest fly non stop destination Cancellations delay rule exception airline provide meal taxi hotel voucher Delays cancellation always magically due weather even perfect summer condition accord airline truth airline enough plane staff pilot cover slight delay

reviews: On this day our flight was delayed due to storms I am a copd patient who travels with oxygen After a long day of traveling I was running low on battery charge The flight attendants went over and beyond what I needed to make me feel comfortable And charged my batteries The outlets at the airport are far and few that even work And the outlets are always far from were the wheelchairs are placed After a hour delay we made it home Thank you for all your help and assistance And to all who took time out of their day to help me thank you
Lemma: day flight delay due storm copd patient travel oxygen long day travel run low battery charge flight attendant go beyond need make feel comfortable charge battery outlet airport far even work outlet always far wheelchair place hour delay make home Thank help assistance take time day help thank

reviews: I flew Puerto Vallarta to Houston pilot tried to land twice and was a bad storm he good decided to come to Austin and get some gas I am always some stress about airplanes and I have been handling pretty good when I saw we were over the airport in Houston and had to go up twice I starting very nervous the Captain explained the situation but was very stressful not your fault I asked the stewardess if she can give me an alcohol drink and she answer in a bad attitude we cannot do that I was so stressed I understand sometimes you can t but was the mean way she said she was not nice with anybody please urgent put her in a customer service training on the back of the airplane the other stewardess were serving sodas and taking care about customers she was only sitting at the time I asked for a drink You have an excellent employees who always take care about customers and do amazing job but her attitude is the worst I have seen

reviews: Chicago to Norfolk via Orlando Yesterday I got on board my flight to ultimately take me to Norfolk The weather in Chicago was lightning and thundering so the pilot wisely put us back at the gate after finding out that we would not be taking off for sometime They allowed us to get off of the plane so that we could use regular washrooms It soon became evident that I was going to miss my connecting flight in Orlando which would ultimately take me to Norfolk I expressed my concerns with the pilot who suggested that I cancel and re schedule for today I went to the desk and got a ticket and will be flying out today In the meantime I had many questions come up regarding my rewards program and had to call customer service for two different issues Every single person I got with was perfect at handling their job I cannot give a high enough rating for this airline I have never had a bad experience traveling on Southwest

reviews: Milwaukee to Atlanta My family and I were taking a vacation to St Pete s beach in Florida Our flight from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay was at We wanted to fly into Tampa and take a cab to the hotel where we would be staying We could not fly directly to Tampa Bay so we had landed in Atlanta Now that would ve been fine if our two hour overlay didn t turn into a hour stay at the airport We missed the first day at our hotel which we paid for We had to sleep at the airport And we could not meet the rest of our family who was meeting us down there They flew on Delta There was a storm in Tampa Bay at the time yet every single airline except Southwest was flying there Delta and United were still flying to Tampa Bay I am sad to say this is not the first time I have had an experience like this At our hour wait at the airport the airline kept changing the estimation time from waiting to hours to adding an extra

reviews: Orlando to Milwaukee via Atlanta Arriving to the airport from a business trip to be notified the flight was an hour delayed Frustrating but understandable Things can happen A little over a hour later received a text that the flight was canceled Although it does text you new flights available the process makes you pay for the new flight so I didn t process but went to the counter at the gate There were over people in a line dealing with the same situation There were two ladies working the counter there were additional stations open that more employees could have been deployed to move the line faster I was in this line for hours Once it was my turn no greeting from the employee no apology and only one option was given for a new flight which was the following day with a layover making my direct flight into a much longer trip I asked if Southwest was offering any compensation to their customers for hotel accommodations and the answer was the weather in Milwaukee was going to get really bad and by the time the flight would get there the airport would be closed so no they don t compensate for weather That statement was false I live in Milwaukee and no rain or storms were in the forecast I left the counter not feeling valued as a customer In customer service how you handle a difficult situation is where you gain loyalty Not one of those customers walked away feeling valued or that anyone was doing all they could to help I understand a regional airline like Southwest doesn t have as many flights as the other airlines to try and help people but they could have shown empathy be apologetic offered some type of compensation even if it was a voucher for their airline But we were all just a number in a line I will suggest to my company and to my husband s company to think about this before booking their next flights

reviews: Baltimore to Fort Lauderdale I have flown with this airline several times and have only come back for the low prices The ground customer service is terrible The people tell you different things are often confused and have a bad attitude Both times i ve flown southwest recently the plane has been overbooked and they also forced people with carryons to check one even though you are allowed to check two The seats aren t awful but they aren t very comfortable either Both time we have checked in practically right at the hour mark when you are allowed to but we still end up in C class It s incredibly frustrating because I flew with my daughter who is We were told there would be no problem getting us a seat together but when we got on not only were there no seats together but there was only middle seats left She was really upset and scared to sit between two strangers The pick your own seat just isn t a good system in my opinion it s chaotic when you get on a plane and stressful to find a seat The on flight wifi is really low quality The plane staff is fine but they in no way go out of their way to be helpful I am overall very dissatisfied with my experience with Southwest and I will absolutely never fly with them again and unless you are a single flyer I urge you to choose a different airline too The lower price is t worth the drop in quality If you re looking for a comfortable and low stress trip stay away from Southwest airlines

reviews: Indianapolis to Denver I spent a lot of money on tickets to fly to Denver for my brothers wedding When we checked our bags in the lady at the counter told us we could board as family due to having of my kids under the age of When it came time time board with family boarding the lady at the gate was trying to make my older boys ages and wait and board at the end with c class She said only the parents and the children under the age of could board as family I spent more money on those tickets than probably anyone on that flight I told the lady at the gate that I was told we could all board as family and she said no For fear of being kicked off the flight I myself waited with my older boys and boarded last and we were all split up all over the plane and I couldn t get a seat close to my husband to help with the younger kids

reviews: Absolutely ridiculous customer service Don t fly Southwest Airlines Remember you get what you pay for If there are any issues that would require customer service assistance from this airline your done for The nightmare initially begun on the th of July when I was scheduled to depart from St Louis to arrive in Norfolk VA Arrive at the Southwest ticketing counter to learn my flight had been cancelled due to weather Once I learned this I asked the ticketing agent isn t it protocol for someone to call text or email me the customer to make them aware of the flight changes The reply I got was priceless Basically my question was ignored So now the ticketing agent begins to look in order to rebook my flight Now they book me a flight for the very next morning However this time I will have to fly from St Louis to Cleveland OH then to Chicago Illinois and then onto a Norfolk Of course I accept the reservation thinking all has been resolved and there would be no more issues So approximately hours later I arrive back in St Louis airport I board the first flight from St Louis thinking I m finally on my way to my destination and I would be good to go The plane lands arriving in Cleveland with the pilot coming on the speaker stating there s a weather delay and no one can get in or out of Chicago After sitting in Cleveland for almost four hours until finally being cleared for take off to continue the journey now to Chicago and then Norfolk Finally land in Chicago approximately three hours after my Southwest connection flight had already departed for Norfolk I immediately go to Southwest customer service counter to explain what I just went through First I m told all remaining flights are booked going to Norfolk I m also told that they can fly me to Baltimore Maryland the next day which would be the third day And I m also told when I get to Baltimore I would have to be on standby in order to try to get a flight to Norfolk Now my frustration is beginning to show I ask if I would be provided a hotel here in Chicago and I was told no So I get no hotel no later flight and absolutely nothing at all in order to make up for this inconvenience Not even a bag of peanuts or even a drink I always knew this was a suspect airline However take it from me Save your money and go United or Delta If you don t and something happens In my case weather Then your just throwing your money away I understand weather is not the airlines fault However it s how the customer service takes care of their customers during that inconvenience is what is being measured I m a customer who definitely learns from their mistakes In short no one should have to experience this especially in a strange unfamiliar city and then get told that the best they can do is have me sleep on the floor in the airport and then ride to another strange city to then be placed on standby for the final destination

reviews: I am very disappointed in Southwest s customer service I booked a flight back in March and just discovered days before my flight that they completely changed my itinerary without notification I originally selected a pm flight out of Atlanta because I live hours away from any airport and they are the closest So instead of waking up at am and leaving by to make it to the airport at am I now have to wake up at am to battle rush hour traffic and get small children through the airport There is reason I needed that flight time Any later flights and I am looking at getting at my destination around pm pm and then Driving another hours to get to my destination When I called to see what could be done the corporate office pretty much told me it wasn t their problem and there was nothing they could do I asked if they could get my family a hotel room the night before after spending thousands on tickets to book a flight you think they could throw me bone but they said they would not and that again this wasn t their problem WOW I always enjoyed flying with Southwest Because I though they were caring but apparently this is no longer the case I guess you get what you pay for

reviews: Indianapolis to Chicago Midway Worst customer service Flight was delayed due to maintenance issues We were later boarded with them telling us the issue was fixed We sat on the plan didn t take off The Captain came in trying to be funny asked a stupid question about how old we all were Then said we weren t going because of rain in Chicago I texted my daughter who lives in Chicago and was told it was total sunshine there Then the same captain came back minutes later to tell us the real problem was the original problem not weather During our more than an hour of sitting on the tarmac while the captain and maintenance crew were just trying to figure out why we couldn t leave we were offered nothing no water nothing After another minutes we were told the plane wouldn t be going anywhere it was out of commission This is almost hours after we were supposed to leave We were told to deplane and make other arrangements I stood in a line of people to get refund for an hour and a half I was then told by extremely rude customer service people I d have to call their customer relations department to get any compensation for sitting hours in both the airport and on the plane Horrible customer service I called the customer relations number they gave me to find out they close at pm EST and I d have to call back tomorrow They could care less about helping people just want your money Southwest has gone down the tubes with regards to customer service

reviews: Atlanta to Las Vegas I would never fly with this airline ever First the flight pattern was changed Just as we were getting ready to board the took our plane and sent it to Ft Lauderdale Then we had to wait for them to locate us a plane Now I paid for a direct flight We had to first go to St Louis at which point we were not to change planes We were taxiing in to unload those not going on with us and we were told to change planes Then we had to go to Austin prior to Vegas Now they only offered us food in a snack pack of mini pretzels child size snack pack While waiting in Austin to board additional people The staff were begging no one to open window shades as the A C was not working properly It was over booked and very hot hrs later we land in Las Vegas starving and tired and hot This airline could careless about our first experience with them
Lemma: Atlanta Las Vegas would never fly airline ever First flight pattern change get ready board take plane send Ft Lauderdale wait locate us plane pay direct flight first go St Louis point change plane taxi unload go us tell change plane go Austin prior Vegas offer us food snack pack mini pretzel child size snack pack wait Austin board additional people staff beg one open window shade C work properly booked hot hr later land Las Vegas starving tired hot airline could careless first experience

reviews: Dallas to Philadelphia Never use Southwest It is terrible We had our flight cancelled times because of technicalities Our flight was supposed to be on the th so we went and our flight got delayed We stayed there the whole day then our flight got cancelled Then we came back the th and we now got a connecting flight from Dallas to Houston to Philadelphia The one from Houston to Philadelphia got delayed for bad weather but when we checked the weather was perfect Then they were like sorry we don t know if it will be cancelled or not So we got another flight and we argued with them this time and on the th we finally got a single flight to Philadelphia from Dallas And we were late to a very important camp all because of Southwest
Lemma: Dallas Philadelphia Never use Southwest terrible flight cancel time technicality flight suppose th go flight get delay stay whole day flight get cancelled come back th get connect flight Dallas Houston Philadelphia one Houston Philadelphia get delay bad weather check weather perfect like sorry know cancel get another flight argue time th finally get single flight Philadelphia Dallas late important camp Southwest

reviews: Columbus to Las Vegas I like their prices but unfortunately it was a very hectic and annoying flight both there and back Arriving at the airport we were told we would not be able to make our plane switch due to the plane we were supposed to get on being delayed so much So we had to re schedule for the following morning and had to go clear back home and return to our flight in the morning but we made it to Vegas Then on the trip home the flight was supposed to leave at pm We did not take off until almost pm We sat on the plane after boarding for over an hour And then the flight was so bumpy and uncomfortable that I was in tears It was just an all around cruddy experience Again I love the prices that Southwest offers but for the experience we had it should be even less I just don t think that I can ever fly Southwest again unfortunately They were apologetic about all of the delays especially on the way back But I still wonder how it could happen It just seems unprofessional
Lemma: Columbus Las Vegas like price unfortunately hectic annoy flight back Arriving airport tell would able make plane switch due plane suppose get delay much schedule following morning go clear back home return flight morning make Vegas trip home flight suppose leave pm take almost pm sit plane board hour flight bumpy uncomfortable tear around cruddy experience love price Southwest offer experience even less think ever fly Southwest unfortunately apologetic delay especially way back still wonder could happen seem unprofessional

reviews: So dissatisfied with Southwest My daughter was checked into her flight last night to fly out today She received an alert that her flight was cancelled due to mechanical No other options available no compensation provided It was too late to cancel hotel and she ended up booking with Alaska and at such a late date spent double what she will be refunded by Southwest I will never again fly this airline
Lemma: dissatisfied Southwest daughter check flight last night fly today receive alert flight cancel due mechanical option available compensation provide late cancel hotel end book Alaska late date spend double refund Southwest never fly airline

reviews: Charleston to Cleveland via Baltimore After hearing great things about Southwest Airlines I booked a trip with higher expectations The cost was reasonable and the fact that you could take two bags was awesome It was my month olds first time flying and I thought because the reviews were grand we would be just fine on this flight even though there was a connecting flight and layover on both round trip flights I was very disappointed when we deplaned and were informed that our next flight would be delayed due to the air conditioning on the aircraft going out What started out as a minute delay became a hour delay with a switch of aircraft What s worse The aircraft we were switched to turned out to be having maintenance issues also They took an hour to figure that out then when we were called to board we were turned around again because the plane had too much fuel What was supposed to be an hour and a half layover turned into hours with a starving month old I had a rental reservation that had to be pushed back twice I missed my year old grandmothers birthday party and I ended up having to rent a car instead of the mini suv that I reserved due to the fact that the could not hold the car for me This was by far the most uncomfortable and frustrating experience and there were no apologies or attempts at consolation from any of the employees at the airport or on the air craft So disappointed in Southwest Don t fly with an infant you never know with this airline I guess

reviews: Tampa to Kansas City I know better than to choose Southwest but somehow I did The customer service was horrid My year old son was flying by himself He checked no bags The ticketing agent wouldn t let me go with him over to the plane and help him make sure he knew where to go She also wouldn t let me use my KTN for him to go through TSA Pre though when I travel with him on other airlines he gets to go through TSA Pre because I do He s too young and isn t eligible for TSA Pre yet The ticketing agent was rude and weirdly aggressive I m definitely never flying this joke of an airline again If it were just me I d have no issue but to do this to an year old is unconscionable Especially when it was so busy and my son already was nervous and confused I almost walked over to one of the better airlines and just purchased him a new plane ticket You definitely get what you pay for with this sad excuse for an airline

reviews: Minneapolis to Cancun via Chicago Midway After having a flawless flight to Cancun I was shocked at how things were so bad trying to get back to MSP After leaving Cancun and told we were going to land in Chicago we circled Chicago for over min because of bad weather Then told we were running low on fuel we had to land in St Louis to refuel Then waiting on paperwork we were finally ready to head back to Chicago After landing in Chicago we were told we had to stay on the plane for an hour because we were not near customs After min we were able to get off the plane and get through customs and get our luggage After all of that delay and when we got to a Southwest agent he told us the next flight back to MSP would take us BACK to St Louis and then to Ohio and end in MSP No Way So the Southwest agent said If you think you can make your flight go ahead and try So I booked it through security with many nice people letting me go ahead of them and starting at B I RAN to B Sweating and panting I made it to my gate with many C people still waiting to board Hooray I was an A person I gave the ticketing agent my ticket and he called someone and said She has a ticket but she is not coming up Then asked me to speak with a gate agent WELL MY SEAT HAD BEEN GIVEN AWAY SINCE NO ONE THOUGHT I WOULD MAKE THE FLIGHT CAN YOU BELIEVE IT With many people STILL waiting to board Just unreal They would do NOTHING for me but tell me I had a pm flight as my only option Then they tell me I m the last seat A C not an A like I was last time Even though I asked if I could please get on earlier No one was helpful at all such a shame to leave our resort in Mexico where everyone was kind and helped in any way they could Large disappointment to end a week of vacation Really had a different view of Southwest Airlines after this return flight

reviews: Little Rock to Ontario via Phoenix This was the worse flight of my life There were claim to be service animals on my flight of the dogs seem to really be a service animal because it was very chilled and quiet The other was barking jumping on people the owner even let it loose on the plane doing the flight Prior to boarding I witness this dog doing all of this so when I was boarding it was hanging out into the middle of the isle I asked the flight attendant if he could ask the owner to please hold the dog so I could board I have extremely high anxiety and fear of dogs He rudely said no i m not its a service dog I said I understand but I have a disability also and I need to board He rudely said I am not going to tell another person how or what to do with their dog A few people on the flight heard him and said Miss let me help you and blocked the dog so I could get by Shortly after plane took off the dog was loose on the plane a female flight attendant told the owner he would have to keep the dog with him I don t have a problem with people that need and or require service animals but I do think they should be made to control their animal I paid almost for my ticket was travel for bereavement of close family and then force to have to deal with my anxiety attack because of this one dog that was clearly not a service animal This was the worse experience flying ever and I fly often

reviews: Philadelphia to Memphis Worst experience ever Traveling with children and items of luggage Our flight got weather delayed and missed our last connecting flight No one on the plane or after exiting the plane was able to help No one offered a hotel or even a ride with one adult three children a car seat and four checked bags and a carry on for everyone We ended up having to stay and even while in line with all these bags and children I was asking for help and all the employees said I can t I m monitoring lines Monitoring lines Then after rechecking our bags I got a call to find our new tags were not added Which means they probably won t end up at our final destination I can t wait for this day to be over just so I never have to fly Southwest again

reviews: I regretfully feel obligated to report my experience this previous weekend regarding Southwest Airlines and their Southwest Vacations I have been a loyal supporter of Southwest for over years and have had nothing but superior customer service and great experiences until this unfortunate event I went to Southwest as I always do and decided to use their Southwest Vacations options since I was staying at a hotel this trip Everything was fine or so I thought untill my scheduled departure date I go online to check in to my flight only to find out that my flight has been cancelled without notification to me Surprised I call Southwest and try to understand what has happened After about hours on hold I was told that my flight was cancelled due to weather and that I had unknowingly booked through a rd party and not Southwest themselves despite using the Southwest official website to book After a minute conversation I was forced to leave the following day as there were no flights remaining that day unless I could get to the gate within minutes causing me to miss previously scheduled and paid for events that could not be made up or refunded I then call the hotel and try to cancel my room since I will not be staying there and they said that since I booked though Southwest Vacations they had to cancel the room and refund me Did not seem like an issue Fast forward to today I finally am back and get to speak with customer relations from Southwest Thinking that this should not be much of an issue as they had miscommunication on their end they could refund me for the nights stay that I would miss as they called and cancelled the night with the hotel and would be able to compensate me in some manor for the error of not contacting me to allow me to get on a different flight earlier that day that had availability and some possible compensation for the events that were missed During the conversation with the agent for Southwest she specifically said that They would take responibility for the error as Southwest Vacations is subcontracted though a rd party administrator Even though it bears the offical Southwest logo is accessed though their Official website they contract out that to another party but she still stated they would were taking take responsibility I think great we can get this taken care of to only have Southwest offer me a voucher to cover missed events a premium room on Saturday night in Las Vegas and a lost day of my vacation This is unacceptable as they themselves took responsibility for the error and still refused to at the very least refund me the money for the hotel room that was never used and some gesture for the error I can not believe that Southwest who allows their logo and namesake to be used to mislead loyal customers into using something that they promote on their website but then do not stand behind even though it holds their name is despicable I felt disrespected as a loyal customer to be offered for what was a loss of times that amount Southwest if you are going to license out your name to a separate company back them and have a system in place to contact clients or do not promote them on your official website to defraud your loyal customers

reviews: New Orleans to San Francisco via San Diego Where do I begin This is our first time flying Southwest since August of and to fully explain my frustration with their customer service I ll have to start with the story of them cancelling both of our flights and leaving us with no other option than for us to pay k each for tickets back home in order to catch our out of country flight the next day We are both wedding photographers and were leaving New Orleans to head to Baltimore for a wedding The morning of our flight about two hours prior we received a notification from Southwest Airlines that our flight was cancelled They provided us with alternative flight options which we selected and then put us on standby without communicating this with us Fast forward after a hour travel day we made it to Baltimore a little after midnight Keep in mind the direct flight is normally hours The morning of our returning flight from Baltimore to New Orleans we received yet another cancellation notification However this time the link to their flight change wasn t working no flights were available to select and the help call line to book another flight had a wait time of hours And so I waited because we didn t really have any other option And each time they picked up the call they disconnected us leaving us with literally zero alternative flight options or any way to get in touch with Southwest Airlines This charade continued on until pm in the afternoon no contact from southwest no alternative flights they straight up cancelled our flights and gave us nothing in return Because we were leaving the country the next day we had no other choice than to pay k for a ticket out of Baltimore Southwest Airlines finally got in touch with us a few days later not acknowledging any lack in their system pretending as though the day of our cancelled departure never happened They offered us a voucher for our trouble What A Joke Now a year later in hopes that southwest has their stuff together we ve boarded our plane from New Orleans only for them to tell us an engine failed to stay on They asked us to switch planes no biggie This stuff happens Two hours later and we re finally boarding the next plane We miss our connecting flight in San Diego due to their delay and end up waiting another two hours for our next flight They call us to the front desk to adjust our tickets A group what s up yes we were quick we were prepared and they had us boarding at the back of the plane I kid you not They not only delayed us by hours but they didn t even have the courtesy of taking care of us by allowing us to board in our original position or even during pre boarding Come on southwest we were loyal before you repeatedly screwed us over So while Southwest is great with their checked bags and while it s awesome that you can be flexible with them remember there s a massive chance they ll cancel your flight and leave you having to spend a couple grand on a new flight and then pretend that never happened
