reviews: El Paso to Oklahoma via Dallas What happened to all those employees who help in time of need There were kids on the ground exhausted people in distress by the boat load You guys are so quick to tell good stories and how your employees help They all went home to bed the few that were there I could tell were bothered by the chaos and had no answers for anyone There was one employee walking down the long line of people I thought finally someone to help give us an update No she was just trying to figure out why so many hundreds of people were in line at such a late hour I guess if I didn t start recruiting people at midnight to help find a taxi UBER or Lyft to Oklahoma I would have slept on the floor and I think your staff would have left thinking that seems wild It felt like we were treated just like that a wild animal who didn t belong in the airport Left pm from El Paso Texas Flight delayed while on plane pm due to fuel gauge The ramp got stuck and there was an electrical problem Still stuck on the plane Pilot in disbelief and apologies We wait back in the boarding area only to be told the flight is canceled hundreds of people get in line All the staff looked panicked with no words of comfort to a lot of sleepy tired angry people We wait for hours to be told no flights till Tuesday no vouchers for hotel no rental cars available too late to rent by midnight am looking for a place to sleep Decide to start asking Uber and Lyft after drivers refusing to drive that far I tried to go back into airport and they wouldn t let me in I m tired stuck with a floor to sleep on I call Southwest Airlines number lady tells me she can t refund my money because I m attached to my bags I m told by other customer after Storm was over many other flights took off Yet we were canceled I took lyft to drive us to Oklahoma city Now its I need to figure out how to get my bags and rental car what a nightmare I m so upset with Southwest Airlines right now they left me stranded and for some reason decided our plane was canceled while others continued to leave to their destination

reviews: New Orleans to Austin Flight was delayed leaving New Orleans because of weather elsewhere but Janez at Gate B at Louis Armstrong Airport in New Orleans La kept everyone in good spirits She had the whole gate area engaged in a sing a long with incoming passengers more than once inviting passersby to join in the fun She went above and beyond her duty as a gate agent to insure that our day would not be ruined by a delayed schedule Thanks to Janez and Southwest frustrations were eased and smiles were plentiful
Lemma: New Orleans Austin Flight delay leave New Orleans weather elsewhere Janez Gate B Louis Armstrong Airport New Orleans La keep everyone good spirit whole gate area engage sing long incoming passenger invite passersby join fun go beyond duty gate agent insure day would ruin delayed schedule Thanks Janez Southwest frustration ease smile plentiful

reviews: Oakland to Seattle After being an hour late on mechanical issues then loaded and taxing around then returned to the gate Finally they bored a cop to escort off a passenger that wasn t listening to attendants along with his family While doing it the attendant joked about how cute folks thought the cop was It was extremely poorly handled and now we are going to be hours late The keystone cops and attendants could not find their luggage It was the worst flight I have had in the last months and I have been on business trips so flights Now we have to gas up and get ok to leave again Maybe we will never get there
Lemma: Oakland Seattle hour late mechanical issue load tax around return gate Finally bore cop escort passenger listen attendant along family attendant joked cute folk think cop extremely poorly handle go hour late keystone cop attendant could find luggage bad flight last month business trip flights gas get ok leave Maybe never get

reviews: Denver to Houston with Southwest Airlines They cancelled the original flight re scheduled a new flight delayed it three times Too unreliable I won t fly them ever again even if I have to pay more
Lemma: Denver Houston Southwest Airlines cancel original flight schedule new flight delay three time unreliable fly ever even pay

reviews: Flew Southwest back in June from Philadelphia to Kansas City via St Louis and enjoyed the experience Staff were amazing flight was on time and food and beverages were substantial for the short flights My only minor gripe is that the seats could have been a little wider
Lemma: Flew Southwest back June Philadelphia Kansas City via St Louis enjoy experience Staff amaze flight time food beverage substantial short flight minor gripe seat could little wider

reviews: Dallas to Houston Horrible service Boarding process is chaotic and unorganized Sat on the plane for over an hour No explanations given Could have driven to Houston faster and with less hassle

reviews: Richmond VA to Houston TX Trip was planned with one stop in Atlanta from there I would take another flight to Houston The flight was canceled with no explanation given Then they rebooked us to another flight that would leave hours later This meant we had to hang around for hours in the airport Then once it came for us to board see flight delayed for an hour once again no explanation Will never fly Southwest again

reviews: Providence to Tampa Not only did I spend over hours on the Nashville airport floor sleeping on because of flights and delays and no accommodations I have now spent hours waiting at the providence airport on Southwest Airlines where the staff here seem a little rude I ve been pushed to the side delayed and just have received poor customer service My flights have been canceled twice now but have other flights flying from and to the same place through the same weather that has canceled my own flight interesting Now I have to arrange all my plans spend more money drive an hour to Orlando because the quickest way in was to Tampa I missed work last week during that fight cancelation I have to rent a car tonight etc etc It is just a little baffling there hasn t been one employee to help accommodate completely ruining all of my plans and pushing me to the side when another customer decided his question was more important I was told I m getting two dollar vouchers to southwest by a nice phone employee the only one who seems somewhat reasonable but I ve been sitting here for hours and haven t received an email about that Nice

reviews: On June th my family was headed to my sisters wedding from El Paso TX to Island Park Idaho where I was to be her bridesmaid We landed in Salt Lake City All of our luggage made it safely except one the most important one None of our clothes arrived Being that we had a hour drive we were not able to wait for it and later discovered it didn t arrive until pm or so Staff member from baggage claim in Salt Lake did everything she possibly could to try and get me our luggage but fed ex wasn t delivering over the weekend that far from Salt Lake She told me to get clothes and necessities and Southwest would reimburse us They did She spoke with her manager and then called me back to see if someone could drive back and get the luggage they would give us a travel credit voucher Unfortunately we could not but we still received a travel voucher So we made the best of it Upon return to Salt Lake airport the staff were wonderful I gave them my receipts and they promptly wrote us a check to reimburse us for what we had spent on clothes They retrieved our luggage These unfortunate incidents do happen and although it does inconvenience one it is not the end of the world Thank you Southwest for making us feel better about our situation

reviews: I flew from Atlanta to Norfolk Virgina to go to Outer Banks on June rd Left on June th from Norfolk back to Atlanta It was a rough day Flights were canceled all over After a very long day and many flight changes I made it home safe but my bags were lost I was exhausted and frustrated I had made a very dumb mistake and had something in my baggage that was very expensive I was sick I went to claim office and filed lost baggage Was told and filed loss Was told my baggage would be returned next day I received a call next day it was found and would be returned by pm that night Sure enough it was I am very happy to report all was in my bags the item I was most concerned about was in bag along with all else I don t fly much but when I do it is usually Southwest Have to say that will be my number one from now on Most staff I dealt with were amazing Have only one regret the man who delivered to me was the nicest man and regret I did not get his name Southwest thank you so much for all you have done

reviews: Minneapolis to Sacramento via Denver Worst flight and customer service experience ever experienced I can understand that weather is out of their control but it s how the flight changes were dealt with and poor customer service received that prompted this review We were flying from Minneapolis St Paul to Sacramento on a Sunday over Memorial Day weekend Unfortunately there was a layover in Denver and we missed the connecting flight Automatically rebooked the flight to the following evening and they did not offer any accommodations Also because we were put on standby for the earliest flight the next day their system removed us from the confirmed flight the following day even though we were fifth in line for standby They did not tell us this ahead of time and we slept in the airport because we would ve paid for hrs of sleep since we would have to go thru security once more in the morning When we did not make the cut for the following morning flight the later evening flight no longer had spots available After two hours and three service reps later we finally came across a service rep who cared enough to search for an earlier available flight to Sacramento Abdenbi was so great and a blessing to our rough experience Regardless I will never again voluntarily travel with southwest They should have handled this better by making it right with anything coupon voucher accommodation etc

reviews: We had a flight from San Antonio to Colorado to Vegas for Thursday at pm we had a wedding to get too Our flight got delayed so we wouldn t be flying out till We sat at the airport all night for a few hours and then They offered all of the passengers vouchers As we went to get our vouchers they said our flight was canceled it would be too late for us to leave from Colorado to Vegas when it landed so they said they Can re book us They rebooked us to fly out of San Antonio BUT they split us up and we all are having to arrive at separate times ranges from early morning to late afternoon We lost a night of a hotel we had already paid for because the hotel wouldn t let us save our night for another one We missed the wedding we were going for and one of our friends was stuck without a hotel since we wouldn t get there till the next day to check In for her since it was underneath one of our names Very disappointed they did a horrible job in accommodating us for the horrible experience we had The lady said it s out of her hands and we can either re book or leave it alone Southwest Airlines has done nothing to make us feel like we didn t lose out on time hotel money and food and our friend was left stranded alone in the Vegas airport for a whole night

reviews: I thought I had left early enough to get to the airport on time but I grossly underestimated how long things sometimes take for parking checking bags etc My original flight was supposed to leave at but I had just gotten started getting my bags checked at It wouldn t let me verify my flight in their system but within a minute or so the employee had asked if I wanted to be rebooked on another flight at going to the same place So very quickly I went from disaster to incredibly happy and the rebooking was free of charge I thanked him and even still managed to get a good seat on the first flight Very nice gesture that my late but very much appreciated
Lemma: think leave early enough get airport time grossly underestimate long thing sometimes take park checking bag etc original flight suppose leave get start get bag check let verify flight system within minute employee ask want rebooked another flight go place quickly go disaster incredibly happy rebooking free charge thank even still manage get good seat first flight nice gesture late much appreciate

reviews: Las Vegas to Oakland Never flown Southwest before this trip to the USA Overall rating would be quite good save for their seat policy In Europe or Asia I ve flown low cost airlines which sometimes for a small premium fee allow you to choose your seat in advance With Southwest you are only allowed to pay a substantial fee to be among the first to board but with no guarantee about the seat Should they allow seat reservation for a normal fee they would make a big improvement in what already is a good airline
Lemma: Las Vegas Oakland Never fly Southwest trip USA Overall rating would quite good save seat policy Europe Asia flown low cost airline sometimes small premium fee allow choose seat advance Southwest allow pay substantial fee among first board guarantee seat allow seat reservation normal fee would make big improvement already good airline

reviews: Dallas to Denver Watched staff let all of A and B class take on more than one bag then forced people in other classes to stow all baggage regardless of their willingness The agent was very disappointing in her response to why my single bag had to be checked while other were allowed to bring two or even three bags She simply lied and said that didn t happen them started saying sir over and over in a condescending manner I finally just walked on the plane no ticket for my bag no idea if I ll ever see it again Why can t I have a ticket for my single bag that I paid to bring on to the plane Extremely condescending employee Very unhappy customer
Lemma: Dallas Denver Watched staff let B class take one bag force people class stow baggage regardless willingness agent disappointing response single bag check allow bring two even three bag simply lie say happen start say sir condescending manner finally walk plane ticket bag idea ever see ticket single bag pay bring plane Extremely condescend employee unhappy customer

reviews: Good afternoon I wanted to take a minute to say thank you and share with you why you have converted me from another airline for life My wife s Grandmother was in her last days and hours of her life the last week of March this year My wife and I had planned on traveling to see her and had a ticket purchased already for my wife and one of my daughters but we needed it changed and needed to get me and my other daughter a flight For my work I travel quite frequently from Nashville to Dallas among other places on another airline Because of my status I like them to continue to build points with them I called them first to book myself and my daughter a flight to Phoenix They were of no assistance would not budge on the price for an emergency and would still charge me a large amount to move my points I hung up My wife then called Southwest Not only did they get us booked last minute they adjusted the pricing for an emergency and helped us the whole way thru it moving our points around etc Even when we got to the airport they bumped us to an even earlier flight to get us there as quickly as possible What a blessing it was to fly with you If we would have gone with the other airline or had we not been bumped up to an earlier flight we would not have made it in time to see her grandmother before she passed We arrived within less than hours of her passing What you do for people every day may seem routine but for us it was a life changing moment Having my wife be there before her grandmother passed means more to me than I can possibly express to you As a result I have decided to switch to Southwest for all of my work and personal trips going forward even though I do not have status with you Sometimes I fly out of Knoxville where you do not service but other than that I will forever use you now Thank you for making such a hard time for my family just a little easier

reviews: Raleigh Durham to Austin via St Louis My flight was scheduled for pm departure It was delayed waiting for passenger on a flight from Orlando It looked like I might miss the connection in St Louis I checked at the service desk in Raleigh They called and assured me that the plane would wait in St Louis I get to St Louis and I get off the plane and the flight to Austin is delayed hours I will arrive at AM I use lyft and I doubt that they will running at that time and I live minutes from the airport They couldn t offer me a room in St Louis or any alternative I really feel they are not telling me the truth I have lost trust in Southwest They are no longer my preferred airline

reviews: My handicapped sister and I were to fly from BNA to LAX via Atlanta Several passengers experienced a St Louis flight cancellation We all sat on the plane until they figured out how to help them In the meantime several more of us missed our connections as we sat on the aircraft Those of us who missed our connection to LAX were sent first to New Orleans then to Austin then to Phoenix arriving much later than our scheduled flight arrival time We were exhausted couldn t get off the plane to get something to eat Having arrived many hours later than scheduled we missed our prepaid shuttle at LAX that would have taken us to Ventura not exactly an inexpensive cab ride home I have been looking for the card given to me by the lady who helped us at the baggage claim area of customer service for Southwest She found us a room because we were stranded I m very grateful to her for helping us Its hard to believe Southwest put us in this position and made such a miserable trip of it

reviews: I took a returning flight from SJO to FLL yesterday with my yr old father who has Parkinson s When I got off the plane there was no assistance It was a complete disaster trying to get through baggage declorations and customs I booked my flight to SJO with Spirit Air who clearly at booking gives option for Wheelchair Assistance Everything on the Spirit flight went smoothly Not the case at all with Southwest It couldn t have gone any worse When I contacted Southwest customer service I was completely dismissed and was told it was the airports problem I was also told I should have not used the app and booked online so I could drop down a box some place and choose Wheelchair assistance Doesn t sound so handicap friendly Regardless I arrived at the airport hours before my flight so I could get this handled and was left on my own with my father who can walk far with consistent tremors and dementia Customer service could not careless
Lemma: take return flight SJO FLL yesterday yr old father Parkinson get plane assistance complete disaster try get baggage declorations custom book flight SJO Spirit Air clearly book give option Wheelchair Assistance Everything Spirit flight go smoothly case Southwest go bad contact Southwest customer service completely dismissed tell airport problem also told use app book online could drop box place choose Wheelchair assistance sound handicap friendly Regardless arrive airport hour flight could get handled leave father walk far consistent tremor dementia Customer service could careless

reviews: Austin to Houston This trip which ended in Alabama was the most horrible experience I ve had in all the years of traveling first the company that I went to work for chose the least expensive way to get me to the location When I boarded the plane I was wearing a leather jacket that was owned by my stepfather who had passed away it was handed down to me for years I had admired this jacket and I decided to take it with me for good luck at my sales event however it was rather bulky so when I got on the plane they were full and the airline stewardess asked if I would put the jacket in the above head storage I ve heard horror stories of arguing with a flight attendant and have seen too many movies so I complied and put it in the overhead bin However I did not realize of the seating arrangements which is open seating when you get on the plane so the only seats that were available were the center seats which left me at a disadvantage where I couldn t see the overhead bin that my jacket was it So when we landed I had to wait for everyone to move in order to get out of my seat and by the time I got to the bin where my jacket was to be it was gone I of course did not get upset because again did not want to be escorted off the plane so I asked as I got off about my jacket they said they would check on it once I get off I waited about minutes or so no one came out finally someone came out and said they could not find my jacket and that I would have to report it online because they had no one there to take the report which I thought was odd as a customer service gesture When I finally spoke to them they told me that I need to report it online after I done so all I heard from them is we haven t found it we haven t found it to this day I have not heard from them again it s as if they don t care what happens to your belongings and they have no sense of responsibility how sad for the general public
Lemma: Austin Houston trip end Alabama horrible experience year travel first company go work choose least expensive way get location board plane wear leather jacket own stepfather pass away hand year admire jacket decide take good luck sale event however rather bulky get plane full airline stewardess ask would put jacket head storage heard horror story argue flight attendant see many movie comply put overhead bin However realize seating arrangement open seat get plane seat available center seat leave disadvantage see overhead bin jacket land wait everyone move order get seat time get bin jacket go course get upset want escort plane ask get jacket say would check get wait minute one come finally someone come say could find jacket would report online one take report think odd customer service gesture finally speak tell need report online do hear find find day hear care happen belonging sense responsibility sad general public

reviews: Probably would not have been a bad experience if timing wasn t important but we had a connecting flight to meet up with a group of travelers to experience the adventure that most only hope to live You look over the the rude comments and answers to your questions while checking in and think well I guess you get what you pay for But when the flight was delayed delayed delayed and finally canceled We start scrambling to make the connection only to be told I apologize sir all flights are booked while looking through those glazed over eyes of I really don t care sir please step aside so I can brush off the man behind you we can put you on a flight tomorrow and there s nothing more we can do But our connecting flight with the group departs tonight Again expression doesn t change I apologize I m sure she was only caring out the script she had previously rehearsed in a training send down from corporate Well we missed our connecting flight and because of the logistics will miss the first two days of the journey I feel bad I was difficult today I guess you get what you pay for I assure you this airline will never have to apologize to me again

reviews: Austin to Phoenix Southwest had cancelled our returning flight and moved us to an earlier flight and were never notified us of the change When we showed up at the airport they told us we missed our flight The supervisor basically told us it was our fault because the only thing we had to show him was our original booking document He said Oh that document is from February so it doesn t count but he never even claimed that we had been notified of the change We ended up wasting an extra eight hours at the airport Southwest has screwed up three of the last five trips we have taken with them Their customer service has taken a sharp turn for the worse

reviews: On August th my family and I were flying back from what was suppose to be an amazing vacation Unfortunately and unexpectedly we lost my father while we were on vacation and he was with us As we boarded our flight one of the flight attendants recognized us from our departure and asked if we were down a family member We said yes and told our tragic story After learning of our unfortunate circumstances Gisela was the most amazing caring thoughtful person ever to step into our lives at the very moment we needed her Offering to help with loose ends and comfort She was absolutely an angel Thank you so much Gisela

reviews: Recently my friend and I flew from Kansas City to San Juan transferring through Baltimore Coming back we left San Juan to Kansas City transferring through Tampa My friend had shoulder surgery less than three months ago and was still handicapped She had called ahead of time as she is not able to walk very far and the airline when ask always had a wheelchair and person to put her on the plane or take her off which really helped me as I was carrying our overhead bags Since she has long legs one of the flights she had to sit about rows back with the seat next to the isle The bad part of this was that she could not stretch her legs like if she was on the front row and the arm rest would not lift up for her to push herself out The other flights she was able to sit in front and the only thing she missed was the tray on the newer flights that helps hold the snack and drink where the older air planes do not have this All the airline personnel no matter who they were were always helpful on these flights I am used to using a Kiosk in Kansas City outside and San Juan only has one inside and that made it hard trying to drag all the luggage inside

reviews: St Louis to Las Vegas Booked earliest flight am depart to am arrival to make it to a brunch and even paid extra night at resort to check in before Received email flight cancelled and rebooked automatically am to pm no phone call for other flight options Called representative to ask for earlier flight for both of us after minutes was able to make the changes for both of us I thought Received an email next day saying I missed my flight and was considered a no show The phone representative booked the wrong date for of our tickets I called to complain to representative and they were unable to refund my ticket I had to purchase a new ticket on my credit card He referred me to another customer service line waited minutes on hold before being assisted Then I was told they would try to refund me when it was clearly the employees fault After arguing my case politely and being on additional holds I was told I would be refunded within days So my credit card remains double charged for days hours on the phone and people later on the phone and still waiting for my refun I have been a loyal Southwest Customer and even referred friends for the Rewards Card however this was the worst experience I ve encountered Extremely disappointed You think they would at least give some sort of voucher for such a bad experience I had to argue to not have to double pay security fees and tickets

reviews: This review is actually for a flight I will catch tomorrow Southwest was so unbelievably nice to me just now that I had to do something nice for them Think about that for a second A large corporation was so good to me that I searched for a way to show a little gratitude This is a first for me I am so used to ATT nickel and diming me every chance they can and my bank finding new ways to pull more fees out for any slip up on my part that I thought my money was gone when I realized that I forgot to change my flight to tomorrow Their policy is that you can change or cancel and get a refund on any flight as long as you do this before your flight takes off That policy me makes SWA the best Buses and movie houses won t give you a thing if your plans change and they would only be giving you a few dollars Well this time I forgot to change the flight and thought that they are already being so generous to let customers change their minds for free there is no way they would help me out after I failed to simply do my part I called and my flight is tomorrow No charge Any other airline would have cost another Southwest you had every right to charge me again but you didn t I owe you one

reviews: Due to the terrible storms that recently took place in Dallas Texas I was unable to travel to California for two days The flights the following days of course were full since everyone had rescheduled and I had to cancel my trip I was traveling on American Airlines to California first and then Southwest from Burbank to San Jose Airport Because I could not get to California in time to catch my Southwest Flight I had to cancel it It was canceled two days before I was to leave April canceled I then received an email at the time the flight was supposed to take off in Burbank that said I had not canceled the flight and that I would lose all my money because I had not canceled it before the time of departure The huge storms in Dallas were not my fault and Southwest should have at least credited my account for a future flight Nearly all other airlines do this They refused to do this I won t be flying them anymore There service has become increasingly worse during recent years and there pricing policies e g the business seats scam we all know about are byzantine

reviews: Atlanta to Dallas The issue I have with this airline and the flight experience I had stems from the general lack of communication Flight planned to leave at pm from Atlanta with expected time of arrival to Dallas at pm the plane was to stop briefly in Austin with no projected plan to switch planes We arrive to Austin and hear over the intercom while in the plane This flight will be heading to Chicago so if you are going to Dallas you will have to get off this plane to meet with another plane expected to arrive soon Sorry for the abrupt change guys Essentially I was booted off this plane with no email text update from the airlines As I get off the plane everyone from my flight who had plans to fly to Dallas were all confused and lost because no one knew where to go to next what gate will be the next plane leaving to Dallas nothing I have never had service like this with them but I believe today they completely dropped the ball I wish I had some sort of email text correspondence that would have alerted me of this change The original flight had no delays foreseen or anything officially stated to those on the flight It s completely inconsiderate to those who need to return for work or need to be home to their children for school the following day when abrupt changes as this with little time to make room for adjustments Ridiculous
Lemma: Atlanta Dallas issue airline flight experience stem general lack communication Flight plan leave pm Atlanta expect time arrival Dallas pm plane stop briefly Austin projected plan switch plane arrive Austin hear intercom plane flight head Chicago go Dallas get plane meet another plane expect arrive soon Sorry abrupt change guy Essentially boot plane email text update airline get plane everyone flight plan fly Dallas confuse lose one know go next gate next plane leave Dallas nothing never service like believe today completely drop ball wish sort email text correspondence would alert change original flight delay foresee anything officially state flight completely inconsiderate need return work need home child school following day abrupt change little time make room adjustment Ridiculous

reviews: My fight was from Baltimore to Fort Lauderdale on March This was by far the best flight I ve had with any airline The flight staff was very courteous and humorous They constantly made announcements keeping us informed of everything Treated us like family and kept us laughing and entertained The flight was smooth and on time

reviews: Dallas to Atlanta Received a text at pm informing me that my flight was delayed until pm Fine not a problem Then on my way to the airport at pm and received another text stating that my flight was now leaving at pm Arrived to the airport to learn that those times are only considered estimates and that I should ve been here at in case that changed Nowhere in my communications from Southwest was I informed of this Got rebooked for a pm flight and since I m now here hours early I can t even enter the gate areas Also this trip was originally to take place a week ago but had to be rescheduled because Southwest cancelled that flight And this the nd time in a row that I have had this flight cancelled And Dallas is a Southwest hub I will never use this airline again Buyer beware
Lemma: Dallas Atlanta Received text pm inform flight delay pm Fine problem way airport pm receive another text state flight leave pm Arrived airport learn time consider estimate case change Nowhere communication Southwest inform Got rebooked pm flight since hour early even enter gate area Also trip originally take place week ago reschedule Southwest cancel flight nd time row flight cancel Dallas Southwest hub never use airline Buyer beware

reviews: Chicago to Oakland Southwest cancelled our flight going and coming home Instead of trying to help their customers they just leave them without options Within minutes every flight was sold out When they cancelled our flight flying out I called and the customer service rep said my flight coming home would not be cancelled It was and I was not able to get another flight for two days which was not possible due to a connecting flight We had to go with another airline that could accommodate us It cost allot of extra money and time Southwest could have cared less Then when I had to cancel the flight I booked two days later after I asked if I would get a full refund if I could get another flight they tried to charge me anyway It is unbelievable the lack of customer service they have provided this trip I m not understanding why they couldn t just get another plane to put all of these customers on and leave them where they are rather than just leave them with nothing to fin for themselves As of now I am considering never flying with them again and cutting my southwest card up They never once tried to make the situation better It s really sad they are treating their loyal customers this way You need a better system Southwest when you cancel flights For me personally I m scared to ever book a flight with you again I was really worried about how my family and I were going to get home at the LAST MINUTE

reviews: I just wanted to share my recent experience with Southwest so that people can make informed decisions and know what they are getting themselves into when they book with them I did not have a good experience with Southwest Airlines I received an email from Southwest on Wednesday night indicating that my Thursday morning flight back from Boston to Denver had been cancelled due to weather I had heard from my brother in law who used to fly Southwest frequently that they had a very strict weather cancellation policy so out of curiosity I went to check if all flights into Denver were cancelled or if Southwest was just falling back on their strict weather cancellation policy I found that both JetBlue and Spirit flights were still scheduled to arrive in Denver on time which would lead me to believe that although Denver airport conditions may not have been ideal they were safe enough for commercial airlines to fly in Denver International Airport was even indicating that they had of their runways open I called the number Southwest included in their flight cancellation email to reschedule my flight After waiting on hold for about hours I was disconnected so I called them back immediately only to wait on hold for more hours Once I was finally able to get through to a customer service representative to reschedule my flight the representative told me that the absolute soonest flight they could get me on was not until Sunday days later My husband and I had plans to go up to the mountains for the weekend and flying back into Denver on Sunday would have caused us to miss our entire trip So I called AMEX Travel as I had booked through them initially and they were able to get me on a United flight leaving Saturday one day earlier than the Southwest flight At this point I was really wishing I would have booked with JetBlue or Spirit as now I would be stuck in Boston an additional days that I had not planned for This means more nights in a hotel more days of having to purchase food and more days of missing work If this wasn t inconvenient enough my husband and I were also not going to be able to make our trip to the mountains which we had already planned Just for fun I added up all the costs that stemmed from Southwest cancelling my flight Hotel per night x nights prices had gone up over the weekend due to the St Patrick s Day holiday Food about meal x meals Missed days of work hr x hrs hr workdays Total amount lost due to Southwest cancelling my flight because of their strict weather policy this is not including the money that was already spent on our trip to the mountains that we were not able to take I don t know many people who can afford to just lose out on that amount of money Southwest did end up refunding my cancelled flight which naturally they should considering they cancelled it In addition when I called in to see if they could offer any other kind of compensation they offered me a Southwest flight voucher They indicated that because the flight was cancelled due to weather the cancellation was out of their control and is not their fault I beg to differ JetBlue and Spirit did not cancel their flights so clearly the cancellation was due to some policy Southwest has that JetBlue and Spirit do not

reviews: I flew to MO from NY for my sons Army graduation We had booked a return flight from MO to NY on at which was delayed until then cancelled I was told it was due to the weather and I would not receive a refund After speaking to different people I was finally told our flight was cancelled due to safety issues My family and I had to purchase different tickets through American Airlines because Southwest told us that they wouldn t have anything for another days One of the Southwest representatives said that they would return per person gave me a receipt told me it would return to my credit card within two days which was a lie I spent over on a rental car and new tickets in order to get home for work thinking I was getting my money back as I was told I will no longer be flying Southwest the customer service is terrible

reviews: I had a change of last name that I e mailed well back in Jan Upon requesting how to get my last name change I was not informed that I should also include any upcoming flight reservation numbers That being said only my Rapid Rewards profile was updated on the site nothing else I didn t know what to make of this by the time I went to fly out I was allowed to fly with my old married last name with no issues but was almost left to not be allowed to get on the plane from Austin because my ID didn t match my boarding pass name This caused me to nearly miss my flight and I rushed to the gate losing items I ve never in my life lost so many items in my life especially not all at once I was incredibly flustered I lost items at Austin one on a plane going to Nashville then at the Nashville Airport before boarding my flight back to Chicago The incorrect last name was Baker instead of Anderson I called to their Customer Service headquarters to where the best they could do was offer me a voucher of That s not even enough for a free flight round trip to anywhere They seriously don t care about their customers because aside from using this voucher I will no longer be using their flight services again I didn t even get a promised drink from Nashville into Chicago I also landed without a jacket because this was one of my lost items and ended up freezing I ve reported my lost items twice TWICE Because after you call in to report a claim of a lost item they insist that you fill out a document of theirs to be submitted via e mail on top of it This company makes all sorts of excuses as to why they won t do anything further They say that they had no idea I had an upcoming flight based on my RR I had no idea they even needed it So they can t point blame on me What happened to the Customer s always right attitude I ll be taking my business elsewhere and I recommend everyone else does the same I get that they are not responsible for lost items however I would not have lost any of those items if I hadn t been flustered to missing my plane to begin with so yes it is their fault when I ve never lost anything at airports in my life I m very disappointed in this airline company and I cannot wait to use their voucher to just move on to another airline company

reviews: I d rather fly harnessed to the wing of a JetBlue flight than fly Southwest Worst airline ever continually lets me down Started our trip off with an overcrowded flight where I couldn t rest my arm without bumping into a stranger This was an international flight by the way hours Then on the way back we went from Punta Cana to Chicago then back to Baltimore Added at least hours to my travel time Then when we finally arrived in Baltimore they lost my girlfriends luggage so I had to wait for another flight to land and see if it was there but it wasn t So they had to mail it to me All they gave me for this was a dollar travel voucher which I will never be able to use because I don t plan on using their airline again
Lemma: rather fly harness wing JetBlue flight fly Southwest Worst airline ever continually let Started trip overcrowded flight rest arm without bump stranger international flight way hour way back go Punta Cana Chicago back Baltimore Added least hour travel time finally arrive Baltimore lose girlfriend luggage wait another flight land see mail give dollar travel voucher never able use plan use airline

reviews: After being stuck in Denver for days and not email to let us know our flight was canceled to to weather we finally discovered we had to act fast as the airlines were filling up fast We were told the soonest a flight home would be is days away After spending more money and extending out stay I asked if Southwest Airlines could upgrade our boarding zone to B instead of C as it s first come first serve the answer was no We could purchase upgrade Both the man on the phone and multiple customer service were unsympathetic towards our situation as we were stranded for days I ll never fly Southwest Airlines again
Lemma: stick Denver day email let us know flight cancel weather finally discover act fast airline fill fast tell soonest flight home would day away spend money extend stay ask Southwest Airlines could upgrade board zone B instead C first come first serve answer could purchase upgrade man phone multiple customer service unsympathetic towards situation strand day never fly Southwest Airlines

reviews: Ft Lauderdale to Columbus via Orlando I recently thought I d try another airline other than Delta and decided to take a chance on Southwest Flight attendant was making extremely unprofessional comments over the loud speaker Secondly On the way there and the way back we didn t make it on time once Thought no big deal delays happen Called customer service to try and bump flights Estimated wait time minutes A company shouldn t even be allowed to say they have customer service with a minute phone wait time Do not fly with Southwest
Lemma: Ft Lauderdale Columbus via Orlando recently think try another airline Delta decide take chance Southwest Flight attendant make extremely unprofessional comment loud speaker Secondly way way back make time Thought big deal delay happen Called customer service try bump flight Estimated wait time minute company even allow say customer service minute phone wait time fly Southwest

reviews: Southwest continues to underwhelm I think I ve finally had enough They just cancelled my return flight with no explanation Literally no code is available to the agent explaining the reason Clearly it is so they can maximize profits during a busy week of flights Now my family of is stranded with no rental cars and no hotels available during spring break week The next available flight home is days away What are we to do Sleep outside On top of it all the customer service agent put me on a brief hold only to hang up on me because my call to figure out options was taking too long for her I hate you Southwest Never again And I will tell everyone I meet about this experience
Lemma: Southwest continue underwhelm think finally enough cancel return flight explanation Literally code available agent explain reason Clearly maximize profit busy week flight family strand rental car hotel available spring break week next available flight home day away Sleep outside top customer service agent put brief hold hang call figure option take long hate Southwest Never tell everyone meet experience

reviews: Atlanta to Punta Cana Hostesses were extremely rude and inconsiderate Very unprofessional Wouldn t recommend flying Southwest if you have an another alternative Flight itself was fine but our group was treated extremely poorly
Lemma: Atlanta Punta Cana Hostesses extremely rude inconsiderate unprofessional recommend fly Southwest another alternative Flight fine group treat extremely poorly

reviews: Dallas to Orlando I hate this airline This was the first time for me with Southwest and this is the most horrible airline I have travelled with No professionalism at all Rude staff No seats assigned seriously I will not fly Southwest Airlines ever again
Lemma: Dallas Orlando hate airline first time Southwest horrible airline travel professionalism Rude staff seat assign seriously fly Southwest Airlines ever

reviews: There was a slight delay in departure from Dallas to Washington however this delay was made up in the air On DAL DCA leg the aircraft was This aircraft with the new Boeing interior design is brighter with curved overhead bins Seating is very comfortable with ample leg room Service was the typical Southwest fare On the PVD DAL leg the aircraft was a Again there was a slight delay We were fortunate to be seated in the very first row thus we had all the extra leg room WiFi on both flights was excellent
Lemma: slight delay departure Dallas Washington however delay make air DAL DCA leg aircraft aircraft new Boeing interior design bright curved overhead bin Seating comfortable ample leg room Service typical Southwest fare PVD DAL leg aircraft slight delay fortunate seat first row thus extra leg room WiFi flight excellent

reviews: Providence to Dallas via Washington DC Both flights departed on time with no issues in the boarding process and or during in flight Service was typical of Southwest Flight Attendants come around and take your order for drinks and service snacks Both flights were on B On the PVD DCA leg there was enough leg room to seat in comfort The same could not be said for the DCA DAL leg The seating area felt cramped even though this was the same type of aircraft we flew in on from Providence
Lemma: Providence Dallas via Washington DC flight depart time issue boarding process flight Service typical Southwest Flight Attendants come around take order drink service snack flight B PVD DCA leg enough leg room seat comfort could say DCA DAL leg seat area felt cramp even though type aircraft fly Providence

reviews: Baltimore to Tampa I had surgery days prior and had medical documentation stating I was not to lift anything over pounds or walk extended distances I was not even supposed to fly but I was going to see a specialist on Maryland so the restrictions were put in place and we arranged wheelchair assistance I had zero issues the flight to BWI The trip back was an absolute nightmare and completely unacceptable We landed in Tampa after a turbulent flight which in turn heightened my pain I was of people that had boarded with wheelchair assistance When we landed we were advised that the wheelchairs weren t available yet Fortunately the other people were able to walk off the aircraft without a problem I advised the stewardess of my restrictions and stated I would wait Everyone had gotten off and the stewardess asked me to walk off I again told her I could not They cleaned the plane a bit and again told me I needed to get off I did not fight it and advised them I could not lift my bag and they carried it off for me and had me stand in pain in the alleyway and wait with the entire crew She then said I needed to go so I slowly started walking and walked most the alley way where I was then greeted with a wheelchair The attendant then took off hitting the bump off the gate I told him I just had surgery but clearly he was in a hurry This is absolutely unacceptable I legitimately needed help and had arranged for assistance on advance with documentation stating my restrictions If there weren t any wheelchairs available I should not have been forced to walk in pain when I was advised by a medical professional otherwise I had physical proof with me and this trip was not made by choice I called and filed a complaint with customer service and was advised I would get a response within days This is unacceptable My husband and I have always flown Southwest and never had an issue

reviews: Salt Lake City to to Bradley via Chicago All male flight attendant crew In this day and age it was nice to see a whole male flight attendant crew on the aircraft They were all professional and very nice especially the lead With southwest s mission being based and rooted upon great personality they have met that expectation and more Even with a difficult passenger a few rows in front of me complaining about a simple task of putting his belongings under the seat the lead still remained pleasant and professional Shout out to the crew for their hard work and positive work ethic Need more crews like them

reviews: Thursday receive an alert on my app my flight to Houston is cancelled No reason given The flight had a stop and plane Change in Las Vegas I have a seminar that I cannot miss I spend an hour on hold and an hour online trying to rebook with Southwest no luck book with Spirit airlines I find the contact link to SWA and send a message cancel my return trip also stating I cannot wait to book a flight and I have one on another airlines One hour later I receive a call from SWA can we work something out No I have already booked a new flight cancel and refund my money Today I check my e mail and I have a no reply answer from them It states the flight was cancelled for inclement weather Las Vegas received an inch of snow on Thursday I lived in Vegas for years and in the airport received of snow and they did not cancel flights Then I get a CNN news alert that SWA is cancelling flights all over because of a mechanics negotiations that has gone on for two years It appears that most flights in or out of Las Vegas are cancelling

reviews: Minneapolis to Dallas via Chicago I had flight on Feb early morning at Am initially from MSP to Dallas There was no snow but they still cancelled the flight Rescheduled to am they just cancelled again For next day feb I rescheduled to flight for early morning am it got cancelled again Rescheduled to Am flight later it also got cancelled To be frank I guess they don t have enough people to fly in their flight so they just cancelled flight by saying weather conditions Because I have all my friends traveled on both days without any problem since there is no snow It has very bad customer service I would not recommend them for my future travel
Lemma: Minneapolis Dallas via Chicago flight Feb early morning initially MSP Dallas snow still cancel flight Rescheduled cancel next day feb reschedule flight early morning get cancel Rescheduled flight later also get cancel frank guess enough people fly flight cancel flight say weather condition friend travel day without problem since snow bad customer service would recommend future travel

reviews: Chicago to St Louis Southwest canceled our Flight at pm the night before our trip The weather was not the reason since their other flights flew We were given a phone number to call There was a minute wait to reschedule Since most flights on this route are close to or totally fully booked we returned by train Since the last trips on this route have had hour delays twice and a hour minute delay once we will fly other airlines This is the second time in years a flight was canceled
Lemma: Chicago St Louis Southwest cancel Flight pm night trip weather reason since flight flew give phone number call minute wait reschedule Since flight route close totally fully book return train Since last trip route hour delay twice hour minute delay fly airline second time year flight cancel

reviews: Southwest used to be a decent airline but has recently declined in service We took our year old daughter to Disney Our return flight was canceled without notification To make matters worse when I asked the attendant at the gate I was told it was because of weather Being skeptical of this weather related issue I called Southwest customer service number and was told the real answer which was the the flight was canceled due to maintenance issues So not only was I not informed of the cancellation they lied to me at the gate This is not the first time this has happened last time I was on business This is my last trip on Southwest Unacceptable Especially when you re traveling with a child Southwest Get your act together
Lemma: Southwest use decent airline recently decline service take year old daughter Disney return flight cancel without notification make matter bad ask attendant gate tell weather skeptical weather related issue call Southwest customer service number tell real answer flight cancel due maintenance issue inform cancellation lie gate first time happen last time business last trip Southwest Unacceptable Especially travel child Southwest Get act together

reviews: Las Vegas to Oklahoma City Our flight was cancelled and I did not get an email until right before I was checking luggage Others got an email the day before Then we booked another flight late that night to get a cancellation minutes making the reservations They didn t have any flights back to Tulsa until days later I had to fly into OKC and drive the rest of the way The line was so long I got out after standing in the same spot for minutes I didn t get anything for this trouble

reviews: Los Angeles to New Orleans My originally flight from Oakland to LAX with connection flight LAX to MSY was postponed due to mechanical windshield wiper motor error Our flight was changed times with the best option staying with original flight and hoping plane would be fixed After hours we finally flew to LAX where we had to wait in baggage claim for hours and argue to get a hotel reminder that we missed our connection flight home due to southwest equipment malfunction Southwest gave us a voucher for travel to and from hotel but second voucher could not be plugged into app as payment Staffs response was I don t know how to help you Staff was unhelpful and inefficient having to contact supervisor for hotel then travel arrangements to and from hotel We had NO direct contact or conversation with the manager Once we arrived to the hotel which was minutes away from the airport the service desk attendant told us they never received a call from southwest and hopefully she could find us a room We decided to Uber back to LAX and payed on our expense due to voucher not working Get to southwest for am flight after hours of sleep due to inefficiency of staff and wasting our time trying to figure out processes which should already be in place Flight from LAX to MSY was delayed yet again hours due to mechanical errors I asked the desk attendant if I could have more specifics to document for work and the response I received was I don t know anything further and when I asked if there will be an announcement as to why flight was delayed the response I got was no we are inspecting the plane and when it is safe to fly then we will notify you Awaiting flight in airport which total hours spent is hours and counting for this one flight on my birthday

reviews: Chicago to Sacramento Well this is the second time in a row this has happen with southwest I and my husband are active military and never received baggage claim We have important places we need to be at a certain time and don t have time to wait days without our military belongings This is ridiculous They re service wasn t great They didn t seem to care of the situations we had come across This is a disaster Don t think I ll ever travel with them again

reviews: Raleigh to Denver Huge fan of Southwest I will use them whenever possible over any other airline However not a huge fan of the early bird check in feature The past times I purchased it it did not work Did not check me in and gave me a much lower boarding number The first time I caught it close enough and was able to get B but when I brought it up to customer service at the gate they just kinda shrugged and said that s weird it shouldn t have sold it to you when we didn t have any more available and that was it No apology no refund offer no anything The second time even though I d paid for early bird I made sure I was prepared to check myself in just in case Glad I did It didn t work again I checked myself in and again brought it up to the gate agent and customer service again just a shrug and weird No apology No refund offer Nothing It s very confusing to me because Southwest has amazing customer service in all other avenues in my experience But with early bird check in they just don t care if it works or not It s an additional per person in my party that they pocketed So now I continue to use Southwest but I don t upgrade to the early bird check in It s not worth it when it s unreliable
Lemma: Raleigh Denver Huge fan Southwest use whenever possible airline However huge fan early bird check feature past time purchase work check give much low board number first time catch close enough able get B bring customer service gate kinda shrugged say weird sell available apology refund offer anything second time even though pay early bird make sure prepare check case Glad work check bring gate agent customer service shrug weird apology refund offer Nothing confuse Southwest amazing customer service avenue experience early bird check care work additional per person party pocket continue use Southwest upgrade early bird check worth unreliable

reviews: Buffalo to Phoenix I had an amazing experience with Southwest on February Due to a reversal of departure time I arrived at the airport stressed and late The staff was amazing The ticket agent checked my luggage quickly with a late check in tag I was doubtful it would make the flight I raced to the gate and the gate agent was wonderful and so helpful She assured me my luggage would arrive and she was right My luggage and I both arrived in Phoenix together and on time Fabulous experience with Southwest
Lemma: Buffalo Phoenix amazing experience Southwest February Due reversal departure time arrive airport stress late staff amaze ticket agent check luggage quickly late check tag doubtful would make flight race gate gate agent wonderful helpful assure luggage would arrive right luggage arrive Phoenix together time Fabulous experience Southwest

reviews: Hartford to Tampa The fact that we were significantly delayed tonight by hr min isn t even the motivation behind this review It s not even the constant WiFi problems we experience every single flight The main reason is Southwest s lack of heart I was A List Preferred and have flown SW exclusively for a few years now I was three flights short in to maintain my A List Preferred status and I emailed them explaining that the reason I was short was because I was forced to fly Delta a few times due to Southwest cancelling or delaying the flights in question It was such a light hearted plea too I thought surely in the name of customer experience they ll understand and appreciate the fact that I m loyal to them still and they ll do the right thing Not so much unfortunately Instead I get this canned email response below We received your email and appreciate your taking the time to contact us As a valued Customer of Southwest Airlines your feedback is very important to us and we welcome the opportunity to respond A List and A List Preferred status provides lucrative benefits to recognize and reward our most loyal Customers and we must rely on our Rapid Rewards Members to gain entry to these tier levels through their activity in the program I truly understand your frustration given that you were only three flights shy of qualifying for A List Preferred In order to maintain the integrity of our Rapid Rewards program and continue to provide the perks associated with each tier status we must consistently adhere to the program rules Saying no to a request for tier status that has not been truly earned helps ensure that we are able to say yes to offering benefits to our qualifying Members in the future Your patronage and loyalty has not gone unnoticed It s our hope that you will continue flying Southwest Airlines as it would be our privilege to welcome you onboard for many years to come Sincerely Nancy Southwest Airlines

reviews: Atlanta to Chicago I have horrible anxiety and gets worse when I need to fly I am a person that believe my feet belong on the ground Well I had to take a business trip solo and never flown alone I saw the pilot coming from grabbing some lunch so I approached him to see if he was flying the plane or going home If he was going home I was going to ask to sit next to him to help with my fears He was the flying pilot He asked me if everything was ok and I told him I was very scared and nervous He told me it was going to be ok and a smooth short ride I thanked him for the conversation and went to wait in line to board Well a few mins into waiting a wonderful man came and said to come with him They allowed me on the plane and introduced me to everyone working on the plane The wonderful gentlemen told me to pick any seat and he would sit next to me and guide me through the sounds and bumps so I know I m safe Everyone working on flight was so amazing I wish I knew each and everyone name working that day to call and tell their bosses how much I appreciate everything they did to help me feel better Thank you so much Southwest Airlines You all are amazing and I hope your bosses know this I cannot thank you enough for taking the extra time to help me
Lemma: Atlanta Chicago horrible anxiety get bad need fly person believe foot belong ground Well take business trip solo never fly alone saw pilot come grab lunch approach see fly plane go home go home go ask sit next help fear fly pilot ask everything ok tell scared nervous tell go ok smooth short ride thank conversation go wait line board Well min wait wonderful man come say come allow plane introduce everyone work plane wonderful gentleman tell pick seat would sit next guide sound bump know safe Everyone work flight amazing wish know everyone name work day call tell boss much appreciate everything help feel well Thank much Southwest Airlines amazing hope boss know thank enough take extra time help

reviews: Indianapolis to Ft Myers From the beginning of the flight to the end our stewardess Deborah was a consummate professional There was a screaming baby people were not loading with consideration of others in mind but Deborah took it all in stride Her beaming smile and wonderful compassion to this harried new parent was a refreshing change to those of us used to being just another number in the airline industry If Southwest keeps employing stellar employees like Deborah I will no longer even search out the competition Quality beats any of the other items that I could possibly consider Thank you again Deborah
Lemma: Indianapolis Ft Myers beginning flight end stewardess Deborah consummate professional screaming baby people load consideration others mind Deborah take stride beaming smile wonderful compassion harry new parent refreshing change us use another number airline industry Southwest keep employ stellar employee like Deborah longer even search competition Quality beat item could possibly consider Thank Deborah

reviews: Sacramento to San Diego On the flight out the plane pulled away from the gate on time only to sit on the tarmac for an hour so they could complete a repair But of course this was considered an on time departure On the return flight the captain informed us that something was dropped under the captains chair and they had to remove the chair and an access panel to retrieve it I kid you not After minutes the captain came out of the cockpit picked up the intercom and with a grin on his face showed the entire passenger area the item that was retrieved a cupholder Just great I feel so confident flying with Southwest
Lemma: Sacramento San Diego flight plane pull away gate time sit tarmac hour could complete repair course consider time departure return flight captain inform us something drop captain chair remove chair access panel retrieve kid minute captain come cockpit pick intercom grin face show entire passenger area item retrieve cupholder great feel confident fly Southwest

reviews: Our plane from Baltimore Washington to Aruba had some minor mechanical issues forcing us to divert to San Juan instead of flying directly on to Aruba There was another plane waiting for us in San Juan and we were able to make it to Aruba hours late which was great considering the diversion The best part of the story is a few hours later we received a voucher each for from SWA for the delay Considering we used points and my wife flew on a companion fare free it cost me nothing for the flight SWA handled the problem well and we arrived only three hours behind schedule when it could have been a much longer delay They were so smart with sending out vouchers to all of us in a timely manner

reviews: On December I flew my daughter back to California from Phoenix Her luggage that was checked in was opened and checked by Homeland Security We did not know the suitcase was checked until the next day in the afternoon My daughter and I decided to put her Christmas gift cards PlayStation Ross and Burlington in the selfie light box that she got for Christmas as well thinking they would be safe Not the case When my daughter open the selfie light box to retrieve her gift cards because her mother was taking her shopping that day she discovered that the Burlington gift card had been stolen What a disappointment My daughter is years old and this was her first experience flying and this is the treatment she received from a dishonest employee I contacted Southwest and they sent me an email stating that the missing item my daughter s Burlington gift card is not covered I feel ripped off and appalled that Southwest does not take responsibility for such misconduct
Lemma: December fly daughter back California Phoenix luggage check open check Homeland Security know suitcase check next day afternoon daughter decide put Christmas gift card PlayStation Ross Burlington selfie light box get Christmas well think would safe case daughter open selfie light box retrieve gift card mother take shopping day discover Burlington gift card steal disappointment daughter year old first experience fly treatment receive dishonest employee contact Southwest send email state miss item daughter Burlington gift card cover feel rip appal Southwest take responsibility misconduct

reviews: Long Island to Baltimore I have always experienced excellent service from Southwest Airlines except in the area of TSA The TSA constantly reminds me that it is not their fault that pre check is not open or in Albany s case pre check has no body scanner for pre check I know SW is not responsible for TSA agents but since they have not sent me the usual evaluation form here I am I met my st obnoxious agent ever on at am at ISP I asked why pre check was not open and he yelled at me that it was not his fault It was SW s Since I had packed for pre check screening it took me a little time to locate liquids He badgered me the entire time with a loud voice At one point he asked the woman behind me if she was his witness She asked for what and he shut up The woman who did the extensive pat down was excellent And how about this At BWI my luggage was on the carousel before I arrived there
Lemma: Long Island Baltimore always experience excellent service Southwest Airlines except area TSA TSA constantly remind fault pre check open Albany case pre check body scanner pre check know SW responsible TSA agent since send usual evaluation form meet st obnoxious agent ever ISP ask pre check open yell fault SW Since pack pre check screen take little time locate liquid badger entire time loud voice one point ask woman behind witness ask shut woman extensive pat excellent BWI luggage carousel arrive

reviews: San Diego to Sacramento No interest in helping passengers They create arbitrary timelines regarding departure time and announcements with no real structure Their ability to brush off all customer concerns and pass off customers to avoid problems overshadows the prices for flights They are cheap for a reason Consistently stuck on planes waiting for passengers on one flight and on the next they turn multiple people away They state they do hard paperwork for the pilot before each flight which must be untrue if they pilot comes walking on minutes before departure Another example of an airline that overbooks passengers When asked about the status of my luggage I was informed of a new system to check luggage The employee stated she could not see where my luggage went due to the new system This is a joke Southwest It is so easy to be an honest and compassionate company yet you challenge yourself daily by treating customers the ones that buy the tickets like second class citizens I will not be flying Southwest and have since been using Alaska airlines with no problems

reviews: Boston to Dallas via Houston I have been contacting Southwest Airlines to get my check in bags which was sent from Boston to Dallas They canceled my flight my connecting flights initially and I was stuck in Houston for hours asking for another flight before I was given another flight to Dallas which got a layover of hours in Oklahoma City When I reached Dallas they have no idea where my checked in bags are Tried contacting baggage claim office They were not interested in helping me Tried contacting customer care They couldn t help either Tried contacting baggage office last hours multiple times but no answer I am stuck in this city with no clothes and I have to leave from here tomorrow Now they have ruined my trip and my new agenda for today is to take an Uber and go to the airport which is miles away and check with them if my bags have reached
Lemma: Boston Dallas via Houston contact Southwest Airlines get check bag send Boston Dallas cancel flight connect flight initially stick Houston hour ask another flight give another flight Dallas get layover hour Oklahoma City reach Dallas idea check bag Tried contacting baggage claim office interested help Tried contact customer care help either Tried contacting baggage office last hour multiple time answer stick city clothes leave tomorrow ruin trip new agenda today take Uber go airport mile away check bag reach

reviews: I have been trying to get home for the last hours Weather delayed my flight at first which is obviously not their fault but then the aircraft landed us in a different state kicked us off left our luggage and left us I was then thrown onto a random flight that wouldn t even be getting me home I arrived in the middle of the night and they gave me no ticket to even get home After I went to the counter to get a new flight home it would be another hours before I could board My luggage was left behind in the other state because of their sloppy work of throwing me onto a different flight at random and I have no clue when I will be getting it My father is now driving hours to pick me up because Southwest has stranded me at different airports and gave out no hotel vouchers Therefore I have been in airport chairs for the last hours and I have more to go Bless my dad for stepping up

reviews: Phoenix to Cleveland I will never fly Southwest Airlines again You get up early to check in so you may have the luxury of choosing a seat and if you re traveling with loved ones being able to sit next to them Well my partner and I got a B boarding pass When we finally get to board we see these personal items of somebody s placed on two rows of seating When my fiance and I go to sit down we are told those seats are being saved for someone else s family members Obviously those family members did not get up to get a higher boarding number When I asked the stewardess if that was allowed the stewardess replied we don t regulate the seating Needless to say my fiance and I we re separated during a very long flight Also we ordered drinks and the stewardesses sat in the back giggling and laughing with each other rather than doing their job we didn t get our drinks until we had to ask them not once but twice I have been a faithful Southwest customer so has my mother two sisters aunt and many cousins I have told my whole family about my experience and we all agree to never fly Southwest again Next time I need to fly I will pay the extra money and Fly Frontier Airlines that way I ll pay an extra couple of bucks but at least I know I ll be sitting with the person I m traveling with and where I want to Southwest Airlines you ve got a lot of cleaning up to do and until then you just lost a lot of business from my family
Lemma: Phoenix Cleveland never fly Southwest Airlines get early check may luxury choose seat travel loved one able sit next Well partner get B boarding pas finally get board see personal item somebody place two row seat fiance go sit tell seat save someone else family member Obviously family member get get high boarding number ask stewardess allow stewardess reply regulate seating Needless say fiance separate long flight Also order drink stewardess sit back giggling laugh rather job get drink ask twice faithful Southwest customer mother two sister aunt many cousin tell whole family experience agree never fly Southwest Next time need fly pay extra money Fly Frontier Airlines way pay extra couple buck least know sit person travel want Southwest Airlines get lot clean lose lot business family

reviews: Tulsa to Houston via Dallas I pay extra for Business class every time to board first Southwest boards all the pre boarding first and places them all in the front rows It s not worth the money to pay extra Fly American where you know what seat you will be in It s absolutely a rip off to pay the extra when the first to rows are already filled up when you get on Then they try to give you one free drink if you will move seats Not trying to be an asshole but the people who preboard don t pay extra It s ridiculous to pay extra when you get nothing from it I fly at least twice a month and now I know why I don t fly with them very often
Lemma: Tulsa Houston via Dallas pay extra Business class every time board first Southwest board pre boarding first place front row worth money pay extra Fly American know seat absolutely rip pay extra first row already fill get try give one free drink move seat try asshole people preboard pay extra ridiculous pay extra get nothing fly least twice month know fly often

reviews: Baltimore to Los Angeles Traveled with month old daughter and husband We got a red eye flight Daughter was not having it and started screaming crying for about half the fight One flight attendant in particular kept questioning me if this was our first time flying and why my daughter was acting up I told her she s months old to which she replied In my years of experience experience I ve traveled with a lot of toddlers Made me feel as if something was wrong with my daughter or me being a bad mother Never again will I fly with Southwest I ve heard bad experiences from family and friends that traveled with Southwest but now that I have experienced it myself I ve had enough
Lemma: Baltimore Los Angeles Traveled month old daughter husband get red eye flight Daughter start scream cry half fight One flight attendant particular kept question first time fly daughter act tell month old reply year experience experience travel lot toddler Made feel something wrong daughter bad mother Never fly Southwest heard bad experience family friend travel Southwest experience enough

reviews: Orlando to Nashville I arrived at the airport hours prior to my boarding time Once I checked in I was notified that my flight was delayed No big deal Then it was delayed more times Then it was canceled I understand that it was raining when I arrived at the airport but according to the radar there was no serious weather conditions at my current location nor at my destination Other Southwest planes were leaving left and right I tried calling customer service but was put on hold and never got in touch with a real agent Everything was automated I ll fly Delta next time
Lemma: Orlando Nashville arrive airport hour prior boarding time check notify flight delay big deal delay time cancel understand rain arrive airport accord radar serious weather condition current location destination Southwest plane leave leave right try call customer service put hold never get touch real agent Everything automate fly Delta next time

reviews: Orlando to Philadelphia This is our first time flying with the SouthWest airlines but I wasn t happy coming back from Orlando FL Philadelphia PA Check in staff told us that we can board as a family of together But boarding staff was rude and unpleasant not letting us in because apparently SouthWest has policy that family can board together only with kids and under I have a y o kid and we were scalded and shouted on us many times in front the other people that we just would like to cut the line with small children She didn t had any rights to humiliate me and my family like this It wasn t handled this situation intelligent way at all After this we were seated the last ones on the airplane and basically all of the seats were taken Our family was scattered all over the airplane because South West have open seated option I was surprised that they found two seats for me and my yo son I m not sure what the management thought by this decision but many families on the airplane was unhappy I would recommend changing it People didn t wanted to switch the seats and everybody felt like imprisoned for a couple of hours I m happy that it was h min flight and never buying cheap tickets anymore from this airline You should change a lot in your policies and retrain your staff how to handle conflict situations with customers
