reviews: I just got off flight to San Diego from Austin and the three flight attendants were so amazing My month old daughter was very fussy and not wanting to sleep and the three flight attendants were quick to help The FA s offered to walk her up and down the plane for me made sure we had plenty of juice and kept us supplied with crackers and even made a makeshift baby rattle for her Hands down the best service I ve ever received during a flight Normally I would ve felt embarrassed or judged but they didn t I will definitely be only flying southwest from now on

reviews: El Paso to San Antonio So if you ask for assistance lifting your bag over your head you cannot sit in the emergency exit row I am a law student and figured I d add the heavy books to my luggage over the backpack Well I should have checked my bag because when I asked for a boost to push the bag in the flight attendant first said she had a hurt shoulder and couldn t do much to assist She gave it a light push Then when the bag was up she said if I couldn t lift my bag over my head I couldn t sit in the emergency exit row The year old man with the tiny bag could but I could not The elderly couple the wife could not lift her own bag but her husband lifted it for her could sit in the emergency exit row Last time I sat in that row a former pilot assisted me in putting up my bag and did not flag down a flight attendant or even mention that if I could not lift my bag I can t sit there The flight attendant could not lift my bag yet she is still able to work and presumably can open the door Further the guests in the emergency exit row were drinking cocktails Intoxication seems to render them fit I have already addressed this issue with Southwest on Twitter and they do not seem to care I lifted my bag from the overhead bin myself and made a mental note to not ask for help check my bag in the future so my ft tall stature can sit comfortably in the future This is merely a warning to future customers

reviews: I flew from Indianapolis to Dallas for four days for a family Thanksgiving My bag never made it on the flight Upon arriving to Dallas we immediately filed for a lost bag They located the bag and said they would deliver it I had to wait two days before my bag got there which was half of my vacation The compensation for the inconvenience we got was the bag delivery itself That is down right ridiculous I had to buy clothes and bathroom supplies for Southwest Airlines mistake This was extremely unprofessional and I will probably never fly Southwest Airlines again

reviews: I am so thankful to be coming home this week to work at Corporate and to spend Thanksgiving with family and friends A big shout out to Southwest as I booked my ticket in reverse from Columbus to Tampa leaving today except I m in Tampa They were able to get me home today still on the next direct flight and fixed my ticket for the following Tuesday They even let me keep my incredible price of round trip This is why I fly Southwest regularly It pays to be a loyal flyer

reviews: Raleigh to Orlando Nothing bad service wise to say about my trip RDU MCO RDU The outbound flight was delayed five minutes coming from Phoenix but had empty seats and let customers spread out Arrived in Orlando on time Inbound flight back to Raleigh was packed full and arrived minutes early Service was friendly both ways Southwest Airlines will continue to get my business for future trips

reviews: Oklahoma City to Chicago My flight was delayed multiple times and their customer service sucks The staff needs better training as they do not know what they are talking about It took the th rep to be able to tell me the true answer to my issue after being told and promised something different They do not honor what they say Make sure you get it in writing because all you will get is a I m sorry this is policy We will address this internally I wasted hours on the phone with them
Lemma: Oklahoma City Chicago flight delay multiple time customer service suck staff need well training know talk take th rep able tell true answer issue tell promise something different honor say Make sure get write get sorry policy address internally waste hour phone

reviews: Tampa to Los Angeles via Denver Just beware of Southwest Airlines Business select When you use the word Business in relation to air travel it usually means a wider seat more legroom better meal service prioritised baggage and lounge access If you tick the box and pay for this so called upgrade you get none of those things Fair enough you have some fare flexibility and the bags go free Apart from that and a free drink coupon you get an economy seat and economy treatment You get to board early And it cost me a lot of money a few hundred dollars for this so called upgrade you could say that I should have taken the time to read the fine print but I made the error of thinking that Business meant Business My advice it s a scam and don t bother with it

reviews: San Jose to Portland My flight got delayed a lot and I tried to catch an early one I was first on the waiting list A class Luckily they had one empty seat so I was prepared to go to the door when a very SW employee flirting around with the male passengers told me that there is somebody else in front of me specifically her latest flirt Normally I would have not care much since it was a long shot to get on an early flight but her indolence made me fight for my seat Her supervisor came of course said it s me who is supposed to be in the plane and that she will try to make it right The captain came and help with one more seat Their help was much appreciated but for me this was last time flying with SW Too many delays non professional crew and higher price compared with the other airlines without any comfort for the money This happened on flight from SJC to PDX the delayed flight was

reviews: Richmond to Phoenix via Atlanta They lost my bag on veterans day What a nice way to say thanks to an OEF and OIF veteran What really annoyed me and spurned this review was finding out that this airline doesn t scan bag tags at loading unloading and track bag movement like the other airlines How can this not be integrated into a major us airlines technology infrastructure in Unacceptable Furthermore Southwest refuses to admit that the bag was lost and is instead just delayed Garbage When I asked the agent where the bag was she couldn t tell me since they don t track I then asked her what you call it when you don t know where something is Her answer Lost I needed what was in the bag to prep for a business meeting on Monday which I am now unable to do
Lemma: Richmond Phoenix via Atlanta lose bag veteran day nice way say thanks OEF OIF veteran really annoy spurn review find airline scan bag tag load unload track bag movement like airline integrate major us airlines technology infrastructure Unacceptable Furthermore Southwest refuse admit bag lose instead delay Garbage ask agent bag tell since track ask call know something answer Lost need bag prep business meeting Monday unable

reviews: Originally going from Grand Rapids to Birmingham through Chicago Midway The GR flight was delayed hours so I would miss my connection I asked customer service if I could drive to midway and catch the connection They said no that was not possible to do but would rebook me on a different flight I drove to midway for the rebooked flight to find that it too was delayed by more than hrs and would miss my connection in Tampa So they rebooked me on the second leg of the original flight the one customer service said was not possible to get on Sat at Chicago Midway for hrs only to find that this flight too was now delayed hours None of these delays were due to weather by the way I have now had of my last Southwest flights delayed Shame on me for continuing to use this sub par airline I guess I m a glutton for punishment

reviews: Tampa to Nashville I tried to check in hours early to get a good seating position No checking button but there was an early bird option I clicked and paid It said I would be checked in early but didn t see any boarding info I kept refreshing screen to see if it would give a check in button Finally about min after the hour advance period it gave me the checkin button and I checked in Now have position B I have never had B when checking in right at the hr mark This was because the screen didn t give me the button SW is obviously giving preference to other people and delaying the checkin button for others Horrible service Like traveling in a semi trailer full of cattle when you can t check in early I called and they said that the early bird check in button checked me in early for the return flight not the st flight Horrible user experience Absolutely the worst In the future I will fly a real airline that actually allows you to have better than a middle seat
Lemma: Tampa Nashville try check hour early get good seating position check button early bird option click pay say would check early see board info keep refresh screen see would give check button Finally min hour advance period give checkin button check position B never B check right hr mark screen give button SW obviously give preference people delay checkin button others Horrible service Like travel semi trailer full cattle check early call say early bird check button check early return flight st flight Horrible user experience Absolutely bad future fly real airline actually allow good middle seat

reviews: Grand Rapids to San Antonio via Chicago I have been flying Southwest for years and have been very happy with the airline and Rewards program until this last trip I checked in my daughter and I hours in advance and it asked me to check a box by each name obviously can check in a person at a time That afternoon something happened and my daughter could no longer go I got on line and went to cancellations It asked for the passenger name and confirmation number I put in my daughters name and was able to cancel her flight Fast forward about hours later and I arrive for my flight at am eastern standard time I was told that my flight had also been cancelled even though I only ever entered my daughters name They were able to re book me but I had paid points for tickets and they re booked me for ticket at points I called customer service and they could not help I called customer relations and I was told if I had called them before I re booked they would have helped However they were not even open for business until am CST hours after i had to get on a plane I am thoroughly disgusted with the lack of help and the fact that both flights were cancelled when only name was entered
Lemma: Grand Rapids San Antonio via Chicago fly Southwest year happy airline Rewards program last trip check daughter hour advance ask check box name obviously check person time afternoon something happen daughter could longer go get line go cancellation ask passenger name confirmation number put daughter name able cancel flight Fast forward hour later arrive flight eastern standard time tell flight also cancel even though ever enter daughter name able book pay point ticket book ticket point call customer service could help call customer relation tell call book would help However even open business CST hour get plane thoroughly disgust lack help fact flight cancel name enter

reviews: I have flown with Southwest several times including my very first flight back in December It was also my year old son s first flight from STL to Denver and we were all so nervous It was an extremely early flight am departure When we first boarded the pilot was standing in the aisle and introduced himself to my son We told them it was our very first flight ever and he could see that my son was in tears After introducing himself he told my son that he will safely get us there and will make sure it s a wonderful flight so he will love flying so do not worry about a thing and even showed my son the cockpit area it made his day week year They also gave him a little airplane sticker pin We hit a little bit of turbulence on the way however the pilot told us every single time prior to possibly hitting it and even explained why and that it was perfectly safe and how long the turbulence might last It made us all so comfortable I have flown at least flights just since then and have yet to have a bad experience with Southwest Their crew are unbelievable always going above and beyond for us My son has flown two more times and looks forward to it every time gets super excited to meet his pilots as he says And they always shake his hand We will always fly Southwest

reviews: Oakland to San Diego I missed my flight and Robert from Southwest San Diego helped me get to my destination He issued me a standby ticket but later as I was waiting outside for a ride back home he found me and handed me an actual ticket He helped me during this difficult time and I am so grateful for him

reviews: Sacramento to Houston via Los Angeles This airline had me and passengers delayed for over two hours due to mechanical issues Don t you think you should get all of us paying passengers to a different safe and working airplane The fact that I have waiting over hours because this unorganized airline either doesn t have enough working planes or don t care enough to get us moving

reviews: Charlotte to Minneapolis Our flight was delayed due to other issues than weather leaving Charlotte this evening In trying to determine whether to book a new flight in Charlotte we asked the staff We were told that we had ten to fifteen minutes and should sit up front and run to the next concourse We did not know it was on the other side of the airport So we upgraded sat up front and ran to B in Chicago Midway to make our connection home to Minneapolis Even though we made it to the gate and saw the plane sitting there we were told that it was gone and we had to book a flight hours later And we needed to go back to where we were told to run from There was no communication to the gate that passengers were running across the airport This airport is the worst Southwest hub in the world and this was the second and last experience there Southwest can do better than this
Lemma: Charlotte Minneapolis flight delay due issue weather leave Charlotte evening try determine whether book new flight Charlotte ask staff tell ten fifteen minute sit front run next concourse know side airport upgrade sit front run B Chicago Midway make connection home Minneapolis Even though make gate saw plane sit tell go book flight hour later need go back tell run communication gate passenger run across airport airport bad Southwest hub world second last experience Southwest good

reviews: Houston to Norfolk via Baltimore I flew out of Houston TX to Norfolk VA on Oct and was to return on Oct My Daughter s nd Birthday was on the th of Oct I went to the gate on the th for my departure nothing was said about having to pay for my daughter s return flight because she was now I go to the airport to depart and was rudely told I need to pay for her ticket and that the information is on the website and that she is Sorry I didn t read it I would assume being in customer service and knowing the regulations that it would have still been told to me when looking at my daughter s Birth Certificate and seeing she turns two within the time of my stay in VA I called the airline and they told me that I have no choice but to pay for my daughter to fly back I didn t anticipate the money and didn t have it I had to miss my flight and go back to a friends house that I stayed with I didn t have a rental car anymore because I had to turn it in so I had to wait for someone to come get my daughter and I After I got to my friends house I called and spoke withthe Customer Relations Dept and she said she was sorry about my situation and that I could apply for a donation ticket back I went to the website and read that SWA gives away free tickets a year to those in need but the request can take weeks I have a job I had to get back to didnt have enough diapers or anything to continue my stay So I called them back Again I am sorry but there is no way around it you ll have to pay I told the agent I can pay on the th but will it still be the same amount of money for my daughter to fly back and how much will it cost to change my reservations She said they can t guarantee the price will be the same and that she didn t know how much more out of pocket I would have to come out I live paycheck to paycheck I only went to VA because my oldest daughter gave birth to my first Grandchild and it was important I would be there I could have left my daughter with my Husband while I was gone if I would have known I had to pay for her return flight back But since I was stuck there no one cared and upper management that could have helped me and also didnt want to get on the phone themselves did not help nor care I was stranded without a vehicle and no place to go with my year old daughter I was fortunate enough to reach out to distant family and borrow the money to fly back home with my baby I have never flown with SWA before I always chose Delta and from here on out I will stick with Delta Not only are the flight attendants rude and their customer service is completely incompetent they honestly have no heart or no care in the world The Customer is not their priority
